[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'dul ba cha bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bsil yab thogs te 
[\[1b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la bsil yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[1b.3\]]la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par sdus shig_/tshe 
[\[1b.4\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/_'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas 
[\[1b.5\]]pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad 
[\[2a.2\]]dpong sa'i khang par mchis shing mthun par gyur na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das dpong sa'i khang pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa 
[\[2a.3\]]nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lnga po 'di dag ni 'jig rten na yod cing srid pa'i ston pa dag yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di na ston pa gcig ni tshul khrims yongs su 
[\[2a.4\]]ma dag bzhin du bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar byed de/_de la nyan thos rnams kyis lhan cig 'grogs pa'i rgyus ston pa shes ldan 'di ni tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du bdag gi 
[\[2a.5\]]tshul khrims yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar shes mod kyi/_bdag cag gis gal te ston pa 'di gzhan la brjod par gyur na/_des 'di yid mi dga' bar 'gyur bas bdag cag la gang gis 'di yid mi dga' 
[\[2a.6\]]bar gyur pa des ston pa la kun du spyad pas ci bya ste/_ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid kyis shes par zad do/_/'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_na ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag gis sems 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]par byed do snyam pas nyan thos rnams kyang de la tshul khrims kyi sgo nas rjes su bsrung ba bya bar sems so/_/ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams las tshul khrims rjes su srung bar re bar byed de/_'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing srid pa'i ston pa dang po yin no/_/gzhan yang 'di na ston pa 
[\[2b.2\]]gcig ni 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag bzhin du bdag gi 'tsho ba yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar byed de/_de la nyan thos rnams kyis lhan cig 'grogs pa'i rgyus ston pa shes ldan 'di ni 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag bzhin du bdag gi 'tsho ba yongs su dag cing 
[\[2b.3\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar shes mod kyi/_bdag cag gis ston pa 'di gal te gzhan la brjod par gyur na des 'di yid mi dga' bar 'gyur bas bdag cag la gang gis 'di yid mi dga' bar gyur pa des ston pa la kun du spyad pas ci bya ste/_ston pa shes 
[\[2b.4\]]ldan 'di rang nyid shes par zad do/_/'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_na ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag gis sems par byed do snyam pas nyan thos rnams kyang de la 'tsho ba'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung ba bya bar 
[\[2b.5\]]sems so/_/ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams las 'tsho ba rjes su srung ba re bar byed de/_'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing srid pa'i ston pa gnyis pa yin no/_/gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni shes pa dang mthong ba yongs su ma dag bzhin du bdag gi shes pa dang mthong ba 
[\[2b.6\]]yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar byed de/_de la nyan thos rnams kyis lhan cig 'grogs pa'i rgyus ston pa shes ldan 'di ni shes pa dang mthong ba yongs su ma dag bzhin du bdag gi shes pa dang mthong ba yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[2b.7\]]pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar shes mod kyi/_bdag cag gis ston pa 'di gzhan la brjod par gyur na des 'di yid mi dga' bar 'gyur bas/_bdag cag la gang gis 'di yid mi dga' bar gyur pa des ston pa la kun du spyad pas ci bya ste/_ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]shes par zad do/_/'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_na ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag gis sems par byed do snyam pas nyan thos rnams kyang de la shes pa dang mthong ba'i sgo nas 
[\[3a.2\]]rjes su bsrung ba bya bar sems so/_/ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams las shes pa dang mthong ba rjes su srung ba re bar byed de/_'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing srid pa'i ston pa gsum pa yin no/_/gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni brda sprod pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin bzhin 
[\[3a.3\]]du bdag ni brda sprod pa phun sum tshogs shing /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar byed de/_de la nyan thos rnams kyis lhan cig 'grogs pa'i rgyus ston pa shes ldan 'di ni brda sprod pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin bzhin du bdag ni brda sprod pa phun sum 
[\[3a.4\]]tshogs shing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar shes mod kyi/_bdag cag gis ston pa 'di gzhan la brjod par gyur na des 'di yid mi dga' bar 'gyur bas bdag cag la gang gis 'di yid mi dga' bar gyur pa des ston pa la kun du spyad pas ci bya ste/_
[\[3a.5\]]ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par zad do/_/'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_na ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag gis sems par byed do snyam pas nyan thos rnams kyang de la brda sprod pa 
[\[3a.6\]]phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung ba bya bar sems so/_/ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams las brda sprod pa phun sum tshogs pa rjes su srung ba re bar byed de/_'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing srid pa'i ston pa bzhi pa yin no/_/gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni 
[\[3a.7\]]chos 'dul ba nyes par bshad pa dang ldan bzhin du bdag ni chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa dang ldan zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar byed de/_de la nyan thos rnams kyis lhan cig 'grogs pa'i rgyus ston pa shes ldan 'di ni chos 'dul ba nyes 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]par bshad pa dang ldan bzhin du bdag ni chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa dang ldan zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar shes mod kyi/_bdag cag gis ston pa 'di gzhan la brjod par gyur na/_des 'di yid mi dga' bar 'gyur bas bdag cag la gang 
[\[3b.2\]]gis 'di yid mi dga' bar gyur pa des ston pa la kun du spyad pas ci bya ste/_ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par zad do/_/'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_na ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag gis 
[\[3b.3\]]sems par byed do snyam pas nyan thos rnams kyang de la chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung ba bya bar sems so/_/ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams las chos 'dul ba legs par bshad pa rjes su srung ba re bar byed de/_'di ni 'jig rten na yod 
[\[3b.4\]]cing srid pa'i ston pa lnga pa yin no/_/dge slong dag nga ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa kho na yin pas nga'i tshul khrims yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar byed de/_nga la nyan thos rnams tshul khrims kyi sgo nas rjes su bsrung ba bya bar 
[\[3b.5\]]mi sems shing nga yang nyan thos rnams las tshul khrims rjes su srung ba re bar mi byed do/_/dge slong dag nga ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa kho na yin pas nga'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar byed de/_nga la nyan thos rnams 'tsho ba'i sgo 
[\[3b.6\]]nas rjes su bsrung ba bya bar mi sems shing nga yang nyan thos rnams las 'tsho ba yongs su srung ba re bar mi byed do/_/dge slong dag nga ni shes pa dang mthong ba yongs su dag pa kho na yin pas nga'i shes pa dang mthong ba yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' 
[\[3b.7\]]bar byed de/_nga la nyan thos rnams shes pa dang mthong ba'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung ba bya bar mi sems shing nga yang nyan thos rnams las shes pa dang mthong ba rjes su srung ba re bar mi byed do/_/dge slong dag nga ni brda sprod pa phun sum tshogs pa kho na yin pas nga'i brda sprod pa phun sum tshogs 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]shing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar byed de/_nga la nyan thos rnams brda sprod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas rjes su srung ba bya bar mi sems shing /_nga yang nyan thos rnams las brda sprod pa phun sum tshogs pa rjes su srung ba re bar mi byed 
[\[4a.2\]]do/_/dge slong dag nga ni chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa dang ldan pa kho na yin pas nga'i chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa yin zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa med do zhes dam 'cha' bar byed de/_nga la nyan thos rnams chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i sgo nas 
[\[4a.3\]]rjes su bsrung ba bya bar mi sems shing /_nga yang nyan thos rnams las chos 'dul ba legs par bshad pa rjes su srung ba re bar mi byed do/_/dge slong dag nga ni khyed la tshar bcad cing tshar bcad cing smra bar byed zil gyis mnan cing zil gyis mnan cing smra bar byed de/_khyed la 
[\[4a.4\]]dbyig tu mi 'dzin cing rdza mkhan gyi snod so ma btang ba dag bzhin du gang snying po yod pa de 'jog par byed kyis nga'i tshig gi lam dag la bzod par gyis shig_/de nas lhas byin gyis ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dag la smras pa/_
[\[4a.5\]]ko ka li ka_/khan da dra bya/_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya/_rgya mtshos byin dag khyed cag tshur sheg_/dge sbyong gau ta ma 'dug bzhin du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa dbye bar bya zhing 'khor lo yang dbye bar bya ste/_des na bdag cag shi zhing /_dus la bab pa dag la dge sbyong gau ta 
[\[4a.6\]]ma de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che ba/_de tsam du mthu che ba 'dug bzhin du lhas byin dang /_ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin gyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa phye zhing 'khor lo yang dbye ba byas so zhes phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 
[\[4a.7\]]rnams su snyan pa'i sgra'i tshogs rgya chen po dge ba mngon par grags par 'gyur ro/_/lhas byin bdag cag gis de ltar byar mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mthu che ba/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_lha'i mig dang ldan pa/_gzhan gyi sems 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]shes pa gang dag yod pa de dag ni thag ring po yang mthong la drung na 'dug pas kyang mi mthong zhing de dag gi sems kyis bdag cag gi sems la khyab par bya ste/_yid kyis kyang bdag cag rnam par shes par byed pas de dag gis bdag cag 'phags pa nyid kyang shes 
[\[4b.2\]]par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/ko ka li ka thabs 'ga' zhig yod do/_/lhas byin thabs de gang yin/_tshur sheg dang bdag cag dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi drung du dong ste/_gnas brtan dag thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig dang bdag cag gis 
[\[4b.3\]]gnas brtan rnams yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o zhes yo byad thams cad kyis bstab par bya'o/_/gzhon nu rnams la ni lhung bzed dang chos gos dang dra ba dang phor bu dang ska rags dang lung dbog pa dang /_bklag pa dang kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang yid la 
[\[4b.4\]]bya bas bsnyen bkur dang stongs mo bya'o/_/lhas byin gal te thabs de lta bu yod na de ltar bya'o/_/de nas lhas byin gyis dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir brtul ba dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis 'phags ma thag tu lhas byin gyis dge 'dun 
[\[4b.5\]]mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir brtul to/_/zhes rnam par shes par gyur nas/_dge slong rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lhas byin dang gzhan yang de lta bu gang 
[\[4b.6\]]yin pa la bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa lhas 
[\[4b.7\]]byin khyod dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed kun du dga' mi rtsod mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing /_chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas lhas byin la tshe dang ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun mthun pa dbye 
[\[5a.2\]]ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed kun du dga' mi rtsod mchog gcig 'don pa 
[\[5a.3\]]gcig cing /_chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bzhams te bsgo'o/_/dge 
[\[5a.4\]]slong rnams kyis de la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[5a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis lhas byin dang gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la 
[\[5a.6\]]yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong lhas byin 'dis dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i slad du brtul te/_dbyen bgyid par 
[\[5a.7\]]'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste mchis nas/_'di la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]snyad 'dogs par bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis lhas byin la tshe dang ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod 
[\[5b.2\]]pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed kun du dga' mi rtsod mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing /_chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston 
[\[5b.3\]]pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar 
[\[5b.4\]]bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong lhas byin 'dis dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i slad du brtul te dbyen bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste mchis nas/_'di la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di 
[\[5b.5\]]la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis lhas byin la tshe dang ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun 
[\[5b.6\]]mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed kun du dga' mi rtsod mchog gcig 
[\[5b.7\]]'don pa gcig cing /_chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa lhas byin khyod dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag lhas byin la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du 
[\[6a.2\]]lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis lhas byin la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal 
[\[6a.3\]]zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas lhas byin la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo'o/_/gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par 
[\[6a.4\]]byed do/_/de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs pa bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin de dag kyang dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang 
[\[6a.5\]]rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba 'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i/_mi 
[\[6a.6\]]shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ko 
[\[6a.7\]]ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di skad bsgo bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa ko ka li ka_/khan da dra bya/_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya/_rgya mtshos byin khyed shes 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing /_dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa de'i grogs byed cing mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par ma byed cig_/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe 
[\[6b.2\]]dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs 
[\[6b.3\]]par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i/_mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma yin/_'dul 
[\[6b.4\]]ba smra ba ma yin gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba/_'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang 'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du 
[\[6b.5\]]smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par ma byed cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis shig_/tshe dang 
[\[6b.6\]]ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed kun du dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe 
[\[6b.7\]]dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]phyogs pa bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[7a.2\]]rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa de'i grogs byed cing mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par ma byed cig_/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de 
[\[7a.3\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang /_'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i 
[\[7a.4\]]phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma yin/_'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba/_'dul 
[\[7a.5\]]ba ma yin pa smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing 
[\[7a.6\]]bzod pa de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par ma byed cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun 
[\[7a.7\]]mthun mi phyed kun du dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de dag la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'i skabs 
[\[7b.2\]]de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu 
[\[7b.3\]]gang yin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge 
[\[7b.4\]]slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin 'di dag dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i slad du rtul bar bgyid cing dbyen 
[\[7b.5\]]bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste mchis pa de'i grogs bgyid cing mi mthun par smra nas/_'di dag la dge slong rnams kyis bzhams te bsgo na 'di dag la dge slong rnams kyis bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog 
[\[7b.6\]]tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra 
[\[7b.7\]]bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa de'i grogs byed cing mi mthun 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par ma byed cig_/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba 
[\[8a.2\]]smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang /_'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing 
[\[8a.3\]]bzod do zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma yin/_'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba/_'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang /_'dul 
[\[8a.4\]]ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par ma byed cig_/tshe 
[\[8a.5\]]dang ldan pa dag khyed dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed kun du dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing /_
[\[8a.6\]]chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis 
[\[8a.7\]]bsgo ba mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin 'di dag dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i slad du rtul bar 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]bgyid cing dbyen bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste mchis pa de'i grogs bgyid cing mi mthun par smra nas 'di dag la dge slong rnams kyis bzhams te bsgo na/_'di dag la dge slong rnams kyis bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la 
[\[8b.2\]]nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[8b.3\]]pa dag khyed shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa de'i grogs byed cing mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par ma byed cig dge slong rnams la 'di skad 
[\[8b.4\]]ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su 
[\[8b.5\]]tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba 
[\[8b.6\]]ma yin/_'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba/_'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_
[\[8b.7\]]dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par ma byed cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]mthun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed kun du dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i 
[\[9a.2\]]bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing /_mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ko ka 
[\[9a.3\]]li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin 
[\[9a.4\]]du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas 
[\[9a.5\]]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo'o/_/gsol ba dang 
[\[9a.6\]]bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[9a.7\]]kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lhas byin gyis nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba dang 'khor lo yang 'byed par nus te/_'di ltar de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mi mthun par smra ba nyid kyi rjes su phyogs pa bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dag yod pa'i phyir ro/_/lhas byin gyis dge sbyong gau ta mas dge slong dag lhas byin gyis nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba dang 'khor lo yang 'byed par nus te/_'di ltar de'i grogs byed pa'i dge 
[\[9b.2\]]slong mi mthun par smra ba nyid kyi rjes su phyogs pa bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dag yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bdag la lung bstan to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka 
[\[9b.3\]]ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la smras pa/_ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dag shes par gyis shig_/dge sbyong gau ta mas lhas byin gyis nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba dang 'khor lo yang 'byed par nus te/_
[\[9b.4\]]'di ltar de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mi mthun par smra ba nyid kyi rjes su phyogs pa bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dag yod pa'i phyir ro zhes kho bo la lung bstan to/_/de dag gis smras pa/_lhas byin gal te de lta 
[\[9b.5\]]na legs so/_/des rgya cher dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir brtul bar brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 
[\[9b.6\]]'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin la smras pa/_lhas byin khyod kyis dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir brtul zhing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug 
[\[9b.7\]]pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par smad pa 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par rjes su gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 
[\[10a.2\]]bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab 
[\[10a.3\]]tu bzung ste 'dug na/_dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyed dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun dang mthun 
[\[10a.4\]]par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed kun du dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa khyed dge 'dun 'byed 
[\[10a.5\]]par byed pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtang bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/_yang dag 
[\[10a.6\]]par bstan par bya'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo/_yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni lhas byin nam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge 
[\[10a.7\]]'dun zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun no/_/mthun pa zhes bya ba ni ro gcig pa'o/_/dbye ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gnyis su bya ba'i phyir ro/_/rtul bar byed cing zhes bya ba ni rtsol bar byed cing ngo /_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug na zhes bya ba ni ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dag yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug na'o/_/dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni lhas byin la'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni 
[\[10b.2\]]chos 'di pa rnams kyis so/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba ji skad sngar bstan pa ltar bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba na'o/_/gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni lta ba de yongs su 
[\[10b.3\]]gtong na'o/_/de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o/_/gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong na'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba 
[\[10b.4\]]ji skad sngar bstan pa ltar bsgo bar bya ste/_yang dag par bsgo ba de ni de yin/_yang dag par bstan pa de ni de yin no/_/dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du ltung ba de dge 'dun la rag las pa yin te/_des na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so/_/de 
[\[10b.5\]]la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis cung zad ji tsam du dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[10b.6\]]gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na gsol ba byas pa na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/las brjod pa dang po brjod pa na ma rdzogs par gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na rdzogs par brjod pa 
[\[10b.7\]]na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/las brjod pa gnyis pa brjod pa na ma rdzogs par gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na rdzogs par brjod pa na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/las brjod pa gsum pa brjod pa na ma rdzogs par gzhi de gtong na de lta na 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]legs/_gal te mi gtong na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rdzogs par brjod pa na gal te mthun pa dang chos ma yin pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/mi mthun pa dang chos kyi bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/mthun pa dang chos ltar bcos 
[\[11a.2\]]pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/mi mthun pa dang chos ma yin pa ltar bcos pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/chos ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar bsgo bar mi byed na ltung ba med do/_/chos ji lta ba dang /_
[\[11a.3\]]'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar mthun pas bsgo bar byed na rdzogs par brjod pa na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong des stan de la 'dug bzhin du 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ngo zhes brjod 
[\[11a.4\]]par bya ste/_gal te de skad brjod na de lta na legs/_gal te mi brjod na de phyin chad nas de la 'chab pa'i nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na dge slong gis ji tsam du gzhi des ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang 
[\[11a.5\]]gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las nyams su myong bar byed na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa'i dge 'dun 
[\[11a.6\]]lhag ma ste bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi gnyis pa bca' bar bzhed nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge 'dun gyis 
[\[11a.7\]]bya ba cung zhig yod kyis re zhig stan las ma ldang shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la rmas pa/_ko ka li ka_/khan da dra bya/_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya/_rgya mtshos byin khyed shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par 
[\[11b.2\]]blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa de'i grogs byed cing mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs nas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 
[\[11b.3\]]'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang /_'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa 
[\[11b.4\]]de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes smras pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba 
[\[11b.5\]]ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par smad pa snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par rjes su gzigs pas 'dul ba 
[\[11b.6\]]la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mi mthun par smra ba nyid kyi rjes su phyogs pa 
[\[11b.7\]]gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_mang po dag yod cing /_gal te de dag dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod 
[\[12a.2\]]cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes zer na dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag de skad ces dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang /_'dul ba yang dag par 
[\[12a.3\]]blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig_/
[\[12a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma yin/_'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba/_'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa yang 
[\[12a.5\]]dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par ma byed cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed dge 
[\[12a.6\]]'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed kun du dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 
[\[12a.7\]]'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]kyis de skad bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtang bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo/_yang dag par bstan pa na 
[\[12b.2\]]gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/dge slong de'i zhes bya ba ni lhas byin gyi'o/_/grogs byed pa'i dge slong zhes bya ba ni ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dag go/_/mi mthun par smra 
[\[12b.3\]]ba nyid kyi rjes su phyogs pa zhes bya ba ni lta ba de dag dang /_'dod pa de dag dang /_bsam pa de dag dang ldan pa'o/_/gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_mang po dag yod cing zhes bya ba ni gnyis las lhag pa ni mang ba'o/_/gal te de dag ces bya ba ni rjes su phyogs pa de 
[\[12b.4\]]dag go/_/dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams la'o/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o/_/dge yang rung zhes bya ba ni dge ba la sbyor bar yang ma byed cig ces pa'o/_/sdig kyang rung zhes bya ba ni sdig pa las zlog par yang ma byed cig ces 
[\[12b.5\]]bya ba'o/_/dge slong 'di la zhes bya ba ni lhas byin la'o/_/ci yang ma smra shig ces bya ba ni cung zad kyang ma smra shig pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang /_'dul ba yang dag par blangs 
[\[12b.6\]]nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni chos ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'o/_/dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_zhes bya 
[\[12b.7\]]ba ni don rtogs pa yin gyi/_don ma rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do/_/zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni dge slong lhas byin 'di gzhi gang 'dod pa de bdag cag kyang 'dod do zhes zer na'o/_/
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]dge slong de dag la zhes bya ba ni ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra bya dang /_ka Ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dag la'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba ji 
[\[13a.2\]]skad sngar bstan pa ltar bsgo bar bya ba'o/_/dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba na'o/_/gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni lta ba de yongs su gtong na'o/_/de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba'o/_/
[\[13a.3\]]gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi gtong na'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba ji skad sngar bstan pa ltar bsgo bar bya ba ste/_yang dag par bsgo 
[\[13a.4\]]ba de ni de yin/_yang dag par bstan pa de ni de yin no/_/dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du ltung ba de dge 'dun la rag las pa yin te/_des na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis cung zad ji tsam 
[\[13a.5\]]du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa de'i grogs byed cing mi mthun pa smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par byed na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bzhams 
[\[13a.6\]]te bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na gsol ba byas pa na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/las brjod pa dang po brjod 
[\[13a.7\]]pa na ma rdzogs par gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na rdzogs par brjod pa na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/las brjod pa gnyis pa brjod pa na ma rdzogs par gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na rdzogs par brjod pa na nyes pa sbom por 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/las brjod pa gsum pa brjod pa na ma rdzogs par gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na nyes pa [(]sbam [,]sbom [)]por 'gyur ro/_/rdzogs par brjod pa na gal te mthun pa dang /_chos ma yin pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/mi mthun pa dang 
[\[13b.2\]]chos kyis bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/mthun pa dang /_chos ltar bcos pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/mi mthun pa dang /_chos ma yin pa ltar bcos pas bsgo bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/chos ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_ston pa'i 
[\[13b.3\]]bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar bsgo bar mi byed na ltung ba med do/_/chos ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar mthun pas bsgo bar byed na rdzogs par brjod pa na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong des stan de la 'dug bzhin du 'di 
[\[13b.4\]]skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ngo zhes brjod par bya ste/_gal te de skad brjod na de lta na legs/_gal te mi brjod na de phyin cad nas de la 'chab pa'i nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na dge slong gis ji tsam du gzhi des ma 
[\[13b.5\]]bshags shing so sor ma bshags par gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las nyams su myong bar byed na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis 
[\[13b.6\]]nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/rjes su phyogs pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na re lde ri la dge slong 'gro 
[\[13b.7\]]mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis dang /_dge slong dmar ser can khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dag 'khod do/_/de dag bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig tho 'tsham par byed/_kun du rtse bar byed/_kun tu ca co 'don par byed/_rgod pa dang /_
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]dregs pa dang /_lus sgyur bar byed/_stan gcig la 'dug par byed/_snod gcig tu za bar byed/_phor bu gcig tu myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba sna tshogs dag 'thung bar byed/_me tog dag 'thog par byed/_'thog tu 'jud par byed/_
[\[14a.2\]]phreng ba dag rgyud par byed/_rgyud du 'jud par byed/_me tog rna rgyan dag thogs par byed/_thogs su 'jud par byed/_bro rdung bar byed/_bro rdung du 'jud par byed/_glu len par byed/_glu len du 'jud par byed/_rol mo'i sgra 'byin par byed/_rol mo'i sgra 
[\[14a.3\]]'byin du 'jud par byed/_bro mkhas pa dang /_glu mkhas pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa mkhas pa la ngo so las byung ba sbyin par byed/_chos gos dag brdzes te rgyug par byed/_mchong bar byed/_rab tu mchong bar byed/_brla skor bar byed/_lag pa skor bar 
[\[14a.4\]]byed/_nya ltar skor bar byed/_chur 'phyo ba 'phen par byed/_chu la rnga ma du ka ltar rdung bar byed/_glang po che'i skad kyi sgra 'byin par byed/_rta'i skad kyi sgra 'byin par byed/_khyu mchog gi skad kyi sgra 'byin par byed/_rma bya'i skad kyi sgra 'byin par byed/_khu 
[\[14a.5\]]byug gi skad kyi sgra 'byin par byed/_khas rdza rnga'i sgra 'byin par byed/_khas dung gi sgra 'byin par byed/_khas rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin par byed/_glang po che'i thab mo yang byed/_glang po che'i thab mo byed du 'jud par yang byed/_rta'i thab mo dang /_khyu mchog gi thab mo 
[\[14a.6\]]dang /_ma he'i thab mo dang /_ra'i thab mo dang /_lug gi thab mo dang /_bud med kyi thab mo dang /_skyes pa'i thab mo dang /_gzhon nu'i thab mo dang /_gzhon nu ma'i thab mo dang /_bya gag gi thab mo dang /_thi ba'i thab mo dang /_ngur pa'i thab mo yang byed/_byed 
[\[14a.7\]]du 'jud par yang byed de/_de dag dang gzhan yang dge slong gi las ma yin pa dag byed cing byed du 'jud de/_de dag gi spyod tshul dang /_spyod pa dang /_log par sgrub pa des re lde'i ri la dge slong ma 'ongs pa dag kyang mi 'ong la/_'ongs pa dag kyang mngon par mi 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]dga' zhing re lde'i ri'i gnas spong bar byed do/_/re lde'i ri la gnas pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag kyang yid mi dga' zhing zhe bcil bar gyur nas dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag la yang bsod snyoms dbul ba dang /_bya bar sems pa dka' na/_blo bur 
[\[14b.2\]]du lhags pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos par gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yul ka shi ka dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na re lde rir phyin nas re lde ri'i nags na 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro sham thabs 
[\[14b.3\]]bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te re lde ri la bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa kho nas re lde ri la bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa kho nas tha na slong mo gcig sbyin pa yang ma thob/_phyir gtong ba yang 
[\[14b.4\]]ma thob par phyir byung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon ni re lde ri 'di 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos kyang gang bar gyur la/_'dir slong mo bas kyang 
[\[14b.5\]]bsod snyoms rnyed sla bar gyur na/_da ltar yang re lde ri 'di 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos kyang gang ba ni yin na/_'on kyang bdag ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa kho nas re lde ri la bsod snyoms 
[\[14b.6\]]la zhugs pa de ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa kho nas tha na slong mo gcig sbyin pa yang ma thob/_phyir gtong ba yang ma thob par phyir byung ba las na 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos byis pa/_blun pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa 'ga' zhig gis nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[14b.7\]]dbang du gyur pas spyod yul lam spyod yul gyi grong ngam rigs kyi bud med dam/_rigs kyi gzhon nu ma dag la kun du smras pa'am/_nom pa'am/_nyug pa byas par ma gyur tam snyam mo/_/de'i tshe na re lde ri pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]dpong sa'i gnas na bram ze dang /_khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam bya ba zhig gi phyir 'dug ste mthun par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo re lde ri pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi dpong sa'i gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas re lde ri pa'i 
[\[15a.2\]]bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag sngon ni re lde ri 'di 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos kyang gang bar gyur la/_'dir slong mo bas kyang bsod snyoms rnyed sla bar gyur na/_
[\[15a.3\]]da ltar yang re lde ri 'di 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba ni yin na/_'on kyang bdag ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa kho nas re lde ri la bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa kho nas 
[\[15a.4\]]tha na slong mo gcig sbyin pa yang ma thob/_phyir gtong ba yang ma thob par phyir byung bar gyur to/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_re lde ri pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag de dag dbang po rnams phyir blan te 'khod do/_/de'i tshe na dge bsnyen chu rgyun can 'khor de nyid du 
[\[15a.5\]]'dug cing mthun par gyur to/_/de nas dge bsnyen chu rgyun can gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lag pa gnyis nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu khrid nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/re lde ri 
[\[15a.6\]]'di la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis dang /_dge slong dmar ser can khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dag mchis te/_de dag bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig tho 'tsham par bgyid/_kun du rtse bar bgyid/_kun du ca co 'don 
[\[15a.7\]]par bgyid/_rgod pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_lus sgyur bar bgyid/_stan gcig la mchis par bgyid/_snod gcig tu 'tshal bar bgyid/_phor bu gcig tu myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba sna tshogs dag 'tshal bar bgyid/_me tog dag 'thog par bgyid/_
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]'thog tu stsol bar bgyid/_phreng ba dag rgyud par bgyid/_rgyud du stsal bar bgyid/_me tog rna rgyan dag thogs par bgyid/_thogs su stsal bar bgyid/_bro rdung bar bgyid/_bro rdung du stsal bar bgyid/_mchid mchi bar bgyid/_mchid mchir stsol bar 
[\[15b.2\]]bgyid/_rol mo'i sgra 'byin par bgyid/_rol mo'i sgra 'byin du stsal bar bgyid/_bro mkhas pa dang /_glu mkhas pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra 'byin mkhas pa la ngo so las byung ba stsol bar bgyid/_chos gos dag brdzes te rgyug par bgyid/_mchong bar bgyid/_
[\[15b.3\]]rab tu mchong bar bgyid/_brla skor bar bgyid/_lag pa skor bar bgyid/_nya ltar skor bar bgyid/_chab tu 'phyo ba 'phen par bgyid/_chab la rnga ma du ka ltar rdung bar bgyid/_chab la rnga bo che ltar rdung bar bgyid/_glang po che'i skad kyi sgra 'byin par bgyid/_rta'i skad kyi 
[\[15b.4\]]sgra 'byin par bgyid/_khyu mchog gi skad kyi sgra 'byin par bgyid/_rma bya'i skad kyi sgra 'byin par bgyid/_khu byug gi skad kyi sgra 'byin par bgyid/_khas rdza rnga'i sgra 'byin par bgyid/_khas dung gi sgra 'byin par bgyid/_khas rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin par bgyid/_
[\[15b.5\]]glang po che'i thab mo yang bgyid/_glang po che'i thab mo bgyid du stsol bar yang bgyid/_rta'i thab mo dang /_khyu mchog gi thab mo dang /_ma he'i thab mo dang /_ra'i thab mo dang /_lug gi thab mo dang /_bud med kyi thab mo dang /_skyes pa'i thab mo dang /_gzhon 
[\[15b.6\]]nu'i thab mo dang /_gzhon nu ma'i thab mo dang /_bya gag gi thab mo dang /_thi ba'i thab mo dang /_ngur pa'i thab mo yang bgyid/_bgyid du stsal bar yang bgyid de/_de dag dang gzhan yang dge sbyong gi las ma lags pa dag bgyid cing bgyid du stsal to/_/de dag gi 
[\[15b.7\]]spyod tshul dang /_spyod pa dang /_log par sgrub pa des re lde ri la dge slong ma mchis pa dag kyang mi mchis la/_mchis pa dag kyang mngon par mi dga' zhing re lde ri'i gnas spong bar bgyid do/_/re lde ri la gnas pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag kyang yid mi 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]dga' zhing /_zhe bcil bar gyur nas dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag la yang bsod snyoms dbul ba dang bgyi bar sems pa dka' na/_glo bur du lhags pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gyur gyis btsun pa kun dga' bo gal te khyod mi 
[\[16a.2\]]dka' na khyod kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du don 'di bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol cig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge bsnyen chu rgyun can la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/_/de nas dge bsnyen chu rgyun can gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos cang mi smra bas 
[\[16a.3\]]dang du blangs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag gi sdum par bsod snyoms gcig gsol bar ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge bsnyen chu rgyun can la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/_/de nas 
[\[16a.4\]]dge bsnyen chu rgyun can gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bde bar 'dug pa la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed cing /_rang gi lag 
[\[16a.5\]]nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos zos shing lag pa bsnyal lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mdun du chos 
[\[16a.6\]]mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge bsnyen chu rgyun can la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par ston/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed cing chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[16a.7\]]gtam yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo //_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_de nas tshe 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ji ltar yongs su spyad pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab nas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lhung bzed 
[\[16b.2\]]dang /_chos gos mkhos su phab ste rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[16b.3\]]de la dge bsnyen chu rgyun can dang lhan cig skabs su gtam brjod pa ji snyed byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[16b.4\]]stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang lhan cig re lde'i ri la song la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis bskrad pa'i las gyis shig_/'di ltar bya ste/_lam gyi bar du 'dug la dge slong gleng ba po bsko bar bya ste/_
[\[16b.5\]]dge slong gleng ba po chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya zhing bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_glengs pa dang ma glengs 
[\[16b.6\]]pa mi shes pa ste/_dge slong gleng ba po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya zhing /_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya'o/_/dge slong gleng ba po chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya zhing bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_
[\[16b.7\]]'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_glengs pa dang ma glengs pa shes pa ste/_dge slong gleng ba po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya zhing bskos pa yang 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la je dang po spro bar bya ste/_tshe dang 
[\[17a.2\]]ldan pa ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod re lde ri la song ste/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so la dge sbyong gi chos ma yin pa rnam pa mang pos gleng bar spro'am/_gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te 
[\[17a.3\]]las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di re lde ri la mchis te dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so la dge sbyong gi chos ma lags pa rnam pa mang pos gleng bar spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la 
[\[17a.4\]]bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so la gleng bar bsko'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa 
[\[17a.5\]]rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di re lde ri la mchis nas dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so la dge sbyong gi chos ma lags pa rnam pa mang pos gleng bar spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes 
[\[17a.6\]]bgyi ba dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so la gleng bar bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so la gleng bar bsko bar mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod 
[\[17a.7\]]pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so la gleng bar bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]slong dag ngas dge slong gleng ba po'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong gleng ba pos srin bu can gyi ril song ste gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 
[\[17b.2\]]mthun par gyur pa na dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis la gleng bar bya'o/_/gal te mthun pa mi sbyin na ma gus pa de nyid kyis gnas nas bskrad pa'i las bya'o/_/gal te mthun pa ster na skabs 'byed du gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te skabs mi 'byed na 
[\[17b.3\]]ma gus pa de nyid kyis bskrad pa'i las bya'o/_/gal te skabs 'byed na gleng bar bya'o/_/gal te ltung ba ma mthong ngo zhes zer na ma gus pa de nyid kyis bskrad pa'i las bya'o/_/gal te ltung ba mthong ngo zhes zer na 'di skad ces de kho na'i phyir dge 'dun gyis khyed 
[\[17b.4\]]gnyis la bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad do zhes brjod par bya'o dge slong gleng ba pos gleng ba po'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom 
[\[17b.5\]]ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang lhan cig re lde ri la song ste/_lam gyi bar du 'dug nas dge slong gleng ba po bskos so/_/de na dge slong dmar ser can gang dag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis dang mtshungs par 
[\[17b.6\]]byed pa de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang lhan cig 'dir 'ongs te lam gyi bar du 'dug nas/_dge slong gleng ba po bskos te dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis skrod pa'i las byed par 'gyur ro zhes thos so/_/
[\[17b.7\]]thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di gnyis kyis kun du spyad pa dang /_smras pa dang /_brtul ba gang yin pa dag las bdag cag gis kun du ma spyad pa dang /_ma smras pa dang /_ma brtul ba ci yang med pas de'i phyir 'di gnyis la 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]skrod pa'i las byed na bdag cag la yang ci'i phyir mi byed de/_gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dir 'ongs te dang por 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis bskrad pa'i las byas nas de'i 'og tu bdag cag la 
[\[18a.2\]]yang skrod pa'i las byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod par 'gyur bas bdag cag gtur bu'i khur drags te nyan rna ba bzhag cing 'khod nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams sgo gcig nas 'jug par 'gyur ba na/_bdag 
[\[18a.3\]]cag gtur bu'i khur dag thogs te sgo gcig nas 'byung zhing mnyan yod du 'dong bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas dge slong gleng ba po re lde ri la song ste gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas 
[\[18a.4\]]dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis kyis mthun pa byin te skabs phye nas dge slong gleng ba pos glengs pa dang /_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ltung ba mthong ngo /_/gleng ba pos smras pa/_
[\[18a.5\]]de kho na'i phyir dge 'dun gyis khyed gnyis la bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams sgo gcig nas zhugs par gyur pa na/_dge slong dmar ser can dag gtur bu'i khur dag thogs 
[\[18a.6\]]te sgo gcig nas byung zhing mnyan yod du dong nas de dag gis ltung ba bshags par bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bshags shing /_sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs bsdam par bya ba dag kyang sems kyis bsdams te/_dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa 
[\[18a.7\]]dag dang lhan cig gnas shing dge 'dun gyi bya ba yang rjes su srung bar byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis la bskrad pa'i las byas nas 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]mnyan yod ga la ba der song ste/_mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'dong ba na mnyan yod du phyin to/_/'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis kyis bsams pa/_gang sa la sgyel ba de ni sa nyid las brten te ldang ba yin pas bdag cag gnyis kyang mnyan yod nyid du song ste/_
[\[18b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol bar bya'o snyam nas 'gro mgyogs kyis smras pa/_nab so gang sa la sgyel ba de ni sa nyid las brten te ldang ba yin pas bdag cag gnyis kyang mnyan yod nyid du song ste/_bcom ldan 'das dang 
[\[18b.3\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol bar byas 'dong ngo /_/nab sos smras pa/_ma nyes kyis tshur shog bzod pa gsol du 'dong ngo /_/de gnyis kyis gros byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos 
[\[18b.4\]]thogs te re lde ri la bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_re lde ri la bsod snyoms brgyus te zas kyi bya ba byas nas phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar spyad pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod ga 
[\[18b.5\]]la ba der rgyu zhing dong ste mthar gyis rgyu zhing dong ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis de gnyis mthong ba dang /_de dag de gnyis la gtam 'dre bar mi byed/_phebs par smra bar mi byed do/_/dge slong dmar ser can dag 
[\[18b.6\]]gis kyang de gnyis mthong ba dang /_de dag kyang de gnyis la gtam 'dre bar mi byed/_phebs par smra bar mi byed do/_/de nas dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis kyis dge slong dmar ser can dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 
[\[18b.7\]]gnas brtan gnas brtan dag kho bo cag gnyis la gtam 'dre bar mi byed/_phebs par smra bar mi byed pa ni rigs na/_khyed cag ci'i phyir/_kho bo cag gnyis la gtam 'dre bar mi byed/_phebs par smra bar mi byed/_kho bo cag gnyis kyis kun du spyad pa dang /_
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]smras pa dang /_brtul ba gang yin pa dag las khyed cag gis kun du ma spyad pa dang /_ma smras pa dang /_ma brtul ba ci zhig yod/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gnyis de yang bden mod kyi/_'on kyang kho bo cag gis ltung ba bshags 
[\[19a.2\]]par bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bshags shing sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs bsdam par bya ba dag kyang sems kyis bsdams te/_da ltar dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa dag dang lhan cig gnas shing dge 'dun gyi bya ba yang rjes su srung bar byed pas kho 
[\[19a.3\]]bo cag phyin cad gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag dang lhan cig longs spyod par mi byed do/_/de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_
[\[19a.4\]]'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes 'phya bar brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de gnyis la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gnyis khyed cag gnyis su la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes zer/_zhe sdang 
[\[19a.5\]]gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes zer/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la dong nas bdag cag bskrad pa'i las byas pa dag la'o/_/dge slong don 
[\[19a.6\]]nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la dong nas bdag cag bskrad pa'i las byas par shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes zer/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug 
[\[19a.7\]]gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes zer zhing /_dge slong rnams la yang de skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do/_/zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[19b.2\]]dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di skad bsgo bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[19b.3\]]bo dang /_gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la dong nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig_/zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig_/dge 
[\[19b.4\]]slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig 
[\[19b.5\]]ni skrod par mi byed do/_/zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong de dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin/_gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin/_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dag nyid khyim sun 
[\[19b.6\]]'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dag yin te/_khyed nyid kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa kun du spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes 
[\[19b.7\]]bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]mnyan nas dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis la tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la dong nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par 
[\[20a.2\]]shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig_/zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig_/dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe 
[\[20a.3\]]sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do/_/zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong de dag ni 'dun pas 
[\[20a.4\]]'gro ba ma yin/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin/_gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin/_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dag nyid khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dag yin te/_khyed nyid kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar mthong 
[\[20a.5\]]zhing thos la rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa kun du spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes 
[\[20a.6\]]bya ba'i tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bzhams te bsgo'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par 
[\[20a.7\]]byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te 
[\[20b.2\]]las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so 'di gnyis dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la mchis nas 'di gnyis bskrad pa'i las bgyid par 
[\[20b.3\]]'tshal bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes mchi/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes mchi zhing /_dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe 
[\[20b.4\]]sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do/_/zhes mchi nas/_'di gnyis la dge slong mang pos bzhams te 
[\[20b.5\]]bsgo na/_'di gnyis la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 
[\[20b.6\]]'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis la tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la dong 
[\[20b.7\]]nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig_/zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig_/dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes ma zer cig_/
[\[21a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong de dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin/_gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin/_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dag nyid khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dag yin 
[\[21a.3\]]te/_khyed nyid kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa kun du spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro 
[\[21a.4\]]ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab 
[\[21a.5\]]so 'di gnyis dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la mchis nas 'di gnyis bskrad pa'i las bgyis par 'tshal bzhin du/_de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes mchi/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_
[\[21a.6\]]'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes mchi zhing /_dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las 
[\[21a.7\]]dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes mchi nas/_'di gnyis la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 'di gnyis la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis la tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gnas brtan gnas brtan 
[\[21b.2\]]gang dag re lde ri la dong nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig_/zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig_/dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan 
[\[21b.3\]]pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i 
[\[21b.4\]]phyir zhe na/_dge slong de dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin/_gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin/_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dag nyid khyim sun 'byin pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dag 
[\[21b.5\]]yin te/_khyed nyid kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa kun du spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_
[\[21b.6\]]gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo 
[\[21b.7\]]ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis la gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong 
[\[22a.2\]]'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo'o/_/gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs 
[\[22a.3\]]par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[22a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong rab tu mang po dag grong ngam/_grong rdal zhig na nye bar rten 
[\[22a.5\]]cing gnas par gyur la de dag kyang khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod par gyur cing /_de dag gis khyim dag sun phyung bar mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes sam/_de dag sdig pa kun du spyod par mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes 
[\[22a.6\]]na dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dag yin te/_khyed kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa kun du spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu 
[\[22a.7\]]shes kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed 'di na gnas pas chog gis gnas 'di nas dengs shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/gal te de dag dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes zer na dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed de skad ces tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[22b.2\]]dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes ma zer cig_/
[\[22b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong de dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin/_gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin/_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dag nyid khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa 
[\[22b.4\]]dag yin te/_khyed nyid kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa kun du spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_
