[\[43b.1\]]shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshes la gos mang po dag cig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la yang gzhan mang po dag cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma dag gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_
[\[43b.2\]]gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na phyi ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma dag gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma 
[\[43b.3\]]bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshes dang tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang tshes bcu tshun cad kyis gos mang po dag cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma dag gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la 
[\[43b.4\]]sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung 
[\[43b.5\]]ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar 
[\[43b.6\]]gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du dge slong 
[\[43b.7\]]gis ji srid du spang ba'i dngos po de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam/_chos gos sam/_dra ba'am/_phor bu'am/_ska rags sam/_dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/'chang ba'i spang ba ste dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' 
[\[44a.2\]]ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong rnams la chos gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_dge slong dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa gang yang rung bas chos gos rnyed nas des de bkrus shing dras te drubs nas kha bsgyur te gtur bu'i bam po bsgres nas dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug 
[\[44a.3\]]mar gnas pa rnams la rjes su gtad de/_dge slong dag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dong zhing de dag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na ma sbas pa dang sbed du ma bcug par gyur to/_/dge slong gnas 
[\[44a.4\]]pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa dag kyang chos gos de dag skems pa dang /_bsang ba dang /_'ding ba dang /_sprug pa dang /_brtul ba dang /_sbed pa dag byed pas bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur cing lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_
[\[44a.5\]]yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong rnams la chos gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_dge slong dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa gang yang rung bas chos gos rnyed nas des de bkrus shing dras te drubs 
[\[44a.6\]]nas kha bsgyur te gtur bu'i bam po bsgres nas dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams la rjes su gtad de/_dge slong dag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dong zhing de dag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 
[\[44a.7\]]ljongs rgyur 'dong pa na ma sbas pa dang sbed du ma bcug par gyur/_dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa dag kyang chos gos de dag skems pa dang /_bsang ba dang /_'ding ba dang /_sprug pa dang /_brtul ba dang /_sbed pa dag byed pas bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]bar gyur cing lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[44b.2\]]to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la 
[\[44b.3\]]sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mang po dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed la chos gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu byung ste/_dge slong dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa gang yang rung bas chos gos rnyed nas des de bkrus shing dras 
[\[44b.4\]]te drubs nas kha bsgyur te gtur bu'i bam po bsgres nas dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams la rjes su gtad de/_dge slong dag chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dong zhing khyed cag chos gos stod g.yogs smad 
[\[44b.5\]]g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'dong ba na ma sbas pa dang /_sbed du ma bcug par gyur la/_dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa dag kyang chos gos de dag skems pa dang /_gsang ba dang /_'ding ba dang /_sprug pa dang /_brtul ba dang /_sbed pa dag byed 
[\[44b.6\]]pas bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur cing lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso dka' ba 
[\[44b.7\]]dang /_dgang dka' ba dang /_'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_phri ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes pa nyid dang /_tshod shes pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par rjes su gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 
[\[45a.2\]]bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol 
[\[45a.3\]]du bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[45a.4\]]'od srung chen po rgyal po'i khab na sde can ma'i phug na gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas dge 'dun dang mthun par 'dug go/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag de nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing mthun par gyur nas gtso cher tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen 
[\[45a.5\]]po 'ong ba la sdod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po gso sbyong gi gnas su 'phags pa na chu klung dbyar bzang ldan rgal ba dang chu rlabs chen po byung ba des de'i snam sbyar gsher bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po snam sbyar de 'tshir ba dang /_'ding ba dang /_
[\[45a.6\]]skems pa na yun ring du thogs par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos snam sbyar de btsir cing bting ste bskams nas gso sbyong gi gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag 
[\[45a.7\]]gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing mthun par gyur nas gtso cher tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la sdod cing 'khod na/_'on 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'phyis par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na bdag gso sbyong gi gnas su 'phags pa na chu klung dbyar bzang ldan rgal ba dang chu rlabs chen po byung ba des bdag gi snam sbyar gsher bar gyur nas/_bdag snam sbyar 'tshir ba dang /_'ding ba 
[\[45b.2\]]dang /_skems pa na yun ring zhig thogs par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar bdag dge slong 'od srung chen po rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa lags la bdag gi snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog na/_bdag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes zer ba'i skabs de 
[\[45b.3\]]dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong 'od srung chen po rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i 
[\[45b.4\]]gnang ba byin cig_/'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/_gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dkyil 'khor bar dge slong bzhi'i tshogs las mi nyung ba'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la 
[\[45b.5\]]dge slong 'od srung gis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te rgan rims bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas dge 'dun la snam sbyar nye bar bstan te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[45b.6\]]bdag dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa lags la bdag gi snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog nas/_bdag dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_thugs 
[\[45b.7\]]brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'od srung 'di rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa lags la 'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog nas/_dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur 
[\[46a.2\]]pa 'di dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur 
[\[46a.3\]]ba'i gnang ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'od srung 'di rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa lags la 'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog nas/_dge slong 'od srung rgan 
[\[46a.4\]]po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa 'di dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 
[\[46a.5\]]'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu 
[\[46a.6\]]gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis dge slong gang yang rung ba la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin par gyur na des chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs 
[\[46a.7\]]dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dug cing mthun par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]can lags la/_bdag gi snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog na bdag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong shA ri'i 
[\[46b.2\]]bu rlung nad can dang gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin cig_/'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dkyil 'khor bar dge slong 
[\[46b.3\]]bzhi'i tshogs las mi nyung ba'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/_dge slong shA ri'i bus bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te rgan rims bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas dge 'dun la snam sbyar nye bar 
[\[46b.4\]]bstan te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can lags la bdag gi snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog nas/_bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can dge 'dun las snam 
[\[46b.5\]]sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_de'i 
[\[46b.6\]]'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di rlung nad can lags la 'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog nas/_dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can 'di dge 'dun las 
[\[46b.7\]]snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di rlung nad can lags la 'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog nas/_dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can 'di dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 
[\[47a.2\]]'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal 
[\[47a.3\]]bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi 
[\[47a.4\]]gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis dge slong gang yang rung ba la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin par gyur na/_des chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi 
[\[47a.5\]]bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod cing bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams dang /_phri ba rnams dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang /_mdzes pa rnams dang /_tshod 
[\[47a.6\]]shes pa rnams kyi yon tan brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong chos gos zin pas 
[\[47a.7\]]sra brkyang phyung na gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]zhes bya ba ni chos gos zin la sra brkyang ma  phyung ba yang yod/_chos gos ma zin la sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/_chos gos zin cing sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/_chos gos ma zin cing sra brkyang ma  phyung ba yang yod de/_snga ma bzhin du mu bzhir rgyas par sbyar ro/_/gal te nub gcig 
[\[47b.2\]]kyang zhes bya ba ni nub gcig gi mthar yang ngo /_/chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang zhes bya ba ni snam sbyar dang bla gos dang mthang gos las gang yang rung ba dang ngo /_/mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na zhes bya ba ni gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o/_/
[\[47b.3\]]dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe 
[\[47b.4\]]na//_//bar sdom la/_khyim gcig pa dang khyim gnyis dang /_/khyim gyi tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_/rtsig pa rib ma 'obs bskor dang /_/rnam bzhir bya ba grong dang khyim/_/sten 'gro mu stegs tshong rdal dang /_/tshong khang sgra khang g.yul dang ni/_/g.yul tshoms gru 
[\[47b.5\]]dang shing rta dang /_/shing ljon kun dga'i ra ba yin/_/lam du 'gro sdod 'dug nyal dang /_/thad kar yang ni de bzhin te/_/mtshams gzhan nyal ba tha ma yi/_/sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin/_/khyim gcig dang ldan pa'i grong dang /_khyim gnyis dang ldan pa'i grong 
[\[47b.6\]]dang /_khyim gyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i grong dang /_rtsig pas bskor ba'i grong dang /_rib mas bskor ba'i grong dang /_'obs kyis bskor ba'i grong dang rnam pa bzhir bya ba grong nyen kor gcig pa dang /_grong nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_grong rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa 
[\[47b.7\]]dang /_grong rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_khyim nyen kor gcig pa dang /_khyim nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_sten 'gro'i khyim nyen kor gcig pa dang /_sten 'gro'i khyim nyen 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]kor tha dad pa dang /_sten 'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_sten 'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_mu stegs can gyi khyim nyen kor gcig pa dang /_mu stegs can gyi khyim nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_mu stegs can gyi 
[\[48a.2\]]khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_tshong rdal nyen kor gcig pa dang /_tshong rdal nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_tshong rdal rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_tshong rdal rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa 
[\[48a.3\]]dang /_tshong khang nyen kor gcig pa dang /_tshong khang nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_tshong khang rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_tshong khang rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_sgra khang nyen kor gcig pa dang /_sgra khang nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_sgra khang rab tu mang po nyen kor 
[\[48a.4\]]gcig pa dang /_sgra khang rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_g.yul nyen kor gcig pa dang /_g.yul nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_g.yul rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_g.yul rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_g.yul gyi tshoms nyen kor gcig pa 
[\[48a.5\]]dang /_g.yul gyi tshoms nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_gru nyen kor gcig pa dang /_gru nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_gru rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig 
[\[48a.6\]]pa dang /_gru rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_shing rta nyen kor gcig pa dang /_shing rta nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_shing rta rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_shing rta rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_shing ljon pa nyen kor gcig pa dang /_shing ljon 
[\[48a.7\]]pa nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa dang /_shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_kun dga'i ra ba nyen kor gcig pa dang /_kun dga'i ra ba nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_kun dga'i ra ba rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]dang /_kun dga'i ra ba rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa dang /_lam du 'gro ba la sogs pa dang /_thad kar 'gro ba la sogs pa dang /_mtshams gzhan dag gi gnas thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i bye brag gis dge slong chos gos dang mi 'bral ba dang 'bral ba'i ltung ba 
[\[48b.2\]]rnam par bzhag pa'i bye brag rgya cher ston to/_/de la khyim gcig dang ldan pa'i grong gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ri khrod pa rnams dang /_bod rnams dang /_kla klo rnams kyi grong ngo /_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag 
[\[48b.3\]]rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na 
[\[48b.4\]]ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/khyim gnyis dang ldan pa'i grong gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[48b.5\]]lta ste/_khyim gcig dang ldan pa'i grong ji lta ba bzhin du/_khyim gnyis dang ldan pa'i grong yang de bzhin no/_/khyim gyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i grong gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_grong sgo sna tshogs nas kun nas gnas pa gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha 
[\[48b.6\]]dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/rtsig pas bskor ba'i grong gang zhe na/_'di lta ste grong rtsig pas bskor ba gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du ba lang drug dang ldan pa'i shing rta smyig ma 
[\[48b.7\]]can gyis khyab cing 'dug pa dang /_bya gag spar nas 'dug pa'i bar de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/rib mas bskor ba'i grong gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_grong rib mas bskor ba gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang 
[\[49a.2\]]zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du ra lug bton pa dag gi rmig pas bslang ba'i rdul 'bab pa dang /_mi rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha dang ldan pa bshang sar 'gro ba'i bar de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen 
[\[49a.3\]]kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'obs kyis bskor 
[\[49a.4\]]ba'i grong gang zhe na/_'di lta ste grong 'obs kyis bskor ba gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du skas gdang bu bcu gnyis pas khyab cing 'dug pa dang /_phyag dar bor ba'i bong ba rags pa 'dril ba'i bar de ni de'i nyen kor yin 
[\[49a.5\]]no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/_nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char 
[\[49a.6\]]bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/grong nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_grong gang na skyed mos tshal lam 'dun sa'am/_lha'i gnas gcig yod pa gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_lha'i 
[\[49a.7\]]gnas so/_/dge slong gis grong du chos gos dag bzhag ste lha'i gnas su skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/lha'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste grong du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/grong ngam lha'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/grong nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_grong gang na skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa'am/_lha'i gnas rab tu mang po dag yod pa gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig 
[\[49b.2\]]thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/grong rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_grong gang dag na skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa'am/_lha'i gnas gcig yod pa gang yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci 
[\[49b.3\]]zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_lha'i gnas so/_/dge slong gis grong du chos gos dag bzhag ste lha'i gnas su skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/lha'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste grong du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/grong ngam lha'i gnas 
[\[49b.4\]]su chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/grong rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_grong gang dag na skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa'am/_lha'i gnas rab tu mang po dag yod pa gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[49b.5\]]de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/khyim nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma phye ba dag gi khyim gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams 
[\[49b.6\]]cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang 
[\[49b.7\]]du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]khyim nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi khyim gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_sgo'o/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste sgor skya 
[\[50a.2\]]rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/sgor chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam sgor chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa 
[\[50a.3\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi khyim rab tu mang po dag gang yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed 
[\[50a.4\]]pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag 
[\[50a.5\]]bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_
[\[50a.6\]]spun sgo bye ba dag ni khyim rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/sten 'gro'i khyim nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba 
[\[50a.7\]]dag gi sten 'gro'i khyim gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag gi gling bu 'jog par byed pa dang /_rnga pa Ta ha dang /_pi bang dang /_rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang /_khar rnga dang /_su g+ho Sha ka 'jog par byed pa dang /_
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]mong phang dang phang lo 'jog par byed pa dang /_gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos 
[\[50b.2\]]gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 
[\[50b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/sten 'gro'i khyim nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi sten 'gro'i khyim gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_rgyal mtshan gyi shing ngo /_/dge 
[\[50b.4\]]slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste rgyal mtshan gyi shing la skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/rgyal mtshan gyi shing la chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam rgyal mtshan gyi shing la chos gos dag bzhag ste 
[\[50b.5\]]gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sten 'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi sten 'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang 
[\[50b.6\]]zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag gi gling bu 'jog par byed pa dang /_rnga pa Ta ha dang /_pi bang dang /_rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang /_khar rnga dang /_su g+ho Sha ka 'jog par byed pa dang /_mong phang dang /_phang lo 'jog par byed pa dang /_
[\[50b.7\]]gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sten 'gro'i 
[\[51a.2\]]khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi sten 'gro'i khyim rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/mu stegs can gyi khyim nyen kor 
[\[51a.3\]]gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mu stegs can gyi khyim lta ba gcig pa dang /_bzod pa gcig pa dang /_'dod pa gcig pa dang /_bsam pa gcig pa gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag lci ba dag gding ba byed pa dang /_yam sreg 
[\[51a.4\]]shing dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_g.yang gzhi dag dang /_shing shun dag dang /_dbyig gu dag dang /_ril ba dag dang /_blugs gzar dag dang /_dgang gzar dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_me sbar bar byed pa dang /_yam sreg shing dag sreg par byed pa dang /_gang 
[\[51a.5\]]du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar 
[\[51a.6\]]byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mu stegs can gyi khyim nyen kor tha dad pa gang 
[\[51a.7\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste mu stegs can gyi khyim lta ba tha dad pa dang /_bzod pa tha dad pa dang /_'dod pa tha dad pa dang /_bsam pa tha dad pa gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_lha'i gnas so/_/dge slong gis mu 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]stegs can gyi khyim du chos gos dag bzhag ste lha'i gnas su skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/lha'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste mu stegs can gyi khyim du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/mu stegs can gyi khyim mam lha'i gnas su 
[\[51b.2\]]chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po lta ba gcig pa dang /_bzod pa gcig pa dang /_'dod pa 
[\[51b.3\]]gcig pa dang /_bsam pa gcig pa gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag lci ba dag 'ding bar byed pa dang /_yam sreg shing dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_g.yang gzhi dag dang /_
[\[51b.4\]]shing shun dag dang /_dbyig gu dag dang /_ril ba dag dang /_blugs gzar dag dang /_dgang gzar dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_me sbar bar byed pa dang /_yam sreg shing sreg par byed pa dang /_gang du de dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_
[\[51b.5\]]'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor 
[\[51b.6\]]du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_
[\[51b.7\]]'di lta ste mu stegs can gyi khyim rab tu mang po lta ba tha dad pa dang /_bzod pa tha dad pa dang /_'dod pa tha dad pa dang /_bsam pa tha dad pa gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]tshong rdal nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgom bye ba dag gi tshong rdal gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag zong 'jog par byed pa dang /_nyo bar byed 
[\[52a.2\]]pa dang /_'tshong bar byed pa dang /_bgrang bar byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_'jog par byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag 
[\[52a.3\]]bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshong rdal nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba 
[\[52a.4\]]dag gi tshong rdal gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_gzhag stegs so/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhag stegs su skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/gzhag stegs su chos gos 
[\[52a.5\]]dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam gzhag stegs su chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshong rdal rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi gcig gi 
[\[52a.6\]]gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi tshong rdal rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag zong 'jog par byed pa dang /_nyo bar byed pa dang /_'tshong bar byed pa dang /_bgrang bar byed pa 
[\[52a.7\]]dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_'jog par byed pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshong rdal rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi tshong rdal rab tu mang po gang dag yin 
[\[52b.2\]]pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/tshong khang nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi tshong khang gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang 
[\[52b.3\]]thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag zong 'jog par byed pa dang /_gro dag dang /_nas dag dang /_mon sran gre'u dag dang /_sA lu dag dang /_'bras dag dang /_til dag dang /_'bras thug po che dag dang /_bu ram dag dang /_mar dag dang /_ras bal dag 
[\[52b.4\]]dang /_skud pa dag dang /_gos dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_'bru spung bar byed pa dang /_bre'u chung dang /_gle ba 'jog par byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_rlung yor 'dzugs par byed pa dang /_nyo bar byed pa dang /_'tshong bar byed pa dang /_bgrang bar byed pa dang /_
[\[52b.5\]]'jal bar byed pa dang /_'jog par byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang 
[\[52b.6\]]ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshong khang nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi tshong khang gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so 
[\[52b.7\]]tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_'dug stegs so/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste 'dug stegs su skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/'dug stegs su chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]nang ngam 'dug stegs su chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshong khang rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi tshong khang rab tu mang po 
[\[53a.2\]]gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag zong 'jog par byed pa dang /_gro dag dang /_nas dag dang /_mon sran gre'u dag dang /_sA lu dag dang /_'bras dag dang /_til dag dang /_'bras thug po 
[\[53a.3\]]che dag dang /_bu ram dag dang /_mar dag dang /_ras bal dag dang /_skud pa dag dang /_gos dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_'bru spung bar byed pa dang /_bre'u chung dang /_gle ba 'jog par byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_rlung yor 'dzugs par byed pa dang /_
[\[53a.4\]]nyo bar byed pa dang /_'tshong bar byed pa dang /_bgrang bar byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_'jog par byed pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos 
[\[53a.5\]]dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshong khang rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_
[\[53a.6\]]spun sgo bye ba dag gi tshong khang rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/sgra khang nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi sgra khang 
[\[53a.7\]]gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /_rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_thag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /_gang du rdung bar byed 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/
[\[53b.2\]]nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sgra khang nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_
[\[53b.3\]]spun sgo bye ba dag gi sgra khang gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na ya gad do/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste ya gad la skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/ya gad la chos gos dag bzhag ste/_
[\[53b.4\]]sgra khang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/sgra khang ngam ya gad la chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sgra khang rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba 
[\[53b.5\]]dag gi sgra khang rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /_rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_thag pa dag 'khal bar 
[\[53b.6\]]byed pa dang /_gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du 
[\[53b.7\]]skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sgra khang rab tu mang po nyen 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi sgra khang rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/g.yul nyen kor gcig pa 
[\[54a.2\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi g.yul gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag 'bru rdung bar byed pa dang /_'phyar bar byed pa dang /_'khrab par byed pa dang /_spung bar byed 
[\[54a.3\]]pa dang /_bre'u chung dang /_gle ba 'jog par byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_rlung yor 'dzugs par byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag 
[\[54a.4\]]ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/g.yul nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag 
[\[54a.5\]]gi g.yul gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_g.yul gyi dkyil lo/_/dge slong gis g.yul gyi dkyil du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag 
[\[54a.6\]]bzhag ste g.yul gyi dkyil du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/g.yul gyi dkyil du'am nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/g.yul rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi 
[\[54a.7\]]gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi g.yul rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag 'bru rdung bar byed pa dang /_'phyar bar byed pa dang /_'khrab par byed pa dang /_spung bar byed pa dang /_bre'u 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]chung dang /_gle ba 'jog par byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_rlung yor 'dzugs par byed pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du 
[\[54b.2\]]skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/g.yul rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi 
[\[54b.3\]]g.yul rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po nyi shu drug pa/_g.yul gyi tshoms nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe 
[\[54b.4\]]na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi g.yul gyi tshoms gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /_rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_mun dza dag rdung 
[\[54b.5\]]bar byed pa dang /_thag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /_lci ba dag 'dor bar byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 
[\[54b.6\]]'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/g.yul gyi tshoms nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi g.yul gyi 
[\[54b.7\]]tshoms gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_sgo'o/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste sgor skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/sgor chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam sgor chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba 
[\[55a.2\]]dag gi g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam gang du de dag glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /_rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_thag pa dag 'khal 
[\[55a.3\]]bar byed pa dang /_lci ba dag 'dor bar byed pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/
[\[55a.4\]]nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi g.yul gyi tshoms rab tu mang po gang dag 
[\[55a.5\]]yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/gru nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi gru gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_'gro ba'i ni nang 
[\[55a.6\]]thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_'dug pa'i ni nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag phur pa 'debs par byed pa dang /_gru rtod par byed pa dang /_gdos pa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_gru skya dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_mun dza dag rdung 
[\[55a.7\]]bar byed pa dang /_thag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /_gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i 
[\[55b.2\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gru nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi gru gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_gru gdong ngo /_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos 
[\[55b.3\]]dag bzhag ste gru gdong du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/gru gdong du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam gru gdong du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed 
[\[55b.4\]]du 'gyur ro/_/gru rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi gru rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_'gro ba'i ni nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngo /_/'dug pa'i ni nang thams 
[\[55b.5\]]cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag phur pa 'debs par byed pa dang /_gru rtod par byed pa dang /_gdos pa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_gru skya dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_thag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /_gang du rdung 
[\[55b.6\]]bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar 
[\[55b.7\]]byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gru rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi gru rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/shing rta nyen kor gcig pa gang 
[\[56a.2\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi shing rta gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_'gro ba'i ni nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngo /_/'dug pa'i ni nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag phur pa 'debs par byed 
[\[56a.3\]]pa dang /_glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /_rtswa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_thag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /_gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa 
[\[56a.4\]]dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/
[\[56a.5\]]nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shing rta nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi shing rta gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so 
[\[56a.6\]]tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_kha lo pa'i gnas so/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste kha lo pa'i gnas su skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/kha lo pa'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba 
[\[56a.7\]]med do/_/nang ngam kha lo pa'i gnas su chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shing rta rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi shing rta rab tu mang po gang 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_'gro ba'i ni nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_'dug pa'i ni nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag phur pa 'debs par byed pa dang /_glang dag 'dogs par byed pa dang /_rtswa dag 'jog par 
[\[56b.2\]]byed pa dang /_mun dza dag rdung bar byed pa dang /_thag pa dag 'khal bar byed pa dang /_gang du rdung bar byed pa dang /_rngo bar byed pa dang /_'thag par byed pa dang /_'cha' bar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'thung bar byed pa dang /_khye'u sus byed pa de ni de dag 
[\[56b.3\]]gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan 
[\[56b.4\]]du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shing rta rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi shing rta rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/
[\[56b.5\]]ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/shing ljon pa nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste shing ljon pa yal ga'i tshogs 'brel pa gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du lo ma lhags pa 
[\[56b.6\]]rlung gis ma bdas pa dag 'bab pa dang /_char chad pa'i thigs pa sbom po dag 'bab pa dang /_gang du gung tshigs kyi tshe shing ljon pa'i grib mas khyab cing 'dug pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar 
[\[56b.7\]]byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shing ljon pa nyen kor tha dad pa gang 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste shing ljon pa yal ga'i tshogs ma 'brel pa gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na rtsa ba'o/_/dge slong gis rtsa bar chos gos dag bzhag ste yal gar skya rengs 'char bar byed na 
[\[57a.2\]]ltung ba med do/_/yal gar chos gos dag bzhag ste rtsa bar skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/rtsa ba'am yal gar chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa 
[\[57a.3\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste shing ljon pa rab tu mang po yal ga'i tshogs 'brel pa gang yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du lo ma lhags pa rlung gis ma bdas pa dag 'bab pa dang /_char chad pa'i thigs pa 
[\[57a.4\]]sbom po dag 'bab pa dang /_gang du gung tshigs kyi tshe shing ljon pa'i grib mas khyab cing 'dug pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste 
[\[57a.5\]]nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shing ljon pa rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shing ljon pa rab tu mang po yal 
[\[57a.6\]]ga'i tshogs ma 'brel pa gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/kun dga'i ra ba nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi kun dga'i 
[\[57a.7\]]ra ba gang yin pa'o/_/de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag me tog dag thu bar byed pa dang /_skon pa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_phreng ba dag rgyud par byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_nyo bar byed pa dang /_
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]'tshong bar byed pa dang /_bre'u chung dang /_phul 'jog par byed pa de ni de'i nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung 
[\[57b.2\]]ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga'i ra ba'i nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi kun dga'i ra ba gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[57b.3\]]de'i nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_khron pa'o/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste/_khron par skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/khron par chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar byed na yang ltung 
[\[57b.4\]]ba med do/_/nang ngam khron par chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga'i ra ba rab tu mang po nyen kor gcig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi gcig gi'am/_spun sgo ma bye ba dag gi kun dga'i ra ba rab tu mang po 
[\[57b.5\]]gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_nang thams cad dang /_phyi rol 'dom gang ngam/_gang du de dag me tog dag thu bar byed pa dang /_skon pa dag 'jog par byed pa dang /_phreng ba dag rgyud par byed pa dang /_'jal bar byed pa dang /_nyo bar byed pa 
[\[57b.6\]]dang /_'tshong bar byed pa dang /_bre'u chung dang /_phul 'jog par byed pa de ni de dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/dge slong gis nang du chos gos dag bzhag ste nyen kor du skya rengs 'char bar byed na ltung ba med do/_/nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste nang du skya rengs 'char bar 
[\[57b.7\]]byed na yang ltung ba med do/_/nang ngam nyen kor du chos gos dag bzhag ste gzhan du skya rengs 'char bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga'i ra ba rab tu mang po nyen kor tha dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi tha dad pa dag gi'am/_spun sgo bye ba dag gi 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]kun dga'i ra ba rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa'o/_/de dag gi nyen kor gang zhe na/_so so tha dad pa'o/_/ci zhig thun mong yin zhe na/_ci yang ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong 
[\[58a.2\]]gis chos gos dag dge slong la gtad de 'gro na lam du mchi na/_btsun pa de'i nyen kor gang lags/_nye ba 'khor ngas bram ze gro zhin skyes la a mra'i sdong po shin tu me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_yal ga phun sum tshogs pa/_'dom bdun 
[\[58a.3\]]gyis bar du chod pa'i a mra'i sdong po bdun po gang dag yin pa de dag la 'dom bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yod par bstan pa de ni dge slong lam du zhugs pa'i chos gos dag gi nyen kor yin no/_/'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba'i nyen kor ni 'dom gang kho ra khor yug go/_/thad 
[\[58a.4\]]kar 'gro ba'i nyen kor yang 'dom gang kho ra khor yug go/_/thad kar 'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang nyal ba'i nyen kor yang 'dom gang kho ra khor yug go/_/btsun pa dge slong mtshams gzhan du mchis nas/_nyal bar bgyid na de'i chos gos dag gi nyen kor gang lags/_
[\[58a.5\]]nye ba 'khor ji tsam du chos gos kyi grwa lus dang ma 'bral ba tshun cad do/_/dge slong gis chos gos spang bar gyur na de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis chos gos spang bar gyur na/_de 
[\[58a.6\]]spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis chos gos spang bar gyur na/_de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[58a.7\]]dge slong gis chos gos spang bar gyur na/_de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du dge slong gis ji srid du spang ba'i dngos po des ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam/_chos gos sam/_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]dra ba'am/_phor bu'am/_ska rags sam/_dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/
[\[58b.2\]]'bral ba'i spang ba ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong rnams la gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_dge slong gang yang 
[\[58b.3\]]rung bas gos sngon po zhig rnyed na des de byed du mi 'jud par de gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe gos byed du gzhug go snyam du re bas de 'jog par byed cing /_sngon po ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong 
[\[58b.4\]]don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong rnams gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_dge slong gang yang rung bas gos sngon po zhig rnyed na des de byed du mi 'jud par de gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe gos byed du gzhug go snyam du re bas de 'jog par byed cing sngon po ji lta 
[\[58b.5\]]ba bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo yang de bzhin no/_/zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng 
[\[58b.6\]]gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[58b.7\]]rab tu mang po dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed la gos mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_dge slong gang yang rung bas gos sngon po zhig rnyed na des de byed du mi 'jud par de gang gi tshe 'di 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe gos byed du 'jug go snyam du re bas de 'jog par byed 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]cing /_sngon po ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo yang de bzhin du bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_gso dka' ba dang /_dgang dka' ba 
[\[59a.2\]]rnam par smad par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba'i bsngags pa brjod cing /_chog shes pa dang /_gso sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_phri ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang /_mdzes pa nyid dang /_drod rig 
[\[59a.3\]]pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 
[\[59a.4\]]'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na dus ma yin pa'i gos shig rnyed la 'dod na dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o/_/blangs nas gal te langs na myur ba kho nar gos su bya ste bcang bar bya'o/_/gal te mi 
[\[59a.5\]]langs la kha ma langs pa kha skong ba'i gos la re ba yod na dge slong des gos de zla ba gcig gi mthar gzhag par bya'o/_/de las 'das par 'jog na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na zhes bya ba ni chos gos zin la 
[\[59a.6\]]sra brkyang ma  phyung ba yang yod/_chos gos ma zin la sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/_chos gos zin cing sra brkyang phyung ba yang yod/_chos gos ma zin cing sra brkyang ma  phyung ba yang yod de/_mu bzhir bcad pa snga ma bzhin no/_/dus ma yin pa'i gos shig ces bya ba la dge slong gis 
[\[59a.7\]]gos kyi dus ni gang yin/_dus ma yin pa ni gang yin zhe na/_sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas na ni ston zla 'bring po nya nas dpyid zla ra ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba de dag ni gos kyi dus yin la/_de phan cad ni dus ma yin no/_/sra brkyang ma  bting ba'i gnas na ni thams cad dus ma yin no/_/rnyed 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]la zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so/_/'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o/_/dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya'o/_/gal te langs na zhes bya ba ni gal te chog na'o/_/myur ba kho nar gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni mi bsgyang 
[\[59b.2\]]ba kho nar byin gyis brlab tu rung bar byas te'o/_/kham langs pa kha skong ba'o zhes bya ba ni snam sbyar ram/_bla gos sam/_mthang gos kha ma langs pa kha skong ba'i 'o/_/gos la re ba yod na zhes bya ba ni dge slong la mas bdag la gos sbyin pa'i re ba'am/_pha'am/_phu nu'am/_
[\[59b.3\]]sring mo'am/_slob dpon nam/_mkhan pos bdag la gos sbyin pa'i re ba'am/_lo lnga'i dus ston gyi tshe'am/_lo drug gi dus ston gyi tshe'am/_gtsug phud 'dreg pa'i dus ston gyi tshe'am/_gnas khang gi dus ston gyi tshe'am/_dus ston chen po'i tshe rnyed du re ba yod na'o/_/
[\[59b.4\]]dge slong des gos de zla ba gcig gi mthar gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni zla ba gcig gi mtha' tshun chad du'o/_/de las 'das par 'jog na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_
[\[59b.5\]]des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//bar sdom la/_dogs bcas dogs pa med pa dang /_/nyams gyur grub par ma gyur dang /_/rgyun chad gos lnga gos gnyis dang /_/sbyar ba dang ni tshad rnams so/_/dge slong 
[\[59b.6\]]gis tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas des de byed du mi 'jud par de gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe gos byed du gzhug go snyam du re bas de 'jog par byed cing des tshes de nyid la gos sngon po dogs pa dang bcas pa gzhan zhig rnyed par gyur na/_dge slong des 
[\[59b.7\]]gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshes la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/_tshes gsum mam/_tshes bcu tshun cad kyis gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/_dge slong des gos de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_
[\[60a.2\]]gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gos de bcu la 
[\[60a.3\]]ma rnyed kyang nyi ma bcu dgu tshun cad kyis rnyed na/_dge slong des gos de nyi ma nyi shu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung 
[\[60a.4\]]bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/_nyi ma nyi shu pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma nyi shu pa la ma rnyed kyang nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun cad kyis rnyed na dge slong des gos de zla ba de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya 
[\[60a.5\]]ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/_nyi ma sum bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gos sngon po rnyed pa ji 
[\[60a.6\]]lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas des de byed du mi 'jud par de gang gi tshe 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe gos byed du gzhug go snyam du re ba med pas de 'jog par byed 
[\[60a.7\]]cing des tshes de nyid la gos sngon po dogs pa med pa gzhan zhig rnyed par gyur na/_dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]bar mi byed pas/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshes la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/_tshes bcu tshun cad dam/_nyi ma bcu dgu tshun cad dam/_nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun cad 
[\[60b.2\]]kyis gos sngon po zhig rnyed na/_dge slong des gos de zla ba de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la 
[\[60b.3\]]sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma sum bcu gcig gi skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gos sngon po rnyed pa ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas des de byed du mi 
[\[60b.4\]]'jud par de gos la re ba yod pa de 'jog par byed cing de'i gos la re ba gang yin pa de nyams par gyur/_'gyangs par gyur/_nyam chung bar gyur cing /_des tshes de nyid la gos sngon po gzhan zhig rnyed par gyur na/_dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis 
[\[60b.5\]]brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[60b.6\]]ro/_/tshes la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/_tshes bcu tshun cad dam/_tshes bcu la ma rnyed kyang nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun cad kyi gos sngon po zhig rnyed na dge slong des gos de zla ba de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan 
[\[60b.7\]]la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma sum bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gos sngon po rnyed pa ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /_
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas des de byed du mi 'jug par de re bas de 'jog par byed cing de'i gos la re ba gang yin pa de grub par ma gyur/_rgyun chad par ma gyur par des tshes 
[\[61a.2\]]de nyid la gos sngon po gzhan zhig rnyed par gyur na/_dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar 
[\[61a.3\]]mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshes la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/_nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad kyis rnyed na dge slong des gos de zla ba de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang 
[\[61a.4\]]bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma sum bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gos sngon po rnyed 
[\[61a.5\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis tshes la gos sngon po zhig rnyed nas des de byed du mi 'jud par de re bas de 'jog par byed cing de'i gos la re ba gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du rgyun chad par gyur 
[\[61a.6\]]na dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/_
[\[61a.7\]]nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshes la ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/_nyi ma nyi shu rtsa dgu tshun chad kyis rnyed nas des de byed du mi 'jud par de re bas de 'jog par byed cing de'i gos la re ba gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]rgyun chad par gyur na dge slong des gos de nyi ma bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rung bar bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rung bar mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin 
[\[61b.2\]]par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gos sngon po ji lta ba bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo yang de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa 
[\[61b.3\]]gos dag du mchis/_nye ba 'khor lnga ste/_gos bdag po yod pa dang /_gos bdag po med pa dang /_gos bor blangs dang /_gos dur khrod pa dang /_gos phyag dar khrod pa nyid ni lnga pa'o/_/de la gos bdag po yod pa gang zhe na/_gang la bdag po skyes pa'am/_bud 
[\[61b.4\]]med dam/_ma ning yod pa de ni gos bdag po yod pa zhes bya'o/_/gos bdag po med pa gang zhe na/_gang la bdag po skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_ma ning med pa de ni gos bdag po med pa zhes bya'o/_/gos bor blangs gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nye du dag gis 
[\[61b.5\]]nye du nyams pa dang /_shi ba dang /_dus la bab par rig nas de'i rgyab nas gos kyis bkab ste dur khrod du khyer nas de dag gis gos de yang phyir khyer te 'ongs nas dge 'dun la 'bul ba de ni gos bor blangs zhes bya'o/_/gos dur khrod pa gang zhe na/_yongs su 
[\[61b.6\]]'dzin pa med pa'i dur khrod nas blangs pa gang yin pa de ni gos dur khrod pa zhes bya'o/_/gos phyag dar khrod pa gang zhe na/_phyag dar khrod pa rnam pa lnga ste/_lam po che'i gos dang /_dgon par bor ba dang /_chu 'gram pa dang /_sril zan dang /_ral rul nyid ni 
[\[61b.7\]]lnga pa yin te/_ral rul zhes bya ba ni ha cang zegs pa gang yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang phyag dar khrod pa rnam pa lnga ste/_mes tshig pa dang /_chus khyer ba dang /_byi bas zos pa dang /_be'us zos pa dang /_ma ma'i gos nyid ni lnga pa yin no/_/gzhan yang gos gnyis te 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]sar pa dang dus tshigs su spyad pa'o/_/gos sar pa gang zhe na/_tha ga pas gsar du btags pa dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung ba'i dus tshigs su ma spyad pa gang yin pa de ni gos sar pa zhes bya'o/_/gos dus tshigs 
[\[62a.2\]]su spyad pa gang zhe na/_dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung ba'i dus tshigs su spyad pa gang yin pa ste/_dus tshigs zhes bya ba ni zla ba bzhi ste/_de ni gos dus tshigs su spyad pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong gis gos sar pa rnyed na gal te dge slong 
[\[62a.3\]]des bcag pa dang /_gding ba dang /_dra ba dang /_btsem pa dang /_kha bsgyur bar nus na dge slong des gos de las snam sbyar ni nyi rim du bya/_gding ba yang nyi rim du bya/_bla gos ni cig rkyang du bya/_mthang gos kyang cig rkyang du bya'o/_/dge slong gis snam sbyar nyi 
[\[62a.4\]]rim la rim pa gsum pa glon par byed na de glon par byed pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_zhag bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis snam sbyar nyi rim las gzhan du glan no snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na de 'bogs pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_
[\[62a.5\]]nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis snam sbyar nyi rim las bkrus shing kha bsgyur te 'di nyid la glan no snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na de 'bogs pa na ltung ba med la/_nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snam sbyar la ji lta 
[\[62a.6\]]ba bzhin du gding ba la yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis bla gos cig brkyang la rim pa glon par byed na de glon pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bla gos la ji lta ba bzhin du mthang gos la yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis 
[\[62a.7\]]gos dus tshigs su spyad pa zhig rnyed la gal te dge slong des bcag pa dang /_gding ba dang /_dra ba dang /_btsem pa dang /_kha bsgyur bar nus na dge slong des gos de las snam sbyar ni bzhi rim du bya/_gding ba yang bzhi rim du bya/_bla gos ni nyi rim du bya/_mthang 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]gos kyang nyi rim du bya'o/_/dge slong gis snam sbyar bzhi rim la rim pa lnga pa glon par byed na de glon pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis snam sbyar bzhi rim las gzhan du glan no snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par 
[\[62b.2\]]byed na de 'bogs pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis snam sbyar bzhi rim las bkrus shing kha bsgyur te 'di nyid du glan par bya'o snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na de 'bogs pa na ltung ba med la/_nyi ma 
[\[62b.3\]]bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snam sbyar la ji lta ba de bzhin du gding ba la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong gis bla gos nyi rim la rim pa gsum pa glon par byed na de glon pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[62b.4\]]ro/_/dge slong gis bla gos nyi rim las gzhan du glan no snyam pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na de 'bogs pa na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bla gos nyi rim las 'di nyid bkrus shing kha bsgyur te 'di nyid du glan no snyam 
[\[62b.5\]]pas rim pa 'bogs par byed na de 'bogs pa na ltung ba med la/_nyi ma bcu 'das na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bla gos la ji lta ba bzhin du mthang gos la yang de bzhin no/_/phyag dar khrod la ni ji tsam 'dod pa glan par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[62b.6\]]la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa snam sbyar dag gi snam phran du lags/_nye ba 'khor dgu ste/_snam phran dgu pa dang /_snam phran bcu gcig pa dang /_snam phran bcu gsum pa dang /_snam phran [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa dang /_snam phran bcu bdun pa dang /_snam 
[\[62b.7\]]phran bcu dgu pa dang /_snam phran nyi shu gcig pa dang /_snam phran nyi shu gsum pa dang /_snam phran nyi shu lnga pa'o/_/nye ba 'khor de la snam phran dgu pa ni gsum sbyar gsum mo/_/snam phran bcu gcig pa ni gsum sbyar gsum dang snam phran gnyis so/_/snam phran 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]bcu gsum pa ni gsum sbyar bzhi dang snam phran gcig go/_/snam phran [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa ni gsum sbyar lnga'o/_/snam phran bcu bdun pa ni gsum sbyar lnga dang snam phran gnyis so/_/snam phran bcu dgu pa ni gsum sbyar drug dang snam phran gcig go/_/snam phran nyi 
[\[63a.2\]]shu gcig pa ni gsum sbyar bdun no/_/snam phran nyi shu gsum pa ni gsum sbyar bdun dang snam phran gnyis so/_/snam phran nyi shu lnga pa ni gsum sbyar brgyad dang snam phran gcig go/_/nye ba 'khor de la snam sbyar snam phran dgu pa gang yin pa dang /_snam phran bcu gcig pa 
[\[63a.3\]]gang yin pa dang /_snam phran bcu gsum pa gang yin pa de gsum ni glegs bu phyed dang gsum par byas te bcang bar bya'o/_/snam sbyar snam phran [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa gang yin pa dang /_snam phran bcu bdun pa gang yin pa dang /_snam phran bcu dgu pa gang yin pa de gsum ni glegs bu 
[\[63a.4\]]phyed dang bzhi par byas te bcang bar bya'o/_/snam sbyar snam phran nyi shu gcig pa gang yin pa dang /_snam phran nyi shu gsum pa gang yin pa dang /_snam phran nyi shu lnga pa gang yin pa de gsum ni glegs bu phyed dang lnga par byas te bcang bar bya'o/_/nye ba 'khor de yan cad ni tshem 
[\[63a.5\]]bru'o/_/btsun pa snam sbyar gyi tshad ji tsam lags/_nye ba 'khor gsum ste/_snam sbyar chen po dang /_'bring dang /_chung ngur rig par bya'o/_/de la chen po ni khru gsum dang lnga'o/_/chung ngu ni khru phyed dang gsum dang phyed dang lnga'o/_/'bring gi ni de gnyis kyi bar ma'o/_/
[\[63a.6\]]snam sbyar ji lta ba bzhin du bla gos dang /_mthang gos kyang de bzhin no/_/gzhan yang mthang gos rnam pa gnyis te/_khru do dang lnga pa dang /_khru do dang bzhi pa'o/_/mthang gos tha ma ni 'khor gsum khebs pa gang yin pa'o/_/spang ba rnams kyi gos tha ma ni khru gang kho ra 
[\[63a.7\]]khor yug go/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan 
[\[63b\]]
