[\[63b.1\]]zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar 
[\[63b.2\]]byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du ji tsam du dge slong gi spang ba'i dngos po de nyid kyis ma bshags shing /_so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam/_chos gos sam/_dra ba'am/_phor bu'am/_ska rags sam/_
[\[63b.3\]]dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/'jog pa'i spang ba ste gsum pa rdzogs 
[\[63b.4\]{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pas gzigs pa lnga po rigs dang /_yul dang /_dus dang /_rus dang /_bud med la gzigs pa dag gis 'jig rten la gzigs nas glang po cher snang bar 
[\[63b.5\]]bsgyur te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe na sa chen po shin tu g.yos par gyur cing 'jig rten gyi 'jig rten gyi bar gang na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun gnag mun par byed pas gnag par 
[\[63b.6\]]gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur nas/_sems can gang dag der skyes pa dag gis rang gi lag pa brkyang pa yang mi mthong ba de dag gis kyang 'od des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan 
[\[63b.7\]]yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes shes par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu 'das nas yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po shin tu g.yos par gyur cing 'jig 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]rten gyi 'jig rten gyi bar gang na nyi ma dang /_zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od dag nyams su mi myong ba'i mun pa mun gnag mun par byed pas gnag par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe na snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas 
[\[64a.2\]]sems can gang dag der skyes pa dag gis rang gi lag pa brkyang pa yang mi mthong ba de dag gis kyang /_'od des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/_/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes shes par gyur 
[\[64a.3\]]to/_/gang gi nyin mo bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bltams par gyur pa de'i nyin mo rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gi bu yang btsas par gyur te/_mnyan yod na rgyal po chen po rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs sbyin gyi bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas 
[\[64a.4\]]pa na 'jig rten gsal ba gsal ba ltar snang bas gzhon nu 'di'i ming gsal rgyal du gdags so snyam nas bu de'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar btags so/_/rgyal po'i khab na rgyal po chen po pad ma chen po'i bu btsas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 
[\[64a.5\]]'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing 'di btsun mo gzugs can gyi bu yin pas gzhon nu 'di'i ming gzugs can snying por gdags so snyam nas bu de'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar btags so/_/kau shAm+bI na rgyal po chen po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas 
[\[64a.6\]]nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas gzhon nu 'di'i ming shar par gdags so snyam nas bu de'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar btags so/_/'phags rgyal na rgyal po chen po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas 
[\[64a.7\]]nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten rab tu snang bas snang bar gyur pas gzhon nu 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so snyam nas bu de'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar btags so/_/rgyal po re res bsams pa/_yang bdag gi bu'i mthu yin no/_/
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]bdag gi bu'i mthu yin no snyam mod kyi/_de ni de lta ma yin te/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi nyin mo bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa de nyid kyi nyin mo shAkya gzhon nu bzang ldan la sogs pa 
[\[64b.2\]]lnga brgya yang btsas so/_/bsnyen bkur ba 'dun byed la sogs pa lnga brgya yang btsas so/_/rta rgod ma lnga brgya las rte'u bsngags ldan la sogs pa lnga brgya yang 'brangs so/_/lha rnams kyis kyang gter lnga brgya nye bar bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[64b.3\]]de bram ze ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan dag gis lung bstan pa/_gal te gzhon nu pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/_chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna 
[\[64b.4\]]bdun po de dag ni 'di lta bur 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni bdun pa yin no/_/'di la bu 
[\[64b.5\]]dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med 
[\[64b.6\]]la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[64b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe na thams cad du gangs kyi ngos dang nye ba chu klung skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]bsti gnas dang /_ha cang mi ring bar shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/_de bram ze ltas pa dang /_mtshan mkhan dag gis gal te gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/_chos kyi rgyal po chos 
[\[65a.2\]]dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun po de dag ni 'di lta bur 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po 
[\[65a.3\]]che dang /_dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni bdun pa yin no/_/'di la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba 
[\[65a.4\]]med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 
[\[65a.5\]]byung na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to zhes sgra bsgrags par gyur to/_/nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po dag gis kyang gangs ri'i ngos dang nye ba chu klung 
[\[65a.6\]]skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang /_ha cang mi ring bar shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/_de bram ze ltas pa dang /_mtshan mkhan dag gis gal te gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal 
[\[65a.7\]]ba/_chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun po de dag ni 'di lta bur 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni bdun pa yin no/_/'di la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/de rgya mtsho la thug 
[\[65b.2\]]pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa 
[\[65b.3\]]kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang nyi 'og gi khams kyi 
[\[65b.4\]]rgyal po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_da gzhon nu bsten na dus su 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur bas gang bsten na gzhon nu bsten par 'gyur snyam mo/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_rgyal po zas gtsang bsten par bya ste/_de bsten na gzhon nu bsten par 'gyur ro snyam 
[\[65b.5\]]nas/_de dag gis rgyal po zas gtsang bsten par brtsams te/_dus dang mthun pa'i dus su 'dud pas pho nya dang /_dkor sgrom dag skur bar byed do/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu btsas pa na don thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams 
[\[65b.6\]]cad grub pas de'i phyir gzhon nu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gdags so snyam nas de'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar btags so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen por 'khrungs shing des rgan po dang /_nad pa dang /_shi 
[\[65b.7\]]ba gzigs nas thugs phyung ste nags kyi nang du gshegs pa de'i tshe na rgyal po zas gtsang dang /_shAkya legs par rab rtogs kyis bka' mchid gsol ba'i mi nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu bkye ste/_de dag gis nyi ma re re zhing deng ni gzhon nu til 'bru gcig gam/_
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]'bras thug po che 'bru gcig gam/_mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig gam/_mon sran gre'u 'bru gcig gam/_rgya shug gi 'bru gcig gam/_rgya sran 'bru gcig gis 'tsho bar mdzad do zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bka' mchid khyer te 'ong 
[\[66a.2\]]ngo /_/nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po dag gis de ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rgan po dang /_nad pa dang /_shi ba gzigs nas thugs byung ste rab tu byung ngo zhes thos nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir bdag cag rgyal po zas gtsang la sten par byed pa'i gzhon 
[\[66a.3\]]nu de rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/_de dag las ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad kyis 'dud pa dang /_pho nya dang dkor sgrom 'bul ba rgyun bcad par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la blon po'i mchog sbed pa zhes bya 
[\[66a.4\]]ba zhig yod la/_rgyal po zas gtsang la ni mdun na 'don gyi bu 'char ka zhes bya ba yod de/_gang gi tshe ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po zas gtsang gi gan du pho nya gtong bar byed pa de'i tshe na blon po'i mchog sbed pa gtong bar byed de/_des rgyal po'i bya ba dag 
[\[66a.5\]]dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas 'char ka'i khyim du 'jug par byed do/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du pho nya gtong bar byed pa de'i tshe na ni mdun na 'don gyi bu 'char ka gtong bar byed de/_des kyang rgyal po'i bya ba dag 
[\[66a.6\]]dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas blon po'i mchog sbed pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed do/_/sbed pa la chung ma sbed ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_skyes bu dga' ba zhig yod de/_'char ka sbed ma dang lhan cig kha dum par gyur to/_/
[\[66a.7\]]sbed pas ji ltar 'char ka sbed ma dang lhan cig kha dum par gyur par shes nas des bsams pa/_'di gsad par bya'o snyam mo/_/yang bsams pa/_gal te 'di bsad par gyur na yul 'khor gnyis 'khrug pa chen por 'gyur bas bdag gis bud med kyi lus kyi 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]phyir ci'i phyir bram ze gsad par bya snyam nas de btang snyoms su bzhag go/_/de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag sbed pas 'phrigs so snyam du rig nas skrag ste khyim nas byung zhing gzhan na 'dug pa dang /_sbed pas smras pa/_'char ka khyod ci'i phyir rang 
[\[66b.2\]]gi khyim spangs te gzhan na 'dug tshur shog_/'di khyod rang gi khyim yin gyis ci bder 'dug shig_/de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/_don gyis na 'dis bdag la rjes su gnang ngo snyam du rig nas de nyid na 'dug go//_//'dul ba rnam par 
[\[66b.3\]]'byed pa/_bam po nyi shu bdun pa/_de nas dus gzhan zhig na blon po'i mchog sbed pa dus la bab nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de la bu med pa'i phyir nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang bang bar bcug go/_/sbed mas 'char ka la gang gi tshe 
[\[66b.4\]]bdag gi khyim thab gson zhing 'dug ste 'tsho zhing sdod pa de'i tshe na khyod rtag pa kho nar byon nad de'i dus la bab ste/_ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang bu ma mchis pa'i slad du nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang bang bar stsal na/_da khyod kyis bka' mchid tsam 
[\[66b.5\]]yang mi spring ngam zhes yi ge spring ngo /_/de nas 'char ka spring yig gi don thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bdag der song bar gyur na gzhi de las 'char ka bud med la chags pa bud med kyi phyir der song ngo zhes gzhan dag kha zer bar 'gyur gyis bdag gis 
[\[66b.6\]]thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas des lan gnyis sam gsum du rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub 
[\[66b.7\]]pa bltams pa de'i tshe na nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po thams cad 'dud cing thams cad kyis pho nya dang /_dkor sgrom dag gsol nas/_gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rgan po dang /_nad pa dang /_gum pa gzigs nas thugs byung ste nags su gshegs pa 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]de'i tshe na nyi 'og gi khams kyi rgyal po de dag las ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad kyis pho nya dang /_dkor sgrom 'bul ba rgyun bkum nas lhas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la pho nya dang /_dkor 
[\[67a.2\]]sgrom dag bka' stsal cing bskur nas de lta de ltar rkyen par gyur pa las da yal bar bor na slad kyis gnod pa chen por 'gyur ba de skol dang mtshams 'brel par mchis pas de dang lhan cig rkyen par mdzad pa'i rigs so/_/'char ka gal te de lta na khyod nyid pho nyar song 
[\[67a.3\]]shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas 'char kas dkor sgrom dag khyer te mnyan yod ga la ba der 'phags nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin to/_/de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/_sten pa la bsten par mi bya bar bsten pa la bsten pa bsten par bya ba yin 
[\[67a.4\]]pas je dang por blon po rnams blta bar bya zhing de'i 'og tu rgyal po blta ste/_sbed ma'i phyir rgyal po la gsol ba bya'o snyam nas/_des blon po rnams la blta bar brtsams te smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis kho bo ji ltar sbed ma dang lhan cig bshes pa de mi shes sam/_
[\[67a.5\]]de khyim thab dus la bab nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu med pa'i phyir de'i nor thams cad rang gi mdzod dang /_bang bar bcug pas de'i phyir kho bo rgyal po la gsol ba byed kyis khyed kyis grogs gyis shig_/de dag gis de bzhin du khas blangs 
[\[67a.6\]]so/_/de nas 'char ka ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyal ba dang /_tshe spel ba byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas lan gnyis lan gsum du rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang /_rgyal po'i byed 
[\[67a.7\]]pa dag byas te/_ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag gi gnas stsol cig_/'char ka khyod sngon gang du zhugs/_lha blon po'i mchog sbed pa'i sdum par mchis so/_/'char ka song la de nyid du zhugs shig_/lha blon po'i 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]mchog sbed pa dus la bab po/_/gal te de dus la bab na ci de'i khyim yang dus la bab bam/_lha de'i sdum pa ni dus la ma bab mod kyi 'on kyang de na stan tsam yang ma mchis so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis 'char ka'i gnas byin 
[\[67b.2\]]cig_/'char ka'i phyir byung ba dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ci lags 'char ka la gnas ma mchis snyam mam/_'di ltar 'char ka sbed ma dang lhan cig mchid mjal bas don gyis na 'char kas sbed ma'i slad du lha la gsol ba lags kyis/_lha 'char 
[\[67b.3\]]ka ni bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu lags pas bram ze ni mi 'dod bzhin du gzung bar bgyi ba lags te/_'di legs par bzung na rgyal po zas gtsang legs par bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal pos 'char ka bos te smras pa/_'char ka ngas khyod ji ltar sbed ma 
[\[67b.4\]]dang lhan cig bshes par sngar ma shes kyis da song la sbed ma dang /_de'i khyim dang /_nor thams cad khyod khyer cig_/lha bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_'char ka sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang /_sbed mas 'char ka 'ongs so zhes thos 
[\[67b.5\]]nas sgo khang du 'dug ste ngu bar brtsams so/_/'char kas mthong nas smras pa/_sbed ma khyod ci'i phyir ngu /_des smras pa/_bdag 'tshal ba'i khyim thab dus la bab na ci khyod kyis kyang yongs su btang ngam/_de nas 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te 
[\[67b.6\]]bdag gis mthun par smras na 'di shin tu ngu bar 'gyur bas bdag gis 'di tshar gcad par bya'o snyam du rig nas 'char kas sbed ma la smras pa/_sbed ma byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba byed pa gang gis btsun mo grags 'dzin dang /_sa 'tsho ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes 
[\[67b.7\]]la sogs pa bud med drug khri spangs te rab tu byung ba de dag gi rkang pa'i rdul tsam du yang khyod kyis mi phod do/_/de nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_'char kas smras pa/_kho bos khyod ma btang bas khyod nyid kyi phyir 'dir 'ongs pa yin no/_/kho bos rgyal po las 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]khyod dang khyim dang /_nor thams cad thob na ci khyod 'di nyid du 'dug gam/_ser skya'i gnas su 'gro/_/des bsams pa/_gal te ser skya'i gnas su song nas bram ze mo las srog kyang mi thob bo snyam du rig nas 'di nyid du mchis so zhes smras te de de nyid du 
[\[68a.2\]]'dug go/_/de'i tshe na 'char ka la khyim gnyis yod de/_gcig ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gcig ni ser skya'i gnas na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad de dka' ba byed pa ci yang med par rig nas/_ci bder dbugs rngub par 
[\[68a.3\]]mdzad ci bder dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing /_'bras chan dang /_zan dron la sogs pa zhal zas rgya chen po dag kyang gsol bar mdzad/_zhun mar dang /_'bru mar dag gis sku dag kyang skud par mdzad/_chu dron pos kyang sku bsil bar mdzad cing /_grong sde 'dong du 
[\[68a.4\]]gshegs nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma gnyis las lan bcu drug bzlas pa'i 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa gsol te/_klu'i rgyal po nag pos mngon par bstod pa na rtswa bkra shis 'tshong pa las rtswa gser gyi mdog lta bu dag bzhes nas/_byang chub 
[\[68a.5\]]kyi gzhi ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_nyid kyis rtswa ma 'khrugs pa'i gdan bshams nas skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrang nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs nas thugs bskyed cing gsung brjod pa/_ji srid zag med ma thob par/_/de srid skyil 
[\[68a.6\]]krung gzhig mi bya/_/de yis ji srid zag med pa/_/ma brnyes skyil krung 'jig mi mdzad/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo'i gung thun la bdud 'byung po dung phyur phrag gsum dang /_bye ba phrag drug gi 'khor dang ldan pa byams pa'i stobs kyis mngon 
[\[68a.7\]]par btul te bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud nas tshangs pas gsol te/_bA rA Na sIr gshegs nas lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe lnga pa dang /_nye lnga dag dang /_grong ba'i khye'u mtho ba mtho ba 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]lnga bcu btul to/_/kar pa si'i tshal gseb tu gshegs nas bzang sde'i tshogs drug bcu bden pa dag la bkod do/_/grong sde 'dong du gshegs nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma gnyis bden pa dag la bkod do/_/steng rgyas su gshegs nas 
[\[68b.2\]]ral pa can stong rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad do/_/ga yA mgo'i mchod rten du gshegs nas dge slong stong po de dag cho 'phrul gsum gyis gdams pa mdzad nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya 
[\[68b.3\]]ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/shar pa'i tshal gseb tu gshegs nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang /_ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag go/_/rgyal 
[\[68b.4\]]po'i khab tu gshegs nas 'od ma'i tshal bzhes te shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang ldan pa rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad do/_/mnyan yod du gshegs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal bzhes te ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 
[\[68b.5\]]gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul nas/_de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi gan du pho nya btang ste/_lha 
[\[68b.6\]]dgyes pa skyed cig_/khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thugs su chud de/_bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad cing /_mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes spring ngo /_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bcom ldan 
[\[68b.7\]]'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya btang ste/_gzhon nu bdag gis ring du ma mthong ste/_bdag gzhon nu mthong bas yongs su skom mo zhes gsol pa dang /_pho nya de de nyid du rab tu phyung ngo /_/pho nya gnyis pa btang ba dang de yang de nyid du rab tu phyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir gang dang gang pho nyar btang ba de dang de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas gtsang gis de thos nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa/_'char kas mthong 
[\[69a.2\]]nas smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs khong du chud cing bzhugs/_'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba dag spyod pa'i tshe ngas gtam rmed pa'i mi dag btang na de dag nyi ma re re zhing gtam khyer te 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad 
[\[69a.3\]]grub pa gnas pa 'dis gnas so zhes gtam snyod par byed na/_da gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas bdud rtsi thugs su chud de bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad cing /_mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs zhes thos nas ngas 
[\[69a.4\]]gtam rmed pa'i mi dag btang na/_'gas kyang gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i gtam khyer te mi 'ong bar gang dang gang pho nyar btang ba de dang de de nyid du 'dug par gyur na nga ji ltar lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug tu rung /_'char kas smras 
[\[69a.5\]]pa/_lha bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_khyod kyang der 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/lha bdag gis lha'i spyan sngar bka' mchid 'tshal te mchi'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis rang nyid kyis phrin yig 'di skad ces/_ma rum bzhugs pa tshun chad nas/_/bdag 
[\[69a.6\]]gis legs par khyod bsrungs te/_/nyon mongs gdugs kyis rab gdungs pas/_/rgyal ba'i ljon shing sdod cing mchis/_/slob ma'i yal ga rtsa lag gis/_/da ltar khyod ni rgyas gyur pas/_/gzhan dag bde bas dga' mdzad na/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal sten 
[\[69a.7\]]par gyur/_/gang tshe dang po khyod 'khrungs tshe/_/shin tu don chen mdzad nas ni/_/nye du rjes su gzung mdzad ces/_/de tshe khyod kyis thugs dam bcas/_/de slad go 'phang zhi brnyes khyod/_/bdag dang nye du'i tshogs rnams la/_/rjes su thugs brtse nyer bzung ste/_/
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]byon pa'i blo gros mdzad du gsol/_/zhes bris so/_/de nas 'char ka phrin yig de blangs te mnyan yod du 'phags nas de mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas ji tsam na 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la phrin yig phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis phrin yig 
[\[69b.2\]]bklag pa mdzad nas/_'char kas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su gshegs sam/_'char ka 'ong ngo /_/'char kas sngon gyi gcugs pa de nyid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das mi gshegs na bdag gis mthus bkri 
[\[69b.3\]]bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_gang la khrid byed sred pa yi/_/dra bkram gang na'ang yod min pa/_/spyod yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de/_/gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/_/gang la khrid byed sred pa yi/_/
[\[69b.4\]]dra bkram gang na'ang yod min pa/_/rtsal yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de/_/gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/_/gang rgyal mi nyams gang la ni/_/'jig rten ma rgyal yong med pa/_/spyod yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de/_/gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/_/gang 
[\[69b.5\]]rgyal mi nyams gang la ni/_/'jig rten ma rgyal yong med pa/_/rtsal yas gzhi med sangs rgyas de/_/gang gi gzhis ni khrid par byed/_/'char kas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po zas gtsang la brjod du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[69b.6\]]pa/_'char ka rgyal ba'i pho nya dag ni de lta bu ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 'o na rgyal ba'i pho nya dag ji lta bu lags/_skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gon pa rab tu byung ba dag yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchis par mchid 
[\[69b.7\]]kyis 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab tu byung ste song shig_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sngon tshe rabs rjes pa de dang de dag tu yab dang /_yum dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_bla 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]ma'i gnas lta bu dag gi chos dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ga' yang ma bcag pas bka' stsal ma thag tu 'char kas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i 
[\[70a.2\]]bu 'char ka rab tu phyung shig dang /_de ni 'di la yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/_de la 
[\[70a.3\]]'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin no/_/'di ni khyod kyis bya ba ma yin no/_/'char ka khyod kyis deng phyin cad bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig khyim gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun tu spyad pa'i chos thams cad brjod do/_/'char kas mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 
[\[70a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i 
[\[70a.5\]]gnas su mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'char ka khyod kyis tsham tshom med par rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par mi bya bar sgor 'greng ste shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam zhes 'dri 
[\[70a.6\]]na shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te zhugs shig ces zer na 'jug par bya'o/_/gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin nam zhes 'dri na/_cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[70a.7\]]khyod kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas 'cha' bar mi byed dam zhes 'dri na/_gnas 'cha' bar mi byed do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te gang du gnas 'cha' bar byed ces 'dri na/_dgon 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]pa'am/_gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ong ngam zhes 'dri na 'ong ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te yun ji tsam na 'ong zhes 'dri na zhag bdun 'das nas so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 
[\[70b.2\]]'das bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/'char ka 'ong ba'i tshe mnyan yod du nyi ma mang po dag gis phyin na phyir 'gro ba'i tshe 'di lta 
[\[70b.3\]]ste/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus nyi ma gcig gis ser skya'i gnas su phyin to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas mi sgo ba bos te smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod song la rgyal po la 
[\[70b.4\]]shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes sbron cig_/des smras pa/_shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang mchis sam/_'char kas smras pa/_shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod do/_/sgo bas rgyal po la sbran pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shAkya 'jug tu chug shig_/su zhig 
[\[70b.5\]]shAkya zlog par byed/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sgo bas ngo shes nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod la bcom ldan 'das a rog gya zhes gsung ngo /_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis 
[\[70b.6\]]'char ka skad las ngo shes nas smras pa/_khyod 'char ka yin nam/_lha bdag skye bos de ltar 'tshal to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid yin nam/_lha cha lugs 'di 'dra ba nyid lags so/_/rgyal po seng ge'i 
[\[70b.7\]]khri las brgyal te sa la lhung nas chus dbang bskur bas srog phyir 'ongs nas dris pa/_gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ong ngam/_lha mchi'o/_/yun ji tsam na 'ong /_dgung bdun 'das nas so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag deng la rgyal 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]po'i pho brang dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dag byi dor gyis shig_/lha gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gnas 'cha' bar mi bgyid do/_/'o na gang du gnas 'cha' bar byed/_dgon pa'am/_gtsug lag khang 
[\[71a.2\]]du'o/_/gtsug lag khang ci 'dra bar/_'char kas mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba brjod do/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po zas gtsang la skyed mos tshal skye yod dang /_n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas la sogs pa skyed mos 
[\[71a.3\]]tshal lnga brgya yod pas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed deng la/_skyed mos tshal gsum po skye yod dang /_n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas dag tu skyed mos tshal re rer yang rgyal byed kyi tshal 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang khang 
[\[71a.4\]]chen bcu drug dang /_khang pa'i gzhi drug bcu yod pa dag myur du byed du chug la/_grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad kyang rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par gnas par gyis shig_/rgyal po rnams ni tshig gis 'grub pa yin la/_lha rnams ni sems kyis 
[\[71a.5\]]'grub pa yin/_rnal 'byor pa rnams ni sems bskyed pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa yin pas blon po rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas skyed mos tshal gsum po skye yod dang /_n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang /_tshangs pa'i 
[\[71a.6\]]gnas dag tu skyed mos tshal re rer yang rgyal byed kyi tshal 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang khang chen bcu drug dang /_khang pa'i gzhi drug bcu yod pa dag byed du bcug cing grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad kyang rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par gnas par byas so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[71a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gson zhing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams la chos nyid kyis gdon mi za bar bgyi ba bcu mnga' ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji srid du sangs rgyas su lung ma bstan pa dang /_ji srid du sems can gzhan gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu phyir 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]mi ldog pa'i sems ma bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams cad ma btul ba dang /_ji srid du sku tshe'i cha lnga pa ma lus pa dang /_ji srid du mtshams bcad pa ma mdzad pa dang /_ji srid du nyan thos zung gcig mchog tu ma bstan pa dang /_ji 
[\[71b.2\]]srid du grong khyer kun 'od du lha las babs pa ma bstan pa dang /_ji srid du mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam par ma bstan pa dang /_ji srid du mtsho chen po ma dros par nyan thos rnams dang thabs cig sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung ma bstan pa dang /_ji srid du yab yum gnyis 
[\[71b.3\]]bden pa dag la ma bkod pa de srid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rgyal po chen po zas gtsang dang /_shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag gdul ba'i dus nye bar gnas par gyur cing /_'di lta ste/_yab 
[\[71b.4\]]yum gnyis bden pa dag la gzhag pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gdon mi za bar mdzad pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin 
[\[71b.5\]]gshegs pa ser skya'i gnas su gshegs kyis/_khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ser skya'i gnas su 'gro ba dang /_yab dang sras mjal ba lta bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 
[\[71b.6\]]btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/_dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ser skya'i gnas su 'gro ba dang /_yab dang sras mjal 
[\[71b.7\]]ba lta bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo'o/_/dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po las mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/_grol 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/_thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/_mdzes 
[\[72a.2\]]pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs 
[\[72a.3\]]kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[72a.4\]]bskor ba/_sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor 
[\[72a.5\]]ba/_'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'phags 
[\[72a.6\]]skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_thags zangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_brgya byin 
[\[72a.7\]]ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dbang po rnams shin tu dul ba/_spyod lam dang /_spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/_chu gter ltar ting nge ba/_sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/_glang po 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/_'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i 
[\[72b.2\]]ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pu pa/_nyag gcig dpa' ba/_gnyis pa med pa/_
[\[72b.3\]]gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/_rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i 
[\[72b.4\]]gzhi la legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_yan lag lnga spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha 
[\[72b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i 
[\[72b.6\]]stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/_'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_ga ya 'od srung dang /_chu klung 'od srung la sogs pa sngon gyi ral pa 
[\[72b.7\]]can stong dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdar te ser skya'i gnas ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po zas gtsang gis nyi ma bdun pa la grong khyer ser skya'i gnas 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]thams cad rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par bzhag cing bdug pa dang /_phye ma 'khrigs pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs bkram pa dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad rgya chen po dag bshams 
[\[73a.2\]]shing /_n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla gam lta bur bshams te/_n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas grong khyer ser skya'i gnas kyi bar gyi lam thams cad mdzes shing rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par bzhag 
[\[73a.3\]]ste/_spos chu'i chag chag btab cing bar bar du dar gyi chun po mang po dbyangs shing /_me tog gi tshoms dag kyang bshams/_bdug spos dri zhim po'i du ba 'khrigs pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs bkram pa dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba dag rnam par 
[\[73a.4\]]bzhag go/_/rgyal po zas gtsang nyid kyis rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen pos n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das la sdod cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na chu rlung ro ha 
[\[73a.5\]]ka'i 'gram du gshegs so/_/de na dge slong kha cig ni lag pa dang rkang pa dag 'khru bar byed/_kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed/_kha cig ni chu 'tshag par byed/_kha cig ni khrus byed do/_/grong khyer ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don 
[\[73a.6\]]thams cad grub pa 'ongs shing /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gnas mal bshams zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar 'dus par gyur cing /_de na kha cig 
[\[73a.7\]]ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul zhing lhags so/_/kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes te je dang por yab kyis sras kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad dam/_'on te sras kyis yab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad pa blta'o snyam pas lhags so/_/de 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs kyis ser skya'i gnas su gshegs na shAkya nga rgyal can dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas chen po ma rnyed de/_'di ltar 'di sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na grong khyer 
[\[73b.2\]]ser skya'i gnas nas lha 'bum phrag du mas bsu ste steng gi nam mkha' las byung ste song na/_da 'dis bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs kyang rkang pas 'ongs so zhes ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur bas bdag rdzu 'phrul gyis ser skya'i gnas su 'jug par bya'o snyam du dgongs shing 
[\[73b.3\]]rig nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed ni rkang pa dag gis chu klung ro ha ka rgol cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs so/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan 
[\[73b.4\]]nas/_rkang pa dag gis chu klung ro ha ka rgal te n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te/_ji ltar thugs mnyam 
[\[73b.5\]]par bzhag na rdzu 'phrul gyis chu klung ro ha ka'i pha rol gyi 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur cing steng gi nam mkha' la ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang pa ltar mngon par 'phags nas/_ser skya'i gnas kyi steng nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas 
[\[73b.6\]]n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i steng gi nam mkha' la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/de na bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs logs su spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/_'chag pa dang /_bzhengs pa dang /_bzhugs pa dang /_mnal ba dag mdzad do/_/me'i 
[\[73b.7\]]khams la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dag dang /_ser po dag dang /_dmar po dag dang /_dkar po dag dang /_btsod ka dag dang /_
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo /_/cho 'phrul zung dag kyang rnam par ston pa mdzad de/_sku'i smad nas me 'bar zhing sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par mdzad do/_/sku'i stod nas me 'bar zhing sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par 
[\[74a.2\]]mdzad do/_/shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang de bzhin du mdzad do/_/de ltar phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bzhi ston par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te de 
[\[74a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po zas gtsang gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par gyur na ni de'i spyi bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur la/_gal te rgyal po zas gtsang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs par gyur na ni shAkya nga rgyal can dag ci'i phyir yab 
[\[74a.4\]]tu gyur pas sras kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par byed ces ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur bas bdag gis ci nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus ma btud bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya'o 
[\[74a.5\]]snyam du dgongs shing rig nas ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi nam mkha' la gzhes shing /_ta la drug dang /_lnga dang /_bzhi dang /_gsum dang /_gnyis dang /_gcig srid tsam na bzhugs so/_/de nas skyes bu bdun srid tsam na gzhes shing skyes bu drug dang /_lnga 
[\[74a.6\]]dang /_bzhi dang /_gsum dang /_gnyis dang /_gcig srid tsam na gzhes so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis ma btud bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shAkya rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_
[\[74a.7\]]gang tshe khyod bltams dog sa rab g.yos dang /_'dzam bu'i grib mas khyod sku ma btang dang /_/'di dang lan gsum kun gzigs mkhyen ldan pa/_/sangs rgyas khyod kyi zhabs la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]pa de slar bsdu ba mdzad nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar gshegs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang dang /_bre bo zas dang /_zas dkar dang /_bdud rtsi zas dang /_shAkya 'bum phrag du ma dag 
[\[74b.2\]]gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/shAkya kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/shAkya kha cig ni thag ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas cang mi 
[\[74b.3\]]smra bar mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_dpa' bo bcibs pa glang po dang /_/chibs dang shing rtas khab gshegs na/_/tsher bcas dog sa'i gzhi dag la/_/ji ltar 
[\[74b.4\]]zhabs kyis gshegs pa mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag ni rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang /_/yang dag stsol ba'i bzhon pa yis/_/nyon mongs tsher mas ma smas par/_/sa gzhi kun tu rnam par rgyu/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_dpa' bo sngan 
[\[74b.5\]]chad ka shi ka'i/_/na bza' gsol bas rnam mdzes na/_/ngur smrig na bza' rtsub po dag_/ji ltar khyod skus bzod par mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po bdag ni khrel 'dzem pa'i/_/snam sbyar gos gyon mdzes pa yin/_/gang gis 
[\[74b.6\]]thub pa'i gos gyon pa/_/zhi ba'i nags na mdzes par 'gyur/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_brtan pa sngan chad gser snod nas/_/zhal zas ro mang ldan gsol nas/_/da ltar bsod snyoms ngan pa dag_/ji ltar khyod kyi mgur du byon/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[74b.7\]]stsal pa/_chos ldan dga' ba dag gi zas/_/nges 'byung ldan zhing mnyam bzhag yin/_/zas sred spangs kyang 'jig rten kun/_/rjes su gzung phyir bdag spyod byed/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_blo bzang khyod sngon yang thog gi/_/gzhal med khang steng dus mthun 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]bzhugs/_/nyag gcig nags na khyod bzhugs na/_/ji ltar bsnyengs dang bral bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gau tam 'jigs kun rtsa dang srid/_/de dag bag nyal bcas spangs pas/_/mya ngan 'jigs bral nags 
[\[75a.2\]]gnas te/_/de na bdag 'jigs ci yang med/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_thub dbang khyod sngon rab dgyes pa'i/_/khab na rtag tu khrus mchog mdzad/_/nags na nyag gcig khyod bzhugs na/_/de na 'byor khrus su dag bgyid/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[75a.3\]]pa/_gau tam chos rdzing bsod nams 'gram/_/rnyog med dam pas bsngags pa ste/_/mi lus mi gsher der bkrus pa/_/rig byed yon tan pha rol 'gro/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_dpa' bo rang gi pho brang na/_/gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/_/chab 
[\[75a.4\]]tshan rnyog dang bcas pa yis/_/ji ltar khyod kyi sku khrus mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gau tam dang klung tshul khrims 'gram/_/dang ba bsil ba mkhas pas bsngags/_/mi lus mi gsher der bkrus pa/_/rig byed yon tan pha rol 'gro/_/rgyal 
[\[75a.5\]]po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_zil gnon gang nas skye 'gyur zhing /_/'jigs skrag gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yid 'byung gang nas skye bar 'gyur/_/zhus pa de ni bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zil gnon gang nas skye 'gyur 
[\[75a.6\]]zhing /_/'jigs skrag gang nas 'byung 'gyur dang /_/yid 'byung gang nas skye 'gyur ba/_/gson cig bdag gis khyod la bshad/_/rga dang na dang 'chi 'gyur ba/_/gal te de gsum yod min na/_/bdag kyang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i/_/yul rnams la ni dga' bar 
[\[75a.7\]]'gyur/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' mdzad pa/_/dpa' bo 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis/_/khyod la gos pa mi mnga' ba/_/legs par 'khrungs pa legs pa lags/_/de nas rab dga' dang rgyas pas/_/drang srong dge 'dun bskor byas 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]te/_/thub dbang zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/_/bde gshegs kun nas rtog cing sdod/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo/_/de nas bcom 
[\[75b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang dang /_lhas sbyin sdig pa 'dod pa nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can ma gtogs pa zas dkar la 
[\[75b.3\]]sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/de nas srog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha 
[\[75b.4\]]cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 'dun la bab par rnam par 
[\[75b.5\]]gzhag par mdzad do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ni bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo /_/lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa dang /_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma mthong ngo /_/lhas byin 
[\[75b.6\]]bden pa ma mthong zhing khro bas zil gyis non pas smras pa/_gal te bdag gis kyang 'di ltar rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i sgyu ma shes par gyur na/_bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad rjes su 'jug par bya ba la rag go/_/shAkya gcugs par gyur pa dga' ba ston pa dag gis 
[\[75b.7\]]de la smras pa/_lhas byin thong shig bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba yin gyis de skad ma zer cig_/de nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/nyi ma gnyis pa la skyed mos tshal skye yod dus phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla gam lta bu bshams pa 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]byas nas/_der yang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang dang /_lhas byin sdig pa 'dod pa nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can ma gtogs 
[\[76a.2\]]pa/_bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri drug stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/de na srog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_
[\[76a.3\]]kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 'dun la bab par rnam par gzhag 
[\[76a.4\]]par mdzad do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ni bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo /_/lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa dang /_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma mthong ngo /_/lhas byin bden pa ma 
[\[76a.5\]]mthong zhing khro ba'i zil gyis non pas smras pa/_gal te bdag gis kyang 'di ltar rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i sgyu ma shes par gyur na/_bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad rjes su 'jug par bya ba la rag go/_/shAkya gcugs par gyur pa dga' ba ston pa dag gis de 
[\[76a.6\]]la smras pa/_lhas byin thong shig_/bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba yin gyis de skad ma zer cig_/de nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/nyi ma gsum pa la skyed mos tshal tshangs pa'i gnas su sa phyogs go skabs yangs par gdan thabs zla gam lta 
[\[76a.7\]]bu bshams pa byas nas/_der yang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang dang /_lhas byin sdig pa 'dod pa nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can ma 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]gtogs pa bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis bden pa dag mthong bar gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/de na srog chags stong phrag mang po kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[76b.2\]]bu/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 'dun la bab par rnam par 
[\[76b.3\]]gzhag par mdzad do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ni bdag gi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam du ha cang dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo /_/lhas byin ni sdig pa 'dod pa dang /_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis bden pa ma mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom 
[\[76b.4\]]ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ci'i phyir rgyal po zas gtsang bden pa mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs na/_rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa mi mthong ste/_sems ha cang mtho ba dang /_ha cang zhum pas so/_/de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems gzhon nu don thams cad 
[\[76b.5\]]grub pa sngon cad lha dang mis mchod par gyur na/_da ni mis mchod cing lhas mchod par ma gyur to snyam du ha cang zhum par gyur par thugs su chud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gdul ba'i phyir lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig 
[\[76b.6\]]la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs shing rig nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni gal te 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad na ni tha na srog chags grog sbur gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems 
[\[76b.7\]]kyis shes la/_ji ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad na ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na nyan thos la sogs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa lha rnams 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gdul ba'i slad du lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston pa bzhed par mthong ngo /_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa 
[\[77a.2\]]dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes nas/_'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu'i lag pa bskums pa las rkyong bar byed pa'am/_brkyang ba las skum par byed pa de bzhin du/_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod 
[\[77a.3\]]pa'i lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te skyed mos tshal tshangs pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sgo bzhi pa sprul pa mdzad de/_sgo bzhi po dag tu 
[\[77a.4\]]'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag sgo srungs su rnam par gzhag par mdzad do/_/de nas gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas g.yas phyogs su nye bar brten te 
[\[77a.5\]]'khod do/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas g.yon phyogs su nye bar brten te 'khod do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gi kun du spyod pa ni nyin mo lan 
[\[77a.6\]]gsum bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nang par sngar langs te khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]shar sgo ga la ba der song ba dang /_yul 'khor srung gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig_/ci'i 
[\[77a.7\]]phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig yin/_rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yin no/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]lho sgo ga la ba der song ba dang /_'phags skyes pos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig yin/_rgyal 
[\[77b.2\]]po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yin no/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]nub sgo ga la ba der song ba dang /_mig mi bzang gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos 
[\[77b.3\]]ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig yin/_rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yin no/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]byang sgo ga la ba der song ba dang /_rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/_rgyal 
[\[77b.4\]]po chen po ma 'jug par sdod cig_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pas 'dir mi tsam gyis tshod kyis mi chud do/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig yin/_rgyal po chen po kho bo ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu yin no/_/de 
[\[77b.5\]]nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma bdag gis bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston par mdzad pa mthong na ci ma rung snyam du 'dod pa skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul pa 
[\[77b.6\]]mdzad pa dang /_'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang gis bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 'ba' zhig la chos ston pa me long gi gzugs kyi nang na 'dug pa ltar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_su la yang 'di lta ste/_da ltar bdag gi don thams cad 
[\[77b.7\]]grub pa lta bu'i bu med do snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems kyi rgyud ha cang mtho bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar bsdu ba mdzad nas rgyal po zas gtsang la chos bstan par brtsam pa mdzad do/_/de nas 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ci'i phyir rgyal po zas gtsang bden pa mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs pa dang /_da ltar rgyal po zas gtsang su la yang 'di lta ste/_da ltar bdag gi don thams cad grub pa lta bu'i bu med do snyam du ha cang dga' 
[\[78a.2\]]bas sems kyi rgyud ha cang mtho bar gyur par thugs su chud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos btsun pa bka' 
[\[78a.3\]]bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang ga la ba der song ngo /_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu tshur gshegs/_
[\[78a.4\]]btsun pa maud gal gyi bu byon pa legs so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye ba mdzad pas ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te/_ji ltar 
[\[78a.5\]]sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur cing shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/_'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dag byed do/_/me'i khams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/_
[\[78a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dag dang /_ser po dag dang /_dmar po dag dang /_dkar po dag dang /_btsod ka dag dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo /_/cho 'phrul 
[\[78a.7\]]zung dag kyang rnam par ston te/_lus kyi smad nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/_/lus kyi stod nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/_/shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang nub dang /_byang phyogs su'ang 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]de bzhin te/_phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir bsdus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 
[\[78b.2\]]maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba/_gzhan dag kyang mchis sam/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_thub pa'i nyan thos mthu che ba/_/gsum rig sems kyi 
[\[78b.3\]]rnam grangs shes/_/zag pa zad par gyur pa dang /_/dgra rnams bcom pa mang du yod/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che bar ma zad kyi/_'di ltar nyan thos rnams la yang rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu 
[\[78b.4\]]che ba dag yod do snyam nas/_de na rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems kyi rgyud snyoms par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[78b.5\]]'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen cing /_bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang gis stan de nyid la 'dug 
[\[78b.6\]]bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[78b.7\]]brten nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag 
[\[79a.2\]]ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes 
[\[79a.3\]]kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/_
[\[79a.4\]]bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa yang gsol pa/_bu pho bzang pos pha la ni/_/lan du phan gdags gang bgyi ba/_/de ni khyod kyis bdag la bgyis/_/
[\[79a.5\]]sems ni mtho ris gzhol bar gyur/_/bu pho bzang pos pha la ni/_/lan du phan gdags gang bgyi ba/_/de ni khyod kyis bdag la bgyis/_/sems ni thar la gzhol bar gyur/_/ngan song dag las legs phyung zhing /_/khyod kyis mtho ris thar pa la/_/rab tu 'bad 
[\[79a.6\]]pas bdag bzhag ste/_/khyod kyis dka' ba legs par mdzad/_/tshong pas khe spogs rnyed pa ltar/_/mtho ris rnyed pa bdag gis rnyed/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ni/_/nye bar rten pa bzang ba lags/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bden pa mthong nas 
[\[79a.7\]]zas dkar la smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod kyis rgyal srid byed du chug shig_/nga ni rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/lha ci'i slad du rgyal srid bgyid du mi stsol/_ngas bden pa dag mthong ngo /_/lhas nam gzigs/_deng nyid do/_/lhas deng nyid gzigs 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]kyi bdag gis gang gi gdugs la bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs pa de nyid kyi gdugs la bden pa dag mthong lags so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bre bo zas dang bdud rtsi zas la smras pa/_gzhon nu gnyis khyed kyis rgyal srid byed du chug shig_/nga ni 
[\[79b.2\]]rgyal po'i drang srong gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/ci'i slad du rgyal srid bgyid du mi stsol/_ngas bden pa mthong ngo /_/lhas nam gzigs/_deng nyid do/_/lhas deng nyid gzigs kyi bdag cag gis ches sngar mthong lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu 
[\[79b.3\]]rnams kyi bu thu bo gang yin/_gzhon nu bzang ldan lags so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu bzang ldan shAkya'i rgyal por dbang bskur ro/_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_nyin gcig mi chad par rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs 
[\[79b.4\]]tshod gsol ba dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba dka' thub kyis lus mi sdug par snang ba dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag nyid chen po 'di dag sems ni bzang ba yin na lus mi bzang ste/_dka' thub 
[\[79b.5\]]drag po dag gis lus mi sdug par snang ba dag yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ci 'dra bar 'khor yang de 'dra ba nyid du gyur na de lta na bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams bsdus te 
[\[79b.6\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na cir 'gyur/_lha 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/khyed kyi bu dag cir 'gyur/_lha zhabs 'bring bar 'gyur ro/_/'o na da gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas bdud rtsi thugs 
[\[79b.7\]]su chud de/_bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par mdzad na khyed kyi bu dag ci'i phyir zhabs 'bring mi byed/_lha ci lags de dag rab tu dbyung ngam/_rab tu phyung shig_/lha shAkya'i rigs rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim re re nas re re rab tu phyung shig_/lhas bka' 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya gzhon nu rnams kyis khyim re re nas re re rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes dril bsgrags pa byas so/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril bsgrags pa de'i tshe na bzang ldan dang ma 'gags 
[\[80a.2\]]pa dang /_nam gru la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya rab tu byung ngo /_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta ste/_rigs mthon po las rab tu byung ba ni rnyed pa'i phyir dang nye ba yin no/_/zhes 
[\[80a.3\]]gsungs pas de dag las rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di dag gzhan gyi phyir kho nar rab tu byung ba yin na/_gzhan kho na la chags so snyam du dgongs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 
[\[80a.4\]]rnyed pa dang bkur sti byung ba gcad par bzhed nas ser skya'i gnas su ci dgyes par bzhugs nas mnyan yod ga la ba der gshegs te/_mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/_mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra 
[\[80a.5\]]ba na bzhugs so//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_mthar gyis mnyan yod na 
[\[80a.6\]]bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/_khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo /_/khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang brang brdungs te smras pa/_'char ka ci'i slad du khyod kyis bdag spangs 
[\[80a.7\]]te rab tu byung /_'char kas smras pa/_byang chub sems dpas btsun mo grags 'dzin ma dang /_sa 'tsho ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes la sogs pa bud med drug khri spangs te rab tu byung ba ni shin tu dka' ba yin gyi rdul gyi rdzab 'dra ba khyod la mi bra ba ci yod/_'char ka bdag 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]kyang rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de ltar gyis shig_/khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/'char ka de der dus dang mthun pa'i dus su 'ong zhing smras pa/_sbed ma rab tu mi 'byung ngam/_sbed mas smras pa/_da dung khyim gyi bya ba legs par ma bsdus so/_/sbed ma dus 
[\[80b.2\]]de tsam gyis ko sa lar byung ba'i khyim gyi bya ba yang legs par bsdus par 'gyur ro/_/'char ka deng legs par bsdus te sang rab tu 'byung ngo /_/'char ka 'di snyam du sngon yang bdag lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis zil gyis mnan par gyur pas gal te bdag 
[\[80b.3\]]gis dge slong ma rab tu phyung bar gyur na drug sde dag gis dge slong ma rab tu phyung ngo zhes rgya cher zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/_de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der rgyu zhing song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na rgyal po'i khab 
[\[80b.4\]]tu phyin nas de rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs te 'dug go/_/sbed ma yang phyi de nyin par khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas de dge slong rnams kyi gan du song ste dris pa/_'phags pa dag de gar mchis/_de su yin/_'phags 
[\[80b.5\]]pa 'char ka'o/_/de rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo /_/sbed mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_sbed ma ci'i phyir ngu /_'phags pa 'char ka'i mchid nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la mchi shig dang /_bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngo zhes 
[\[80b.6\]]mchi nas bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchis na de rgyal po'i khab tu mchis pas da ni bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la/_rab tu byung ba yang ma lags so/_/dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_sbed ma 'char ka spu gri'i phyir rgyal po'i khab 
[\[80b.7\]]tu song bas spu gri sar pas khyod kyi skra 'dreg par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma gso sbyong 'bul ba dag rgyal byed kyi tshal du lhags nas de dag gis sbed ma ngu ba mthong nas smras pa/_sbed ma ci'i phyir ngu /_'phags pa 'char ka'i mchid nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]bsdus la mchi shig dang /_bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngo zhes mchi nas bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchis na/_de rgyal po'i khab tu mchis pas da ni bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la rab tu byung ba yang ma lags so/_/g.yengs 
[\[81a.2\]]ma dge slong dag su zhig dge slong ma rab tu 'byin par byed/_'di ltar dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong ma rab tu 'byin par byed kyis tshur shog_/'phags ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs khyod rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen 
[\[81a.3\]]mo gau ta mI'i gan du khrid nas smras pa/_'phags ma khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang sbed ma 'di rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs de rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so/_/'char ka 'di snyam du bdag gis lhung bzed nag po can rnams 
[\[81a.4\]]rjes su srung bas khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma rab tu ma phyung bas rgya cang dang /_lcag pod dang /_shur bu dang /_shur bu phre'u dag gi bar chad kyang byas la/_de yang lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis rab tu phyung bar gyur na de dang phrad du yang mi ster ro snyam du 'gyod pa skyes 
[\[81a.5\]]nas de mi dga' bzhin du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/_/mnyan yod na rgan zhugs shig mi dga' bzhin du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa des lhung bzed dang chos gos mchan khung du bcug ste dgag dbye byas pa na dgag dbye legs par byas so/_/dgag dbye shin 
[\[81a.6\]]tu byas so zhes de rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der song ste/_mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gtsug lag khang gi sgo na lam la rnam par lta zhing 'dug pa des thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba/_
[\[81a.7\]]smin ma 'phyang ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas 'char kas bsams pa/_dge slong 'ong ba 'di gnas brtan gang yin pa su'o snyam nas/_des smras pa/_gnas brtan byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs so phyag 'tshal lo/_/des smras pa/_slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]'char kas 'di ni rgan zhugs shig ste/_slob dpon yang mi shes/_mkhan po yang mi shes pa zhig go snyam du shes nas 'char kas de gtsug lag khang du 'jug tu bcug ste smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod ga las 'ongs/_des smras pa/_mnyan yod nas so/_/'char 
[\[81b.2\]]kas bsams pa/_gal te dang po kho nar sbed ma'i gtam dris na 'phya bar 'gyur bas 'di ltar snga phyir byas te dri bar bya'o snyam nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ji lta bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ba dang /_nyam nga ba chung ba dang /_bde ba dang /_snyun mi mnga' ba dang /_
[\[81b.3\]]stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes sam/_btsun pa 'char ka de bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ba dang /_nyam nga ba chung ba dang /_bde ba dang /_snyun mi mnga' ba dang /_stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod du dbyar gnas 
[\[81b.4\]]par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ji lta dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /_dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gnod pa chung ba dang /_nyam nga ba chung ba dang /_bde ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_stobs dang ldan par 
[\[81b.5\]]mnyan yod na gnas sam/_ston pa la lta bar 'dod dam/_dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod dam/_btsun pa 'char ka de bzhin te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /_dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gnod pa chung ba dang /_
[\[81b.6\]]nyam nga ba chung ba dang /_bde ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas shing /_ston pa la blta bar 'dod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa ji lta gnas brtan kun shes kau N+Di n+ya dang /_gnas brtan 'od srung chen 
[\[81b.7\]]po dang /_gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang /_gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_gzhan yang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gnod pa chung ba dang /_nyam nga ba chung ba dang /_bde ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]sam/_btsun pa 'char ka de bzhin te/_gnod pa chung ba dang /_nyam nga ba chung ba dang /_bde ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_stobs dang ldan par mnyan yod na gnas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ji lta ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_bla mkhyen drang 
[\[82a.2\]]srong byin dang /_rnying pa dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /_legs skyes dag shes sam/_btsun pa 'char ka de bzhin te shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'o na khyod kyis khyim bdag gi chung ma sbed ma shes sam/_btsun pa 'char ka shes te de ni 
[\[82a.3\]]btsun pa 'char ka'i sngon gyi chung ma yin no/_/rgan zhugs gtam shes so/_/de da dung yang khyod kyi khyim bdag gi chung ma yin snyam mam/_de ni rab tu byung ngo /_/sus rab tu phyung /_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs so/_/'char kas bsams pa/_da dung 
[\[82a.4\]]spyod yul lhag ma dang bcas pa yin no snyam nas smras pa/_rgan zhugs tshur shog_/rkang pa dag khrus shig ces des de la rkang pa bsku ba dang /_lag pa bsku ba mang po byin nas des de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ya gad btsugs te zung mthon po la bzhag nas smras pa/_
[\[82a.5\]]rgan zhugs gtsug lag khang 'di ni zas dang bcas pa/_rnyed pa dang bcas pa yin gyis gtsug lag khang 'dir mngon par dga' bar gyis shig_/des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka bdag ni mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs te 'gro ba yin pas bdag gnas 'di mi 
[\[82a.6\]]'dod do/_/'char kas de'i mdun du sgo lcags dang lde mig kyog po dag bzhag ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gnas pa dang bcas par bya'i mi gnas par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal to zhes smras nas mig lam du mi snang 
[\[82a.7\]]bar song ste/_de mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas 'char kas rang gi gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/_legs par byugs/_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs te sgo bcad nas khri'i steng na phyi gan du nyal zhing skad kyi gdangs kyis kha ton byed cing 'dug go/_/
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]dge slong ma 'dun pa 'bul ba dag lhags nas de dag gis de'i skad kyi gdangs thos nas de dag gis de la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa 'char ka khyod gar bzhud bzhud/_'char kas smras pa/_rgyal po'i khab tu'o/_/de dag dbyar khang du dong nas sbed ma la smras pa/_sbed 
[\[82b.2\]]ma dga' ba skyed cig_/khyod kyi slob dpon 'ongs so/_/kho mo'i slob dpon gang /_'char ka'o/_/de ji ltar kho mo'i slob dpon/_ci kho mos de'i gan nas bklags sam/_g.yengs ma khyod kyis mi shes kyis dge slong ma rnams ni dge slong la rag mang du las kyis khyod song 
[\[82b.3\]]la ltos shig_/sbed mas nas kyi ngar phye dang khrus kyi chal dang /_'bru mar thogs te 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang du song nas sbed mas 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang gi sgo brdungs pa dang /_'char kas smras pa/_de su yin/_sbed mas smras pa/_bdag sbed ma'o/_/khyim 
[\[82b.4\]]bdag gi chung ma sbed ma 'ongs pa legs so/_/bdag da dung yang khyod kyi khyim bdag gi chung ma lags sam/_'o na ci yin/_bdag rab tu byung ngo /_/khyod sus rab tu phyung /_'phags ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs so/_/kho bo re zhig bya ba de lta bu zhig byung nas 
[\[82b.5\]]de'i phyir kho bo rgyal po'i khab tu song na khyod la brtad pa ci byung na de'i phyir khyod rab tu byung /_khyod kyi zhal nas khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus la shog shig dang /_kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung ngo zhes gsungs nas/_bdag gis khyim gyi bya ba legs par bsdus te mchis na 
[\[82b.6\]]khyod rgyal po'i khab tu bzhud de/_gal te bdag 'phags mas rab tu ma phyung du lags na bdag khyim na gnas pa yang ma lags la rab tu byung ba yang ma lags par 'gyur ro/_/'char kas smras pa/_sbed mas ci kho bo bdag nyid kyi lag ngar la sos 'debs par 
[\[82b.7\]]byed dam/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs rab tu phyung yang rung /_kho bos rab tu phyung yang rung ste legs kyis nang du zhugs shig dang chos bstan par bya'o/_/sbed mas 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/des de 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]la chos bstan par brtsams te/_des de la ji tsam pa de tsam du chos bstan nas sngon gyi bgad pa dang /_dga' bar byas pa dang /_rtses pa dang /_dga' mgur spyad pa dran par bya bar brtsams te/_sbed ma bdag cag gnyis kyis skyed mos tshal dang /_
[\[83a.2\]]'dun sa dang /_lha'i gnas ga ge mo zhig tu zas 'di dang 'di lta bu zos pa dang /_bca' ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'chos pa dang /_btung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu 'thungs pa gang yin pa de dran nam zhes smras pa dang 'char ka kun du chags par gyur to/_/ji lta ji ltar 
[\[83a.3\]]chags par gyur pa de lta de ltar dral to/_/bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /_dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /_
[\[83a.4\]]mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /_gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang /_khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par brten cing 'dug la/_gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon par brten cing 'dug pa'o/_/sbed 
[\[83a.5\]]ma des 'char ka de chags so snyam du shes nas sbed mas smras pa/_slad rol du mchis te slar mchi'o/_/'char kas bsams pa/_'di bshang ba byed 'dod dam/_gci ba byed 'dod gor ma chag snyam nas des smras pa/_song shig_/sbed ma phyir byung nas shing 
[\[83a.6\]]dpung bcad brdzes te rgyug par brtsams pa dang /_'char ka de sgra la mkhas pa yin pas des de'i sgra thos nas des de'i phyi bzhin du byung ste/_dge sbyong ma mgo reg mo gar 'bros zhes de de'i phyi bzhin rgyug par brtsams pa dang /_de la brla'i reg pas khu ba byung nas de kun 
[\[83a.7\]]nas dkris pa dang bral te glang po che chags pa dang bral ba bzhin du gzhi de dag nyid na 'dug go/_/sbed mas de kun nas dkris pa dang bral zhing phyir log pa mthong nas 'di kun nas dkris pa dang bral lo snyam du rig nas drung du song ste tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]smras so/_/'phags pa gal te bdag gis dang du blangs par gyur na bdag kyang dge slong mar mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur la/_khyod kyang dge slong du mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur ro/_/sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed la/_gzhan srung na 
[\[83b.2\]]bdag nyid srung bar byed do zhes legs par gsungs so/_/ji ltar bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed ce na/_sten par byed pa dang /_goms par byed pa dang /_lan mang du byed pa dang /_rjes su srung bar byed pa dang /_reg par byed pa dang /_mngon sum du byed 
[\[83b.3\]]pa ste/_de ltar bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed do/_/ji ltar gzhan srung na bdag nyid srung bar byed ce na/_tho mi 'tshams pa dang /_mi gshe ba dang /_mi 'tshe ba dang /_rjes su brtse ba dang /_rjes su snying brtse ba dang /_byams pa'i sems kyis te/_de ltar 
[\[83b.4\]]gzhan srung na bdag nyid srung bar byed do/_/'phags pa sham thabs 'di tshur stsol bkru bar bgyi'o/_/'char kas sham thabs de sbed ma la byin no/_/sbed mas khu ba de mthong nas 'gyod pa skyes te/_bdag gi lus kyi phyogs btsun pa 'char kas sngon ma mthong ba'am 
[\[83b.5\]]sngon ma mnams pa'am/_sngon ma byugs pa ci zhig yod na bdag gis dang du ma blangs pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so snyam du 'gyod pa skyes so/_/sbed ma de ltar rnam par rtog pa na de kun du chags shing dral bar gyur pa'i sems kyis khu ba de rang gi mngal gyi sgor 
[\[83b.6\]]blugs so/_/sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas de la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/de dge slong ma rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_sbed ma kho mo cag go khyod chos bzang po'i chos kyis 'phags pa 'char ka'i gan du 
[\[83b.7\]]'gro bar sems kyi kho mo cag gis des khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur byas par mi sems so/_/sbed mas smras pa/_phu nu mo dag dge slong de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/_gang tshun chad rab tu byung nas des kho mo la sngan chad lan 'ga' yang lag gis kyang 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]ma byugs so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_ma byugs na yang des khyod gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar byas na/_gal te byugs na des khyod gnas skabs ji lta bur byas par 'gyur zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod 
[\[84a.2\]]do/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma de ni pham par ma gyur gyis 'di ltar phyogs dben par bzhag ste bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med pa gyis shig dang /_bu gzhon nu 
[\[84a.3\]]'od srung zhes bya ba btsa' bar 'gyur zhing nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te 'di lta ste/_dge slong gzhon nu 'od srung de ni nga'i gtam sna tshogs dang /_gtam snyan pa dang /_spobs pa dge 
[\[84a.4\]]ba can rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong rnams kyi nyes dmigs byung ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud pa las gyur pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[84a.5\]]kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la
