[\[84a.6\]]gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud dam/_'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_
[\[84a.7\]]mes po dang /_phrugs las brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la de phan cad ni nye du ma yin no/_/gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o/_/rnying pa zhes bya ba ni dus tshigs gsum po dag las dus tshigs gang yang rung bar spyad pa gang yin pa'o/_/'khrur 'jud dam zhes bya ba ni than chur snyug pa byed du 'jud na'o/_/'tshed du 'jud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na tshon du 
[\[84b.2\]]snyug pa byed du 'jud na'o/_/'chag tu 'jud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na thal mos rdebs par byed du 'jud na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 
[\[84b.3\]]'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'tshed du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'khrur 'jud pa dang 
[\[84b.4\]]'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/_'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed 
[\[84b.5\]]du 'jud pa dang /_'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'tshed du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'chag tu 'jud na 
[\[84b.6\]]spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/_'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'chag tu 'jud pa dang 
[\[84b.7\]]'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang /_'chag tu 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'tshed du 'jud na nyes byas su 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/'chag tu 'jud na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/_'chag tu 'jud 
[\[85a.2\]]pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang /_'chag tu 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la yid gnyis za bas gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'tshed 
[\[85a.3\]]du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'chag tu 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'chag tu 'jud dam/_'chag tu 
[\[85a.4\]]'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'chag tu 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang /_'chag tu 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba 
[\[85a.5\]]med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_rigs mthon po las rab tu byung ba 'di ni rnyed pa rnams kyi phyed dang nye ba yin no/_/zhes 
[\[85a.6\]]bka' stsal pas de na yang shAkya'i khyim nas rab tu byung ba de dag la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung nas de dag shin tu gos kyis chab la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas shing /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags lhag pa dag 
[\[85a.7\]]kyang 'chang bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dus dang dus su chos bstan kyang de dag gis bden pa dag ma mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ci'i phyir shAkya rab tu byung ba dag bden pa dag mthong bar mi byed snyam du dgongs nas de dag 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]shin tu gos kyis chab la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas shing de dag lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags lhag pa dag 'chang ba'i phyir te/_gal te ngas shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams la smad na dbral dka' bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs 
[\[85b.2\]]nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul ba la mkhas pa bla na med pa yin pas de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed kyis/_nga'i spyan sngar dge slong bsod 
[\[85b.3\]]snyoms stobs pa gcig dang /_'di nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par dge slong gang gis kyang nye bar 'ong bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa dag dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa gcig dang /_'di nyid kyi gso 
[\[85b.4\]]sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro bar mi bya ste/_dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa gcig dang /_'di nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las gang bcom 
[\[85b.5\]]ldan 'das la ltar 'gro ba de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go zhes khrims su bya ba bcas so/_/bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa na dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa gcig dang /_de nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i 
[\[85b.6\]]tshe ma gtogs par der dge slong 'ga' yang mi 'gro'o/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye sde zla ba shol ma bor bas dbyar ljongs su gnas par khas blangs la/_bcom ldan 'das ni zla ba shol bor bas dbyar ljongs su gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[85b.7\]]nye sde dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin to/_/
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sde lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang ga la ba der song ba dang /_dge slong drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 
[\[86a.2\]]'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar khon na don nyung ngus dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba 'dral bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes smras so/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_des de ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_da ltar sbyor ba la 'jug gis gang gi 
[\[86a.3\]]tshe dral bar gyur pa de'i tshe na des de byed du gzhug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang du dal bus khad kyis sgo gtan brdungs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chab sgo dbye ba mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[86a.4\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa la dge slong khyod da lta ga las 'ongs/_gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs zhes bya ba'i so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa 
[\[86a.5\]]'dis so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la nye sde khyod da ltar ga las 'ongs/_gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag da ltar 
[\[86a.6\]]ljongs nas mchis so/_/bdag ljongs su dbyar gnas par mchid kyis 'tshal to/_/nye sde ljongs su dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas sam/_btsun pa bgyis so/_/nye sde gang gis khyod mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang yin/_rkyen ni 
[\[86a.7\]]gang yin/_btsun pa 'di na gal te bdag gi g.yar sngar rab tu 'byung ba la ltos pa zhig mchis na/_bdag de la 'di skad ces bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod tshur mchi/_dgon pa pa 'tshol cig ces mchi zhing dgon pa pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang rjod par bgyid/_bsod snyoms 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]pa dang /_chos gos gsum pa dang /_phyag dar khrod pa dang /_shing drung pa 'tshol cig ces mchi zhing shing drung pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang brjod par bgyid do/_/gal te de ltar bgyi'o zhes mchi na/_de rab tu 'byin par bgyid do/_/gal te rdzogs par bsnyen par 'tshal ba 
[\[86b.2\]]dang /_gnas la zhugs pa dang /_bklag pa la zhugs pa dang /_mchid don la zhugs pa dang /_yid la bgyi ba la zhugs pa zhes mchis na/_bdag de la yang 'di skad ces bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod tshur mchi/_dgon pa pa 'tshol cig ces mchi zhing dgon pa pa nyid kyi 
[\[86b.3\]]bsngags pa yang rjod par bgyid/_bsod snyoms pa dang /_chos gos gsum pa dang /_phyag dar khrod pa dang /_shing drung pa 'tshol cig ces mchi zhing shing drung pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang rjod par bgyid do/_/gal te de ltar bgyi'o zhes mchi na de la yid la bgyi 
[\[86b.4\]]ba stsol bar bgyid de/_btsun pa gang gis bdag mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyu ni de lags/_rkyen ni de lags so/_/nye sde khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[86b.5\]]kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so/_/nye sde gang la la zhig sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag gi bsngags brjod par mi byed pa de ni/_nga'i bsngags brjod par mi byed pa yin no/_/gang la la sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag gi bsngags 
[\[86b.6\]]brjod par byed pa de ni nga'i bsngags pa rjod par byed pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngas sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag yun ring po nas bstod pa dang /_bkur ba dang /_bsngags pa dang rab tu bsngags pa'i phyir ro/_/nye sde khyod dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba mi srung ngam/_
[\[86b.7\]]btsun pa bdag gis dge 'dun gyi khrims ni gang lags/_khrims su bgyi ba ni gang lags ma 'tshal to/_/nye sde 'di na ngas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dag nga zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed kyis/_nga'i spyan sngar dge slong bsod 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]snyoms stobs pa gcig dang /_'di nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par dge slong gang gis kyang 'ong bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa dag dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms 
[\[87a.2\]]stobs pa gcig dang /_'di nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las gang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro bar mi bya ste/_dbyar gyi nang dag tu dge slong bsod snyoms stobs pa gcig dang /_'di nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par 
[\[87a.3\]]bdag cag las gang bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro ba de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go zhes khrims su bya ba bcas so/_/btsun pa bdag ni glo bur du mchis pa lags te/_don de ni dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis bsrung bar bgyi 
[\[87a.4\]]ba lags so/_/nye sde dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pas kyang dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba bsrung bar bya ba kho na yin no/_/nye sde 'di ltar ngas dge slong glo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong 
[\[87a.5\]]glo bur du 'ongs pas gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas dge slong dag la gnas 'di na khrims su bya ba ji lta bu yod ces dri bar bya'o/_/gal te 'dri na de lta na legs/_gal te mi 'dri na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/nye sde de lta mod kyi ngas dge slong dgon pa pa la 
[\[87a.6\]]dgon pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/_dge slong dgon pa pa de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir ltar 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do/_/dge slong bsod snyoms pa dang /_rnyed pas chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang /_zas phyis mi len pa 
[\[87a.7\]]dang /_stan gcig pa dang /_chos gos gsum pa dang /_phying ba pa dang /_phyag dar khrod pa dang /_shing drung pa dang /_dur khrod pa dang /_cog pu pa dang /_bla gab med pa dang /_gzhi ji bzhin pa la gzhi ji bzhin pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/_dge slong 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gzhi ji bzhin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang bar byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 
[\[87b.2\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas drug sde dag tshe dang ldan pa nye sde ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye sde je skabs phye shig_/ltung ba sde lnga po dag la skabs phye'o/_/khyod la 
[\[87b.3\]]ltung ba byung ba de chos bzhin du slar gyis shig_/ltung ba ma mthong ngo /_/khyod kyis dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba ma dral tam/_dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba ji lta bu yin/_drug sde dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes drug sde dag la 'di 
[\[87b.4\]]skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis nye sde de lta mod kyi ngas dge slong dgon pa pa la dgon pa pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/_dge slong dgon pa pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir ltar 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do/_/
[\[87b.5\]]dge slong bsod snyoms pa dang /_rnyed pas chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa dang /_zas phyis mi len pa dang /_stan gcig pa dang /_chos gos gsum pa dang /_phying ba pa dang /_phyag dar khrod pa dang /_shing drung pa dang /_dur khrod pa dang /_cog pu pa dang /_bla gab 
[\[87b.6\]]med pa dang /_gzhi ji bzhin pa la gzhi ji bzhin pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par bya ste/_dge slong gzhi ji bzhin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus ma yin pa med do zhes gsungs so/_/de nas shAkya rab tu byung ba de dag 'di snyam du 
[\[87b.7\]]sems te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba rnam par smad cing /_'dod pa chung ba la bstod pa ni don gyis na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag smad pa mdzad pa yin gyis bdag cag gis lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]rags lhag pa dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la btang ste rgyud dag pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'dong ngo snyam mo/_/de nas dge slong de dag lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags lhag pa dag khyer te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[88a.2\]]bo ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag las lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags lhag pa 'di dag bzhes shig_/tshe 
[\[88a.3\]]dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus de'i bar du sdod cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' 
[\[88a.4\]]gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir long la blangs nas kyang gtsug lag khang chen po zhig tu 
[\[88a.5\]]spungs te zhog la dge slong gang des brel ba'i dge slong de la de sbyin par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams las lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor 
[\[88a.6\]]bu dang /_ska rags lhag pa dag blangs nas gtsug lag khang chen po zhig tu spungs te bzhag go/_/de nas shAkya rab tu byung ba de dag lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags lhag pa dag nad ji lta ba dang /_'bras ji lta ba dang /_
[\[88a.7\]]zug rngu ji lta ba bzhin du spangs nas chos gos gsum pa lhur len cing rgyud dag pa dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rab tu byung ba de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi 
[\[88b.2\]]rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la gang 
[\[88b.3\]]mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' 
[\[88b.4\]]bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas 
[\[88b.5\]]ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so/_/
[\[88b.6\]]dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po dag tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la brten te 'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de 
[\[88b.7\]]shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/dge slong dag da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral ba/_sred pa med pa/_len pa med pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen pa dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]pas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po dag rigs kyi bu nye sde la brten te 'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhag pa mdzad pa ngo mtshar ci che/_'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod 
[\[89a.2\]]chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_sred pa dang bcas pa/_len pa dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_
[\[89a.3\]]'khrug pa dag las rnam par ma grol bas kyang shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po 'di dag rigs kyi bu nye sde la brten te 'dod pa che ba dang /_phral zhing 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de mngon par shes pa lnga po dag la gzhag par mdzad pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 
[\[89a.4\]]'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_'khrug long dang /_nang 'khrug 
[\[89a.5\]]dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rab tu zhi ba byed du bcug ste/_des bu gcig pa snying du sdug pa dang 'dra bar rgyal srid skyong du bcug go/_/rgyal po tshangs byin la btsun mo tshangs ldan zhes bya ba dang /_rdzing bu tshangs ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_rgyal po tshangs 
[\[89a.6\]]byin de la bu med nas des bu 'dod pas zhi ba dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_gzhan yang lha'i bye brag 'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang /_tshal gyi lha dag dang /_bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang /_sum mdo'i lha dag 
[\[89a.7\]]dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dag dang /_chos mthun pa dag dang /_rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'jig rten na gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu dag dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/_de ni de lta ma yin te/_gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na/_re re la yang 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las ma'i mngal du mngal 
[\[89b.2\]]na gnas pa 'jug par 'gyur te/_gsum po de dag gang zhe na/_pha ma gnyis chags par gyur cing phrad pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste/_gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu dang bu mo 
[\[89b.3\]]skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len pa la zhugs pa na sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/_yi dam brtan pa zhig sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos nas btsun mo tshangs ldan gyi mngal du 
[\[89b.4\]]zhugs so/_/bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags par gyur bshes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /_dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /_mngal na gnas bzhugs 
[\[89b.5\]]pa shes pa dang /_gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang /_khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug la/_gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o/_/de yid dga' zhing 
[\[89b.6\]]yid dga' nas rgyal po tshangs byin la smras pa/_lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing mchis pas nges par khye'ur 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po tshangs byin yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' 
[\[89b.7\]]nas 'di skad ces kye ma kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i bu'i ngo mthong ba dang /_kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /_kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /_gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /_bgo skal la spyod pa dang /_kho bo'i rigs rgyud 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag cag shi zhing dus las 'das pa dag la nyung ngu'am mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/_'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces 
[\[90a.2\]]ming gis yon bshad pa byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par byed do/_/de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /_
[\[90a.3\]]dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /_sman pas bcas pa'i kha zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /_ha cang mi skyur ba dang /_ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang /_ha cang mi mngar ba dang /_ha cang mi tsha ba dang /_ha cang mi bska ba dang /_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_
[\[90a.4\]]mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag dang /_do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_rgyan gyis bklubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /_khri nas khrir dang /_khri'u nas khri'ur dang /_shod kyi sa gzhir 
[\[90a.5\]]mi 'bab pa dang /_des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du 'dzud do/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/_kye ma lhas grong khyer gyi shar sgor sbyin pa dag byin par 
[\[90a.6\]]gyur cing /_bsod nams dag byed par gyur cig_/lho sgo dang /_nub sgo dang /_byang sgo dang /_dbus kyi bzhi mdor kyang sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag byed cing btson thams cad thar bar byed par gyur cig snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis 
[\[90a.7\]]btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa de lta bu de skyes par thos nas grong khyer gyi shar sgor sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed do/_/de bzhin du lho sgo dang /_nub sgo dang /_byang sgo dang /_dbus kyi bzhir mdor yang sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]byed cing /_btson thams cad thar bar byas so/_/yang btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te kye ma bdag lha dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal dang /_dka' thub kyi nags su rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod par gyur cig snyam mo/_/
[\[90b.2\]]de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyi btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu de skyes par thos nas/_btsun mo tshangs ldan dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal dang /_dka' thub kyi nags su zhugs te/_rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod pa dag byas 
[\[90b.3\]]so/_/yang btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/_kye ma bdag lha dang thabs cig chur 'jug pa'i grur zhugs te/_rdzing bu tshangs ldan du rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod par gyur cig snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[90b.4\]]po tshangs byin gyis btsun mo tshangs ldan la 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung bar thos nas/_btsun mo tshangs ldan dang lhan cig chur 'jug pa'i gru me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu ta dang /_pad ma dkar pos bkang bar zhugs te rdzing bu tshangs 
[\[90b.5\]]ldan du rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod pa byas so/_/de gru de nyid du btsas pa las khye'u tshe rabs dran pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_gsal ba/_gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa/_
[\[90b.6\]]lag pa ring ba/_'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhig byung ngo /_/de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs 
[\[90b.7\]]par byed do/_/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir khye'u 'di chu'i nang du btsas pa de'i phyir khye'u'i ming chu skyes zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming chu skyes zhes bya bar btags so/_/gzhon nu chu skyes ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do/_/de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /_zho dang zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo 
[\[91a.2\]]dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de nas gzhon nu chu skyes 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes snyam na/_sems can dmyal ba dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes 
[\[91a.3\]]par shes so/_/las ci byas na des sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes snyam na/_lo drug bcur rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid du bcug pas de dag tu skyes par shes so/_/da ltar gang du skyes snyam na mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po'i rigs su skyes par shes nas/_de 
[\[91a.4\]]'di snyam du sems te/_bdag yang rgyal srid byed du bcug na yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur na ma legs kyis/_bdag gis sgyu thabs cung zhig bya'o snyam nas/_des bdag nyid 'phye bo nyid du bstan te 'dug go/_/gang gi nyin mo gzhon 
[\[91a.5\]]nu chu skyes btsas pa de nyid kyi nyin mo blon po lnga brgya dag gi bu dag kyang btsas te de dag kyang rang rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i ming dag btags par gyur to/_/blon po de dag gis kun du spyod pa ni nyi ma re re zhing rgyal po tshangs byin dang /_gzhon nu chu skyes ltar 'ong ngo /_/
[\[91a.6\]]de nas dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag mchongs pa dang /_dkyus mo byed nus par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs byin 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te nga'i bu gzhon nu chu skyes kyang 'phye bor ma gyur du zin na/_de yang de tsam mchongs pa dang /_
[\[91a.7\]]dkyus mo byed nus par 'gyur gyis/_'di ltar bdag gi de 'phye bo yin yang blas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas gzhon nu chu skyes kyis de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po 'di ni gcugs med par gnod pa byed pa yin gyis 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]bdag gis lkugs pa nyid du bstan te 'dug par bya'o snyam nas/_des ched du bsams te lkugs pa nyid du bstan te 'dug go/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag smra nus par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs byin 'di snyam du sems te/_gal 
[\[91b.2\]]te bdag gi gzhon nu chu skyes kyang lkugs par ma gyur du zin na de yang de tsam smra nus par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de'i tshe na gzhon nu chu skyes kyi ming gzhon nu chu skyes gzhon nu chu skyes zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing /_gzhon nu lkugs 'phye gzhon nu lkugs 'phye zhes 
[\[91b.3\]]bya ba'i ming chags par gyur to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs byin lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug nas/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs khong du chud cing bzhugs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[91b.4\]]'di ltar nga'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'di 'dra ba la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas nga 'das nas gdung chad par yang 'gyur la/_bu gcig bdog pa de yang lkugs 'phyer gyur na/_nga ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug tu rung /_blon po rnams kyis sman pa gnyer 
[\[91b.5\]]te sman pa la rmas nas smras pa/_lha gzhon nu 'di'i dbang po gsal bar gda' ste/_'di la bro nad kyis rnam pa ni cung zad kyang ma mchis pas bsdigs par bgyi ba'i rigs so/_/rgyal po tshangs byin gyis gshed ma dag bkug nas gsang ste bsgo ba/_ngas gzhon nu 
[\[91b.6\]]lkugs 'phye 'di skye bo phal po che'i mngon sum du yongs su gtang bar byas/_khyed kyis gsad par mi bya'o/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/_rgyal po tshangs byin gyis 'khor gyi nang du song ste gshed ma rnams la bsgo ba/_ngas gzhon nu 'di yongs su btang gis khyod 
[\[91b.7\]]kyis 'or cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal po tshangs byin las mnyan nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phye shing rtar bcug ste/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i nang nas phyir khrid de/_de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]'byor pa dang rgyas pa mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci bA rA Na sI 'di stong pa yin nam/_'on te gnas pa yin/_gshed ma'i mi rnams kyi gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rgyal po la phul nas lha gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes tshig 'di lta bu brjod do zhes 
[\[92a.2\]]smras so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis gzhon nu lkugs 'phye pang du bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu gang gsad par bya/_gang gsod du gzhug par bya/_gang srog dang dbral bar bya/_gang la ci zhig sbyin par bya/_de skad smras kyang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye cang mi smra'o/_/rgyal po tshangs 
[\[92a.3\]]byin gyis yang gshed ma rnams la smras pa/_ngas gzhon nu 'di yongs su btang gis khyed kyis 'or cig_/gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes yang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye shing rtar bcug ste/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i nang nas phyir khrid pa dang /_gzhon 
[\[92a.4\]]nu lkugs 'phyes mi'i ro mi bzhis khyer ba zhig mthong nas smras pa/_ci ro 'di shi ba nyid kyi ro yin nam/_'on te gson po'i ro yin/_yang gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rgyal po la phul nas lha gzhon nu tshig 'di lta bu 'di brjod do zhes smras so/_/rgyal 
[\[92a.5\]]po tshangs byin gyis yang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye pang du bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu gang gsad par bya/_gang gsod du gzhug par bya/_gang srog dang dbral bar bya/_gang la ci zhig sbyin par bya/_de skad smras kyang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye cang mi smra'o/_/
[\[92a.6\]]yang rgyal po tshangs byin gyis gshed ma rnams la smras pa/_ngas gzhon nu yongs su btang gis khyed kyis 'or cig_/gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes yang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye shing rtar bcug ste/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i nang nas phyir khrid pa dang /_
[\[92a.7\]]gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes 'bru'i phung po chen po zhig mthong nas smras pa/_gal te 'bru'i phung po 'di dang po nyid nas drung ma zos na chen por 'gyur ro/_/gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis yang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rgyal po la phul nas/_lha gzhon nu tshig 'di lta bu 'di brjod 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]do zhes smras so/_/rgyal po tshangs byin gyis yang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye pang du bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu gang gsad par bya/_gang gsod du gzhug par bya/_gang srog dang dbral bar bya/_gang la ci zhig sbyin par bya/_de skad smras kyang gzhon 
[\[92b.2\]]nu lkugs 'phye cang mi smra'o/_/rgyal po tshangs byin gyis yang gshed ma rnams la smras pa/_ngas gzhon nu yongs su btang gis shes ldan dag song la gzhon nu nags khrod du myur du sa thams su chug shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis 
[\[92b.3\]]yang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye shing rtar bcug ste nags khrod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_dong brko bar brtsams so/_/de nas lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba ci phyir khyod/_/brtad dang bcas pas dong brko byed/_/ci phyir 
[\[92b.4\]]khyed cag dong brko ba/_/dris pa nga la myur du smros/_/kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/_rgyal po'i sras bu mi smra ba/_/lkugs 'phye btsas nas de yis ni/_/myur bar 'di ni nags khrod du/_/dong du chug ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phye 'di snyam 
[\[92b.5\]]du sems te/_'di dag ni drag shul can/_lag pa dmar ba/_snun pa dang /_rab tu snun pa la zhugs pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa dag yin pas/_gal te na 'di dag gis bdag gsad par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam 
[\[92b.6\]]du rig nas de skrag ste gshed ma rnams la smras pa/_gal te lhas bdag la dam pa cig stsol na/_bdag rkang pas grong khyer du 'jug cing tshig kyang smra'o/_/gshed ma pa rnams kyis rgyal po'i gan du song ste rgyas par brjod pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu 
[\[92b.7\]]gal te rgyal srid 'dod na ngas de yang gzhon nu la sbyin no/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag deng la grong khyer thams cad myur du rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par zhog la/_bdug 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]spos dang /_phye ma 'khrigs pa dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba dang /_me tog sna tshogs bkram pa gyis shig_/rgyal po rnams ni tshig gis 'grub la/_lha rnams ni sems kyis 'grub/_rnal 'byor pa rnams ni sems bskyed pa tsam 
[\[93a.2\]]gyis thams cad 'grub pas blon po rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po las mnyan nas/_grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang /_gyo mo dang /_gseg ma med par bzhag cing /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma 'khrigs pa dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng 
[\[93a.3\]]ba dang /_me tog sna tshogs bkram pa byas so/_/ljongs kyi mi 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rkang pas grong khyer du 'jug cing tshig kyang smra bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes ya mtshan skyes nas 'dus par gyur to//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam 
[\[93a.4\]]po nyi shu dgu pa/_de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rkang pas grong khyer du zhugs nas rgyal po tshangs byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po tshangs byin gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_bdag lkugs ma lags 'phye ma 
[\[93a.5\]]lags/_/glen pa ma lags blo med min/_/gsal bar bgyid pa'i tshig rnams kyis/_/smra ba bdag lags mi dbang po/_/bdag lkugs ma lags 'phye ma lags/_/glen pa ma lags blo med min/_/dbang po tshang ba gsal ba dang /_/ldan pa bdag lags 
[\[93a.6\]]mi dbang po/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu khyed ci'i phyir tshig smra bar mi byed cing rkang pas 'gro bar mi byed/_lha de'i slad du gson cig_/bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs su/_/dgung lo drug bcur bdag gis ni/_/mi rnams nang du rgyal tshab kyi/_/rgyal srid rigs 
[\[93a.7\]]mthun bgyid stsal bas/_/dgung lo stong phrag drug bcu ru/_/sems can dmyal bar rab tu bsregs/_/sems dmyal sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_/drag po 'jigs rung dran gyur nas/_/rgyal srid mngon par mi 'tshal zhing /_/slan cad sems dmyal mchi mi 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]bgyi/_/yab kyis bdag ni rab 'byung bar/_/rjes su gnang ba mdzad du gsol/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu drang srong dag gang gi phyir dka' thub kyis gdung ba dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_mchod sbyin byed pa ni rgyal srid kyi phyir yin na/_khyod ci'i phyir lag mthil na 
[\[93b.2\]]'dug pa spangs te rab tu 'byung bar byed/_de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_khon gcugs 'thab rtsod bgyid pa yis/_/'dod la spyod pa bdag mi 'tshal/_/khon gcugs 'thab rtsod 'jigs bgyid pa'i/_/tshangs spyod bdag gis spyad 
[\[93b.3\]]par bgyi/_/kim pa'i 'bras bu 'dra ba yi/_/'dod pa spyod par bdag mi 'tshal/_/'bras bu bdud rtsi'i ro bda' ba'i/_/tshangs spyod bdag gis spyad par bgyi/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bde ba gang dang gang dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni rgyal po 
[\[93b.4\]]nyid yin na/_khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung bar byed/_de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_gang las sdug bsngal skye 'gyur ba'i/_/bde ba de la bder mi sems/_/gang las bde ba skye 'gyur ba'i/_/sdug bsngal de la bde 
[\[93b.5\]]bar sems/_/yab kyis bdag ni dka' thub kyi/_/nags su mchi ba gnang bar mdzod/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu 'di ni yang tog gi steng bdug spos dang /_phye ma 'khrigs par me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing gnas mal 'jam po legs par bshams pa dag tu 
[\[93b.6\]]gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med par nyal bar bya zhing /_sil snyan gyi sgra snyan pa dag gis sad par bya ba dang /_gos 'jam po bgo bar bya ba dang /_zhim po bza' bar bya ba dang /_zhim po btung bar bya ba yin na dgon par rab tu byung bas rtag tu shing drung du rtswa bting 
[\[93b.7\]]ba'am/_lo ma bting ba la bred ngas kyis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa dag dang lhan cig nyal bar bya ba dang /_wa'i skad kyis sad par bya ba dang /_g.yang gzhi dang shing shun bgo bar bya ba dang /_rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag bza' bar 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]bya ba dang /_chu dron po rnyog pa can dag btung bar bya dgos na/_ci'i phyir khyod rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung bar byed/_de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_nags na shing shun rtswa gyon zhing /_/rtsa ba 'bras bu 'cha' ba 
[\[94a.2\]]dang /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa rnams dang ni/_/lhan cig gnas pa mchog lags kyi/_/'jig rten pha rol 'jigs bgyid pa'i/_/mkhas pas rgyal srid slad du ni/_/gsod dang 'ching dang brdeg pa dag_/bgyid pa de lta ma lags kyis/_/yab kyis bdag ni 
[\[94a.3\]]dka' thub kyi/_/nags su mchi ba gnang bar mdzod/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu je kho bo'i the tshom gsum po 'di dag chod cig dang /_de'i 'og tu khyod rab tu 'byung ba mi dka'o/_/khyod kyis grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i 'byor pa dang rgyas pa mthong nas 'di skad ces bA rA Na sI 
[\[94a.4\]]'di stong pa yin nam/_'on te gnas pa yin zhes smras pa de khyod kyis ci las bsams te smras/_lha de'i slad du gson cig_/lhas bdag rgyu ma mchis par khum shig ces bka' stsal na/_'ga' yang ci'i slad du gzhon nu 'di dgum par bgyi zhes chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[94a.5\]]tshig mi smras pas bdag gis de las bsams te smras so/_/bu ma nyes so/_/khyod kyis mi'i ro mi bzhis khyer ba zhig mthong nas 'di skad ces ci ro 'di shi ba nyid kyi ro yin nam/_'on te gson po'i ro yin zhes smras pa/_de khyod kyis ci las bsams te smras/_lha de'i 
[\[94a.6\]]slad du gson cig_/gang nongs pa bgyid pa'i las bgyis pa'i ro de ni gum pa nyid kyi ro lags la/_gang legs pa bgyid pa'i las bgyis pa'i ro de ni gson po'i ro lags pas bdag gis de las bsams te smras so/_/bu ma nyes so/_/khyod kyis 'bru'i phung po chen 
[\[94a.7\]]po zhig mthong ba na/_'di skad ces gal te 'bru'i phung po 'di dang po nyid nas drung ma zos na chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras pa de khyod kyis ci las bsams te smras/_lha de'i slad du gson cig_/lha zhing pa gang dag 'bru skyin po bgyis te 'tshal nas/_las bgyid pa de dag ni 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]'bru smin pa na 'bru'i phung po chen po bu lon pa dag la 'bul bar bgyis pas de dag gis ni dang po nyid nas drung 'tshal ba lags so/_/de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag gis mi nyid rnyed pa na/_gal te de rnyed nas dge ba'i las kyi lam sogs par mi bgyid pa de'i 
[\[94b.2\]]sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang rgyun chad par 'gyur zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad na bde 'gro las yongs su nyams shing ngan 'gro la rten par 'gyur bas bdag gis de las bsams te smras so/_/de nas rgyal pos bu'i tshig de thos nas/_mchi mas brnangs pas bu 
[\[94b.3\]]blangs te tshig smras pa/_brtul zhugs des 'chang rang gi chos spyod cig_/bdag kyang khyod kyi slob mar khas len no/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rab tu ma byung na cir 'gyur/_lha rgyal 
[\[94b.4\]]por 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyi bu dag cir 'gyur/_lha zhabs 'bring bar 'gyur ro/_/'o na da de rab tu 'byung na khyed kyi bu de dag ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /_lha bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo/_/de'i tshe na grong khyer bA rA Na sI dang ha cang mi ring ba na bsti gnas shig yod pa 
[\[94b.5\]]de na drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_brtse ba dang ldan pa/_sems can la byams pa zhig 'dug nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phye 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa 'byor pa chen pos drang srong de'i drung du rab tu byung ngo /_/drang srong des lkugs 'phye la gdams 
[\[94b.6\]]ngag byin nas lkugs 'phyes brtsal ba dang /_'bad pa dang /_bsgrim pa byas nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes drang srong de'i lus spos kyi shing sna tshogs 
[\[94b.7\]]kyi phung por bcer te bsregs nas mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur chen po byas so/_/gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag yongs su bskyang bar brtsams nas/_de'i ming gzhon nu lkugs 'phye zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing /_ston pa lkugs 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]'phye ston pa lkugs 'phye zhes bya ba'i ming chags par gyur to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na ston pa lkugs 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i phyir bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du mi byed snyam nas de 'di snyam du sems 
[\[95a.2\]]te/_'di dag g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_dbyug gu dang /_ril ba dang /_blugs gzar dang /_dgang gzar lhag pa 'chang zhing /_shin tu lo ma dang /_khre rgod dang /_ut+pa la'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/_/de nas 
[\[95a.3\]]ston pa lkugs 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag smad na dbral dka' bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gdul ba la mkhas pa bla na med pa yin pas de nas ston pa lkugs 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 
[\[95a.4\]]smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u/_dgung zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog 'dod kyis nga'i gan du bram ze'i khye'u rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu stobs pa gcig dang 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par gang gis kyang nye bar 'ong bar mi bya'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[95a.5\]]rnams kyis kyang dbyar gyi nang dag tu bram ze'i khye'u rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu stobs pa gcig dang /_'di nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las bram ze'i khye'u gang gis kyang mkhan po la ltar 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dbyar gyi nang dag tu bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[95a.6\]]rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu stobs pa gcig dang 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bdag cag las bram ze'i khye'u gang mkhan po la ltar 'gro ba de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go zhes khrims su bya ba bcas so/_/ston pa lkugs 'phyes 
[\[95a.7\]]zla ba gsum nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa na/_de'i gan du bram ze'i khye'u rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu stobs pa gcig dang /_de nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i tshe ma gtogs par bram ze'i khye'u gang yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/ston pa lkugs 'phyes thag ring po kho na 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tshur shog_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]khyod 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod dang kho bo mtshungs te/_khyod kyang lto khengs pa'i zas kyis chog shes pa dang /_kun tu chog shes pa yin la/_kho bo yang lto khengs pa'i bsod 
[\[95b.2\]]snyoms kyis chog shes pa dang /_kun tu chog shes pa yin no/_/'di na kha cig shin tu lo ma dang /_khre rgod dang /_ut+pala'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa dag ni ma yin no/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gor ma chag par mkhan po'i 
[\[95b.3\]]brtul zhugs rdzogs par gyur te/_'di ltar mkhan po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang lhan cig phebs par smra bar byed do snyam du rig nas ston pa lkugs 'phye ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_ston pa lkugs 'phye'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas ston pa 
[\[95b.4\]]lkugs 'phye cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_mkhan po dud 'gro rnams dang lhan cig phebs par smra bar byed kyi/_mi rnams dang mi byed gor ma chag snyam nas stan las langs te dong ngo /_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs 
[\[95b.5\]]can zhig ston pa lkugs 'phye ga la ba der dong ba dang /_ston pa lkugs 'phyes [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can de thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can tshur shog_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can khyod 
[\[95b.6\]]'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod dang kho bo mtshungs te/_khyod kyang g.yang gzhi gcig 'chang la/_kho bo yang g.yang gzhi gcig 'chang ngo /_/khyod kyang shing shun gcig dang /_dbyug gu gcig dang /_ril ba gcig dang /_blugs gzar dang /_dgang gzar gcig 'chang 
[\[95b.7\]]la/_kho bo yang shing shun gcig dang /_dbyug gu gcig dang /_ril ba gcig dang /_blugs gzar dang /_dgang gzar gcig 'chang ngo /_/khyod kyang lto khengs pa'i bsod snyoms kyis chog shes pa dang /_kun du chog shes pa yin la/_kho bo yang lto khengs 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]pa'i bsod snyoms kyis chog shes pa dang /_kun du chog shes pa yin no/_/'di na kha cig g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_dbyug gu dang /_ril ba dang /_blugs gzar dang /_dgang gzar lhag par 'chang ba dag ni ma yin no/_/de nas 
[\[96a.2\]]bram ze'i khye'u de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar mkhan pos 'dod pa che ba smad cing /_'dod pa chung ba nyid bstod pa ni don gyis na mkhan pos bdag cag smad pa yin gyis/_bdag cag gis g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_dbyug gu dang /_ril ba 
[\[96a.3\]]dang /_blugs gzar dang /_dgang gzar lhag pa dag chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du bor te/_mkhan po ga la ba der 'dong ngo snyam nas/_de dag gi g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_dbyug gu dang /_ril ba dang /_blugs gzar dang /_dgang gzar lhag pa dag chu klung 
[\[96a.4\]]zlog byed du bor nas rgyud dag pa dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul dag gis ston pa lkugs 'phye ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_ston pa lkugs 'phye'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas ston pa lkugs 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u de dag 
[\[96a.5\]]gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/_'di ltar bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag gis mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas par gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa byas so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na ston pa lkugs 'phye 
[\[96a.6\]]gang yin pa de ni nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po 'di dag yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can gang yin pa de ni dge slong nye sde yin 
[\[96a.7\]]te/_de'i tshe yang ngas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po 'di dag rigs kyi bu nye sde la brten nas 'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de/_mngon par shes pa lnga po dag la gzhag par byas la da ltar yang ngas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po 'di dag rigs kyi bu nye 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]sde la brten nas 'dod pa che ba dang phral zhing 'dod pa chung ba nyid la bkod de/_shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhag pa mdzad do/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin 
[\[96b.2\]]la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /_'dren ma spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag la 
[\[96b.3\]]brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/_/'khrur 'jug pa'i spang ba ste bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang 
[\[96b.4\]]gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams kyis dgon par gnas pa ma bkag pa de'i tshe na dge slong ma rnams kyang dgon pa'i gnas su dong ste/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong 
[\[96b.5\]]bar byed do/_/de nas dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog 'khor lnga brgya dang nags mun pa can ga la ba der song ste phyin nas shing ljon pa'i drung zhig tu brten te skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug nas bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 
[\[96b.6\]]'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar byed do/_/dge slong ma de dag phye ma red mnyan yod du 'jug 'dod nas smras pa/_'phags ma ut+pa la'i mdog bslang bar bya'o/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_'phags ma ut+pa la'i mdog ni mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul che ba yin 
[\[96b.7\]]pas dang po kho nar dbyar khang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyang yod do zhes zer nas de dag gis de ma bslang ba kho nar dong ngo /_/ut+pa la'i mdog kyang phye ma red langs nas dge slong ma de dag thams cad dong bar mthong ba dang /_des bsams pa/_ci da 'gro'am/_'on 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]te 'di nyid du 'dug snyam nas de de nyid du 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/g.yon can lnga brgya tsam gyis las dag byas nas nags mun pa can du lhags te/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag las nyis brgya lnga bcus ni skal ba 
[\[97a.2\]]dag bgo bar bya'o/_/nyis brgya lnga bcus ni nags byul bar bya'o zhes de dag las nyis brgya lnga bcus ni skal ba dag bgo bar brtsams/_nyis brgya lnga bcus ni nags byul bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis ut+pa la'i mdog 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[97a.3\]]na kha cig na re shes ldan dag 'di ni tho yor zhig yin no zhes zer/_kha cig na re 'di ni mi zhig yin no zhes zer/_kha cig na re 'di ni dge slong zhig yin no zhes zer ro/_/de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig 'dug pa des smras pa/_'di ni dge slong ma zhig 
[\[97a.4\]]yin gyi dge slong ni ma yin no/_/ji ltar shes/_dge slong dag ni skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/_dge slong ma rnams ni skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug go/_/de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas shes ldan dag 'di lta bu'i nags 'jigs su rung ba'i nang na dge slong ma gcig 
[\[97a.5\]]pu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs pa ltos zhes zer ro/_/de dag dmag dpon gyi gan du song ba dang /_dmag dpon gyis de dag la dris pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyi nags mun pa can 'di na ngo mtshar cung zad mthong ba yod dam mchis te/_'di lta bu'i nags 
[\[97a.6\]]'jigs su rung ba'i nang na/_dge slong ma gcig pu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs pa mchis so/_/de bltas 'dong ngo zhes de dag de'i drung du dong ba dang /_dmag dpon gyis dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa mthong 
[\[97a.7\]]ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mngon par dad par gyur nas de mngon par dad pa skyes pas smras pa/_kye ma dge slong ma 'di ni gnyig nas bzang ba yin te/_mtshan mo zla nyi mo ltar 'dug pa gang yin pa dang /_gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa gang yin pas so 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]zhes de bslang bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_ci'i phyir 'di slong bar byed/_zas sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong gi rgyus shes pa gcig gis smras pa/_'di ni dus ma yin par mi za'o/_/dmag dpon gyis smras pa/_ci'i phyir/_des smras 
[\[97b.2\]]pa/_'di ni dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs pa yin no/_/dmag dpon gyis smras pa/_kye ma dge slong ma 'di ni gnyis ka nas bzang ba yin te/_gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa gang yin pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs pa gang 
[\[97b.3\]]yin pas so/_/yang smras pa/_'di la chang blud par bya'o/_/dge slong gi rgyus shes pa des smras pa/_'di ni myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa yin no/_/dmag dpon gyis smras pa/_kye ma dge slong ma 'di ni gnyig nas bzang ba yin te/_gzugs 
[\[97b.4\]]bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa gang yin pa dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs pa gang yin pas so/_/yang smras pa/_kho bos yon gnas kyi zhing 'di lta bu la bsod snyoms kyis bsgrub par ma nus so zhes des ras yug chen po la 'os pa 
[\[97b.5\]]gcig dang /_bsod snyoms kyi phud cig phul nas shing ljon pa'i yal ga la btags te bzhag nas smras pa/_'phags ma 'di ltar khyod la mi mkhyen pa dang /_mi gzigs pa dang /_mi rig pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga' bas bdag gis 
[\[97b.6\]]khyod la bsod snyoms dang na bza' 'di 'bul lo zhes smras te song ngo /_/ut+pa la'i mdog nang par sngar langs pas skye bo phal po che'i rjes shul mthong nas des bsams pa dang /_g.yon can lnga brgya nye bar 'ongs par mthong nas mi mdzes pa 'ga' zhig rig par ma 
[\[97b.7\]]byas sam snyam na 'ga' yang ma byas par mthong ngo /_/shing ljon pa'i yal ga la ras yug chen dang /_bsod snyoms btags te bzhag pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_'di ni dad par gyur pa rnams kyis dad pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no snyam nas des bsams pa/_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]gal te byin len stobs pa la bsdad na bya'am/_spre'us chud gzan par 'gyur bas bdag ni dge 'dun la bsod snyoms kyi phud 'bul ba yin la 'di ltar dge slong rnams la mi rung ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma rnams la rung ba yin la/_dge 
[\[98a.2\]]slong ma rnams la mi rung ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams la rung ba yin pas bdag rang nyid kyis 'di khyer te/_dge 'dun la bsod snyoms kyi phud 'bul du 'gro'o snyam nas des de khyer te rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/drug sde rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni drug sde las 
[\[98a.3\]]gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des ut+pa la'i mdog mthong nas smras pa/_sring mo ci'i phyir nang par sngar mnyan yod kyi sgo dag phye ste 'ongs/_des smras pa/_bdag mnyan yod du 
[\[98a.4\]]ma mchis kyi/_bdag mdang sum nags mun pa can du mchis par khas blangs so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_nye dga' ni nyin mo nyid nags mun pa can du zhugs na yang spu dag gyen du 'greng bar 'gyur ro/_/sring mo khyer ba 'di ci yin/_des smras pa/_chom rkun pa 
[\[98a.5\]]lnga brgya tsam der mchis nas de dag dad par gyur pas bdag la dad pa'i dbang du bgyis pa stsal to/_/sring mo khyod ni chom rkun pas kyang dad par bya ba yin gyi/_gal te nye dga' de dag gis mthong du zin na lcag rgod mang pos brdabs te khur tsa bar khrid par 'gyur ro/_/'di 
[\[98a.6\]]ltar gang la ras yug chen 'di lta bu yod pa de ni gos sar pa las snam sbyar nyi rim byas te sems las chung ngus dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa khyod ras yug chen 'di bzhed dam/_lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma bzhin du'o/_/'phags pa bdag 
[\[98a.7\]]gis dge 'dun la bsod snyoms kyi phud phul te slar mchis pa'i bar du gzhes shig dang /_de'i 'og tu khyod la ras yug chen gsol lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis 'di la bslangs pa dang de la byin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]sring mo bdag gis bsod snyoms kyi phud len pa dag khrid de 'ong gis de'i bar du 'di nyid du sdod cig_/nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs pa dang /_des dge slong bsod snyoms kyi phud len pa dag snying las chung ngur 'khod pa mthong nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 
[\[98b.2\]]sbyin bdag dag ni khur gyis ngal zhing sdod la/_khyed cag ni 'di na snying las chung ngur 'khod na tshur shog bsod snyoms kyi phud long shig_/de dag gis gzhong bu thogs te dong ba dang /_ut+pa la'i mdog gis de dag la bsod snyoms kyi phud phul nas ras yug chen sprugs 
[\[98b.3\]]nas nye dga' la phul lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khyod sbyin pa 'dis sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smras so/_/ut+pa la'i mdog gis bsams pa/_nga 
[\[98b.4\]]dbyar khang du song ste ci rung /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nas ut+pa la'i mdog bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[98b.5\]]de'i tshe na ut+pa la'i mdog gis chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang rnyings par gyur nas/_de na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong ma rnams kyis dbyar gyi gos kyi rnyed pa ma grub bam/_btsun pa grub 
[\[98b.6\]]bo/_/'o na ci'i phyir dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog gi chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang rnyings par gyur/_btsun pa sring mo 'di ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can lags te/_'dis sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_dge 
[\[98b.7\]]slong yid du 'thad pa dag la ma phul ba'am/_yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te/_'dis deng yang ras yug chen rnyed nas de yang 'dis btsun pa nye dga' la stsol to/_/kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos lhag pa len tam/_btsun 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]pa len to/_/kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la 'di snyam du 'di'i chos gos lnga tshang ngam/_'on te ma tshang snyam du mi sems par 'di ltar thob bo cog len par byed kyi/_nye du la ni byin yang len par mi byed do/_/de nas bcom 
[\[99a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog la gtsug lag khang chen po nas chos gos lnga byin cig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog la gtsug lag khang chen po nas chos 
[\[99a.3\]]gos lnga byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par 
[\[99a.4\]]bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las gos len na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[99a.5\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan 
[\[99a.6\]]na bdag gis 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags cung zad kyang ma khyer ro snyam nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa chung mas mthong nas smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod ci'i slad du phyag la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_bzang 
[\[99a.7\]]mo kho bo'i khyim nor du ma dang ldan na bdag gis 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags cung zad kyang ma khyer te/_gal te bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol te re re la ras bcos bu sar pa phrugs re bskon na des bdag gi 'jig rten pha rol 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]gyi lam rgyags khyer bar 'gyur ro/_/chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig_/de nas khyim bdag de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' 
[\[99b.2\]]gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs 
[\[99b.3\]]du mas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas 
[\[99b.4\]]te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[99b.5\]]khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang bar byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[99b.6\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa legs par sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu ra bzhag ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[99b.7\]]'das la spyan 'dren gyis/_btsun pa gdugs tshod sbyar ba'i dus lags na/_da bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol/_lhung bzed dang 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te/_khyim bdag de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs 
[\[100a.2\]]so/_/de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag gis bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing 
[\[100a.3\]]bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun re re la ras bcos bu sar pa phrugs re re gsol to/_/de nas khyim bdag des stan dma' ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan 
[\[100a.4\]]pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam 
[\[100a.5\]]grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyi slad 
[\[100a.6\]]bzhin pha zad tsam du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir log ste rang gi khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_steng gi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[100a.7\]]kyi gzhir gtogs pa na gtong ba rjes su dran par sgom pa na chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags mang du khyer gyis mchog tu dga' ba dang /_rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras kyis ni 'jig rten pha 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]rol gyi lam rgyags bsnams na/_bdag gis ma 'tshal to/_/bzang mo bdag cag gnyis kyi longs spyod dag thun mong ma yin nam/_rje'i sras 'di ltar skol cag gi longs spyod dag thun mong lags mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gis kyang skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 
[\[100b.2\]]la sogs pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bshos gsol te/_chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag phul na de lta na bdag gis cang 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_bzang mo ci sngar sbyin pa byin pas phyis sbyin par byar med dam/_de bzhin 
[\[100b.3\]]gyis shig_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ga la ba der song ste phyin nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta 
[\[100b.4\]]mIs khyim bdag gi chung ma de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par byed/_yang dag par gzengs stod par byed/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/_rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis 
[\[100b.5\]]yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas cang mi smra'o/_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de stan las langs te skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[100b.6\]]nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags ma sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang thabs cig gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs khyim bdag gi chung ma de la cang mi smra bas dang du 
[\[100b.7\]]blangs so/_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i rkang pa 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa legs par sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te stan bshams nas chur bzhag 
[\[101a.2\]]ste skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la spyan 'dren gyis 'phags ma gdugs tshod sbyar ba'i dus lags na/_da 'phags mas de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes dro la bos so/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed 
[\[101a.3\]]dang chos gos thogs te dge slong ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i bkad sa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag 
[\[101a.4\]]gi chung ma des skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la sogs pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bde bar 'dug par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing 
[\[101a.5\]]bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/_des chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag gi sprog ma phye nas chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag thogs te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug go/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 
[\[101a.6\]]'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag dgag pa mdzad pas gal te re zhig blangs par gyur na ni bslab pa'i gzhi 'khrugs par yang 'gyur/_gal te ma blangs na ni khyim bdag gi chung ma'i bsod nams kyi bar chad dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi 
[\[101a.7\]]rnyed pa'i bar chad du 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis bsams pa/_kye ma 'phags ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag blangs par gyur cig_/bdag cag gis blangs par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dus lags pa'i slad 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]du gnang bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag blangs nas/_khyim bdag gi chung ma la yon bshad pa byas te stan las langs te song ste/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[101b.2\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta 
[\[101b.3\]]mI la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gau ta mI ngas gnang ba gang yin pa de khyod kyis shes pa legs so legs so/_/de lta bas na ngas dge slong ma rnams kyis chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag blangs nas dge slong rnams dang lhan cig brje bar bya ba rjes su gnang ngo /_/de nas 
[\[101b.4\]]dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gis gos de dag khyer te drug sde dag gi gan du dong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag dgag pa mdzad de/_bdag cag gis chen po la 'os pa'i gos rnyed pa 'di dag khyed bzhes 
[\[101b.5\]]la bdag cag la ngan pa dag stsol cig_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_sring mo dag bdag cag la dge slong ma'i ras ma dag dgos pa med de/_de'i tshe yang bdag cag byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa dag la khur dag bslang bar gyur gyis bdag cag mi len to/_/
[\[101b.6\]]dge slong ma gzhan dag dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi drung du dong ste smras pa/_'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag dgag pa mdzad de/_bdag cag gis chen po la 'os pa'i gos rnyed pa 'di dag khyed bzhes 
[\[101b.7\]]la/_bdag cag la ngan pa dman pa dag stsol cig_/sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na brjes pa ma gtogs te/_de la brje ba 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]ni 'di yin te/_de tsam gyis sam/_ji tsam gyis dge slong ma dga' bar 'gyur bas brje bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa'i bsngags pa brjod de/_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs 
[\[102a.2\]]pa'i yon tan dang /_phri ba dang /_drod rig pa'i bsngags pa brjod do/_/dge slong rnams la yang de dang mthun pa dang /_de dang 'tsham pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang ldan pa'i chos dang mthun pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[102a.3\]]de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las gos len na brjes pa ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang 
[\[102a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/nye du ma yin pa las zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_mes po dang /_phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad nye du yin la de phan cad ni nye du ma yin no/_/gos zhes bya ba ni gos bdun po 
[\[102a.5\]]bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/_/len na zhes bya ba ni bdag gir byed na'o/_/brjes pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni brjes 
[\[102a.6\]]pa bzhag ste'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis 
[\[102a.7\]]gos len na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas gos len na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gos len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]dge slong ma nye du la yid gnyis za bas gos len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun la gos 'bul ba dang /_legs par smra ba la ltung ba med do/_/rdzogs par bsnyen pa byed pa dang bor rlag byung ba la ltung ba med do/_/rin gyis len pa dang /_brjes pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge 
[\[102b.2\]]slong ma grags pa bsod nams che ba yin la/_des dge slong gi mdun du bzhag nas 'di skad ces 'phags pa bdag la rdzas 'di lta bu dag mchis kyis/_'phags pas bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig ces brjod de mi ltos par song ba la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa 
[\[102b.3\]]dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/len pa'i spang ba ste lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan 
[\[102b.4\]]yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo kho bo zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o/_/rje'i sras re zhig gzhon pa'i gnas 
[\[102b.5\]]skabs su rol pa dang /_dgyes pa dang /_dgyes mgur spyod pa mdzod la/_bgres pa'i gnas skabs su nor sgrub par mdzod cig_/bzang mo ji tsam du gzhon pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag ni grang ba dang /_dro ba bzod pa yin pas je nor bsgrub par bya zhing /_rgas pa'i gnas skabs su 
[\[102b.6\]]bde ba spyad cing 'dug par bya'o/_/chung mas bsams pa/_bdag gis bskul bar bya ba gang yin pa de rang nyid byed do snyam nas smras pa/_rje'i sras de ltar mdzod cig_/khyim bdag des chung ma de la kha zas tsam byin nas zong khyer te yul gzhan du song ngo /_/de'i chung 
[\[102b.7\]]ma des bsams pa/_bdag gi khyim thab grang ba na grang bas sbrebs bzhin pa dang /_tsha ba na tsha bas gdungs bzhin pa dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pas gnod bzhin pa dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pa dag gis nyen 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]bzhin du longs spyod dag mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir spro bar byed/_'bad par byed/_rtsol bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gi phyir bya'o snyam pa yin pas bdag las med par 'dug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/_des tshong 
[\[103a.2\]]dus su song ste ras bal bzang po blangs nas dog pa bzang po bkal te/_tha ga pa mkhas pa la ras zung bzang po 'thag tu bcug nas/_des ras de spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos te gos kyi za ma tog tu bcug ste bzhag go/_/khyim bdag des kyang don legs par grub nas khe 
[\[103a.3\]]spogs rnyed de legs par 'ongs nas chung ma des khyim bdag de khrus byas nas de la ras zung de phul lo/_/khyim bdag des bsams pa/_bdag gis 'di la kha zas tsam bzhag pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang ras zung 'di mi rnyed do snyam du rig nas chung ma la smras pa/_
[\[103a.4\]]bzang mo ras zung 'di ga las rnyed/_rje'i sras je gsol cig_/khyim bdag des de gyon nas yang smras pa/_bzang mo ras zung 'di ga las rnyed/_rje'i sras je bshos mnobs shig_/des zan zos nas yang dris pa/_bzang mo ras zung 'di ga las rnyed/_des skabs 
[\[103a.5\]]de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_bzang mo legs so/_/kho bo ni sgrub pa yin la/_khyod kyang 'di ltar sbed pa yin na/_bdag cag gi longs spyod dag ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /_yangs par 'gyur ro/_/chung mas smras pa/_
[\[103a.6\]]rje'i sras 'di ni bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs pa lags kyis/_khyod kyis su la yang ma stsol cig_/khyim bdag de dad pa dang ldan pa/_bzang ba/_dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du rgyal byed kyi tshal du byung ste 'gro ba na mi sgo bas 
[\[103a.7\]]mthong nas des bsams pa/_khyim bdag 'di ras zung 'di lta bu gyon pa las na 'dis ni rnyed pa mang po rnyed pa yin no snyam mo/_/drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]cing 'dug pa des khyim bdag de mthong nas bsams pa/_khyim bdag 'di ras zung 'di lta bu gyon pa las na 'dis ni rnyed pa mang po rnyed pa yin gyis/_gal te bdag gis 'di ma phrogs na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo snyam nas des de la smras pa/_khyim bdag 'ongs pa 
[\[103b.2\]]legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod yun ring mo ring mo nas zla ba bzhin du ga las 'khor 'khor/_'phags pa bdag zong thogs te yul gzhan du mchis par gyur to/_/khyim bdag khyod kyis rnyed pa mang po grub bam/_'phags pa cung zad tsam mo/_/khyim bdag mtshe'u 
[\[103b.3\]]ni rnyog ma can nam/_dad pa'i rgyu mthun pas rig par bya ste/_khyod ras zung 'di lta bu gyon pa las na khyod kyis rnyed pa mang po grub par mngon gyis tshur shog_/chos bstan par bya'o/_/drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni gal te tshul khrims kyi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag 
[\[103b.4\]]cag lha rnams su skyes so snyam du sems la/_gal te sbyin pa'i gtam byed na nyan pa po dag rang gi sha gang yin pa de yang bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems so/_/gal te ngan song gi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnams su skyes so snyam du 
[\[103b.5\]]sems par 'gyur ba yin no/_/khyim bdag des nye dga'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de la chos bstan par brtsams nas/_des de la ci nas kyang de'i sems dad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos kyi gtam byas so/_/de dad 
[\[103b.6\]]par gyur nas smras pa/_bdag gis 'phags pa la legs par gsungs pa'i na bza' phrugs gcig 'bul lo/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]a rog gya/_sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog dang /_lha rnams kyi gos 
[\[103b.7\]]dag thob par gyur cig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad ces/_sang dag 'chi yang su shes kyis/_/de ring nyid du brtul te bya/_/'chi bdag sde chen de dang ni/_/khyed cag bshes pa ma yin no/_/zhes gsungs kyis/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis ras zung 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]bzang po gyon pa 'di nyid kho bo la byin cig dang /_kho bos 'di las snam sbyar nyi rim byas te sems las chung dus dge ba'i phyogs la bde bar tron bya'o/_/'phags pa khyod 'di bzhed dam/_lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin du'o/_/'phags pa 
[\[104a.2\]]bdag khyod la mi 'bul ba ni ma lags na/_'di ltar 'di ni mchis brang gis bdag la stsal pa lags so/_/khyim bdag kho bos khyod gzhan la dad par byas na khyod ko bud med kho na'i dbang yin nam/_zhes nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]dngan dus kyi phyed kyis de'i bla gos blangs nas de lag pa 
[\[104a.3\]]gnyis 'dril bar byed/_bzhin sgyur bar byed do/_/khyim bdag gis de la smras pa/_'phags pa 'di ci'i tha tshig khyim bdag 'di ni khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi ni yod na yongs su longs spyod pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi ni 
[\[104a.4\]]med de/_nam zhig na 'di dang 'dra ba rnyed na 'di las chos gos byed par 'gyur bas 'di chos gos kyi gdang kho na la zad par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa ci bdag sgren mor mchi bar bgyi'am/_khyim bdag khyod la gos gyon pas ci zhig bya/_tshul khrims dang /_rigs 
[\[104a.5\]]dang /_spyod pa gyon pas chog mod/_gcer bu la ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa nyams pa de dag ni sgren mor 'gro na mi sdug pa yin gyi khyod lta bu ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang ldan pa la sgren mor 'gro ba mi sdug pa ci yod/_khyim bdag khyod dor thung mi gyon 
[\[104a.6\]]nam/_'phags pa 'tshal lo/_/khyim bdag khyim bdag rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni dor thung gyon te shing tshal thogs nas/_ba lang gi phyi bzhin 'gro ba yin pas khyod kyang shing tshal thogs la/_ba lang gi phyi bzhin song shig dang /_skye bo dag gis ba lang sur 'gro 
[\[104a.7\]]ba phyir byung ba zhig yin par shes par 'gyur ro/_/zhes nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]dngan dus kyi phyed kyis de'i smad g.yogs kyang blangs so/_/khyim bdag de shing tshal pa thogs te ba lang gi phyi bzhin zhugs pa dang /_mi sgo bas mthong nas smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bos da ci kho na khyod chen 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]po la 'os pa'i ras zung gyon par mthong na/_ci de dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo chom rkun pa dag gis ni ma bcom mod kyi/_'di ltar btsun pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kha'i chos kyis bcom mo/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun du spyod pa ni nang par nang 
[\[104b.2\]]par sngar langs te 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba yin pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nang par sngar langs te 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig mnyan yod nas byung ste 'gro ba mi sgo bas 
[\[104b.3\]]mthong nas des smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis don mthun mang du khrid de 'ongs kyis ci nas kyang mi choms par bag gyis shig_/kye nang rje rgyal byed kyi tshal dang lam gyi bar na chom rkun pa dag 'khod dam ci/_lam gyi bar na ma yin gyi rgyal byed kyi tshal nyid na 'khod do/_/kye nang rje khyod 
[\[104b.4\]]ni bal gyi rigs nag po dang 'dra ste/_sgo 'di nas bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gshegs pa gang gis kyang khyod dkar por mdzad ma spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul ni bdag gis 
[\[104b.5\]]mgos blang ba yin na/_khar tsang gi nyin mo khyim bdag cig chen po la 'os pa'i ras zung gyon te byung ba de'i ras de nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kha'i chos kyis phrogs nas khyim bdag de smod cing dor thung gis zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[104b.6\]]de ni bdag gi bya ba yin no snyam nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mthong nas smras pa/_khyim bdag a rog gya/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_a rog mi gya yang rung ngo /_/khyim bdag khyod kho bo la sngan chad du ba 'thul na da ci me kho nar 'bar ro/_/kho bo 
[\[104b.7\]]mer mi 'bar du ji ltar rung /_gzhan dag rab tu byung ba ni 'dod pa spangs pa'i phyir yin na btsun pa nye dga' ni 'dod pa mngon par spel ba'i phyir kho nar yin no/_/kho bos ci byas/_khyod kyis khyim bdag cig rgyal byed kyi tshal ltar 'ongs pa de'i ras zung dngan dus kyis phrogs 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]nas khyim bdag de smod par mi byed dam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_de ni 'jig rten na lha ni sbyin par byed la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ni zlog par byed do zhes zer ba yin no/_/ci des khyod la ril ba b+h+r-ing gar thogs te phul lam/_khyim bdag gal te mi bzod na bslab pa'i gzhi
