[\[105a.2\]]'char chug shig_/ci kho bos de yal bar bor du re'am/_de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 
[\[105a.3\]]'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa las gos slong bar bgyid na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis 'phags pa dag khyim bdag gam/_
[\[105a.4\]]khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa las gos slong bar mi 'gyur bar 'phags pa rnams la dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' bar mdzad pa'i rigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med 
[\[105a.5\]]zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_
[\[105a.6\]]skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye 
[\[105a.7\]]dga' khyod kyis khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa las gos bslangs pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi 
[\[105b.2\]]bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste gos slong na spang ba'i ltung byed 
[\[105b.3\]]do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po sum bcu pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[105b.4\]]bzhugs so/_/grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu don mthun pa dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song 
[\[105b.5\]]ste gos slong na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pas 'di na bdag cag la nye du 'ga' yang med kyis bdag cag mnyan yod du song na der bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gos dag gis bgo bsha' byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_
[\[105b.6\]]de dag gis smras pa/_ci bdag cag sgren mor 'dong bar bya'am/_mtshan mo 'gebs pas 'dong bar bya zhing nyin mo tshang tshing gi nang du zhugs te 'khod la mtshan mo lam du 'jug par bya'o zhes de dag mtshan mo 'gebs pas rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong ba dang /_dge slong nam gyi cha stod 
[\[105b.7\]]dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa dag gis de dag mthong nas smras pa/_gcer bu sgre byi dag 'di khyed kyi 'dug gnas kyang ma yin/_gtsug lag khang yang ma yin na khyed ga las 'ongs/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag ni gcer bu pa ma yin no/_/'o na 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]khyed cag su yin dge slong dag go dge slong 'di lta bu yod dam/_gang dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa dag ci 'dra ba yin khyed cag ming ci grong phreng ba can de'i dge slong bzhi bcu'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so zhes de 
[\[106a.2\]]dag gis de dag la la las ni snam sbyar byin la las ni bla gos byin la las ni mthang gos byin/_la las ni rngul gzan byin pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dus ma gtogs te/_
[\[106a.3\]]de la dus ni 'di yin te/_dge slong gos phrogs sam/_gos rlag gam/_gos tshig gam/_gos rlung gis khyer ram/_gos chus khyer na de la de ni dus yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad 
[\[106a.4\]]bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la yang de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang de dang ldan pa'i chos dang mthun pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang 
[\[106a.5\]]ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste gos slong na dus ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/de la dus ni 'di yin te/_dge 
[\[106a.6\]]slong gos phrogs sam/_gos rlag gam/_gos tshig gam/_gos rlung gis khyer ram/_gos chus khyer na de la de ni dus yin no/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/khyim bdag gam zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o/_/khyim bdag 
[\[106a.7\]]gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do/_/nye du ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_mes po dang /_phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/_de phan cad ni nye du ma yin no/_/gan du song ste zhes bya ba ni drung du song ste'o/_/gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/_/slong na zhes bya ba ni slong mo byed na'o/_/dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dus bzhag ste'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes 
[\[106b.2\]]bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/_/de la dus ni 'di yin te/_dge slong gos phrogs sam/_zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi gos dag chom rkun pa dag gam/_g.yon can dag gis phrogs par gyur pa'o/_/gos rlag gam zhes 
[\[106b.3\]]bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi gos dag rlag par gyur pa'am/_'khyams par gyur pa'o/_/gos tshig gam zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi gos dag mes tshig par gyur pa'o/_/gos rlung gis khyer ram zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi gos dag rlung gis khyer 
[\[106b.4\]]bar gyur pa'o/_/gos chus khyer na zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi gos dag chus khyer bar gyur pa'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_rin thang dang /_kha dog dang /_khru tshad las te/_ji ltar rin thang las zhe na/_dge slong gi gos kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba slong 
[\[106b.5\]]bar byed cing /_des kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba'i gos thob na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba ji lta ba de bzhin du kAr ShA pa Na bcu ri ba dang /_kAr ShA pa Na [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga ri ba dang /_kAr ShA pa Na nyi shu ri ba dang /_kAr ShA pa Na lnga 
[\[106b.6\]]bcu ri ba'i bar gyi gos slong bar byed cing /_des kAr ShA pa Na lnga bcu ri ba'i gos thob na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba'i gos slong bar byed cing lhag pa thob na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_
[\[106b.7\]]lhag pa thob na ltung ba med do/_/kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba ji lta ba de bzhin du kAr ShA pa Na bcu ri ba dang /_kAr ShA pa Na [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga ri ba dang /_kAr ShA pa Na nyi shu ri ba dang /_kAr ShA pa Na lnga bcu'i bar ri ba'i gos slong zhing lhag pa thob na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_lhag 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]pa thob na ltung ba med do/_/de ltar rin thang las so/_/ji ltar kha dog las zhe na/_dge slong gis gos sngon po slong bar byed cing des gos sngon po thob na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sngon po ji lta ba de 
[\[107a.2\]]bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_gos stug po dang /_srab mo slong bar byed cing /_des srab mo thob na slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gos sngon po slong bar byed pa na ser po thob na/_sngon po slong ba de la nyes byas su 
[\[107a.3\]]'gyur la/_ser po thob pa la ltung ba med do/_/sngon po slong ba la ji lta ba de bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo slong ba na stug po thob na/_srab mo slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_gong ma thob pa la ltung ba med de/_de ltar kha dog las 
[\[107a.4\]]so/_/ji ltar khru tshad las zhe na/_dge slong gis gos khru lnga pa slong bar byed cing /_des gos khru lnga pa thob na/_de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/khru lnga pa ji lta ba de bzhin du khru bcu pa dang /_khru [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa dang /_khru 
[\[107a.5\]]nyi shu pa dang /_khru lnga bcu pa'i bar gyi gos slong bar byed cing /_gos khru lnga bcu pa thob na/_de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gos khru lnga pa slong ba na lhag pa thob na/_khru lnga pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 
[\[107a.6\]]'gyur la/_lhag pa thob pa la ltung ba med do/_/khru lnga pa ji lta ba de bzhin du khru bcu pa dang /_khru [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa dang /_khru nyi shu pa dang /_khru lnga bcu pa'i bar gyi gos slong bar byed cing /_des gos khru lnga bcu pa slong bar byed pa na lhag pa thob na gos khru lnga bcu pa slong bar byed pa 
[\[107a.7\]]de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_lhag pa thob pa la ltung ba med de/_de ltar khru tshad las so/_/ras ma slong ba na kha tshar thob pa dang /_kha tshar slong ba na ras ma thob pa dang /_ras ma slong ba na ras yug chen dang /_ras yug phran thob pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/slong ba'i spang ba ste drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[107b.2\]]nye dga' la blo skyes pa/_'di dag thams cad khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdams pas phyin cad gang nas kyang bca' ba'i rin tsam yang bslang bar mi nus na/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu la 
[\[107b.3\]]brten nas bslab pa'i gzhi bag yangs su mdzad pa yod pas bdag gis grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag sngon du btang ste rnyed pa bsgrub par bya'o snyam nas/_de grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag ga la ba der song ba dang /_ji tsam na grong phreng ba can pa'i 
[\[107b.4\]]dge slong bzhi bcu po dag rnyad rnyid dag 'tshem zhing 'khod pa mthong nas/_des de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis gzhan thos la gzhan mthong ste/_bdag ko grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[107b.5\]]'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar byed cing 'dug par sems kyi/_bdag tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar rnyang rnying dag 'tshem zhing 'khod par ni mi sems so/_/gnas brtan bdag cag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo/_/kye ma ma legs so/_/
[\[107b.6\]]ma legs so/_/gnas brtan su'i mya ngan byed/_ci kho bo cag gi 'am/_ma yin te gang dag gis khyed cag bcom pa'i ma byin par len pa de dag sgren mo kho nar skye bar 'gyur zhing /_sgren mo kho nar dus byed par 'gyur bas de dag gi mya ngan byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed ci'i 
[\[107b.7\]]phyir gos dag mi slong /_gnas brtan su zhig sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun spangs te kho bo cag la sbyin pa dang bya bar sems par 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde'i mtha' de dang de dag tu nges par bstod pa dang /_bkur ba dang /_
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]bsngags pa dang /_rab tu bsngags pa dag ma yin nam/_gnas brtan kho bo cag gis su la bslang ba yang mi shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong rab tu shes pa gang gis khyed cag gis gos dag slong bar 'gyur ba 'ga' zhig la ci'i phyir mi bcol/_gnas 
[\[108a.2\]]brtan dge slong rab tu shes pa su zhig bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par byas te/_kho bo cag gi don du gos dag slong bar 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa dag re zhig kho bo bdag nyid dang bcu pa la yang thabs yod la/_gzhan yang kho bo cag mi drug re re yang bdag nyid dang 
[\[108a.3\]]bcu pa yin pas kho bo cag mi drug bcu la yang thabs yod do/_/gzhan yang gal te khyed cag la mi gnod na kho bo cag kyang gzhon nu dag gi don du ras yug phran dang /_ras yug chen slong bar byed do/_/gnas brtan de la kho bo cag la gnod pa ci yod/_re zhig re res kyang 
[\[108a.4\]]chos gos gsum gsum slong la rag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag gis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dang /_gos dag bslang ba gnyis ka mi nus kyis/_'di ltar gang gi tshe phyi rol du zas la bos pa de'i tshe bslang bar bya'o zhes nye dga' de gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa bkrus nas gtsug lag khang gi nang du 
[\[108a.5\]]zhugs te 'dug nas des bsams pa/_thabs ci zhig byas na des mnyan yod thams cad chub par 'gyur snyam nas des yang bsams pa/_je dang po kho nar dbul po'i srang du 'gro bar bya zhing de'i 'og tu phyug po'i srang du 'gro bar bya/_de'i 'og tu ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi 
[\[108a.6\]]pho brang dang btsun mo rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma'i khyim dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i khyim dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim dang /_bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /_rnying pa gnyis kyi khyim dang /_dge bsnyen ma [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi mas ga'i khyim dang /_dge bsnyen ma 
[\[108a.7\]]khyim bdag gi chung ma legs skyes kyi khyim dag tu 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]khyed cag la las su bsgo ba dag 'ong bar gyur na/_khyed cag gis mi gnod par 'di skad ces bdag cag la mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dag gi bya ba cung zhig yod do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]phyi de nyin par gzhon nu zhig grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag 
[\[108b.2\]]gi gan du btang ste chos gos dag bslang gis tshur sheg shig ces spring ngo /_/gzhon nu de der song ba dang /_ji tsam na de dag snyoms par zhugs pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_snying rje med pa'i snying dang ldan pa 'jig rten pha rol btang ba su zhig 'di dag ting nge 'dzin las slong bar 
[\[108b.3\]]'gyur snyam nas de nye dga'i gan du song ste smras pa/_slob dpon de dag snyoms par zhugs shing mchis pas sus kyang de dag ting nge 'dzin de las slong bar mi nus so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bkren pa khyod brtson 'grus 'di lta bus zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed par 
[\[108b.4\]]'gyur ram/_nye dga' rang nyid 'gro'o zhes de song nas dpong sa'i khang par sgo glegs la rting bas brdabs pa dang /_dpong sa'i khang pa thams cad 'gul nas de dag ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dge slong bzhi bcu po dag chos gos gsum 
[\[108b.5\]]bslang bar bya na/_khyed cag snying las chung ngur 'khod dam/_tshur sheg 'dong ngo /_/gnas brtan je so shing bor nas 'dong ngo /_/tshur sheg lam ka nyid du 'or cig_/de dag 'phags pa dang nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag drug sde dag ni bya rog dkar po dang 
[\[108b.6\]]'dra bas kho bo cag gis rgan rims bzhin du 'khod par mi bya bar bar bar du rgan pa dag gis 'khod par bya'o/_/de dag dbul po'i srang du dong nas dngar kha byas te bsdad pa dang /_de dag gis de dag mthong nas nyam nga bar gyur te smras pa/_'phags pa dag nyes dmigs 
[\[108b.7\]]'ga' zhig ma byung ngam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag nyes dmigs byung ngo /_/ci nongs khyod kyis grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde'i mtha' de dang de dag tu bstod pa/_bkur ba/_bsngags pa/_rab tu bsngags pa de dag thos sam/_
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]thos so/_/de dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo/_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag mda' gzhu long shig_/phub dang /_dbyug pa dag long shig_/chom rkun pa dag 'dzin du 'dong ngo /_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_de dag bcom nas yun 
[\[109a.2\]]ring du lon zhing yul 'khor gzhan du bcom par gyur to/_/'on ji ltar bgyi/_de dag la gos dag byin cig_/de dag gis de dag la gos sar pa dang rnying pa dag byin no/_/de dag gis gos de dag khur du drags te gzhon nu dag la gtad nas smras pa/_deng la 'di dag 
[\[109a.3\]]gtsug lag khang du skyol cig_/gzhon nu dag gis de dag khyer te gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang /_de dag phyug po'i srang du dong nas/_dngar kha byas te bsdad pa dang /_de dag nyam nga bar gyur te smras pa/_'phags pa dag nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig ma byung ngam/_nyes dmigs 
[\[109a.4\]]byung ngo /_/ci nongs/_khyed kyis grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde'i mtha' de dang de dag tu bstod pa/_bkur ba/_bsngags pa/_rab tu bsngags pa/_de dag thos sam/_thos so/_/de dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo/_/
[\[109a.5\]]de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag mda' gzhu long shig_/phub dang /_dbyug pa dag long shig_/chom rkun pa dag 'dzin du 'dong ngo /_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_de dag bcom nas yun ring du lon cing yul 'khor gzhan du bcom par gyur to/_/'o na ji ltar bgyi/_
[\[109a.6\]]de dag la gos dag byin cig_/de dag gis de dag la chen po la 'os pa'i gos dag byin to/_/drug sde dag gis gos de dag khur du drags te gzhon nu dag la gtad nas smras pa/_deng la 'di dag gtsug lag khang du skyol cig_/de dag gis gos de dag khyer te gtsug lag khang du 
[\[109a.7\]]dong ba dang /_de dag ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pho brang du dong nas dngar kha byas te bsdad pa dang /_ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de dag mthong nas/_nyam nga bar gyur te smras pa/_'phags pa dag nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig ma byung ngam/_lha 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]nyes dmigs byung ngo /_/ci nongs/_lhas grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde'i mtha' de dang de dag tu bstod pa/_bkur ba/_bsngags pa/_rab tu bsngags pa de dag gsan tam/_thos so/_/de dag chom rkun pa dag gis 
[\[109b.2\]]bcom mo/_/rgyal pos dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba/_song la myur du chom rkun pa dag dang /_rkun rdzas dag khug shig_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_lha de dag ni bcom nas yun ring du lon cing yul 'khor gzhan du bcom par gyur to/_/'o na ji ltar bya/_lha de dag 
[\[109b.3\]]la gos dag stsol cig_/rgyal pos dge slong re re la yo byad bcu gsum bcu gsum byin no/_/drug sde dag gis gos de dag khur du drags te gzhon nu rnams la gtad nas smras pa/_deng la 'di dag gtsug lag khang du skyol cig_/de dag gis gos de dag khyer te gtsug lag 
[\[109b.4\]]khang du dong ba dang /_grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan dag da chog gis thong shig_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ha cang brtabs ma ngas shig_/khyed la kho bo cag gis dang po nyid nas tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te 
[\[109b.5\]]khyed la mi gnod na kho bo cag kyang gzhon nu dag gi don du ras yug phran dang /_ras yug chen dag slong ngo zhes ma smras sam/_de dag dge slong dbang che bar grags pas bsgo bas cang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/de dag btsun mo rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma'i khyim dang /_btsun 
[\[109b.6\]]mo phreng ldan ma'i khyim dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim dang /_bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /_rnying pa gnyis kyi khyim dang /_dge bsnyen ma [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga'i khyim dang /_dge bsnyen ma khyim bdag gi chung ma legs skyes kyi khyim du mthar gyis dong 
[\[109b.7\]]ste sngar bstan pa skad brjod pa dang /_de dag gis kyang dge slong re re la yo byad bcu gsum bcu gsum byin no/_/de nas drug sde dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te dge slong brgya gral du ma bkod na gral stongs par 'gyur gyis deng la gral du bkod cig_/ma 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]nyes te bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms blangs te 'ong ngo /_/drug sde dag gis gtsug lag khang du dong ste rnyang rnying dag las bzhi bcu phung por byas te bzhag go/_/dge slong bzhi bcu po dag zas kyi bya ba byas te 'ongs pa dang /_drug sde dag gis lhan cig gnas 
[\[110a.2\]]pa dang /_nye gnas dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg don nyung ngu dag bos shig_/de dag gis de dag bos pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci kho bo cag khyed kyi gos srung ba yin nam/_rang gi gos dag long shig_/dge slong bzhi 
[\[110a.3\]]bcu po dag gis phan tshun gdong du blta bar brtsams pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci'i phyir phan tshun gdong du lta/_gnas brtan dag thams cad rnyang rnying sha stag yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di dag mdud pa 'or cig dang snam sbyar yin no/_/'di dag ni drubs 
[\[110a.4\]]shig dang bla gos yin no/_/'di dag ni drubs shig dang mthang gos yin no/_/'di dag ni drubs shig dang rngul gzan yin no/_/gal te mi dga' na 'dong dang yang bslang bar bya'o/_/kye ma'o gnas brtan dag 'di dag nyid kyang ma bslangs kyang rung ngo /_/de dag gis rnyang rnying de dag khyer te dgon par dong nas 
[\[110a.5\]]'tshem zhing 'khod do/_/thams cad du sgra grags pa/_grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag re res kyang yo byad bcu gsum bdun bdun rnyed do zhes grags so/_/de dag dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis gzhan thos la 
[\[110a.6\]]gzhan mthong ste/_bdag cag gis grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag re res kyang yo byad bcu gsum bdun bdun rnyed do zhes thos na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ko rnyang rnying dag 'tshem zhing 'khod do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyed cag gis lta kho bo cag rang rang phrag pa dag 
[\[110a.7\]]gis kyang khyer zhes kyang thos so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong phreng ba can pa'i dge slong bzhi bcu po dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed len pa'i drod mi shes pa bden nam/_
[\[110b.2\]]btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi brtson pa dang /_mi sbyor ba dang /_ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong 
[\[110b.3\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di 
[\[110b.4\]]ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gos phrogs sam/_gos rlag gam/_gos tshig gam/_gos rlung gis khyer ram/_gos chus khyer na khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song la gos bslang bar bya'o/_/gal te de la bram ze'am/_
[\[110b.5\]]khyim bdag dad pa can zhig gis dus kyis gos mang po stobs par 'dod na dge slong des de las gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug par blang bar bya'o/_/de las lhag par len na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/gos 
[\[110b.6\]]phrogs sam zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi gos dag chom rkun pa dag gam/_g.yon can dag gis phrogs par gyur pa'o/_/gos rlag gam zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi gos dag rlag gam 'khyams par gyur pa'o/_/gos tshig gam zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[110b.7\]]dge slong gi gos dag mes tshig par gyur pa'o/_/gos rlung gis khyer ram zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi gos dag rlung gis khyer bar gyur pa'o/_/gos chus khyer na zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gi gos dag chus khyer bar gyur pa'o/_/khyim bdag ces bya 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]ba ni skyes pa'o/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do/_/nye du ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_mes po dang /_phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad nye du yin la/_de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/_/gan du song la zhes bya ba ni gan du song ste'o/_/gos 
[\[111a.2\]]zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/_/bslang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni slong mo bya ba'o/_/'dod na zhes bya 
[\[111a.3\]]ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o/_/gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug pa blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa ni gnyis te/_dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa dang /_khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad 
[\[111a.4\]]g.yogs dang bcas pa'o/_/dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa ni sar pa las snam sbyar nyi rim dang /_ras yug phran khru lnga pa dang do pa'o/_/khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa ni ras yug chen khru bcu gnyis pa dang /_ras 
[\[111a.5\]]yug phran khru bdun pa dang do pa'o/_/de las lhag pa len na zhes bya ba ni de las gong ma'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur 
[\[111a.6\]]zhe na/_dge slong khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa slong bas khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pa na lhag pa slong na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dge slong gi stod 
[\[111a.7\]]g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa slong bas dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pa na/_lhag pa slong na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]bcas pa slong bas khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pa na/_gal te chung na yang bslang bar mi bya la/_lhag na yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/dge slong dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa slong bas dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs 
[\[111b.2\]]dang bcas pa thob pa na/_gal te chung na bslang bar bya la/_lhag na yang sbyin par bya'o/_/de ltar na dge slong gis khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa las lhag pa slong ba dang /_dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa las lhag par sbyin 
[\[111b.3\]]par mi byed na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gos spang bar gyur na de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la/_ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral 
[\[111b.4\]]bar ma byas la/_ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la/_ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[111b.5\]]slong gi gos spang bar gyur na/_de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ni ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du dge slong gis ji tsam du spang ba'i dngos po de nyid kyis ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam/_chos gos sam/_
[\[111b.6\]]dra ba'am/_phor bu'am/_ska rags sam/_dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba nye bar 'jog par byed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/
[\[111b.7\]]slong bar rigs pa'i spang ba ste bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/khyim bdag de gzhan gyi chung ma la chags par gyur nas de la chung mas rje'i sras de ltar ma mdzad cig ces phyir bzlog na ji tsam du de phyir bzlog kyang phyir ma log pa de tsam du de'i 
[\[112a.2\]]chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'khrul pa rtsom par byed do/_/khyim bdag de yang bud med gzhan dag la sbyin par byed la/_chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pas de ltar khyim de gnyis ka nas rgud par gyur nas de gnyis la bu mo mngag gzhug ma 
[\[112a.3\]]zhig yod nas khyim bdag des bu mo de la 'dis khyim rgud par byas so zhes khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed do/_/bu mo des smras pa/_bdag gis khyim rgud par gyur pa 'di ci las gyur pa 'tshal mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag gis ji ltar rje dag la bsngags pa ma 
[\[112a.4\]]lags pa brjod par bgyir rung /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de tshor nas khyim bdag de dang khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i gan du song ste/_ci nas kyang de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing tshul khrims 
[\[112a.5\]]'chal pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod nas/_des de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par byas so/_/khyim bdag de gtum pa/_brtun ngas pa/_drag shul che ba yin pas yang bu mo de la brdeg par brtsams pa dang /_chung mas de la smras pa/_
[\[112a.6\]]rje'i sras gang gi tshe bdag cag las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi mkhyen pa de'i tshe go rdeg par mdzad mod/_da bdag cag dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa nye dga' la brten nas las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pas 'di ltar 'jig rten ni rang gi las kyi 'bras 
[\[112a.7\]]bu la spyod pa lags pas su zhig su'i bran lags/_bu mo 'di la rdeg par ma mdzad cig_/bzang mo khyod zer ba ma nyes so/_/bu mo tshur shog_/khrus gyis la shog shig_/bu mo de khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang des de la gos phrugs gcig bskon nas smras pa/_bu mo 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]dga' zhing las byos shig_/bu mo des bsams pa/_khyim bdag khyo shug 'di sngon gtum pa/_brtun ngas pa/_drag shul che ba yin te/_yang dang yang du bdag la khu tshur dang /_thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed cing /_zas dang gos ngan pa dag sbyin par byed 
[\[112b.2\]]na/_da 'di bdag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur to snyam nas/_yang bsams pa/_gang tshun chad nas 'phags pa nye dga' khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa de tshun chad nas khyim bdag 'di pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur pas bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la ci zhig gi dga' bar bya snyam 
[\[112b.3\]]nas/_des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis 'di la cung zhig brkus te dbul du ni khyim bdag 'dis bdag brdeg btsog mang po byas te sngon gyi gnas su bzhag par 'gyur ro snyam nas de sdod cing 'dug go/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma des khyim bdag de la smras pa/_rje'i 
[\[112b.4\]]sras mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'phags pa nye dga' ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/_'phags pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bdag cag las dri ma can dang phral nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod de/_yang dang yang du bdag cag la chos 
[\[112b.5\]]kyis sdud par byed pas bdag cag gis kyang de la zang zing cung zad kyis bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/bzang mo de bzhin bya'o/_/ci zhig bgyi/_de la ras yug chen cig dbul bar bya'o/_/bu mo des de thos nas bsams pa/_bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dga' ba 
[\[112b.6\]]de sbran par bya'o snyam mo/_/nye dga' yang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs pa dang /_bu mo des khyim legs par byugs shing phyag dar bor nas des nye 
[\[112b.7\]]dga' mthong ba dang rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dgyes pa sbran par bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag 'di khyod la ras yug chen 'bul bar 'gyur ro/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_sa'i steng na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]pa de dag dang bdag mnyam par deng bu mo 'dis kyang 'phrigs so snyam nas des gshe ste smras pa/_bu mo gal te bden par gyur na ni ngas khyod la gshe ba dag la chugs ma bya'o/_/ji ste [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par gyur na ni brdeg btsog mang po byed du bcug ste sngon gyi 
[\[113a.2\]]gnas ji lta bar gzhag par bya'o/_/'phags pa spyo ba mang du mdzad na bzhud cig dang khyod nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhud nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug pa dang /_khyim bdag de chung ma dang bcas pas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te stan ches dma' ba blangs 
[\[113a.3\]]nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bo la bskon par bya ba'i ras yug chen gang yin pa de blta'o/_/de gnyis kyis phan tshun gdong du blta bar brtsams te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag cag gis gsang ste smras pa 
[\[113a.4\]]de 'phags pa la sus bgyis/_ci 'phags pas gzhan gyi sems kyang mkhyen nam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_kho bo lhung bzed du zos shing so lhags pa dang /_skra dkar por gyur pa yin na kho bo la de tsam yang mi srid dam/_khyim bdag des ras yug chen de 
[\[113a.5\]]blangs te nye dga' la phul ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ras yug chen de mthong nas lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed/_bzhin sgyur bar byed do/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa ci'i slad du phyag gnyis 'dril bar mdzad/_zhal sgyur bar mdzad/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras 
[\[113a.6\]]pa/_khyim bdag 'di ni khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams ni yod na yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ni med de/_ras yug chen 'di ni mchil lham phyi ba'am/_skar khung glan par rung ste/_'di ni chos gos kyi gdong la yongs su 
[\[113a.7\]]zad pa dang mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/'o na ji ltar bgyi/_ras yug chen bzang po gzhan byin cig_/ras yug chen gzhan ma mchis so/_/tshong dus nas nyos te byin cig rin ma mchis so/_/dus thob la byin cig_/khyim bdag des chung ma'i gdong du blta bar brtsams 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]pa dang /_chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag cag la 'phags pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]phan btags kyis ras yug chen 'jol la de la phul cig_/khyim bdag de nye dga' dang lhan cig srang du song nas/_tshong khang du phyin pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_tshong pa 'di nga rgyal bskyed 
[\[113b.2\]]par bya ste/_des na ras yug chen bzang po ster bar 'gyur ro snyam nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khyim bdag la smras pa/_khyim bdag tshong pa 'di ni gcam bu zhig yin pas 'di la ras yug chen bzang po med kyis gzhan du 'dong ngo /_/tshong pa des de thos nas des chen po la 'os pa'i 
[\[113b.3\]]ras yug chen bstan te smras pa/_'phags pa ras yug chen la gzigs/_ras yug chen 'di ni bzang na 'di rin ji tsam 'di dang 'di tsam mo/_/khyim bdag 'di 'jal lo/_/khyim bdag 'jal lam 'jal lo/_/dus ji tsam na/_dus 'di tsam na'o/_/tshong pa 
[\[113b.4\]]des khyim bdag de la ras yug chen de byin nas khyim bdag des nye dga' la phul ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khyim bdag a rog gya zhes smras nas/_khyod sbyin pa 'dis sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog thob pa dang /_lha 
[\[113b.5\]]dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo /_/khyim bdag de longs spyod srabs nas/_des rin de dus de tsam gyis 'bul bar ma nus nas/_tshong pa des khyim bdag de nyi ma la btags pa dang de chung po grogs dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_ci khyod 
[\[113b.6\]]zhun mar 'thungs sam/_'on te rims kyis btab/_bu lon pas bzung ste 'dug go/_/khyod kyi phas kyang bu lon pa yod par ma byas/_mes po dag gis kyang ma byas na bu lon pa ga las byung /_des smras pa/_gang dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la dad par byed pa de 
[\[113b.7\]]dag 'di ltar 'gyur te/_'di ltar gang byin pa de mi len par lhag par slong bar byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod 
[\[114a.2\]]gang byin pas mi mgu zhing lhag pa slong ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa 
[\[114a.3\]]mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin 
[\[114a.4\]]no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin dag spags nas bdag gi gos kyi rin 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la 
[\[114a.5\]]dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las/_de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste/_bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de'i gan du 
[\[114a.6\]]song nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pas bdag gi phyir gos kyi rin gang dag spags pa'i gos kyi rin de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la bdag la gos rung ba dus su legs par bskon cig ces smras te gos drub na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong 
[\[114a.7\]]gi phyir zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga'a'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/khyim bdag gam zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do/_/nye du ma yin pas zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_mes po dang /_phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]nye du yin la/_de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/_/gos kyi rin dag ces bya ba ni gser ram dngul lo/_/gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig ces bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_
[\[114b.2\]]ko tam pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/_/nyos la zhes bya ba ni nyos te'o/_/dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs dang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga'o/_/de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las zhes bya ba ni longs spyad par bzod pa'o/_/de 
[\[114b.3\]]ni gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par zhes bya ba ni sngar mgron du ma bos par ro/_/rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste zhes bya ba ni bsnyen bkur byed pa zhig byung ste'o/_/bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab dang mchog gi phyir ro/_/khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi 
[\[114b.4\]]chung ma nye du ma yin pa de'i gan du song nas zhes bya ba ni drung du song nas so/_/gos drub na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[114b.5\]]de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_rin thang dang /_kha dog dang /_khru tshad las te/_ji ltar rin thang las zhe na/_dge slong gis kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba'i gos thob pa na de de las lhag par slong na/_lhag pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung 
[\[114b.6\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba ji lta ba bzhin du kAr ShA pa Na bcu ri ba dang /_kAr ShA pa Na nyi shu ri ba dang /_kAr ShA pa Na lnga bcu ri ba'i bar gyi gos thob pa na/_de de las lhag pa slong na/_lhag pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 
[\[114b.7\]]'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med de de ltar rin thang las so/_/ji ltar kha dog las zhe na/_dge slong gis gos sngon po thob pa na/_de de las lhag par slong na/_lhag pa slong ba de la nyes su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/sngon po ji lta ba de bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo thob na de de las lhag pa slong ba na/_lhag pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 
[\[115a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med de/_de ltar kha dog las so/_/ji ltar khru tshad las zhe na/_dge slong gis gos khru lnga pa thob pa na/_de de las lhag pa slong na/_lhag pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la 
[\[115a.3\]]ni ltung ba med do/_/khru lnga pa ji lta ba de bzhin du khru bcu pa dang /_khru nyi shu pa dang /_khru lnga bcu pa'i bar gyi gos thob na de de las lhag pa slong na/_lhag pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/_de ltar khru tshad las so/_/dge 
[\[115a.4\]]slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na 
[\[115a.5\]]de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la 
[\[115a.6\]]ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na ji srid du dngos po de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam/_chos gos sam/_dra ba'am/_phor bu'am/_ska rags sam/_dge sbyong 
[\[115a.7\]]gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba nye bar 'jog na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/kha tshar slong ba na lhan pa thob pa dang /_lhan pa slong ba na ras yug phran nam ras yug chen thob pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/spags pa las lhag pa slong ba'i spang ba ste brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan 
[\[115b.2\]]yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/khyim bdag de gzhan gyi chung ma la chags par gyur nas de la chung mas rje'i sras de ltar ma mdzad cig ces 
[\[115b.3\]]phyir bzlog na/_ji tsam du de phyir bzlog kyang phyir ma log pa de tsam du de'i chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'khrul pa rtsom par byed do/_/khyim bdag de yang bud med gzhan dag la sbyin par byed la/_chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pas 
[\[115b.4\]]de ltar khyim de gnyis ka nas rgud par gyur nas/_de gnyis la bu mo mngag gzhug ma zhig yod nas khyim bdag des bu mo de la 'dis khyim rgud par byas so zhes khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed do/_/bu mos smras pa/_bdag gis khyim rgud par gyur pa 'di 
[\[115b.5\]]ci las gyur pa 'tshal mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag gis ji ltar rje dag la bsngags pa ma lags pa brjod par bgyir rung /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de tshor nas khyim bdag dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i gan du song ste/_ci nas kyang de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i 
[\[115b.6\]]gzhi dag la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod nas/_des de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par byas so/_/khyim bdag de gtum pa/_
[\[115b.7\]]brtun ngas pa/_drag shul che ba yin pas yang bu mo de la brdeg par brtsams pa dang /_chung mas de la smras pa/_rje'i sras gang gi tshe bdag cag las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi mkhyen pa de'i tshe go rdeg par mdzad mod/_da bdag cag dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]nye dga' la brten nas las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pas 'di ltar 'jig rten ni rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa lags pas su zhig su'i bran lags/_bran mo 'di la rdeg par ma mdzad cig_/bzang mo khyod zer ba ma nyes so/_/bu mo tshur 
[\[116a.2\]]shog khrus gyis la shog shig_/bu mo des khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang /_des de la gos phrugs gcig bskon nas smras pa/_bu mo dga' zhing las byos shig_/bu mo des bsams pa/_khyim bdag khyo shug 'di sngon gtum pa/_brtun ngas pa/_drag shul can 
[\[116a.3\]]yin te/_yang dang yang du bdag la khu tshur dang /_thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed cing zas dang gos ngan pa dag sbyin par byed na/_da 'di bdag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur to snyam nas yang bsams pa/_gang tshun chad nas 'phags pa nye dga' khyim 'dir 'jug par 
[\[116a.4\]]brtsams pa de tshun chad nas khyim bdag 'di pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur pas/_bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la ci zhig gis dga' bar bya snyam nas des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis 'di las cung zhig brkus te dbul du ni khyim bdag 'dis brdeg btsog mang po 
[\[116a.5\]]byas te sngon gyi gnas su bzhag par 'gyur ro snyam nas de sdod cing 'dug go/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma des khyim bdag de la smras pa/_rje'i sras mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'phags pa nye dga' ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/_'phags pa nye 
[\[116a.6\]{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bdag cag las dri ma can dang phral nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod de/_yang dang yang du bdag cag la chos kyis sdud par byed pas bdag cag gis kyang de la zang zing cung zad kyis bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/bzang mo de bzhin bya'o/_/ci zhig 
[\[116a.7\]]bgyi/_de la bdag cag so so nas ras yug chen dbul bar bya'o/_/bu mo des de thos nas bsams pa/_bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dga' ba de sbran par bya'o snyam mo/_/nye dga' yang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]bsod snyoms la zhugs te mthar gyis bsod snyoms rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs pa dang /_bu mo des khyim dag legs par byugs shing phyag dar bor nas des nye dga' mthong ba dang rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dgyes pa sbran par 
[\[116b.2\]]bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di khyod la so so nas ras yug chen 'bul bar 'gyur ro/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_sa'i steng na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed pa de dag dang bdag mnyam par deng bu mo 'dis kyang 'phrigs so snyam nas des gshe ste 
[\[116b.3\]]smras pa/_bu mo gal te bden par gyur na ni des khyod la gshe ba dag la chugs ma bya'o/_/ji ste [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par gyur na ni brdeg btsog mang po byed du bcug ste sngon gyi gnas ji lta bar gzhag par bya'o/_/'phags pa spyo ba mang du mdzad na bzhud cig dang khyod nyid kyis mkhyen par 
[\[116b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de zhugs nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug pa dang khyim bdag de chung ma dang bcas pas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te stan ches dma' ba blangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bo la so so nas ras yug chen sbyin 
[\[116b.5\]]par byas pa de blta'o/_/de gnyis kyis phan tshun gdong du blta bar brtsams te 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/'phags pa bdag cag gis gsang ste smras pa de 'phags pa la sus bgyis/_ci 'phags pas gzhan gyi sems kyang mkhyen nam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras 
[\[116b.6\]]pa/_kho bo lhung bzed du zos shing so lhags pa dang /_skra dkar por gyur pa yin na kho bo la de tsam yang mi srid dam/_khyim bdag dang chung mas so so nas ras yug chen blangs te nye dga' la phul ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ras yug chen de dag mthong nas lag pa gnyis 'dril 
[\[116b.7\]]bar byed/_bzhin sgyur bar byed do/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa ci'i slad du phyag gnyis 'dril bar mdzad/_zhal sgyur bar mdzad/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di dag ni khyed la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams ni yod na yongs su 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ni med de ras yug chen 'di dag ni mchil lham phyi ba'am/_skar khung glan par rung ste/_'di dag ni chos gos kyi gdang la yongs su zad pa dang mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/'o na ji ltar bgyi/_ras yug chen bzang 
[\[117a.2\]]po gzhan dag byin cig_/ras yug chen dag ma mchis so/_/tshong dus nas nyos te byin cig_/rin dag ma mchis so/_/dus thob la byin cig_/khyim bdag des chung ma'i gdong du blta bar brtsams pa dang /_chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag cag la 'phags pa 
[\[117a.3\]]nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]phan btags kyis ras yug chen dag 'jol la de la phul cig_/khyim bdag de nye dga' dang lhan cig srang du song nas tshong khang du phyin pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_tshong pa 'di nga rgyal bskyed par bya ste/_des na ras yug chen bzang po ster bar 'gyur 
[\[117a.4\]]ro snyam nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khyim bdag la smras pa/_khyim bdag tshong pa 'di ni gcam bu zhig yin pas 'di la ras yug chen bzang po med kyis gzhan du 'dong ngo /_/tshong pa des de thos nas des chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen bstan te smras pa/_'phags pa ras yug 
[\[117a.5\]]chen la gzigs/_ras yug chen 'di ni bzang na 'di'i rin ji tsam/_'di dang 'di tsam mo/_/khyim bdag 'di 'jal lo/_/khyim bdag 'jal lam/_'jal lo/_/dus ji tsam na dus 'di tsam na'o/_/tshong pa des khyim bdag de la ras yug chen de byin nas khyim 
[\[117a.6\]]bdag des nye dga' la phul ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khyim bdag a rog gya zhes smras nas/_khyod sbyin pa 'dis sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog thob pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig 
[\[117a.7\]]ces smras te song ngo /_/khyim bdag de longs spyod srabs nas des rin de dus de tsam gyis 'bul bar ma nus nas tshong pa des khyim bdag de nyi ma la btags pa dang /_de chung po grogs dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_ci khyod zhun mar 'thungs sam/_'on te rims kyis 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]btab/_bu lon pas bzung ste 'dug go/_/khyod kyi phas kyang bu lon dag yod par ma byas/_mes po dag gis kyang ma byas na bu lon pa ga las byung des smras pa/_gang dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la dad par byed pa de dag 'di ltar 'gyur te/_'di ltar gang byin pa de 
[\[117b.2\]]mi len par lhag pa slong bar byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin 
[\[117b.3\]]no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod gang byin pas mi mgu zhing lhag pa slong ba bden nam/_btsun 
[\[117b.4\]]pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs 
[\[117b.5\]]du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab 
[\[117b.6\]]pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin so so ba dag spags nas bdag cag gnyis kyis gos kyi rin so so ba 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu so so ba dag nyos la dge slong ming 'di zhes bya 
[\[117b.7\]]ba 'ongs dang bdag cag gnyis kyis so so nas de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las/_de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste/_bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de dag gi 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]gan du song nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gis bdag gi phyir gos kyi rin so so ba gang dag spags pa'i gos kyi rin so so ba de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag gos 'di dang 'di lta bu so so ba dag nyos la gnyi ga 'dus te bdag la gos rung ba cig dus 
[\[118a.2\]]su legs par skon cig ces smras te gos drub na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/khyim bdag ces bya ba ni skyes pa'o/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma zhes bya ba ni bud med do/_/nye du ma 
[\[118a.3\]]yin pas zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_mes po dang /_phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/_/gos kyi rin ces bya ba ni gser ram/_dngul lo/_/gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig ces bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_
[\[118a.4\]]zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/_/nyos la zhes bya ba ni nyos te'o/_/dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs dang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga'o/_/de la gos 
[\[118a.5\]]rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las zhes bya ba ni longs spyad par bzod pa'o/_/de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par zhes bya ba ni sngar mgron du ma bos par ro/_/rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste zhes bya ni bsnyen bkur byed pa zhig byung ste'o/_/bzang 
[\[118a.6\]]po 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab dang mchog gi phyir ro/_/khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de dag gi gan du song nas zhes bya ba ni drung du song nas so/_/gnyi ga 'dus te zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga tshogs te'o/_/gos drub na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o/_/
[\[118a.7\]]spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_rin thang dang /_kha dog dang /_khru tshad las te ji ltar rin thang las zhe na/_dge slong 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]gis kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba'i gos thob pa na de de las lhag pa slong na lhag pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba ji lta ba de bzhin du kAr ShA pa Na bcu ri ba dang /_kAr ShA pa Na nyi shu ri 
[\[118b.2\]]ba dang /_kAr ShA pa Na lnga bcu ri ba'i bar gyi gos thob pa na de de las lhag pa slong na lhag pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/de ltar rin thang las so/_/ji ltar kha dog las zhe na/_dge slong gis 
[\[118b.3\]]gos sngon po thob pa na de de las lhag pa slong na lhag pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/gos sngon po la ji lta ba de bzhin du ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_stug po dang /_srab mo thob pa na de de las 
[\[118b.4\]]lhag pa slong na lhag pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/de ltar kha dog las so/_/ji ltar khru tshad las zhe na/_dge slong gi gos khru lnga pa thob pa na de de las lhag pa slong na lhag pa slong ba de la nyes 
[\[118b.5\]]byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/khru lnga pa ji lta ba de bzhin du khru bcu pa dang /_khru nyi shu pa dang /_khru lnga bcu pa'i bar gyi gos thob na de de las lhag pa slong na lhag pa slong ba de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob 
[\[118b.6\]]na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/_de ltar khru tshad las so/_/dge slong gi gos dag spang bar gyur na de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/_de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na/_
[\[118b.7\]]de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la/_ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/_de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/_de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na ji srid du dngos po de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags 
[\[119a.2\]]par lhung bzed dam/_chos gos sam/_dra ba'am/_phor bu dang /_ska rags sam/_dge slong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba nye bar 'jog na/_de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/kha tsher slong ba na lhan pa thob pa dang /_lhan pa slong ba na ras yug phran nam/_
[\[119a.3\]]ras yug chen thob pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/so so nas spags pa las lhag pa slong ba'i spang ba ste dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam 
[\[119a.4\]]po sum bcu rtsa gcig pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/nye dga' la blo skyes pa 'di thams cad khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdam pa byas pas phyin cad ras yug 
[\[119a.5\]]phran sgre bo yang su las kyang bslang bar mi nus kyis 'di ltar bdag dang lhan cig yi ge'i grwa na yig 'bru'i yi ge dag slob slob pa bram ze dbyar tshul yod kyis de'i gan du song ste bltas na de las cung zad 'thob kyang srid do snyam nas de de'i khyim du song ba dang /_sgo bas 'phags pa 
[\[119a.6\]]ma bzhud cig ces bgags so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi spyod yul ma yin pa ni rnam pa lnga gsungs te/_rol mo mkhan gyi khyim dang /_'jud mthun ma'i khyim dang /_chang pa'i khyim dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_
[\[119a.7\]]gdol pa'i khyim yin na/_ci 'di rol mo mkhan gyi khyim mam/_'jud mthun ma'i khyim mam/_chang pa'i khyim mam/_rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_gdol pa'i gnas yin nam/_'phags pa khyod spyo ba mang du mdzad de/_'di ni rol mo mkhan gyi khyim yang ma lags/_
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]'jud mthun ma'i khyim yang ma lags/_chang pa'i khyim yang ma lags/_rgyal po'i pho brang yang ma lags/_gdol pa'i gnas kyang ma lags te/_'di ltar 'di ni bram ze dbyar tshul gyi sdum pa lags so/_/kwa'i nang rje song la bram ze dbyar tshul la nye dga' shes ldan 
[\[119b.2\]]lta bar 'dod cing sgo na sdod do zhes gyis shig_/sgo bas smras pa/_khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i snying tshoms mchis pa lags snyam mam/_bkren pa gal te sbron na ni sbron cig_/mi sbron na khyod la mtshams chen po bcad pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sgo bas bsams 
[\[119b.3\]]pa/_'di ni 'di ltar 'jigs pa med pa dang /_bag tsha ba med par tshig gtong ba las na ma sbran na gnod pa byed kyis song la sbran no snyam nas de der song ste smras pa/_jo bo btsun pa nye dga' jo bo lta bar 'tshal zhing chab sgo na sdod do/_/dbyar tshul gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 
[\[119b.4\]]nye dga' la su 'gog_/btsun pa nye dga' 'jug tu chug shig_/nye dga' zhugs pa dang /_dbyar tshul gyis smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs so/_/btsun pa nye dga' gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig_/nye dga' de'i 
[\[119b.5\]]mdun du 'dug ste der sgra mthon po dang sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_sgra zab mos sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams so/_/gang gi tshe nye dga' yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas sbyin pa'i bsngags pa rjod par byed pa de'i tshe na bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag 'di snyam du kye ma 
[\[119b.6\]]rang gi sha dag kyang bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems pas bram ze dbyar tshul gyis smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' dbyar gnas pa la kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu 'bul lo/_/a rog gya sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 
[\[119b.7\]]'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog thob pa dang lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod kyang thob par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo /_/mnyan yod nas dge slong gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du rgyal po'i khab tu 'ongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyod cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des 
[\[120a.2\]]chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/_dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyod cag las gang de bzhin 
[\[120a.3\]]gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig_/dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la mnyan to/_/mnyan yod nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong de gnyis kyis 
[\[120a.4\]]de thos nas bdag cag kyang mnyan yod du 'gro dgos so snyam nas mi dga' bar gyur to/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]thos nas nyam nga bar gyur te/_bdag la brgya la brgya lam na rnyed pa byung ba de'i bar chad byung ngo snyam nas/_de bram ze dbyar tshul gyi gan du song ste sgra dma' ba dang /_sgra yid du mi 'ong 
[\[120a.5\]]ba dang /_sgra zhum pas sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams pa dang /_dbyar tshul gyis smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' khyod sngon sgra mthon po dang /_sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_sgra zab mos sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par mdzad na/_khyod da ltar sgra dma' ba dang /_
[\[120a.6\]]sgra yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_sgra mi zab pas sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par mdzad pa 'di la rgyu ci mchis/_chung po grogs bdag cag brgya la brgya lam na phrad pa 'byung na de yang yun mi ring ba kho nas 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/ma ga d+hA pa zur gyis go/_/ko sa 
[\[120a.7\]]la pa brjod nas shes/_/pan tsa la pa yig phyed kyis/_/nub mi ma smras mi shes so/_/zhes bya ba yin pas dbyar tshul gyis bsams pa/_'di ni shAkya'i rigs rgya chen po de snyed spangs te rab tu byung ba yin pas 'di bdag dang 'bral ba la mya ngan mi byed kyi kAr ShA pa Na 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]drug bcu 'chor ba'i mya ngan byed do snyam nas smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' gang dang gang du gnas par bdag gis kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu bskur bar bgyi'o/_/a rog gya de lta na phan phun med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag 
[\[120b.2\]]byed pa yin no zhes smras nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/_grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/_thul ba 'khor thul ba dang 
[\[120b.3\]]ldan pa/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i 
[\[120b.4\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[120b.5\]]bskor ba/_sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshong 
[\[120b.6\]]dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer 
[\[120b.7\]]stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_thags zangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dbang 
[\[121a.2\]]po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/_spyod lam dang /_spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/_chu gter ltar ting nge ba/_sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/_glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad 
[\[121a.3\]]bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/_'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum 
[\[121a.4\]]dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pu pa/_nyag gcig dpa' ba/_gnyis pa med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/_rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa 
[\[121a.5\]]gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/_mi 'jigs 
[\[121a.6\]]pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_yan lag lnga spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis 
[\[121a.7\]]phyug pa/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/_mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par 'phags pa/_kun shes kauN+Di n+ya 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_'od srung dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang /_gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun 
[\[121b.2\]]du bdar nas ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs te mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa dag zong thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu dong ba dag gal te don mthun mang na de la rgyal 
[\[121b.3\]]po'am/_bram ze dbyar tshul sho gam gcod par byed pas bram ze dbyar tshul gyis sho gam pa dag la smras pa/_gang gi tshe mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa dag mnyan yod du phyir 'gro ba de'i tshe na kho bo la sbron cig_/sho gam pa dag gis tshong pa dag la bsgo nas de dag gis zong 
[\[121b.4\]]bsgyur te rin blangs nas bram ze dbyar tshul gyi gan du dong ste bdag cag mnyan yod du mchi na bgyi ba ci mchis zhes smras pa dang /_bram ze dbyar tshul gyis tshong pa gcig la kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu gtad de khyod kyis 'di btsun pa nye dga'i gan du khyer la phul cig ces bsgo'o/_/
[\[121b.5\]]tshong pa des bsams pa/_gang bram ze dbyar tshul gyis dad par bya ba'i dge slong de ni gdon mi za bar grags pa yin pas bdag gis kyang de la dga' ba cung zad byas/_gos dag bskon no snyam nas de 'od ma'i tshal du song ste dge slong gi gan du phyin nas dris pa/_'phags pa 
[\[121b.6\]]dge slong gi tshul dang mthun pa'i gos dag ji ltar lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci dge 'dun la ras yug chen gyi sbyin pa byed dam/_'phags pa dge 'dun la ras yug chen gyi sbyin pa mi bgyid de/_'di ltar bram ze dbyar tshul gyis btsun pa nye dga' la kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu 
[\[121b.7\]]bskur ba dag de'i gos dag tu bsgyur te mchi'o/_/dge slong des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gos dag kyang len cing khyod kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu yang 'bul du 'jud pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/tshong pa des bsams pa/_'di ni gor ma chag par 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]de dang kho na yod pa yin no snyam nas de dge slong gzhan zhig gi gan du song ste dris pa/_'phags pa dge slong gi tshul dang mthun pa'i gos dag ji lta bu lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci dge 'dun la ras yug chen gyi sbyin pa byed dam/_'phags pa dge 'dun la ras yug 
[\[122a.2\]]chen gyi sbyin pa mi bgyid de 'di ltar bram ze dbyar tshul gyis btsun pa nye dga' la kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu bskur ba dag de'i gos dag tu bsgyur te mchi'o/_/dge slong des smras pa/_gal te rgyas ma btab par khyer na khyod yul gyi khe spogs 'bul du 'jud pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur 
[\[122a.3\]]ro/_/tshong pa des bsams pa/_'di dang de gnyis mthun no snyam nas de bram ze dbyar tshul gyi gan du song ste smras pa/_dbyar tshul kAr ShA pa Na 'di dag rgyas thob shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yid ches kyis khyod nyid kyis khyer cig_/dbyar tshul bdag la thugs ches mod kyis 'on kyang 
[\[122a.4\]]bdag gis legs par bgyi ba bgyi'o/_/dbyar tshul gyis rgyas btab nas des de dag khyer te mnyan yod du song nas de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste dge slong rnams la dris pa/_'phags pa dag 'phags pa nye dga'i gtsug lag khang gang lags/_de dag gis de'i gtsug lag khang 
[\[122a.5\]]'di yin no zhes bstan nas de der song ba dang nye dga' mi snang nas des dge slong zhig la dris pa/_'phags pa btsun pa nye dga' gar bzhud/_des smras pa/_nyin mo spyod pa'i phyir ro/_/tshong pa des smras pa/_bram ze dbyar tshul gyis de la kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu bskur ba 'di 
[\[122a.6\]]dag zhog la de mchis na stsol cig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba mgo bos 'dzin pa 'ga' mthong ngam/_des bsams pa/_'di ni gdon mi za bar de dang kho na yod pa yin no snyam nas des dge slong gzhan zhig gi gan du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[122a.7\]]bram ze dbyar tshul gyis btsun pa nye dga' la kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu bskur ba 'di dag zhog la de mchis na stsol cig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te khyod kyis rgyas ma btab par 'ongs na khyod yul gyi khe sbogs 'jal du 'jud pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/des 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]bsams pa/_'di dang de gnyis su mthun gyis khyim du song la de nyid du de 'ongs pa la bde bar tshig gi lan gdab bo snyam nas smras pa/_'phags pa btsun pa nye dga' la khyim bdag gi mchid nas 'di skad ces bdag gi sdum pa ni phyogs ga ge mo zhig na mchis kyis gal te 
[\[122b.2\]]kAr ShA pa Na bzhed na gshegs su gsol zhes gsungs shig ces smras te song ngo /_/nye dga' yang gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub ste/_de yang 
[\[122b.3\]]tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de legs par gsungs pa yin te/_khyod deng kho na nyin mo spyod du song bas deng nyid du kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu grub bo/_/gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu re re la kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu drug bcu byin pa'i sbyin 
[\[122b.4\]]bdag de lta bu de gang yin/_btsun pa nye dga' dge 'dun thams cad la ma yin gyi khyod gcig pu la'o/_/gang gis nye dga' la kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu byin pa'i sbyin bdag de lta bu de gang yin/_bram ze dbyar tshul gyis bskur ro/_/de ni phyi rol gyi rnyed pa kho na yin na rgya ma byid 
[\[122b.5\]]dam/_ma zhu'am/_sgyu ma zhugs sam/_sus brtags/_ma brtags pa kho nar blangs sam/_sus blangs/_kho bo ni dgra bo sha stag gi nang na 'dug go/_/de la dge slong gzhan des smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' yi chad du ci yod/_khyim bdag de na re bdag 
[\[122b.6\]]gi sdum pa ni phyogs ga ge mo zhig na mchis kyis gal te kAr ShA pa Na bzhed na gshegs su gsol zhes zer ro/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]snam sbyar blangs te gom pa bskyed de song ba dang /_khyim bdag des de thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_dge sbyong 
[\[122b.7\]]hral po gom pa 'di lta bus 'ong pa 'di ni btsun pa nye dga' yin gor ma chag snyam nas/_des thag ring po kho na nas de la smras pa/_khyod btsun pa nye dga' ma lags sam/_kho bo yin no/_/bram ze dbyar tshul gyis khyod la kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu bskur ba 'di lags 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]kyis bzhes shig_/a rog gya sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog thob pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod kyang thob par gyur cig_/'phags pa ci'i slad du bdag gi ming 
[\[123a.2\]]gis yon bshad pa mdzad/_bram ze dbyar tshul gyi ming gis yon bshad pa mdzod cig_/bkren pa 'di la dgos pa ci yod/_'di ltar khyod kyis kyang mang du byas te khyod kyis khyer te 'ongs pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gis 'di khyer te srang du 'gro ba'i khye'u zhig re zhig rnyos shig_/
[\[123a.3\]]'phags pa bdag la khye'u ma mchis so/_/bkren pa rgyal po'i khab nas thag ring po 'di srid du khyer te 'ongs na srang du skyel mi nus sam/_des khye'u la smras pa/_kAr ShA pa Na khyer te 'phags pa'i phyi bzhin song la phyi rol du ma 'byung shig_/'dis khyod la bca' ba'i rin sbyin 
[\[123a.4\]]du ma gzhug shig_/khye'u des kAr ShA pa Na khyer te de'i phyi bzhin srang du song nas tshong rdal dang por phyin pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa kAr ShA pa Na 'di dag 'dir 'jog tu stsol cig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khye'u khyod shin tu legs par bslabs so/_/zhes des spos 'tshong 
[\[123a.5\]]gi khye'u zhig la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kAr ShA pa Na 'di dag re zhig zhog shig_/'phags pa bdag ni bla ma la rag las pa lags so/_/khyod nam yang rang la rag las par ma gyur cig_/des spos 'tshong gi khye'u gzhan zhig gi gan du song ste smras pa/_bzhin 
[\[123a.6\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kAr ShA pa Na 'di dag re zhig zhog shig_/'phags pa bdag gi bla ma slad rol du mchis so/_/nam yang 'jug par ma gyur cig_/de spos 'tshong gi khye'u dad pa gsar dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de'i gan du song ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kAr ShA pa Na 'di dag re zhig 
[\[123a.7\]]zhog shig_/'phags pa bdag ma la rag las pa lags so/_/kho bos ko khyod dad pa dang ldan par shes kyi kho bos khyod ji ltar rtug pa la dad par ni mi shes so/_/gal te khyod kyis dad pa ma thob tu zin na khyod kyis shing tshal blangs te dge slong skrod par yang 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]skyengs nas smras pa/_'phags pa gzhag tu gsol/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kAr ShA pa Na de dag der bzhag ste khyim bdag gi khye'u de phyir btang ste song ngo /_/tshong pa'i tshogs kyis kyang bdag cag las gang nyi ma shar na 'ong ba de bdag cag gis kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu 'jal du gzhug go 
[\[123b.2\]]zhes khrims su bya ba bcas nas spos 'tshong gi khye'u de la mas smras pa/_bu ci nas kyang bdag nyid kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu 'jal du mi gzhug pa de ltar gyis shig_/nye dga' mtshan mo 'gyod pa skyes te spos 'tshong gi khye'u de dad pa gsar dang ldan pa yin pas/_kAr ShA pa Na de 
[\[123b.3\]]dag bsnyon par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas de nang par sngar langs te khye'u zhig khrid nas de tshong rdal du song ba dang /_spos 'tshong gi khye'u de tshong rdal 'byed cing 'dug pa des mthong nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kAr ShA pa Na de dag byin cig_/
[\[123b.4\]]'phags pa tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bdag cag las gang gdugs shar na mchi ba de kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu 'jal du stsal ba'i khrims su bgyi ba bcas pas bdag cag tshong pa'i tshogs kyi nang du mchis te/_slar mchis kyi bar du yud tsam zhig bzhes su gsol/_bkren pa 
[\[123b.5\]]su zhig khyod kyi lto gol ba yin snyam su zhig sgyid pa gnyis skrangs skrangs su sdod par 'gyur/_gal te ma byin par 'gro na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu 'jal du gzhug pa'i gyod la bsgrin par bya'o/_/spos 'tshong gi khye'u de khros nas kAr ShA pa Na'i thum 
[\[123b.6\]]bu de 'phangs pa dang /_de'i rgya gogs so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_rgya ma byid dam/_ma zhu'am/_sgyu ma zhugs sam blta'o/_/ci kho bo khyod kyis brtags te gtad dam/_gal te khyod kyis brtags te ma blangs na ci'i phyir rgya gcog par byed/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]spos 
[\[123b.7\]]'tshong gi khye'u de de srid du bsgor gyi bar du tshong pa'i tshogs kyis de'i khyim nas kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'i gta' bcad nas/_de la mas smras pa/_bu khyod kyis las ci byas na des khyod kyis bdag nyid kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'i gyod la bsgrin par gyur/_khye'us smras pa/_gang 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]dag shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams la mngon par dad par byed pa de dag 'di ltar 'gyur te/_dad pa'i myu gu skyes ma thag pa nyid nyams par byas so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[124a.2\]]'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[124a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma 
[\[124a.4\]]yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par 
[\[124a.5\]]gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gi phyir rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po'am/_bram 
[\[124a.6\]]ze'am/_khyim bdag gam/_grong rdal gyi mi'am/_yul gyi mi'am/_nor can nam/_tshong dpon nam/_ded dpon gyis pho nya'i lag tu gos kyi rin dag bskur bar gyur la/_de nas pho nya de gos kyi rin de dag khyer nas dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_dge 
[\[124a.7\]]slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig_/khyod la rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po'am/_bram ze'am/_khyim bdag gam/_grong rdal gyi mi'am/_yul gyi mi'am/_nor can nam/_tshong dpon nam/_ded dpon che ge mos gos kyi rin 'di dag bskur gyis/_
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]'phags pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes shig ces zer na dge slong des/_pho nya de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa pho nya dge slong dag ni gos kyi rin dag len du mi rung ste/_bdag cag gos rung ba dus su rnyed na ni len to zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te pho nya des dge slong 
[\[124b.2\]]de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal ta bgyid pa/_'phags pa rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len pa gang lags pa/_'ga' mchis sam zhes zer na dge slong gos 'dod pas pho nya 'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta byed pa ste/_'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta nyams 
[\[124b.3\]]su len pa'o zhes kun dga'i ra ba ba'am/_dge bsnyen zhal ta byed pa bstan par bya'o/_/de nas pho nya des gos kyi rin de dag khyer nas zhal ta byed pa ga la ba der 'gro bar bya zhing phyin nas zhal ta byed pa de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa shes par gyis shig_/
[\[124b.4\]]khyod kyi gos kyi rin 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs dang de la gos rung ba dus su skon cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de nas pho nya des zhal ta byed pa de la shin tu legs par yang dag par bsgo zhing yang dag par bstan nas/_dge slong 
[\[124b.5\]]de ga la ba der 'gro bar bya zhing phyin nas/_dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pas zhal ta bgyid pa bstan pa gang lags pa de la bdag gis yang dag par bstan lags kyis de'i gan du bzhud cig dang /_des khyod la gos rung ba dus su skon par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[124b.6\]]dge slong gos 'dod pas zhal ta byed pa'i gan du song la tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag gos 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag gos 'dod do zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul bar bya/_dran par bya'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul zhing dran par 
[\[124b.7\]]byas pa na gal te gos de grub na de lta na legs/_gal te ma grub na lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdad par bya'o/_/lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdad pa na/_gal te gos de grub na de lta na legs/_gal te 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ma grub na de'i 'og tu gos bsgrub pa'i phyir brtsal te/_gos grub pa na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/gal te ma grub na phyogs gang nas gos kyi rin de dag 'ongs pa der bdag 'gro bar bya'o/_/yang yid brtan pa'i pho nyas tshe dang ldan pa dag gis dge slong 
[\[125a.2\]]che ge mo'i phyir gos kyi rin gang dag bskur ba de dag ni dge slong de'i don ci yang ma grub kyis/_shes par gyis shig tshe dang ldan pa dag gis rang gi nor chud ma gzan cig ces spring bar bya ste/_de la de ni cho ga yin no/_/dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni/_shAkya'i bu nye 
[\[125a.3\]]dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rgyal po'am zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_bud med rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur na de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba yin la/_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs 
[\[125a.4\]]dang /_dmangs rigs dag rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur na de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba yin no/_/blon po chen po'am zhes bya ba ni rgyal po las gzhan pa blon po dang /_rtsis mkhan dang /_sna chen po la gtogs pa rgyal srid
