[\[125a.5\]]byed pa gsang tshig mthun pas 'tsho ba gang dag rgyal po la brten nas 'tsho bar byed pa dag go/_/bram ze'am zhes bya ba ni bram ze gtsang sbra can no/_/khyim bdag gam zhes bya ba ni phyug pa'o/_/grong rdal gyi mi'am zhes bya ba ni grong khyer gyi mi'o/_/yul gyi mi'am zhes 
[\[125a.6\]]bya ba ni yul mi'o/_/nor can nam zhes bya ba ni nor byed pas phyug pa'o/_/tshong dpon nam zhes bya ba ni cod pan bcings pa'o/_/ded dpon gyis zhes bya ba ni gang gis lan gnyis sam gsum don mthun 'das par gyur pas so/_/pho nya'i lag tu zhes bya ba ni skyes pa 
[\[125a.7\]]dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning gi'o/_/gos kyi rin dag ces bya ba ni gser ram dngul dag go/_/zer na zhes bya ba ni smra na'o/_/gos rung ba zhes bya ba ni spyad bzod pa'o/_/dge slong gos 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o/_/kun dga'i ra ba pa 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]zhes bya ba ni rung ba byed pa'o/_/dge bsnyen zhes bya ba ni gsum la skyabs su song ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs pa'o/_/phyogs su zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi po dag tu ste/_phyogs bzhi po dag gang zhe na/_'bod gnas dang /_khyim gnas dang /_las kyi mtha' dang /_
[\[125b.2\]]las kyi gnas dag go/_/'bod gnas ni rdza mkhan gyi gnas dang /_'dreg mkhan gyi gnas dang /_khyim gnas ni khyim mam chu'i gnas so/_/las kyi mtha' ni bu ram shing gi las kyi mtha' dang /_sA lu'i las kyi mtha' dang /_lan tshwa'i las kyi mtha' dag go/_/
[\[125b.3\]]las kyi gnas ni tshong khang dang tshong rdal lo/_/cang mi smra bar bsdad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag gis te/_bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag gang zhe na/_khyod 'ongs sam zhes zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /_'ongs pa legs so zhes zer ba la 
[\[125b.4\]]de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /_stan 'di la 'dug shig ces zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /_rkang pa khrus shig ces zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /_bca' ba dang bza' ba zo shig ces zer ba la de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang /_btung ba 'thungs shig ces zer ba la 
[\[125b.5\]]de'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o/_/bskul ba'i sgo drug po de dag ha cang myur ba dang /_thogs pa med par brjod cing de la gzhan gyi tshig gi skabs med par byed na bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag yongs su ma rdzogs par brjod par bya'o/_/bskul ba'i sgo drug po de dag ha cang mi myur 
[\[125b.6\]]ba dang /_thogs pa dang bcas par rjod par byed cing de la gzhan gyi tshig gi skabs yod par byed na/_bskul ba'i sgo drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og rol du'o/_/gos grub na zhes bya ba ni thob na'o/_/spang ba'i 
[\[125b.7\]]ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ste des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gal te ma grub na phyogs gang nas gos kyi rin de dag 'ongs pa der bdag 'gro bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid 'gro bar bya'o/_/yang 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]na yid bstan pa'i pho nya las zhes bya ba ni lhan cig gnas pa'am nye gnas las so/_/de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni de la de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_gal te zhal ta byed pa de dge slong de'i 
[\[126a.2\]]gan du 'ongs nas 'di skad ces 'phags pa gos 'di dag bzhes shig ces zer na dge slong des zhal ta byed pa de la 'di skad ces bdag gis 'di dag spangs zin gyis song la de nyid la byin cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/gal te zhal ta byed pa de dge slong de la 'di skad ces 
[\[126a.3\]]'phags pa bdag gis de'i sems bsdu ba rjes su bsgrub kyis bzhes shig ces zer na blang bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]de lta bu ma byas par gang cung zad len na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mi ma yin pas sbyin par byed cing mi ma yin pa'i pho nya dang /_mi ma yin pas 
[\[126a.4\]]rung bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mi ma yin pas sbyin par byed cing mi ma yin pa'i pho nya dang /_mis rung bar byed na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mi ma yin pas sbyin par byed cing mi'i pho nya dang /_mi ma yin pas rung bar byed na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mis sbyin par byed cing mi ma yin pa'i pho nya dang /_
[\[126a.5\]]mi ma yin pas rung bar byed na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mis sbyin par byed cing mi'i pho nya dang /_mi ma yin pas rung bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mis sbyin par byed cing mi ma yin pa'i pho nya dang /_mis rung bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mi ma yin 
[\[126a.6\]]pas sbyin par byed cing /_mi'i pho nya dang /_mis rung bar byed na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mis sbyin par byed cing mi'i pho nya dang /_mis rung bar byed na ni spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la 
[\[126a.7\]]ltung ba ma bshags par gos gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gos gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la/_ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi gos spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba bshags nas gos gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ltung 
[\[126b.2\]]ba med do/_/de bzhin du dge slong gis ji srid du gzhi des ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par lhung bzed dam/_chos gos sam/_dra ba'am/_phor bu'am/_ska rags sam/_dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba nye bar 'jog na de yang spang bar 'gyur ro/_/las dang po 
[\[126b.3\]]pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bskur ba'i spang ba ste bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom la/_srin bal 'ba' zhig cha gnyis dang /_/drug dang mtho gang lam dang ni/_/'khru ba dang ni 
[\[126b.4\]]gser dngul dang /_/mngon mtshan can dang nyo 'tshong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong dag srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_byed du 'jud de/_dge 
[\[126b.5\]]slong dag srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_byed du 'jud pa na srin bal dkon zhing rin che bas bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur cing /_lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas kyang 
[\[126b.6\]]gtong bar byed/_srin bal 'dod pa dang /_srin bal gyi don nyid du 'ongs pa dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la yang dang yang du rig par byed nas/_gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni srog gcod par byed pa dag ste/_srog 
[\[126b.7\]]gcod pa las ma log ma spangs so sor ma spangs pas des na srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_byed du 'jud de/_de dag srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_byed du 'jud pas srin bal 'byung ba'i srin bu srog chags mang po'i tshogs bsgrub shing srog gcod par 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]byed de/_su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[127a.2\]]kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[127a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyod srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_gso dka' ba dang /_dgang dka' 
[\[127a.4\]]ba rnam par smad par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_gso sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_phreng ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes pa dang /_drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa 
[\[127a.5\]]brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul 
[\[127a.6\]]ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/srin bal gyi stan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te/_nang tshangs can dang /_rlings pa ste/_don 
[\[127a.7\]]'dir ni gnyis ka yin par dgongs so/_/sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te/_gsar pas sar pa dang /_rnyed pas sar pa ste/_don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so/_/byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan byed du 'jud na'o/_/spang ba'i 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_chun po dang /_'da' ba dang /_phung po las te/_dge slong gis srin bal dag gi chun po 
[\[127b.2\]]'byed par byed/_'jig par byed/_rmel bar byed cing ji srid du stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_stan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis srin bal dag gi 'da' bar 'byed par byed/_'jig par byed/_rmel bar byed cing 
[\[127b.3\]]ji srid du stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_stan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis srin bal dag gi phung po 'byed par byed/_'jig par byed/_rmel bar byed cing ji srid du stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_stan 
[\[127b.4\]]byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis srin bal dag gi chun po dang 'da' ba dang /_chun po dang /_phung po dang /_'da' ba dang /_chun po dang /_'da' ba dang /_phung po dang /_phung po dang /_chun po dang /_phung po dang /_'da' ba dang /_chun po 
[\[127b.5\]]dang /_'da' ba dang /_phung po 'byed par byed/_'jig par byed/_rmel bar byed cing ji srid du stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_stan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/byas zin pa rnyed pa dang /_byas zin pa la yongs su longs spyod pa dang /_
[\[127b.6\]]rnying pa mngon par 'du byed pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/sril bal gyi spang ba ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[127b.7\]]mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong dag lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_byed du 'jud de/_dge slong dag lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_byed 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]du 'jud pa na lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig dkon zhing rin che bas bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur cing /_lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong 
[\[128a.2\]]bar byed/_lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang /_lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi don nyid du 'ongs pa dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la yang dang yang du rig par byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir/_dge slong dag lug gi bal nag po 'ba' 
[\[128a.3\]]zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_byed du 'jud de/_dge slong dag lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_byed du 'jud pa na lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig dkon zhing rin che bas bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur cing /_lung mnod pa dang /_bklag 
[\[128a.4\]]pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong bar byed/_lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang /_lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi don nyid du 'ongs pa dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la yang dang 
[\[128a.5\]]yang du rig par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu 
[\[128a.6\]]ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed lug bal 
[\[128a.7\]]nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_gso dka' ba dang /_dgang dka' ba rnam par smad par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_gso sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_phri ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes pa dang /_drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan 
[\[128b.2\]]yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang lug bal nag 
[\[128b.3\]]po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/lug bal zhes bya ba ni lug gi bal lo/_/nag po 'ba' zhig gi zhes bya ba ni nag po bzhi ste/_rang bzhin gyis gnag pa dang /_sngo bas gnag pa dang /_'dam kha 
[\[128b.4\]]dang /_kham pa'o/_/stan zhes bya ni stan gnyis te/_nang tshangs can dang /_rlings pa ste/_don 'dir ni rlings pa yin par dgongs so/_/sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te/_gsar pas sar pa dang /_rnyed pas sar pa ste/_don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa 
[\[128b.5\]]yin par dgongs so/_/byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam/_gzhan byed du 'jud na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 
[\[128b.6\]]'gyur zhe na/_chun po dang /_'da' ba dang /_phung po las te/_dge slong gis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig dag gi chun po 'byed par byed/_'jig par byed/_rmel bar byed cing ji srid du stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_stan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed 
[\[128b.7\]]du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig dag gi 'da' ba 'byed par byed/_'jig par byed/_rmel bar byed cing ji srid du stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_stan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lug bal nag 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]po 'ba' zhig dag gi phung po 'byed par byed/_'jig par byed/_rmel bar byed cing ji srid du stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_stan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig dag gi 
[\[129a.2\]]chun po dang /_'da' ba dang /_chun po dang /_phung po dang /_'da' ba dang /_chun po dang /_'da' ba dang /_phung po dang /_phung po dang /_chun po dang /_phung po dang /_'da' ba dang /_chun po dang /_'da' ba dang /_phung po 'byed par byed/_'jig par byed 
[\[129a.3\]]rmel bar byed cing ji srid du stan mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_stan byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/byas zin pa rnyed pa dang /_byas zin pa la yongs su longs spyod pa dang /_rnyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa 
[\[129a.4\]]dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi spang ba ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[129a.5\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lug gi bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa mi bya'o zhes gsungs pas/_de dag bal dkar po dang /_mkhob bal cung zhig bcug nas lug gi bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_
[\[129a.6\]]byed du 'jud de/_des kyang de dag bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur cing lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong bar byed do/_/de 'dod pa dang /_de'i don nyid du 'ongs 
[\[129a.7\]]pa dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la yang dang yang du rig par byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag bal dkar po dang /_mkhob bal cung zhig bcug nas lug gi bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_byed du 'jud de/_des 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]kyang bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur cing /_lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong bar byed/_de 'dod pa dang /_de'i don nyid du 'ongs pa dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[129b.2\]]rnams la yang dang yang du rig par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi 
[\[129b.3\]]dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_
[\[129b.4\]]dge slong dag khyed cag ngas dge slong gis lug gi bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa mi bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pas bal dkar po dang /_mkhob bal cung zhig bcug nas lug gi bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed pa dang /_byed du 'jud pa bden nam/_
[\[129b.5\]]btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_gso dka' ba dang /_dgang dka' ba rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_gso sla ba 
[\[129b.6\]]dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_phreng ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes pa dang /_drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul 
[\[129b.7\]]ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na cha gnyis ni lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las gzhug 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]par bya/_gsum pa ni dkar po las/_bzhi pa ni mkhob bal las gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las ma bcug gam/_gsum pa ni dkar po las/_bzhi pa ni mkhob bal las ma bcug par stan sar pa 
[\[130a.2\]]byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/stan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te/_nang tshangs can dang /_rlings pa ste/_don 'dir ni rlings pa yin par dgongs so/_/sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te/_gsar pas sar pa dang /_rnyed 
[\[130a.3\]]pas sar pa ste/_don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so/_/byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam/_gzhan byed du 'jud na'o/_/cha gnyis ni lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las gzhug par bya zhes bya ba la/_lug bal zhes bya ba ni lug gi bal lo/_/
[\[130a.4\]]nag po 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni nag po bzhi ste/_rang bzhin gyis gnag pa dang /_sngo bas gnag pa dang /_'dam kha dang /_kham pa'o/_/gsum pa ni dkar po las zhes bya ba las dkar po zhes bya ba ni glo'i bal dang /_rgyab kyi bal dang /_gnya' ba'i bal lo/_/bzhi 
[\[130a.5\]]pa ni mkhob bal las gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba la/_mkhob bal zhes bya ba ni rkang pa'i bal dang /_mgo'i bal dang /_lto'i bal lo/_/ma bcug ces bya ba ni ma bsres par ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags 
[\[130a.6\]]par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis stan srang bcu pa byed na de lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las srang lnga dang /_dkar po las srang phyed dang gsum dang /_mkhob bal las srang phyed dang gsum 
[\[130a.7\]]gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las ma bcug gam/_gsum pa dkar po las/_bzhi pa mkhob bal las ma bcug par stan sar pa byed na stan zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/srang bcu pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]dge slong gis stan srang nyi shu pa dang /_srang sum bcu pa dang /_srang bzhi bcu pa dang /_srang lnga bcu pa byed na des lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las srang nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /_dkar po las srang phyed dang bcu gsum dang /_mkhob bal las srang phyed dang bcu gsum 
[\[130b.2\]]gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las ma bcug gam/_gsum pa dkar po las bzhi pa mkhob bal las ma bcug par stan sar pa byed na/_stan zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dkar po 
[\[130b.3\]]dang /_mkhob bal las srang gcig gam/_srang phyed phri ste/_lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las stan sar pa byed na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nag po 'ba' zhig mod pa dang /_rin mnyam pa dang /_dkar po dang /_mkhob bal dkon pa dang /_
[\[130b.4\]]rin che bar gyur na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/cha gnyis bsres pa'i spang ba ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 
[\[130b.5\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong rnams la stan mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te/_de dag stan 'di ni ha cang [{]rings so[,]ring ngo [}]/_/'di ni ha cang thungs so zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud do/_/stan 'di ni ha cang dog 
[\[130b.6\]]go/_/'di ni ha cang yangs so/_/'di ni thams cad kyi thams cad du bug rdol dang /_sha zad pa dang /_bcos dka' ba nyid yin no zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud pas/_dge slong de dag stan byas shing byas shing 'dor ba na bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur cing /_
[\[130b.7\]]lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir/_dge slong rnams la stan mang ba nyid 'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te/_'di dag stan 'di ni ha cang 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]{]rings so[,]ring ngo [}]/_/'di ni ha cang thungs so/_/zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud/_stan 'di ni ha cang dog go/_/'di ni ha cang yangs so/_/'di ni thams cad kyi thams cad du bug rdol dang /_sha zad pa dang /_bcos dka' ba nyid yin no/_/
[\[131a.2\]]zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud pas/_dge slong 'di dag stan byas shing stan byas shing 'dor ba na bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur cing /_lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas 
[\[131a.3\]]gtong bar byed ces smod par byed/_kha zer bar byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad 
[\[131a.4\]]do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed la stan mang ba nyid 
[\[131a.5\]]'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te/_khyed cag stan 'di ni ha cang [{]rings so[,]ring ngo [}]/_/'di ni ha cang thungs so zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud/_stan 'di ni ha cang dog go/_/'di ni ha cang yangs so/_/'di ni thams cad kyi thams cad du bug rdol dang /_sha zad pa dang /_
[\[131a.6\]]bcos dka' ba dag nyid yin no/_/zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_gso dka' ba dang /_dgang dka' ba rnam par smad par mdzad do/_/
[\[131a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_gso sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_phri ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes pa dang /_drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di 
[\[131b.2\]]ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du stan rnying pa de spangs kyang rung /_ma spangs kyang rung stan sar pa gzhan byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[131b.3\]]kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas na 'brog gi nags na bzhugs so/_/'brog gnas grang zhing rlung che bas dge slong lag gi bla dag lo drug tu stan gyis mi thub pa de dag grang ba dag gis 
[\[131b.4\]]las sar pa dag rgyun bcad par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/_mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa/_mkhyen kyang mi rmed pa/_dus su rmed pa/_dus las yol bar mi rmed pa/_don dang ldan par rmed pa/_don dang 
[\[131b.5\]]mi ldan par mi rmed pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang mi ldan par rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog pa mdzad pa yin no/_/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang ldan par rmed pa la dus mkhyen pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[131b.6\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong lag gi bla dag gis las sar pa dag rgyun bcad par gyur/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o/_/gal 
[\[131b.7\]]te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du stan rnying pa de spangs kyang rung /_ma spangs kyang rung /_stan sar pa gzhan byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas/_dge slong lag gi bla dag dgung lo drug gi bar du 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]stan gyis mi thub pa de dag grang ba dag gis las sar pa dag rgyun bkum par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong lag gi bla gang la lo drug tu stan gyis mi thub pa'i dge slong des dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad 
[\[132a.2\]]du stan gyi gnang ba gsol bar bya'o/_/'di ltar gsol bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur la/_dge slong lag gi bla des bla 
[\[132a.3\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_rgan rims kyis phyag 'tshal nas/_rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lo 
[\[132a.4\]]drug tu stan mi bgyid pa las/_bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba gsol na thugs brtse ba can/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la lo 
[\[132a.5\]]drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas te gsol bar bya'o/_/dge slong de dag gis dge slong lag gi bla de la dad pa'am/_yid ches pas 'gro bar mi bya bar dge 'dun thams cad der 'dong bar bya ba'am/_dge 'dun 
[\[132a.6\]]gyis bskos pa'i dge slong dag btang bar bya zhing de dag stan de rang gi mig sngar bab par bya ba'am/_yang na stan de dge 'dun gyi dbus su dbyung bar bya ste/_gal te stan de ha cang ring ba yin na de dag gis bcad par bya'o/_/gal te ha cang thung ba yin na bal sbyin par 
[\[132a.7\]]bya'o/_/gal te ha cang yangs pa yin na de dag gis bcad par bya'o/_/gal te ha cang dog pa yin na bal sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te ral ba dang rdol ba yin na bal sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te thams cad kyis thams cad du bug rdol ba dang /_sha zad pa dang /_
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]bcos dka' ba nyid yin na de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya ste las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lo drug tu stan mi bgyid pa las dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las lo 
[\[132b.2\]]drug tshun chad du stan gnang bar gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 
[\[132b.3\]]'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lo drug tu stan mi bgyid pa las dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang bar gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 
[\[132b.4\]]'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang bar stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi 
[\[132b.5\]]bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag 
[\[132b.6\]]gi bla gang la lo drug tshun chad du stan gnang ba byin pa des lo drug tshun chad du stan byed du gzhug ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod de/_
[\[132b.7\]]dge slong rnams la yang de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis stan sar pa byed na mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du stan rnying pa de spangs kyang rung /_ma spangs kyang rung /_stan sar pa gzhan 
[\[133a.2\]]byed na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/stan zhes bya ba ni stan gnyis te/_nang tshangs can dang /_rlings pa ste/_don 'dir ni rlings pa yin par dgongs so/_/sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa 
[\[133a.3\]]gnyis te/_gsar pas sar pa dang /_rnyed pas sar pa ste/_don 'dir ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so/_/byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam/_gzhan byed du 'jud na'o/_/mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni lo drug gi 
[\[133a.4\]]mtha' tshun chad du bcang bar bya ba'o/_/gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du zhes bya ba ni de'i mtha' tshun chad do/_/stan rnying pa zhes bya ba ni stan gang yod pa de'o/_/spangs kyang rung /_ma spangs kyang rung stan sar pa gzhan byed na zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o/_/dge 
[\[133a.5\]]'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur 
[\[133a.6\]]zhe na//_//bar sdom la/_gnyis brtsams phyi ma zin pa dang /_/gnyis brtsams snga ma zin pa dang /_/gnyis zin nas ni gcig spong dang /_/gnyis ka brtsams te gtong ba dang /_/lo drug pa la nyes med pa/_/de ni stan gyi bsdu ba yin/_/dge slong 
[\[133a.7\]]gis lo gang la stan rtsom par byed pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa rtsom par byed na gnyis pa rtsom pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_byas zin na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa mi rtsom yang lo gnyis pa dang /_gsum 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lo lnga pa la stan gnyis pa rtsom par byed na gnyis pa rtsom pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_byas zin na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis lo gang la stan rtsom par byed pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa brtsams 
[\[133b.2\]]nas snga ma zin par byed na gnyis pa rtsom pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa brtsams nas zin par mi byed kyang lo gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa la stan gnyis pa brtsams nas 
[\[133b.3\]]snga ma zin par byed na de rtsom pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lo gang la stan byas pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa yang byas nas des snga ma shos byin gyis brlabs te phyi ma shos gtong bar byed dam/_phyi ma shos bzhag ste snga ma 
[\[133b.4\]]shos gtong bar byed na gnyis pa rtsom pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa ma byas kyang lo gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa la stan gnyis pa byas nas des snga ma 
[\[133b.5\]]shos bzhag ste phyi ma shos gtong bar byed dam/_phyi ma shos bzhag ste snga ma shos gtong bar byed na gnyis pa rtsom pa de la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_byas zin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis lo gang la stan rtsom pa'i de nyid la stan 
[\[133b.6\]]gnyis pa yang brtsams nas de ma zin par gtong bar byed dam/_lo gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa la brtsams nas de ma zin par gtong bar byed na de rtsom par byed pa la nyes byas lngar 'gyur la/_snga ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis lo gang 
[\[133b.7\]]la stan byed pa'i lo de nyid la stan gnyis pa mi byed cing lo gnyis pa la yang mi byed/_gsum pa la yang mi byed/_bzhi pa la yang mi byed/_lnga pa la yang mi byed par lo drug pa la byed na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/lo drug tu bcang ba'i spang ba ste bcu bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[134a.2\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba ra na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa de'i tshe na thams cad du yul dbus su sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhes grag go zhes sgra grags so/_/byang lam na tshong pa dag gis yul dbus su 
[\[134a.3\]]sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ste/_gang dag de la mchod pa dag byed pa de dag gi mchod pa byas pa de dag ni shin tu 'bras bu che ba dang /_phan yon che ba dang /_gsal ba che ba dang /_rgya chen por 'gyur ro zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 
[\[134a.4\]]cag zong dag thogs te mnyan yod du 'dong zhing der bdag cag gis khe spogs kyang bsgrub par bya/_bcom ldan 'das la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam du rig nas tshong pa lnga brgya byang lam nas zong dag thogs te yul dbus su 'phags so/_/de dag mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas 
[\[134a.5\]]de dag gis zong mkhos su phab ste/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod do/_/shes ldan dag de bzhin 
[\[134a.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnams ni blta bar bya ba rin po che kho na yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di lta ste/_dper na u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar bltams pa dang /_'byung 
[\[134a.7\]]ba dkon pa yin no/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]ldan 'das tshong pa de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag 
[\[134b.2\]]par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas tshong pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi gtsug lag 
[\[134b.3\]]khang blta bar brtsams pa dang /_tshong pa de dag gis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi mal dag na gding ba dbus rdol ba dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag ci'i phyir dge slong gnas brtan gnas 
[\[134b.4\]]brtan 'di dag gi gding ba dag dbus rdol bar gyur/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni phal cher mtshan mo skyil mo krung gis 'da' bar byed do/_/de dag sems mngon par dad par gyur nas dad pa skyes pa de dag gis dge slong rnams 
[\[134b.5\]]la ras yug chen lnga brgya phul lo/_/dge slong rnams kyis gding ba rnying pa de dag khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang bla gab med pa zhig tu bzhag go/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /_
[\[134b.6\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun ni zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrubs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par sgrub pa mdzad de/_lnga gang zhe na/_
[\[134b.7\]]nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang /_lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang /_nad pa la blta bar bzhed pa dang /_gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o/_/don 'dir ni bcom ldan 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]'das gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pas/_rdzas las byung ba ni bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par sgrub pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[135a.2\]]song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga'i ra ba nas/_kun dga'i ra bar/_gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du/_khang khyim nas khang khyim du/_'chag sa nas 'chag sa dang /_gol bar gshegs shing mthar gyis gshegs pa na khang 
[\[135a.3\]]pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de'i tshe na khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang de na gding ba rnying pa rdol ba dang ral bas rdul gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa rab tu mang po dag sa la bkram zhing 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gding ba rnying pa rdol ba dang /_ral 
[\[135a.4\]]ba sa rdul gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa rab tu mang po dag sa la bkram zhing 'dug pa dag gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang e ma zhes gsung zhing smad nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag dag btsir cing btsir 
[\[135a.5\]]cing sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang /_so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gding ba rnying pa de dag legs par brtul cing sprugs nas 
[\[135a.6\]]bting zhing bskams te rtsig pa la mi reg par mdzad nas/_gtsug lag khang gi slad rol du zhabs gnyis bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de nas dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pas/_bsod snyoms blangs nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[135a.7\]]'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyi bsod snyoms sgrub pa'i dge slong la dge slong las ji ltar zas bsod dam/_dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor kun dga' bar 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]mdzad pa yin pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong bsod snyoms sgrub pa la/_dge slong ji ltar zas bsod dam/_dge slong gi dge 'dun tshim par byas sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar mdzad pa dang /_des gsol pa/_btsun pa te bor zas bsod cing dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[135b.2\]]tshim par bgyis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/_gtsug lag khang gi slad rol du zhabs gnyis bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog gi slad du gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs 
[\[135b.3\]]nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di na ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun song nas ring po ma lon par shes nas lde mig khyer te/_kun dga'i 
[\[135b.4\]]ra ba nas kun dga'i ra bar/_gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du/_khang khyim nas khang khyim du/_'chag sa nas 'chag sar dang /_gol bar song zhing mthar gyis 'gro ba na khang pa chen po'i gtsug lag khang zhig ga la ba der phyin nas ngas khang pa chen po'i gtsug 
[\[135b.5\]]lag khang de na gding ba rnying pa rdol ba dang ral ba sa rdul gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa rab tu mang po dag sa la bkram zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang e ma zhes byas te smad nas 'di snyam du bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag 
[\[135b.6\]]dag btsir cing btsir cing sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag byed pa gang yin pa de la dge slong dag drod mi shes pa dang /_so sor mi rtog par yongs su longs spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs kyis/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dad pas sbyin par bya ba la/_drod ran par yongs 
[\[135b.7\]]su longs spyad pa dang /_spang zhing yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_dus su yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_brtag cing yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_khad kyis yongs su longs spyad na legs so//_//bar sdom la/_drod ran pa dang spang ba dang /_/de 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]bzhin dus dang brtag pa dang /_/khad kyis yongs su spyad pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drod ran pa dang /_spang ba dang /_dus dang /_brtag pa dang /_khad kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' 
[\[136a.2\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya 
[\[136a.3\]]ste/_dge slong gis gding ba sar pa byed na sar pa bya kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas glan par bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 
[\[136a.4\]]'khor bas ma glan par gding ba sar pa spyod na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/gding ba zhes bya ba ni so sor gding ba'o/_/sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te/_gsar pas sar pa dang /_rnyed pas sar pa ste/_don 'dir 
[\[136a.5\]]ni gsar pas sar pa yin par dgongs so/_/byed na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam/_gzhan byed du 'jug na'o/_/sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sar pa sra bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas 
[\[136a.6\]]glan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te de la gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor ba gzhan yod na'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru'i khru phyed dang do yod do/_/'khor bas 
[\[136a.7\]]zhes bya ba ni kun nas mtho re yod pas so/_/glan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyar bar bya ba'o/_/ma glan par zhes bya ba ni ma sbyar bar ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas ma glan par ji tsam cung zad du gding ba sar pa spyod par byed na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gding ba rnying pa thams cad kyi thams cad du sha zad 
[\[136b.2\]]pa dang /_bug rdol du gyur pa dang /_bcos su mi rung ba yin na ltung ba med do/_/de tsam med na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/mtho gang gi spang ba ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa rdzogs 
[\[136b.3\]{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni rkang pa spre'u'i zhag gis bskus te 'gro na yang 'gro 
[\[136b.4\]]bar chas pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed/_'ong na yang blo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/yu bu cag ni khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dong /_gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa 'thob pa dang /_
[\[136b.5\]]skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyis yu bu cag kyang 'dong ngo /_/gang du 'dong /_gang du don mthun 'grub par ro/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_gal te thams cad dong bar 'gyur na bdag cag gi nye bar spyod pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 
[\[136b.6\]]lhung bzed nag po can dag gis rjes su 'jug par byed par 'gyur gyis/_bdag cag gis gcig bzhag ste 'dong bar bya na su bzhag par bya/_btsun pa 'char ka'o/_/btsun pa 'char ka khyod 'di nyid du 'dug shig_/kho bo cag 'dong bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gyis shig ces 
[\[136b.7\]]'char ka de nyid du 'dug go/_/lnga po dag gis don mthun btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis bal yul du 'gro ba'i don mthun mthong nas/_de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag khyed gang du 'phags/_'phags pa dag bal yul du'o/_/bzhin 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag kho bo cag kyang khyed dang lhan cig 'dong ngo /_/'phags pa dag bal yul ni rnga mo'i rgyab 'dra ba lags pas/_khyed cag der dgyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gal te de lta bu yin du zin kyang /_yul mthong bar 'gyur bas 
[\[137a.2\]]'dong bar bya'o/_/'phags pa dag gal te de lta na tshur spyon bzhud do/_/drug sde dag don mthun de dag dang lhan cig bal yul du 'phags nas mthar gyis bal yul du phyin pa dang /_nyi ma gang kho na la bal yul du phyin pa'i nyi ma de nyid la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur nas de 
[\[137a.3\]]dag nang par sngar langs te lam srang du dong ba dang /_tshong pa dag gis drug sde dag mthong nas de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa dag bal yul ci 'dra/_khyed cag mngon par mi dgyes par ma gyur tam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag nyi ma gang kho na la bal yul 
[\[137a.4\]]du phyin pa'i nyi ma de nyid la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur to/_/'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed la dang po kho na nas bal yul ni rnga mo'i rgyab 'dra ba lags pas/_khyed cag der dgyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes ma bgyis sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag ci de lta na 'gro'am 'dong 
[\[137a.5\]]ngo /_/'phags pa dag bdag cag gis zong ma bsgyur de de lta lags mod kyi 'on kyang bdag cag dang bshes pa'i tshong pa gzhan dag mchis pa de dag gis zong bsgyur bas de dag la gtad par bgyis de dag dang thabs cig bzhud cig_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_de ma nongs 
[\[137a.6\]]kyis de bzhin bgyi'o/_/bal yul na bal dang ldong ros gnyis mod pas don mthun de dag gis bal gyis shing rta bkang ste chas pa dang /_drug sde dag kyang don mthun de dang lhan cig 'phags so/_/drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni rdul gyis 'jigs pas yang na ni don 
[\[137a.7\]]mthun gyi mdun du 'gro/_yang na ni phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bas de dag don mthun gyi phyi bzhin 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na tshong pa de dag gi shing rta'i srog shing chag nas tshong pa de dag gis bsams pa/_gal te shing rta'i srog shing bcos na sgras chom rkun pa dag 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]'ong bar 'gyur zhing de dag gis dang por bdag cag bsad par 'gyur la de'i 'og tu nor yang phrogs par 'gyur gyis/_bdag cag gis gces pa dag khyer te 'dong ngo snyam nas yid mi dga' zhing 'khod pa dang /_drug sde dag lhags nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i 
[\[137b.2\]]phyir yid mi dga' zhing 'khod/_'phags pa dag shing rta'i srog shing chag ste gal te shing rta'i srog shing bcos na sgras chom rkun pa dag mchis par 'gyur zhing de dag gis dang por bdag cag bkum par 'gyur la/_de'i 'og tu nor yang phrogs par 'gyur bas bdag cag gis 
[\[137b.3\]]gces pa dag 'tshal de mchi'o snyam nas yid mi dga' zhing mchis so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag khyod kyis bal dag yongs su btang ngam/_yongs su btang ngo /_/gal te khyed cag la mi gnod na zhwa dang /_lham sgrog gu can dang /_stod kor nang tshangs can dang /_rgya 
[\[137b.4\]]cang dang /_lcag pod dang /_shur bu phre'u la sogs pa'i don du cung zhig bskur ro/_/'phags pa dag bdag cag la 'dis ci bgyi/_thams cad snoms shig_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' phyag dar khrod pa rnyed do zhes de dag gis lnga car gyi lhung 
[\[137b.5\]]bzed dang chos gos dag gcig gis bskur nas/_mi bzhis de nyid las thag pa bkal de khur bo che ba bzhi drags nas/_de dag gis de khur te dong ngo /_/de dag gis khur de dag khyer te 'phags pa dang /_tshong pa de dag gis drug sde dag bal gyi khur blangs te phyi bzhin 
[\[137b.6\]]'ongs pa mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gis gla mi dag khrid de mchi'o snyam du bsams nas/_khyed cag gis bal 'di thams cad bsnams de byon gyis 'phags pa dag la gla gsol lo/_/bkren pa dag kho bo cag khyod kyi gla mi dag yin nam/_
[\[137b.7\]]'phags pa dag mad kyang bzhad gad bgyi'o/_/don mthun de'i nang na mu stegs can dag cig 'dong ba de dag gis smras pa/_kye ma drug sde dag khyed cag gang du khur 'jig par 'gyur/_gang du rnyed pa 'grub par 'gyur/_khyod kyi ma'i lto dral te der khur 'jig par 'gyur 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]zhing der rnyed pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' gal te don mthun dang lhan cig 'dong na tho 'tsham pa mang du 'byung gis don mthun gyi mdun du 'dong ngo zhes de dag don mthun gyi mdun du 'phags te dong ba dang /_ri brags shig 
[\[138a.2\]]na chom rkun pa gcad pa'i phyir yang rgod kyi mi mang po bkod cing 'khod pa de dag gis de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang nyam nga bar gyur nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag glang po che dang bcas pa'i dmag byung ngo zhes ri brags pa de dag thams cad skrag 
[\[138a.3\]]nas nags khrod du byer ro/_/de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/_'di dag ni glang po che dang bcas pa'i dmag ma yin gyi 'di ltar rnga mo dag cig 'ong ba yin no/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_'di dag ni rnga mo ma yin gyi 'di ltar glang dag cig yin no/_/kha cig 
[\[138a.4\]]gis smras pa/_'di dag ni glang ma yin gyi 'di dag ni khur thogs pa dag cig yin no/_/de dag thag nye bar gyur pa dang /_yang rgod de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag 'di lta bu'i khur dag thogs pas de'i phyir ri brags pa thams cad skrag ste nags 
[\[138a.5\]]khrod du byer ro/_/bkren pa dag gal te chom rkun pa dag gis khyed cag de dag bred ngas par shes par gyur na nyin mo'i nyi ma kho na la yang bcings te nags khrod du khrid par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo nye dga' gal te lam du 'dong na tho 'tsham pa mang du 'byung gis lam gol bar 
[\[138a.6\]]'dong ngo /_/zhes de dag lam gol bar zhugs te dong ba dang /_sho gam pa dag gis tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba bsgugs pa'i phyir 'ge gu pa'i mi mang po dag bkod cing 'khod pa de dag gis de dag mthong nas smras pa/_e ma'o tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag ci'i phyir 
[\[138a.7\]]sho gam dral te 'dong /_bkren pa dag kho bo cag khyed kyi tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag yin nam/_khyed cag su yin/_'phags pa drug sde dag yin no/_/bzhud cig de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' gal te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo nas zhugs na 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]lhung bzed nag po can dag las tho 'tsham pa mang du 'byung gis sge'u chung nas 'jug par bya'o zhes de dag sge'u chung nas zhugs pa dang /_rgan zhugs zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa/_e ma'o khur tsa ba dag ci'i phyir grong dral te 'jug par byed/_rgan zhugs kho bo cag 
[\[138b.2\]]khyod kyi khur tsa ba dag yin nam/_des smras pa khyed su yin/_tshe dang ldan pa drug sde dag yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag byon pa legs so byon pa legs so/_/de dag nang du zhugs nas de dag gi bal gyi khur de dag bshig pa dang /_ri rab kyi rnam pa 'dra ba'i phung po chen 
[\[138b.3\]]por rnam par gnas so/_/de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag khur 'di lta bu dag thogs nas khyed la tho 'tsham pa dag mi 'byung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed ci kho bo cag gis bza' ba kho na'i phyir kha mngon par bsgrubs sam/_gang 
[\[138b.4\]]kho bo cag la tho 'tsham par byed pa de la kho bo cag gis kyang nyis gyur sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong dag don nyung ba dag ci'i phyir/_dge slong dag yan lag gang gis ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis khengs par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha 
[\[138b.5\]]zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[138b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/_btsun pa 
[\[138b.7\]]mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]grangs du mas rnam par smad pa mdzad nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma 
[\[139a.2\]]bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong lam du zhugs pas lug bal dag rnyed la 'dod na dge slong des blang bar bya'o/_/blangs nas khyer ba med na dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du bdag nyid kyis bkur 
[\[139a.3\]]bar bya'o/_/de las 'das par khyer na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag gam/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/lam du zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni/_dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pas so/_/lug bal dag ces bya ba ni lug gi bal 
[\[139a.4\]]dag go/_/rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so/_/'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o/_/dge slong des blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni mnod par bya ba'o/_/blangs nas khyer ba med na zhes bya ba ni rung ba byed pa med na'o/_/dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du zhes bya ba ni 
[\[139a.5\]]dpag tshad gsum gyi mthar thug pa'i bar tshun chad du'o/_/bdag nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni bdag rang gis bkur bar bya ba'o/_/de las 'das par khyer na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar khyer na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs 
[\[139a.6\]]nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis lug bal dag rnyed la khyer ba med na bdag nyid kyis dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha' las 'das par khyer na rgyang grags phyed 
[\[139a.7\]]du phyin na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rgyang grags kyi mthar phyin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/khyer ba yod bzhin du bdag nyid kyis khyer na rtsom pa'i dus kho na na nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rgyang grags phyed du phyin na nyes byas su gzhan gcig tu 'gyur/_rgyang grags 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]kyi mthar phyin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/rdul phra rab drug la rdul phra mo gcig go/_/rdul phra mo drug la chu rdul gcig go/_/chu rdul drug la lcag rdul gcig go/_/lcag rdul drug la ri bong gi rdul gcig go/_/ri bong rdul drug la lug rdul gcig go/_/lug 
[\[139b.2\]]rdul drug la glang rdul gcig go/_/glang rdul drug la nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go/_/nyi zer gyi rdul drug la sro ma gcig go/_/sro ma drug la shig gcig go/_/shig drug la nas gcig go/_/nas drug la sor gcig go/_/sor bzhi drug la khru gang ngo /_/khru phyed dang 
[\[139b.3\]]bzhi la mi'i srid do/_/khru bzhi la gzhu'o/_/gzhu lnga brgya la rgyang grags gcig go/_/rgyang grags brgyad la dpag tshad gcig go/_/de la dge slong dgon pa pa lam du zhugs pas lug bal dag rnyed la/_de blangs te khyer ba med na rgyang grags kyis chod pa'i grong bdun po 
[\[139b.4\]]dag gi grong phyed du ni nyes byas su 'gyur la/_grong gi mthar ni spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/grong nas dgon pa'i lam du 'jug na rgyang grags phyed phyed du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rgyang grags re rer spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/zhwa dang /_lham sgrog gu can dang /_
[\[139b.5\]]stod kor nang tshangs can dang /_rgya cang dang /_lcag pod dang /_shur bu phre'u la sogs pa'i don du de tsam dag khyer ba la ni ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bal thogs 
[\[139b.6\]]pa'i spang ba ste bcu drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' ba la bgo bar bya'o/_/cha dur bya de dag gis 
[\[139b.7\]]smras pa/_bdag cag gis btsun pa 'char ka 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug pa la ci'i phyir skal ba sbyin/_cha lngar bya'o/_/'char kas thos nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis der rnyed pa gang grub pa de yang khyed kyis gyis shig_/kho bo 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]pas rnyed pa gang grub pa de yang kho bo nyid kyir bya'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa 'di 'di na 'dug 'dug pas rnyed pa mang po grub gor ma chag snyam nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag dus thams cad du drug sde yin na da ci'i phyir lnga sder 'gyur 
[\[140a.2\]]bar bya/_cha drug kho nar bya'o su dgod du gzhug_/btsun pa 'char ka ma dub pa yin gyis de 'god du gzhug go/_/'char kas cha drug tu byas te bdag nyid kyi skal ba rang gi gnas khang du bcug ste bzhag go/_/de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka khyod kyis rnyed 
[\[140a.3\]]pa gang grub pa de khyer shog bgo'o/_/'char kas smras pa/_kho bos de'i bar du ka ka Ni gcig tsam yang ma rnyed do/_/khyod kyis kho bo cag bslus so/_/'char kas bsams pa/_bdag gis bal nyung ngu ma zhig rnyed pa 'di su rmel du gzhug_/gal te khyim pa dag 
[\[140a.4\]]la bcol na ni de dag bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs pa yin pas thams cad brkus par 'gyur ro/_/gal te bcu gnyis sde dag la bcol na ni bca' ba'i rin du 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/chos byin la bcol yang chos byin ni mdo sde'i mtha' pa yin la/_'khor yang mdo 
[\[140a.5\]]sde'i mtha' pa dang ldan pa yin pas mdo sde'i tshig dag sems pa na dus 'gyangs par 'gyur ro/_/gau ta mI skem mo la bcol du yang gau ta mI skem mo ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin la/_de'i 'khor yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ldan pa yin pas de 'di ni ltung ba yin no/_/'di ni ltung 
[\[140a.6\]]ba ma yin no zhes sems pa na dus 'gyangs par 'gyur ro/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ni spong ba ma yin la/_'khor yang spong ba pa dang ldan pas des sems rtse gcig tu 'jog pa la bal rmel ba mi gnod kyis bdag gis de la bal rmel du bcol lo snyam nas/_
[\[140a.7\]]de de snyam sems zhing 'dug pa na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs pa de tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas smras pa/_gau ta mIs bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub ste/_
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]de yang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bka' stsal pa de legs par gsungs pa yin te/_da gzod kho na bdag kye ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'ongs na ci ma rung snyam pa'i blo skyes na khyod kyang 'dir 'ongs so/_/bdag gis bal nyung zhig rnyed pa de khyed kyis rmel du chug ste 
[\[140b.2\]]byin cig_/'phags pa bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te slar mchis nas dge slong ma gnyis btang gis de gnyis la bskur bar stsol cig_/'char kas bal de dag gzar thag gis bam po gnyis su dam du rab tu bcings te sgo glegs kyi phag tu bzhag go/_/de 
[\[140b.3\]]nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_dbyar khang du son nas des de'i gan du dge slong ma gnyis btang ste/_'phags pa 'char ka'i gan du deng la bal de bskur du stsol zhes gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/de gnyis dong ste smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[140b.4\]]gau ta mI'i mchid nas bal de bskur du gsol zhes mchi'o/_/'char kas de gnyis la smras pa/_sgo glegs kyi phag na bam po gnyis 'dug pa de gnyis khyer la deng shig_/de gnyis gnas khang du zhugs te 'degs par brtsams pa dang /_bsgul ba tsam du yang ma nus nas 
[\[140b.5\]]de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags pa ci 'dir rang thag gi gor ma dag stsal tam/_gzhon nu ma gnyis ci khyed gnyis gzhon nu ma gta' gam pa yin nam/_zhes des the'u chung gis bteg ste gcig ni gcig gi mgor bskur/_gcig ni gcig gi rked du bskur ro/_/de 
[\[140b.6\]]gnyis mgo chag la thug go/_/rked pa chag la thug go zhes zer zhing dbyar khang du dong nas khur sa la bzhag ste khri steng du sgyel cing 'dug go/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis de gnyis la smras pa/_khyed gnyis gzhon nu ma gta' gam pa yin nam/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyed 
[\[140b.7\]]cag las stobs dang ldan pa gang yin pa des je 'di theg shig_/de dag gis de 'degs par brtsams pa dang /_bsgul ba tsam du yang ma nus nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags ma gnyis ci 'dir rang thag gi rdo dag bcug gam zhes de dag gis bam po de gnyis bshig 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]pa dang ji tsam na phung po chen por rnam par gnas par gyur to/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis rta gad kyis btab ste smras pa/_'phags pa 'char ka na re bal cung zhig zer na gal te mang bar gyur na ji lta bur 'gyur/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs smras pa/_
[\[141a.2\]]nu mo dag mgo bregs shing mchan khung ral bu can dag yin na god du ci yod/_'phags pa 'char ka'i mchid nas bal nyung zhig ces mchi na gal te mang bar gyur na ji lta bur 'gyur/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs smras pa/_nu mo dag de dag ni gnas ngan len kun 
[\[141a.3\]]tu spyod pa dag yin pas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'drums pa ltung bas ltung bar byed do/_/nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gnyis ni skyes bu dam pa yin te/_khur ma blangs pa mi len pa gang yin pa dang /_khur blangs pa mthar phyin par byed pa gang 
[\[141a.4\]]yin pa'o zhes gsungs pas/_'di ni khur blangs pa yin pas mthar phyin par bya dgos kyis/_khyed cag las gang gis ji tsam rmel bar spro ba de tsam rmel la de'i gen du khyer te byin cig_/de dag yun ring du thogs pa dang 'char kas bsams pa/_de dag gis bal de 
[\[141a.5\]]bca' ba'i rin du bzhag gor ma chag_/bdag gis ma legs pa zhig byas te bdag gis bal de ni char pas 'jigs pas gang la khar bzhag pa dang 'dra bar gyur to snyam mo/_/dge slong ma gnyis kyis bal khal cig rmel te khyer te 'ongs nas smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[141a.6\]]'char ka bal dag 'tshal te mchis na gang du gzhag par bgyi/_'char kas bsams pa/_da dung spyod yul lhag ma dang bcas pa yin no snyam nas smras pa/_gnas khang du chug ste zhog shig_/de gnyis kyis bzhag ste song ba dang /_gzhan dag gis kyang khyer te 'ongs 
[\[141a.7\]]so/_/ji tsam na thams cad kyis kyang khyer te 'ongs so/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/de'i tshe na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]mI'i lag pa gnyis 'di lta ste/_dper na btso blag mkhan gyi lag pa dmar ba ltar dmar ba dang shin tu dmar bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gau ta mI ci'i phyir khyod kyi lag pa gnyis 'di lta 
[\[141b.2\]]ste/_dper na btso blag mkhan gyi lag pa dmar ba ltar dmar ba dang shin tu dmar bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das 'di na bgyi ba gzhan lags na gzhan bgyid do/_/ji ltar gyur/_'phags pa 'char kas bdag bal rmel du stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe 
[\[141b.3\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal dag rmel du 'jud dam/_btsun pa rmel du stsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong 
[\[141b.4\]]gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char 
[\[141b.5\]]ka khyod dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal dag rmel du 'jud pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba 
[\[141b.6\]]ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' 
[\[141b.7\]]bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal 'khrur 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud dam/_rmel du 'jud na spang ba'i 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang mes po dang /_phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/_
[\[142a.2\]]de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/_/lug bal zhes bya ba ni lug gi bal lo/_/'khrur 'jud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na chur snyug pa byed du 'jud na'o/_/'tshed du 'jud dam zhes bya ba ni tha na tshon du snyug pa byed du 'jud na'o/_/rmel du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni tha na 'da' ba byed du 'jud 
[\[142a.3\]]na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes 
[\[142a.4\]]pas lug bal dag 'khrur 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'tshed du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/rmel du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/_'tshed 
[\[142a.5\]]du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/_rmel du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_rmel du 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang /_rmel du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[142a.6\]]gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas lug bal dag 'khrur 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'tshed du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/rmel du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 
[\[142a.7\]]'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/_rmel du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_rmel du 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang /_rmel du 'jud na spang 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas lug bal dag 'khrur 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'tshed du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/rmel du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud 
[\[142b.2\]]dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/_rmel du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_rmel du 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud pa dang /_
[\[142b.3\]]rmel du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la yid gnyis za bas lug bal dag 'khrur 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'tshed du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/rmel du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'khrur 'jud pa dang 
[\[142b.4\]]'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_'tshed du 'jud pa dang rmel du 'jud dam/_rmel du 'jud pa dang 'khrur 'jud dam/_rmel du 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud dam/_'khrur 'jud pa dang 'tshed du 'jud 
[\[142b.5\]]pa dang /_rmel du 'jud na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bal rmel du 'jud pa'i spang ba ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[142b.6\]]rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas grong dpon gtsug na nor bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug 
[\[142b.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la grong dpon gtsug na nor bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa sngon gyi gdugs rnams kyis ches snga ba zhig na rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po dang blon po'i 'khor mchis shing mthun par gyur pa rnams la bar skabs kyi bka' mchid kun tu brjod pa 'di lta 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]bu 'di byung bar gyur te/_shes ldan dag ci dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung ngam/_shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid dam/_'on te dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser 
[\[143a.2\]]bdag gir mi bgyid ces mchi nas/_de na kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do zhes mchi/_kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi 
[\[143a.3\]]dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid do zhes mchi na/_btsun pa de la gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do zhes mchis na/_btsun pa ji ltar gang dag de skad mchi ba de dag de 
[\[143a.4\]]ltar brda sprod par bgyid pa na/_bcom ldan 'das la skur pa 'debs par mi bgyid cing ha cang thal bar yang mi bgyid pa dang /_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba dang /_chos smra ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos brda sprod par 
[\[143a.5\]]bgyid pa dang /_gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba de dag la gzhan las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos 'ga' yang mi mchi ba lags sam/_grong dpon gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 
[\[143a.6\]]rnams gser bdag gir byed do zhes zer ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par byed pa nang la skur pa 'debs par byed cing ha cang thal bar byed pa dang /_de dag ngas smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa dang /_chos smra ba ma yin pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos brda sprod par 
[\[143a.7\]]byed pa ma yin pa dang /_smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa de dag la gzhan las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos shin tu 'ong ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_grong dpon dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]gser bdag gir mi byed de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/grong dpon ngas khyod la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/_dge slong 
[\[143b.2\]]rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no/_/btsun pa gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[143b.3\]]kyis de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags 
[\[143b.4\]]so zhes bka' stsal te/_ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/btsun pa gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces grong dpon ngas khyod la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/_dge slong 
[\[143b.5\]]rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags so zhes bka' stsal pa'i 
[\[143b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' de ni rgya cher bzang ba lags so/_/btsun pa bdag kyang 'di snyam bgyid de/_dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag 
[\[143b.7\]]gir bgyid pa de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang rung ba kho na lags so/_/grong dpon de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no/_/de nas grong dpon gtsug na nor bus bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[144a.2\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'dug par gyur cing bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[144a.3\]]'das kyis grong dpon gtsug na nor bu song nas ring por ma lon par thugs su chud nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang 
[\[144a.4\]]par bsdus shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus te/_bcom ldan 
[\[144a.5\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas 
[\[144a.6\]]na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par mchis shing mthun par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das dpong sa'i khang pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong 
[\[144a.7\]]gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ci'i grong dpon gtsug na nor bu nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas nga la grong dpon gtsug na nor bu 'di skad ces btsun pa sngon gyi gdugs rnams kyi ches snga ba zhig na rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po dang blon po'i 'khor mchis shing mthun par gyur pa rnams la bar skabs kyi bka' mchid kun tu rjod pa 
[\[144b.2\]]'di lta bu 'di byung bar gyur te/_shes ldan dag ci dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung ngam shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid dam/_'on te dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir 
[\[144b.3\]]mi bgyid ces mchi nas/_de na kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do zhes mchi/_kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams 
[\[144b.4\]]gser bdag gir mi bgyid do zhes mchi na/_btsun pa de la gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do zhes mchi na/_btsun pa ji ltar gang dag de skad mchi ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par 
[\[144b.5\]]bgyid pa na bcom ldan 'das la skur pa 'debs par mi bgyid cing ha cang thal bar yang mi bgyid pa dang /_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba dang /_chos smra ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos brda sprod par bgyid pa dang /_gsungs 
[\[144b.6\]]pa'i rjes su smra ba pa de dag la gzhan las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos 'ga' yang mi mchi ba lags sam zhes zer nas/_ngas de la 'di skad ces grong dpon gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 
[\[144b.7\]]rnams gser bdag gir byed do zhes zer ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par byed pa na nga la skur pa 'debs par byed cing ha cang thal bar byed pa dang /_de dag ngas smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa dang /_chos smra ba ma yin pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos brda sprod par 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]byed pa ma yin pa dang /_smras pa'i rjes su smra ba ma yin pa de dag la gzhan las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos shin tu 'ong ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_grong dpon dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi 
[\[145a.2\]]dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir byed de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/grong dpon ngas khyod la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du 
[\[145a.3\]]brjod par bya ste/_dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no 
[\[145a.4\]]zhes smras pa dang /_deng la 'di skad ces btsun pa gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser 
[\[145a.5\]]bdag gir bgyid pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags so zhes bka' stsal te/_ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/btsun pa gang gis slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces grong 
[\[145a.6\]]dpon ngas khyod la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya ste/_dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid 
[\[145a.7\]]pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lags so/_/zhes bka' stsal pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' de ni rgya cher bzang ba lags so/_/btsun pa bdag kyang 'di snyam bgyid de/_dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de la ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang rung ba kho na lags so zhes zer ro/_/ngas de la 'di skad ces grong dpon de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin 
[\[145b.2\]]te/_dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid do/_/gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no zhes smras so/_/
[\[145b.3\]]de nas grong dpon gtsug na nor bu des ngas smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba byas nas nga'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te nga'i drung nas song ngo /_/dge slong dag de ltar grong dpon gtsug na nor bu des rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi 
[\[145b.4\]]mdun du dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/_gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de la ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang gdon mi za bar rung ba yin no zhes cha 
[\[145b.5\]]gcig bzung ste/_khyu mchog gi tshig rgya chen po smras shing 'khor gyi nang du yang dag par seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so/_/dge slong dag ngas kyang de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/_
[\[145b.6\]]gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no zhes smras so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na khyed kyis da deng phyin cad shing 'dod pa dag gis shing yongs su btsal bar bya/_rtswa
