[\[145b.7\]]'dod pa dag gis ni rtswa/_shing rta'i las 'dod pa dag gis ni shing rta'i las/_mi blas 'dod pa dag gis ni mi blas yongs su btsal bar bya zhes smra ba'i 'di skad ces rnam grangs gang gis kyang gser bdag gir bya ba ni mi smra'o/_/'di ni re zhig byung ba yin 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[146a.2\]]de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len par byed/_len du 'jud par byed/_phung po gcig tu byed/_phung po gnyis su byed/_khri dang khri'u dang /_khri'u chung ngu dag tu 'jog par byed nas/_gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan 
[\[146a.3\]]dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag ni ma log ma spangs so sor ma spangs pa yin te/_'di ltar rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len par byed/_len du 'jud par byed/_phung po gcig tu byed/_phung po gnyis su byed/_khri dang khri'u dang /_khri'u chung ngu dag tu 'jog 
[\[146a.4\]]par byed do/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag kyang rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len par byed/_len du 'jud par byed/_phung po gcig tu byed/_phung po gnyis su byed/_khri dang khri'u dang /_khri'u chung ngu dag 'jog par byed na shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i 
[\[146a.5\]]dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi 'di la bye brag ni ci yod/_bsam pa ni ci yod/_tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod/_su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar 
[\[146a.6\]]byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[146a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len pa dang /_len du 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]'jud par byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa dang /_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/_/
[\[146b.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma 
[\[146b.3\]]bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len tam/_len du 'jud na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug ste dag gam gzhan yang 
[\[146b.4\]]de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni rang gi lag pas so/_/gser dang dngul zhes bya ba ni dbyig dang gser ro/_/len tam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/len du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de 
[\[146b.5\]]spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_gzhi [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis te/_'di long shig_/'di nas long shig_/'di tsam long shig ces bya ba dang /_'di khyer shog_/
[\[146b.6\]]'di nas khyer shog_/'di tsam khyer shog ces bya ba dang /_'di zhog shig_/'dir zhog shig_/'di tsam zhog shig ces bya ba dang /_de long shig de nas long shig_/de tsam long shig ces bya ba dang /_de khyer shog_/de nas khyer shog_/de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba 
[\[146b.7\]]dang /_de zhog shig_/der zhog shig_/de tsam zhog shig ces bya bas so/_/de la 'di long shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam/_gser 'di long shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_blangs pa na spang ba'i 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'di nas long shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po che nas sam/_zangs nas sam/_rdza bo nas sam/_sgrom nas sam/_ko lpags nas sam/_za ma tog nas long shig ces bsgo bar byed pa 
[\[147a.2\]]ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'di tsam long shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya'am/_stong ngam 'bum long shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 
[\[147a.3\]]'gyur la/_blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'di khyer shog ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam/_gser 'di khyer shog ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_khyer ba na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[147a.4\]]ro/_/'di nas khyer shog ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po che nas sam/_zangs nas sam/_rdza bo nas sam/_sgrom nas sam/_ko lpags nas sam/_za ma tog nas khyer shog ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 
[\[147a.5\]]'gyur la/_blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'di tsam khyer shog ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya'am/_stong ngam/_'bum khyer shog ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_khyer ba na spang ba'i ltung byed du 
[\[147a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/'di zhog shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam/_gser 'di zhog shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_bzhag pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'dir zhog shig ces bya ba ni 'thob 
[\[147a.7\]]par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po cher ram/_zangs su'am/_rdza phor ram/_sgrom du'am/_ko lpags su'am/_za ma tog tu zhog shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_bzhag pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'di tsam 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]zhog shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya'am/_stong ngam/_'bum zhog shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_bzhag pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de long shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su 
[\[147b.2\]]dbyig gam/_gser de long shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de nas long shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po che nas sam/_zangs nas sam/_rdza bo nas 
[\[147b.3\]]sam/_sgrom nas sam/_ko lpags nas sam/_za ma tog nas long shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de tsam long shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya'am/_stong 
[\[147b.4\]]ngam/_'bum long shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de khyer shog ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam/_gser de khyer shog ces bsgo bar byed pa ste de bsgo bar byed 
[\[147b.5\]]pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_khyer ba na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de nas khyer shog ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po che nas sam/_zangs nas sam/_rdza bo nas sam/_sgrom nas sam/_ko lpags nas sam/_za ma tog nas khyer shog ces 
[\[147b.6\]]bsgo bar byed pa ste de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya 'am/_stong ngam/_'bum khyer shog ces bsgo bar byed pa ste de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_
[\[147b.7\]]khyer ba na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de zhog shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam/_gser de zhog shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_bzhag pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/der zhog shig ces bya ba ni 'thob 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zangs po cher ram/_zangs su'am/_rdza phor ram/_sgrom du'am/_ko lpags su'am/_za ma tog tu zhog shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_bzhag pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 
[\[148a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de tsam zhog shig ces bya ba ni 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya 'am/_stong ngam/_'bum zhog shig ces bsgo bar byed pa ste de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_bzhag pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'di long shig_/'di 
[\[148a.3\]]nas long shig 'di tsam long shig ces bya ba dang /_'di khyer shog 'di nas khyer shog_/'di tsam khyer shog ces bya ba dang /_'di zhog shig 'dir zhog shig_/'di tsam zhog shig ces bya ba dang /_de long shig de nas long shig_/de tsam long shig ces bya ba dang /_
[\[148a.4\]]de khyer shog de nas khyer shog_/de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba dang /_de zhog shig der zhog shig_/de tsam zhog shig ces bya ba de dag 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyogs su bsgo bar byed na/_de bsgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_blangs pa dang khyer ba dang /_
[\[148a.5\]]bzhag pa na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dbyig la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gser la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dbyig dang gser la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dbyig gam/_gser brdungs 
[\[148a.6\]]pa la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dbyig dang gser mngon mtshan can la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dngul la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nor bu la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mu tig la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[148a.7\]]bai DUr+ya la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis yul gyi tha snyad can gyi dbyig dang /_gser la reg na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ra gan dang zangs ma dang /_lcags dang rno lcags dang ro nye dang 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]zha nye dang /_khro chu la reg pa la ltung ba med do zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed 
[\[148b.2\]]kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tsam pa na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bsam pa can/_bzang po sbyin pa zhig 'dug pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang /_
[\[148b.3\]]skar khung dang skar khung dra ba can dang /_lan kan gyis brgyan pa/_snying dang mig 'phrog pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug nas/_der dge slong mang po dag dbyar gnas par khas blangs te/_de dag gis dgag dbye byas nas smras pa/_khyim bdag bdag cag 
[\[148b.4\]]mnyan yod du ston pa dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gros bdag cag la gos dag byin cig_/khyim bdag des smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di na gos bzang po dag ma mchis te/_don mthun dag mchi zhes grag gis 
[\[148b.5\]]don mthun dag mchis kyi bar du re zhig gzhes shig dang /_de nas gos bzang po dag 'jal te gsol lo/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag gal te gos bzang po dag med na gos ngan pa dag byin cig_/'phags pa dag bdag ni bzang po sbyin pa lags na/_ji 
[\[148b.6\]]ltar bdag gis ngan pa dag gsol bar bgyi/_gal te khyed cag [{]rings [,]ring [}]na gos kyi rin kAr ShA pa Na dag snoms la bzhud cig_/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis kAr ShA pa Na dag bkag pas bdag cag mi len to/_/'phags pa dag 'di ltar bdag la ma byin pa ni mi mnga'i/_
[\[148b.7\]]gos ngan pa dag sbyin du ni mi rung ngo /_/dge slong de dag gis kAr ShA pa Na dag ma blangs par gos ngan pa dag kho nas dong ste/_mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag gis dbyar gnas pa'i gos kyi rnyed pa ma rnyed dam/_
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]ci nas gang gi phyir khyed cag gos dag ngan par gyur ma rnyed do/_/khyed cag gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs tsam par ro/_/khyim bdag gang la brten/_che ge mo zhig la'o/_/khyim bdag de bzang po sbyin pa zhes grag go de'i phyir ma rnyed do/_/ci'i phyir de dag gis 
[\[149a.2\]]skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag kyang gos kyi rin dag sbyin par byed la/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyang gos kyi rin dag 'dod kyis 
[\[149a.3\]]ngas nyan thos rnams la rung bar bya bar chung zhig gnang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brten te bcang bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang dge slong gis zhal ta byed pa spro bar bya'o/_/dge slong 
[\[149a.4\]]dag gis zhal ta byed pa gang spro bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' ra ba pa'am/_dge bsnyen spro bar bya ste/_kun dga' ra ba pa zhes bya ba ni rung ba byed pa'o/_/dge bsnyen zhes bya ba ni gsum la skyabs su song ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung 
[\[149a.5\]]ba'o/_/dge slong dag yul gzhan du 'dong ba na de dag 'di na bdag cag la sbyin bdag 'ga' yang med do zhes 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin bdag de nyid ji srid du son pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_'tsho ba dang /_sdod pa'i bar du shin tu ring 
[\[149a.6\]]du song yang nyams pa med do/_/dge slong rnams kyis chos gos kyi rin dag rnyed la sbyin bdag med nas de dag 'gyod pa skyes te/_mi len pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blang bar bya zhing 
[\[149a.7\]]blangs nas kyang dge slong gi mdun du 'greng ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di rnyed de/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di byin gyis 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]brlab bo/_/dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'dis dngos po rung ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis mtha' 'khob dag tu gtsug lag khang dag byed du bcug nas de na dus dang 
[\[149b.2\]]dus su skrag pa dag byung nas dge slong dag gis gtsug lag khang stong par bor te byer ro ma byin par len pa dag gis gtsug lag khang stong par rig nas gtsug lag khang bcom pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun bye'am/_mchod rten gyi dbyig dang gser 
[\[149b.3\]]sbas te 'gro bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sba bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gis gang gis sba bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' ra ba pa'am/_dge bsnyen gyis sba bar bya'o/_/gang dag sbed par byed pa de dag nyid rku bar byed 
[\[149b.4\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge bsnyen dad pa can gyis sba bar bya'o/_/dge bsnyen dad pa can med na dge tshul gyis sba bar bya'o/_/dge tshul med na dge slong dag gis rang gis sba bar bya'o/_/de la dong brko bar bya ba yod nas gang gis brko bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[149b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' ra ba pa'am/_dge bsnyen gyis brko bar bya'o/_/de nyid rku bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge bsnyen dad pa can gyis brko bar bya'o/_/dge bsnyen dad pa can med na dge tshul gyis brko bar bya'o/_/dge tshul med na dge slong dag gis rang gis brko bar 
[\[149b.6\]]bya'o/_/'jigs pa dang bral na rnam pa de lta bu nyid kyis phyung ste dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag ngas phongs pa'i dus dag tu gnang ba gang yin pa de bde ba'i gnas skabs dag tu spyad par mi bya ste/_spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_
[\[149b.7\]]sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/gser dngul la reg pa'i spang ba ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]'das 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe na thams cad du yul dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ngo zhes sgra grags te/_de'i nyan thos rnams 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byed pas gang dag de la mchod 
[\[150a.2\]]pa dag byed pa de dag ni shin tu 'bras bu che ba dang /_phan yon che ba dang /_gsal ba che ba dang /_rgyas pa che bar 'gyur ro zhes byang lam pa'i tshong pa dag gis thos nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag yul dbus su 'dong ngo /_/der khe spogs mang po yang bsgrub 
[\[150a.3\]]par bya/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun dag la mchod pa bya'o zhes byang lam pa'i tshong pa de dag zong thogs te/_yul dbus su 'phags nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin to/_/mnyan yod na shes pa can rtsis mkhas pa zhig 'dug pa des byang lam nas tshong pa 
[\[150a.4\]]don mthun 'ongs zhes thos nas des bsams pa/_song ste je bltas na der cung zad 'thob po snyam nas/_des cung zad dmigs pas kyang shes/_cung zad rtog ges kyang shes nas de song ste/_ded dpon la ming dang rus nas brjod cing ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa legs 
[\[150a.5\]]so 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod kyi ma ni ming 'di zhes bya/_khyod kyi pha ni ming 'di zhes bya/_khyod kyi rdzas ni 'di snyed cig 'ongs so/_/nyi ma ga ge mo zhig la ni khal 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/khe spogs ni 'di snyed cig 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang ded dpon des 
[\[150a.6\]]bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gang dag 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byed ces grag pa de dag las 'ga' zhig 'di yin gor ma chag snyam nas des de la dad pas byang lam gyi nags kyi 'bras bus slong 
[\[150a.7\]]phor bkang ste byin nas la ba srin bu'i mdog lta bu cig kyang bskon no/_/shes pa can des blangs shing gyon te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi gan du song ba dang /_de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa/_shes pa can khyod kyis mgo bzlog ste nyal ba gang zhig las thob des 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]smras pa/_byang lam nas tshong pa don mthun 'ongs nas der kho bos ded dpon la ming dang rus nas brjod nas des kho bo la dad pas dad pa'i dbang du byas pa sbyin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes pa can bdag cag la shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong de dag rtag tu khyed la thag pa dag dang phreng rgyud dag 
[\[150b.2\]]dang /_'bru mar mkhan dag las gzhan pa mi gtso bo 'ga' yang mngon par dad par mi byed do zhes tho 'tsham par byed kyis/_khyod la ba 'di gyon te song la shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong de dag gi snying dag gas par gyis shig de ltar bya'o zhes smras te/_de nas shes pa can de la ba de gyon nas rgyal byed 
[\[150b.3\]]kyi tshal du song ngo /_/drug sde dag gis kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/_rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo 
[\[150b.4\]]stong par mi 'jog pas nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des shes pa can de thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/de nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_gcer bu pa ngan pa 'di la ba bzang po zhig gyon te 'ongs kyis gal te bdag gis de ma phrogs na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i 
[\[150b.5\]]ming mi gzung ngo snyam nas/_des de la smras pa/_shes pa can khyod gcer bu pa yin la la ba 'di lta bu gyon na phyir babs sam ci kho bo phyir ma babs te/_'di ltar byang lam nas tshong pa don mthun 'ongs nas der kho bos ded dpon la ming dang rus nas brjod nas des kho bo la dad pas dad 
[\[150b.6\]]pa'i dbang du byas pa byin no/_/ma legs so ma legs so/_/khyed kyis rgas pa'i gnas skabs su tshul khrims 'chal pa kun tu spyad do/_/tshur shog 'dug shig dang chos bstan par bya'o/_/shes pa can de nye dga'i mdun du 'dug pa dang /_nye dga' yid dga' zhing yid dga' 
[\[150b.7\]]nas de la sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams so/_/drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni gal te tshul khrims kyi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag lha rnams su skyes so snyam du sems la/_gal te sbyin pa'i gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag rang gi sha gang yin 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]pa de yang bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems so/_/gal te ngan song gi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnams su skyes so snyam du sems par 'gyur ba yin pas/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]shes pa can de la smras pa/_shes 
[\[151a.2\]]pa can khyod kyi ston pa ni ngan pa la mos pa yin te/_gal te de bzang po 'dod par gyur na des khyed cag la gos 'bum ri ba dang /_zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa mig lnga brgya pa yang gnang bar 'gyur ba zhig ma gnang ngo /_/kho bo cag gi 
[\[151a.3\]]ston pa ni bzang po la mos pa yin pas/_des kho bo cag la gos 'bum ri ba dang /_zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa mig lnga brgya pa yang gnang ngo /_/gal te khyod la ba 'di lta bu gyon te slong mo la 'gro bar gyur na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad 
[\[151a.4\]]pa can dag gis shes pa can 'dis tshul khrims 'chal pa kun tu spyad do snyam du shes pas khyed kyis slong mo yang mi rnyed par gyur gyis/_khyod kyi la ba 'di kho bo la byin cig dang /_kho bos khyod la la ba gzhan zhig sbyin no/_/kho bo la ba 'di gyon te bsod snyoms 
[\[151a.5\]]la 'jug pa na/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis kho bo mthong nas btsun pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]la ba 'di lta bu ga las rnyed ces zer na/_kho bos de dag la 'di skad ces shes pa can che ge mo zhig gis byin no zhes brjod par bya ste/_des na de dag gis shes 
[\[151a.6\]]pa can dad pa dang ldan par gyur to snyam du shes par 'gyur zhing /_de dag gis khyod slong mo la zhugs pa la chang dang nur rtsi'i slong phor bkang ste sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' bzhes shig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_shes pa can khyod kyi 
[\[151a.7\]]tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin pas/_khyod de dag gi tshig thos nas yang phyir 'phrog tu 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i gnas yod do/_/btsun pa nye dga' ci kho bo'i la ba 'di tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag dbang ba yin nam/_la 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]ba 'di ni kho bo nyid dbang ba yin gyis bzhes shig dang /_slar 'phrog tu mi mchis so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]la ba de blangs nas la ba rtsub po gzhan zhig de la byin nas shes pa can de la ba rtsub po de gyon nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi gan du phyir song ba dang /_de dag gis 
[\[151b.2\]]de mthong nas smras pa/_shes pa can khyod kyis yang mgo bsgyur de nyal ba gang zhig las thob/_des smras pa/_'di ni glo gzhan nas grub pa yin no/_/ji ltar gyur/_kho bos la ba de btsun pa nye dga' la byin nas des kyang kho bo la la ba 'di byin no/_/de dag gis 
[\[151b.3\]]spyos te smras pa/_shes pa can shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni yu bu cag gson pas kyang mi dga' ba yin no/_/drug sde dag ji lta bar gzhan de lta ma yin la/_nye dga' ji lta bar drug sde gzhan de lta ma yin no/_/gal te khyod kyis dge slong gnas brtan gzhan 'ga' zhig 
[\[151b.4\]]la byin par gyur na kho bo cag kyang rjes su yi rang bar byed na khyod kyis nye dga' la byin te/_de ni bdag cag las zong gis kyang khrag gi phyis bu len par 'dod pa yin gyis/_gal te la ba khyer te 'ong na de lta na legs/_gal te khyer te mi 'ong na kho bo cag gis khyod tshangs pa mtshungs 
[\[151b.5\]]par spyod pa'i nang nas gnas nas dbyung bar bya zhing /_tshul shing yang dbyung bar bya/_spang leb khri'u yang bsgyur bar bya/_slong phor yang khas dbub par bya/_khar ba yang dor bar bya'o/_/de skrag nas nye dga' ga la ba der song ba dang nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]thag ring po kho na nas de 'ong ba mthong nas 
[\[151b.6\]]des bsams pa/_shes pa can 'gros 'di lta bus 'ong ba 'di ni bdag gi la ba 'phrog par byed pa yin no snyam nas de gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs nas sgo bcad de 'dug go/_/shes pa can des sgo brdung bar brtsams te btsun pa nye dga' btsun pa nye dga' zhes bos pa dang nye dga' cang mi smra 
[\[151b.7\]]bar 'dug go/_/dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_shes pa can khyod la btsun pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ci bya/_des smras pa/_des kho bo'i la ba zhig khyer ro/_/shes pa can gal te khyod la ba 'dod na song la bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su sgrubs shig_/de bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]ba der song ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis shes pa can de thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed shes pa can thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba la ltos shig_/btsun pa bka' 
[\[152a.2\]]bzhin 'tshal/_'di ni la ba'i phyir 'ongs te/_gal te la ba thob na de lta na legs gal te ma thob na khrag tshab skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas shes pa can de phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das btsun pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bdag 
[\[152a.3\]]gi la ba 'tshal ba de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la slar stsal du gsol cig_/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la la ba slar stsal du ma stsal na/_'di ltar bdag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i nang nas gnas nas phyung bar 'gyur zhing tshul shing yang phyung bar 
[\[152a.4\]]gyur/_spang leb khri'u yang bsgyur bar 'gyur/_slong phor yang khas phub par 'gyur/_khar ba yang bor bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la nye dga'i gan du song ste/_shes pa can gyi 
[\[152a.5\]]la ba phyir byin cig_/gal te mi byin na shes pa can 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod do zhes gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas nye dga' ga la ba der song 
[\[152a.6\]]ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsams pa/_shes pa can gyi pho nya 'di lta bu khrid de 'ongs pas 'dis kho bo'i la ba phrogs par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nye dga' la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[152a.7\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes pa can gyi la ba phyir byin cig_/gal te 'di'i la ba phyir myur bar ma byin na shes pa can 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes byung ngo /_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_btsun pa kun 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]dga' bo ston pa'i bka' mnyan par zad kyi/_gzhan du na sgre byi gcer bu 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba bas gal te shes pa can sha stag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/_dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal bzhin du gang 
[\[152b.2\]]bar gyur la de dag thams cad khrag tsha ba skyugs te kha dag cing dus byed par gyur kyang nye dga'i spu'i rtse mo tsam yang mi g.yo ste/_'on kyang bzhud cig dang sbyin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ba dang nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_kwa'i gcer bu pa nyon cig khyod kyis ston pa [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ma des 
[\[152b.3\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bas 'jig rten bslus nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes te/_de'i lce la thong gshol lnga brgyas rmed par byed na/_khyed kyang de bas kyang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ma chen po yin pas khyed kyi lce la yang thong gshol stong gis rmo bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang kho bo'i la ba khyod kyis 
[\[152b.4\]]spyod na/_ci kho bos kyang khyod kyi la ba spyad snyam mam/_btsun pa nye dga' ma lags so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de'i la ba des mdoms kyi phyogs thams cad phyis nas bzhi ltab tu bltab ste/_lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag nas lag pa g.yas pas thal lcag gis bsnun pa dang rim pa 
[\[152b.5\]]thams cad rdol bar gyur nas smras pa/_shes pa can lag pa gnyis rkyong shig_/des lag pa gnyis brkyang ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]gang gis de khas bub tu 'gyel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shugs kyis la ba lag tu byin pa dang /_de khas bub tu 'gyel nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]rdog pas bsnun 
[\[152b.6\]]te smras pa/_gcer bu pa sgre byi gtsug lag khang sla tsas ma gtal bar song shig_/btsun pa nye dga' gal te ma gum na mchi ste/_slan chad rgyal byed kyi tshal du mi mchi'o/_/de ni re zhig byung ba yin gyi/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi 
[\[152b.7\]]bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/_kun tu sbyor bar byed/_rab tu sbyor bar 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]byed/_bun 'gyed par byed/_skyed 'gyed par byed/_byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /_byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang /_ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /_ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/_/ji ltar kun du sbyor bar byed ce na/_kun du rtsom par byed/_yul tshol bar 
[\[153a.2\]]byed/_shing rta sogs par byed/_yul du 'gro ba'i rdzas shom par byed/_le'u pa dang /_gro ba dang /_snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang /_yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/_de ltar kun du sbyor bar byed do/_/ji ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed ce na/_brgyad shas dang /_bcu shas dang /_
[\[153a.3\]]bcu gnyis shas kyi phyir dbang po dang /_gro ba dang /_snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang /_yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/_de ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed do/_/ji ltar bun 'gyed par byed ce na/_nas dang 'bru rnying pa gser phye dang nye sde'i phyir gtong ba dang /_gzhal ba'i snod dang /_bre'u 
[\[153a.4\]]chung dang /_phul dang gro ba dang /_snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang /_yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/_de ltar bun 'gyed par byed do/_/ji ltar skyed 'gyed par byed ce na/_dung gi tshogs kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang /_nor bu'i tshogs kyi phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong bar byed 
[\[153a.5\]]pa dang /_mu tig gi tshogs kyi phyir bai DUr+ya'i tshogs gtong bar byed cing /_dpang po dang /_gro ba dang /_snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang /_yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/_de ltar skyed 'gyed par byed do/_/ji ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/_gser mngon mtshan can gyi 
[\[153a.6\]]phyir mngon mtshan can gtong bar byed de/_de ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed do/_/ji ltar byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/_gser mngon mtshan can gyi phyir mngon mtshan can med pa gtong bar byed de/_de ltar byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/_/ji 
[\[153a.7\]]ltar ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/_gser mngon mtshan can ma yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan can gtong bar byed de/_de ltar ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed do/_/ji ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed ce na/_gser mngon mtshan can 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]ma yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan can ma yin par gtong bar byed de/_de ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/_/gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni ma log ma spangs so sor ma spangs pa yin te/_'di ltar mngon mtshan can 
[\[153b.2\]]gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/_kun du sbyor bar byed/_rab tu sbyor bar byed/_bun 'gyed par byed/_skyed 'gyed par byed/_byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /_byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do/_/bram ze 
[\[153b.3\]]dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyang mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/_kun du sbyor bar byed/_rab tu sbyor bar byed/_bun 'gyed par byed/_skyed 'gyed par byed/_byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /_byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang /_
[\[153b.4\]]ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed na shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la bye brag ni ci yod/_bsam pa ni ci yod/_tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod/_su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems 
[\[153b.5\]]zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga 
[\[153b.6\]]ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa bden 
[\[153b.7\]]nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/_/zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan 
[\[154a.2\]]thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag gam/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/mngon mtshan 
[\[154a.3\]]can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni rnam pa du ma'o/_/byed na zhes bya ba ni kun du sbyor bar byed pa dang /_rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang /_bun 'gyed par byed pa dang /_skyed 'gyed par byed pa lhag par spyod par byed na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni 
[\[154a.4\]]dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas yul gyi tha snyad kyi zong kun du sbyor bar byed cing /_de de la shing rta dang glang dang gla 
[\[154a.5\]]mi dang /_dpang po dang /_gro ba dang /_snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang /_yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/_sho gam dang la gcan dang gru btsas sbyin par byed na ji srid du rnyed pa dag bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rnyed pa bdag gir byed pa na spang ba'i 
[\[154a.6\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas dbyig gam/_gser rab tu sbyor bar byed cing /_de de la dpang po dang /_gro ba dang snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang /_yi ge pa tshol bar byed na ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_
[\[154a.7\]]rnyed pa dag bdag gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas nas dang /_'bru'i bun 'gyed par byed cing /_de de la gzhal blugs dang /_bre'u chung dang /_phul dang /_dpang po dang /_gro ba dang /_snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang /_
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]yi ge pa tshol bar byed na ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rnyed pa bdag gir byed pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas dung gi tshogs kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang /_nor bu'i tshogs kyi 
[\[154b.2\]]phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang /_mu tig gi tshogs kyi phyir bai DUr+ya'i tshogs gtong bar byed cing /_de de la dpang po dang /_gro ba dang /_snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang /_yi ge pa tshol bar byed na/_ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 
[\[154b.3\]]'gyur la/_rnyed pa bdag gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang 
[\[154b.4\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na yangs pa can pa'i lits+tsha bI dag gis khang pa dag drug rtseg dang bdun rtseg tu byed do/_/yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gtsug lag khang dag kyang drug rtseg dang bdun rtseg tu byed pas de dag mtho ches pas brtsigs shing 
[\[154b.5\]]brtsigs shing rdib nas sbyin bdag dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag gson zhing 'dug ste/_'tsho zhing sdod pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang dag kyang 'di ltar 'jig na shi ba rnams kyi ji ltar 'gyur/_bdag cag gis mkhar len gyi rgyur dge 'dun la mi zad pa dbul bar bya'o 
[\[154b.6\]]snyam nas de dag mi zad pa thogs te dge slong rnams kyi gan du dong nas phyin pa dang /_dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa dag mkhar len gyi slad du mi zad pa 'di dag bzhes shig_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[154b.7\]]kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad pas bdag cag mi len to zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi phyir mkhar len gyi rgyu mi zad par blang bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang ni sum rtseg tu bya'o dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbyar khang ni nyis rtseg tu bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas mi zad pa blangs nas dge 'dun gyi mdzod du bcug ste bzhag go/_/sbyin bdag 
[\[155a.2\]]dag 'ongs te smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci'i slad du gtsug lag khang gi mkhar len mi bgyid kAr ShA pa Na dag med do/_/'o na bdag cag gis khyed la mi zad pa dag ma phul lam/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_ci kho bo cag gis mi zad pa dag zos snyama'am/_dge 'dun 
[\[155a.3\]]gyi mdzod na 'dug go/_/'phags pa dag de lta na mi zad par mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar zad par 'gyur te ci bdag cag gi sdum pa na gnas ma mchis snyama'am/_ci'i slad du rab tu sbyor bar mi mdzad/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba 
[\[155a.4\]]mdzad pas bdag cag rab tu sbyor bar mi byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi phyir mkhar len gyi rgyu mi zad pa rab tu sbyor bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[155a.5\]]dad pa can dag sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa 'bul nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa rab tu sbyor bar bya zhing de las skyed gang grub pa des sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_
[\[155a.6\]]dge 'dun la mchod par bya'o/_/de dag gis de dag nyid la byin nas de dag la 'das pa na rtsod par byed cing /_'phags pa dag ci'i phyir bdag nyid kyi nor las rtsod pa byung zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[155a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag la sbyin par mi bya'o/_/de dag gis phyug po dag la byin nas/_de dag la 'das pa na mthu dang ldan pa la rten cing mi ster ba dang /_bla'i grwa'i mthus mi ster nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag la sbyin par mi bya'o/_/de dag 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gis dbul po rnams la byin nas de dag gis kyang 'jal mi nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gta' nyi rir blangs te dpang po dang bcas pa'i dam rgya'i glegs bu bris te sbyin par bya'o/_/glegs bu de la yang lo dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[155b.2\]]gyi gnas brtan dang /_dge skos dang /_len pa po dang /_rdzas dang /_skyed rnams kyi ming bri bar bya'o/_/gang la sbyin par bya ba dge bsnyen dad pa can bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba la yang gta' nyi ri kho nas sbyin par bya'o/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_
[\[155b.3\]]sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa'i spang ba ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs sa [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[155b.4\]]de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/_len par byed/_gtong bar byed/_nyo bar byed/_'tshong bar byed do/_/ji ltar len par byed ce na/_gang gi tshe ljongs su lo legs shing grong khyer du lo nyes pa de'i tshe na ljongs nas grong khyer du len par byed 
[\[155b.5\]]de/_de ltar len par byed do/_/ji ltar gtong bar byed ce na/_gang gi tshe grong khyer du lo legs shing ljongs su lo nyes pa de'i tshe na grong khyer nas ljongs su gtong bar byed de/_de ltar gtong bar byed do/_/ji ltar nyo bar byed ce na/_gang gi tshe rin chung ba de'i tshe na nyo bar byed 
[\[155b.6\]]de/_de ltar nyo bar byed do/_/ji ltar 'tshong bar byed ce na/_gang gi tshe rin che ba de'i tshe na 'tshong bar byed de/_de ltar 'tshong bar byed do/_/gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni ma log ma spangs so sor ma spangs pa yin te/_'di ltar nyo 
[\[155b.7\]]'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/_len par byed/_gtong bar byed/_nyo bar byed/_'tshong bar byed cing bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyang nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/_len par byed/_gtong bar byed/_nyo bar byed/_'tshong bar byed na shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'di dag la bye brag ni ci yod/_bsam pa ni ci yod/_tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod/_su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i 
[\[156a.2\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[156a.3\]]ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/_len par byed/_gtong bar byed/_nyo bar byed/_'tshong 
[\[156a.4\]]bar byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do/_/
[\[156a.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma 
[\[156a.6\]]bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang nyo 'tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag gam/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/nyo 'tshong 
[\[156a.7\]]rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni rnam pa mang po'o/_/byed na zhes bya ba ni len par byed pa dang /_gtong bar byed pa dang /_nyo bar byed pa dang /_'tshong bar byed pa dag lhag par spyod par byed na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]bshags par bya ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis rnyed pa 'dod pas nyo bar byed/_'tshong bar byed na nyo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_'tshong ba la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 
[\[156b.2\]]rnyed pa 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing rnyed pa mi 'dod pas 'tshong bar byed na/_nyo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_'tshong bar byed pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis rnyed pa mi 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing rnyed pa 'dod pas 'tshong bar byed na nyo bar byed pa la ltung ba med la/_'tshong bar 
[\[156b.3\]]byed pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis rnyed pa mi 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing rnyed pa mi 'dod pas 'tshong bar byed na gnyis ka la ltung ba med do/_/yul gzhan gyi sbyor bas snga ma'i rgyud sbyong bar byed pa la ltung ba med do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan 
[\[156b.4\]]thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na byang lam pa'i tshong pa lam gyi bgrod par zhugs pa dag gis gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon 
[\[156b.5\]]po dang ldan pa/_skar khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_lan kan gyis brgyan pa/_mig dang snying 'phrog pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa dag mthong nas de dag dad par gyur te/_de dag gtsug lag khang du dong nas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags 
[\[156b.6\]]pa dag bdag cag gis dge 'dun la mchod ston bgyi'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_mchod ston gyi yo byad dag khyer te sheg shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag blo bur du lhags pa dag lags te/_'di ltar bdag cag rin 'bul gyis khyed kyis 'bras 
[\[156b.7\]]dag stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas bdag cag 'bras dag mi 'tshong ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar mi bya bar 'di ltar gang 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]dag dge 'dun gyi phyir mchod ston byed pa de la rin gyis 'bras sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ri ba kho na sbyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gtsug lag khang de nyid du mchod ston byed pa de la 'theb dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[157a.2\]]'das kyis rin gyis 'bras sbyin par bya'o zhes bca' ba mdzad pas mang po dag mchod ston byed nas thams cad la byin na 'bras dag spyad pas spyi bungs chad par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar 
[\[157a.3\]]mi bya bar 'di ltar rin des 'bras gzhan dag nyo bar bya'o/_/'bras rnying pa dag kyang so sor brtags nas gal te srog chags med na dus su btsongs te 'bras sar pas bang ba dag dgang bar bya'o/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba 
[\[157a.4\]]dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/nyo 'tshong byed pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu pa rdzogs sa [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom la/_lhung bzed gnyis dang tha ga gnyis/_/byin 'phrog ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]dang /_/dgon pa pa dang ras chen dang /_/bsngos pa dang ni gsog 'jog go/_/
[\[157a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' 'di snyam du sems te/_'di dag thams cad khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis khyab par byas 
[\[157a.6\]]pas phyin cad gang nas kyang rnyed pa bslang bar mi nus so snyam nas de de snyam sems pa na dga' 'dun drug bcu skyed mos tshal du dong ba de dag nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te 'di dag las rnyed pa ma grub na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming gzung 
[\[157a.7\]]bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni gal te sbyin pa'i gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag gis rang gi sha dag bcad cing bcad cing sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems la/_gal te tshul khrims kyi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag lha rnams kyi 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]nang du skyes so snyam du sems so/_/gal te ngan song gi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnams su skyes so snyam du sems pa yin pas des lhung bzed gsal ba/_zlum pa longs spyad par bzod pa mchan khung gis khyer te dga' 'dun de dag ga la ba der 
[\[157b.2\]]song ste phyin nas dga' 'dun pa gcig la ci nas kyang de'i sems mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin pa'i gtam byas nas de sems dad par gyur te smras pa/_'phags pa ci'i slad du byon/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la lhung bzed dgos so/_/
[\[157b.3\]]'phags pa bdag la lhung bzed ma mchis te gal te rin gyis rnyed na bdag gis mjal te gsol lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]lhung bzed mchan khung nas phyung ste de la bstan nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lhung bzed 'di yang rin gyis rnyed pa yin no/_/'phags pa 'di'i rin ji tsam/_
[\[157b.4\]]kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'o/_/bdag gis 'di'i rin kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu 'bul lo/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]a rog gya de dag khyod kyir gyur cig_/sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog 'thob pa dang /_
[\[157b.5\]]lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du snod du 'gyur bar gyur cig_/de bzhin du de des dga' 'dun drug bcu po dag re re yang kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu drug bcu sbyor du bcug ste sbyor du bcug nas song ngo /_/dga' 'dun de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas de na dga' 'dun gcig 
[\[157b.6\]]gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bos btsun pa nye dga' shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba chos sgrog pa rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa la lhung bzed kyi rin du kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu phul gyis rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_kho bos kyang phul 
[\[157b.7\]]lo/_/yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_kho bos kyang phul lo/_/de bzhin du thams cad kyis kho bos kyang phul lo/_/kho bos kyang phul lo zhes smras nas de dag phan tshun blta bar brtsams te/_shes ldan dag dge slong gcig la lhung bzed du dgos zhes de dag gis dge 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]slong zhig la dris pa/_'phags pa dge slong gcig la lhung bzed du 'tshal/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gcig kho na dgos so/_/de dag gis shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams ni rnyed pa 'dod pas zil gyis gnon pa dag yin no zhes 
[\[158a.2\]]smad par brtsams so/_/de ni re zhig byung ba yin gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs 
[\[158a.3\]]so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag lhung bzed rnyed do cog gsog par byed cing bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed/_dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag lhung bzed rnyed do cog gsog par byed cing bdag nyid kyang spyod par 
[\[158a.4\]]mi byed/_dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di 
[\[158a.5\]]la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/_
[\[158a.6\]]dge slong dag khyed lhung bzed rnyed do cog sogs par byed cing bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed/_dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin 
[\[158a.7\]]pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcang bar bya'o/_/de las 
[\[158b.2\]]'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/lhung bzed lhag pa zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab par bya ba las lhag pa'o/_/zhag bcu'i bar du zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan bcu'i mtha'i bar du'o/_/bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya'o/_/
[\[158b.3\]]de las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar 'chang ba'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na 'di lta ste/_dge slong 
[\[158b.4\]]gis tshes la lhung bzed rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par 
[\[158b.5\]]rtog par mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshes la lhung bzed ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/_tshes gsum mam/_tshes dgu'am/_tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed 
[\[158b.6\]]de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i 
[\[158b.7\]]skya rengs shar ba na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed cig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la yang gzhan zhig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]la sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na phyi ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam gtong bar mi byed dam rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed 
[\[159a.2\]]na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_tshes dang /_tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang tshes bcu tshun chad kyi lhung bzed cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par 
[\[159a.3\]]brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na phyi ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/_
[\[159a.4\]]gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed gnyis rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de gnyis zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par 
[\[159a.5\]]brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshes la lhung bzed gnyis 
[\[159a.6\]]ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/_tshes gsum mam/_tshes dgu'am/_tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed gnyis rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de gnyis zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_
[\[159a.7\]]gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par rtog par mi byed dam gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed gnyis shig rnyed cing 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]des tshes gnyis la lhung bzed gzhan gnyis shig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma gnyis gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na phyi ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing 
[\[159b.2\]]snga ma gnyis gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 
[\[159b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/tshes dang /_tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang /_tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed gnyis shig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma gnyis gtang bar bya ba 'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_
[\[159b.4\]]gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na phyi ma gnyis byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma gnyis gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/_gzhan la 
[\[159b.5\]]sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed mang po rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de dag zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya 
[\[159b.6\]]ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par tog par mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshes la lhung bzed mang po ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam/_
[\[159b.7\]]tshes gsum mam/_tshes dgu'am/_tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed mang po rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'am/_gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed mang po dag cig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la yang 
[\[160a.2\]]gzhan mang po dag cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma dag gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na phyi ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma dag gtang bar bya 
[\[160a.3\]]ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/_gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[160a.4\]]tshes dang /_tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang /_tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed mang po dag cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma dag gtang bar bya ba'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la 
[\[160a.5\]]sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na phyi ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma dag gtang bar bya ba 'am/_rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/_gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/byin gyis rlob par mi byed dam/_gtong bar mi byed dam/_rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/_gzhan la 
[\[160a.6\]]sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung bzed spang bar gyur na de ma spangs shing bral bar ma byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi 
[\[160a.7\]]lhung bzed spang bar gyur na/_de spangs shing bral bar ma byas la/_ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na/_de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung bzed spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la ltung ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung bzed spang bar gyur na de spangs shing bral bar byas la/_ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na de la ltung ba med do/_/de bzhin du dge slong gis ji srid du spang ba'i dngos po de ma bshags shing so sor ma 
[\[160b.2\]]bshags par lhung bzed dam/_chos gos sam/_dra ba'am/_phor bu'am/_ska rags sam/_dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhung bzed chung ngu dang /_lhung bzed skya ba dang /_
[\[160b.3\]]lhung bzed che ba dang /_lhung bzed ma tshos pa 'chang ba la ltung ba med do/_/rab tu 'byung ba la ltos pa'i don du lhung bzed 'chang ba la thams cad du ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med 
[\[160b.4\]]do/_/lhung bzed 'chang ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa des lhung 
[\[160b.5\]]bzed shin du gsal ba/_dbyibs legs pa/_longs spyad par bzod pa zhig rnyed do/_/bsod snyoms pa zhig kyang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas des bsod snyoms brgyus te srang du phyin pa 
[\[160b.6\]]dang /_spos 'tshong gi khye'u des de mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis lhung bzed shin du gsal ba/_dbyibs legs pa/_longs spyad par bzod pa zhig rnyed kyis gal te bzhed na snoms shig bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la lhung bzed yod do/_/'phags pa gal te 
[\[160b.7\]]dge slong gzhan 'ga' zhig lhung bzed 'tshal ba mchis na de gtang du gsol/_gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas bsod snyoms pa des mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/_des zan zos nas lhung bzed 'khru ba na dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]ldan pa dag srang ga ge mo zhig na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa des lhung bzed shin du gsal ba/_dbyibs legs pa/_longs spyad par bzod pa zhig rnyed kyis khyed cag las gang lhung bzed 'dod pa de song shig_/de dang ha cang thag mi ring ba na nye dga' 
[\[161a.2\]]'dug pa des thos nas des bsams pa/_de lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis thos nas rab tu rgyug par gyur na mi rung gis smad par bya'o snyam nas des de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod dad pas byin pa zos nas lhung bzed kyi gtam dang /_chos gos kyi gtam las 
[\[161a.3\]]gzhan pa'i gtam 'ga' yang med mod/_des bsams pa/_'jig rten na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed pa de dag dang nye dga' mtshungs pa yin na 'dis kyang re zhig bdag smad par gyur na gal te dge slong gnas brtan gzhan 'ga' zhig gis thos par gyur na des rgya cher smad 
[\[161a.4\]]par 'gyur ro snyam nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de bkar te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan po dang kho bo bshes pas de'i phyir kho bos khyod smad kyis ma gshe shig_/gnas brtan gal te bdag yang smra bar gyur na khyod kyis bdag la yang smad par mdzod 
[\[161a.5\]]cig_/tshe dang ldan pa kho bo yang nye bar ma zhi ba tsam du zad kyi ci lhung bzed de lhung bzed ma yin nam/_gnas brtan snga ma nyid kyang smra bar mi bgyi ba lags kyis 'tshal to/_/tshe dang ldan pa de lta mod kyi 'on kyang re zhig smros shig_/gnas brtan srang che ge mo zhig na spos 'tshong 
[\[161a.6\]]gi khye'u zhig mchis pa des lhung bzed shin tu gsal ba/_dbyibs legs pa/_longs spyad par bzod pa zhig rnyed nas de'i mchid nas gal te dge slong lhung bzed 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig mchis na de gtang du gsol zhes mchi'o/_/de ni de tsam du zad de/_de yang nye bar ma 
[\[161a.7\]]zhi ba tsam kho nar zad do/_/de nas nye dga' snam sbyar gyon te 'gros bskyed nas phya rar song ba dang /_spos 'tshong gi khye'u des de 'gros bskyed de 'ong ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bsams pa/_dge sbyong hral po 'gros 'di lta bus 'ong ba 'dis bdag gi lhung 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]bzed 'di phrogs par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas des lhung bzed de blangs te 'jong tshe'i 'og tu bcug ste bzhag pa dang nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de sbed pa'i tshe mthong nas des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci lhung bzed 'di nal gyi bu yin nam ci na de phyir sbed par byed ces des lag pa brkyang ste lhung 
[\[161b.2\]]bzed blangs nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]a rog gya sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog thob pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na snod du 'gyur bar gyur cig_/'phags pa bdag cag tshong pa 
[\[161b.3\]]dag ni khe spogs 'tshal bas 'tsho ba lags pas 'di rin ma mchis par mi dbul te 'di ltar rin gyi phyir 'bul lo/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci khyod drang srong gi snod 'tshong bar byed dam/_tshigs su bcad pa yang smras pa/_gal te skyes bu sa snod kyis/_/gser gyi snod ni 
[\[161b.4\]]thob gyur na/_/de yis mya ngan ci phyir bya/_/bslus pa med par kho bos mthong /_/'phags pa khyod mang du gsung mod kyi 'on kyang rin ma mchis par mi 'bul lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_khyod kyi lhung bzed la lhag par chags pa 'dis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lkog lba can 
[\[161b.5\]]dag gi nang du skye bar bya dgos so zhes de de skad spyo bar byed pa na khyim bdag cig phyogs der 'ongs nas des smras pa/_'phags pa phyag 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa nye dga' phyag 'tshal lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi phyag skam po 'dis ci bya/_
[\[161b.6\]]'phags pa bdag la btsun pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bka' stsal pa gang zhig bdag gis ma bsgrubs/_lhung bzed 'di nyos te byin cig_/khyim bdag des spos 'tshong gi khye'u de la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lhung bzed 'di rin ci tsam/_'di dang 'di tsam mo/_/kho bos khyod 
[\[161b.7\]]la sbyin no/_/spos 'tshong gi khye'u des lhung bzed de khyim bdag de la byin nas khyim bdag des kyang nye dga' la phul lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_a rog gya sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]mchog thob pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na snod du 'gyur bar gyur cig_/khyim bdag de song ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]spos 'tshong gi khye'u de la smras pa/_bkren pa khyod kyis nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]lhung bzed kyi rin spyod du 'jud mi nus snyam du shes sam/_khyod kyi lhung 
[\[162a.2\]]bzed la lhag par chags pa 'dis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lba ba can dag gi nang du skye bar bya dgos so/_/'phags pa ci zhig sbyor mchis/_khyod kyis kyang lhung bzed thob la/_bdag gis kyang rin thob kyis bzhud cig_/nye dga' yang lhung bzed khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas des lhung 
[\[162a.3\]]bzed de dge slong rnams la bstan te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ltos shig_/kho bo'i lhung bzed ci 'dra/_gzhon nu zhig gis smras pa/_gnas brtan ci khyod la lhung bzed gzhan ma mchis sam/_yod do/_/'o na gnas brtan gyis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed 
[\[162a.4\]]gzhan btsal du rung ngam/_dgra bo rnams kyi gre bar rkang pas mnan nas so/_/gnas brtan la dgra bo dag kyang mchis sam/_gang gi phyir khyod kho bo'i lhung bzed gnyis pa yang mi bzod pas je khyod kho bo'i dgra bo thu bo yin no/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag 
[\[162a.5\]]lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan tshol bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_
[\[162a.6\]]skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' 
[\[162a.7\]]khyod lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan tshol ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal bar mi bya'o//_//'dul ba 
[\[162b.2\]]rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas bsod snyoms pa zhig gi lhung bzed cung zhig rdol nas des de thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs 
[\[162b.3\]]pa dang des phye dag rnyed nas des de dag lhung bzed kyi snod kyis mnos so/_/'bras can gsher ba rnyed nas des de dag lhung bzed kyis mnos pa dang de nas zags pas phye dag gsher bar gyur te de dag gis lhung bzed kyi snod ma rung bar gyur nas de sbrang bu dag gis yongs su bskor bar gyur pa dang /_
[\[162b.4\]]de la khye'u dang /_bu mo dag gis smras pa/_'phags pas nor can dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon dag bzhin du 'khor mang por 'gyur ba'i las byas pas sbrang bu dag gis yongs su bskor cing bzhud do/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de mthong nas smras pa/_byis pa 
[\[162b.5\]]dag ci'i phyir 'phags pa la mtho 'tsham par byed/_khyim bdag 'phags pa la tho btsam du ci mchis/_'phags pas nor can dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon dag bzhin du 'khor mang por 'gyur ba'i las bgyis pas sbrang bu dag gis yongs su bskor cing bzhud do/_/khyim 
[\[162b.6\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dge slong de la smras pa/_'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa kun du mdzes pa la khyod ci cal col byed/_khyim bdag 'di la cal col du gyur pa ci yod/_khyod kyis kho bo rol mo mkhan gyi khyim dang /_'jud mthun ma'i khyim dang /_chang pa'i khyim dang /_
[\[162b.7\]]rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_gdol pa'i khyim du zhugs par mthong ngam/_'phags pa 'o na ci'i phyir khyod byis pa dag gis bskor te 'phya bar byed/_khyim bdag kho bo'i lhung bzed 'di zag go/_/'o na ci'i phyir lhung bzed gzhan mi tshol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed yod 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa khyod kyi lhung bzed 'di 'dra ba yod cing bdog pa yin nam zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[163a.2\]]pa/_gang gi lhung bzed rdol ba des glan par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi lhung bzed rdol ba des glan par bya'o/_/zhes bca' ba mdzad nas/_dge slong dag lhan pa snyi ba lnga po bu ram dang /_rgya skyegs kyi tshigs ma dang /_spra tshil dang /_ro nye dang /_tshon mo steng dag gis 
[\[163a.3\]]glon par byed nas/_de dag tsha ba dang phrad nas yang zags par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhan pa snyi ba lnga po de dag spangs te lhan pa sra ba lnga po gzhan dag gis glan par bya'o/_/dge slong 
[\[163a.4\]]dag gis lhan pa sra ba lnga po dag ci 'dra ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhan [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_tham phran dang /_lhan pa dang /_chu srin gyi so lta bu dang /_phye mas so/_/dge slong rnams kyis phye ma du yod mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phye ma 
[\[163a.5\]]gnyis te/_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_rdo'i phye ma'o/_/lcags kyi lhung bzed la ni lcags kyi phye mas glan par bya'o/_/sa'i lhung bzed la ni rdo'i phye mas glan par bya'o/_/de dag chur phye ma bdar te glon par byed nas de de bzhin du 'gogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[163a.6\]]'bru mar du bdar bas glan par bya'o/_/de dag ha cang drag tu sreg pas de 'gogs pa dang /_ha cang chung ngur sros pas mi 'chags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci ran tsam du bsro bar bya'o/_/ha cang rtsub por gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdar bar bya'o/_/
[\[163a.7\]]de dag chus blugs te bdar bar byed pas de yang 'gogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'bru mar blugs te bdar bar bya'o/_/sa las byas pa'i lhung bzed dag rdol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu ram dang /_'jim pas glan nas de dag bsro bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]'das kyis de ltar lhan pa lnga po dag gis glan par bya'o/_/zhes bca' bar mdzad nas/_dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig gis sa las byas pa'i lhung bzed lag pa nas shor te gyo dum lngar gyur nas/_des de dag bu gu phug ste gyo dum dag skud pas brgyus nas bsod snyoms la rgyu bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[163b.2\]]'das kyis lhung bzed la zas med par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas des de rung bar byed pa na bshig cing rgyud par byed pas snga dro thams cad zad par gyur nas dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ci khyod kyi dge ba'i phyogs 'di lta ste/_bcings pa 'grol ba 'di kho na yin nam/_des 
[\[163b.3\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed chag pa la lhan pa sra ba lnga po dag gis glan par bya'o/_/zhes bca' bar mdzad do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab 
[\[163b.4\]]pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la de dang rjes su mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon 
[\[163b.5\]]bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa/_spyad 
[\[163b.6\]]bzod pa yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol zhing lhung bzed grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong des lhung bzed de dge slong gi 'khor la dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la 
[\[163b.7\]]dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/_gtang bar mi bya/_gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste/_de la de ni cho ga yin no/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/lhung bzed 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]lhan pa lnga med pa zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed lhan pa lngar ma tshang ba'o/_/spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du zhes bya ba ni yongs su longs spyad par bzod pa yod bzhin du'o/_/bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mchog 'dod pa'i phyir ram/_yang dang yang 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/lhung 
[\[164a.2\]]bzed sar pa zhes bya ba ni sar pa gnyis te gsar pas sar pa dang /_rnyed pas sar pa ste/_don 'dir ni gnyis ka yin par dgongs so/_/gzhan zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o/_/tshol zhing zhes bya ba ni tshol bar byed cing ngo /_/lhung bzed grub na zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed thob na'o/_/spang 
[\[164a.3\]]ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/_/lhung bzed de zhes bya ba ni lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa de'o/_/dge slong gi 'khor 
[\[164a.4\]]la dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa la'o/_/dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/_gtang bar mi bya/_gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag 
[\[164a.5\]]pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste zhes bya ba la/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/_lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma 
[\[164a.6\]]bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa brims pa dang ma brims pa mi shes pa'o/_/lhung bzed 'brel 
[\[164a.7\]]pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_lhung bzed 'brel pa 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]med pa brims pa dang ma brims pa shes pa'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/_je dang por spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par spro'am/_gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu des gnas mal 
[\[164b.2\]]bsham pa byas te/_gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo ste/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_/dge 
[\[164b.3\]]slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim 
[\[164b.4\]]par bsko'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung 
[\[164b.5\]]bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 
[\[164b.6\]]'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par skos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ngas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_lhung bzed 
[\[164b.7\]]'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gis tshogs pa'i dus su dge 'dun la tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag sang dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par 'gyur gyis/_khyed cag nang par gaN+DI brdungs pa na rang rang gi lhung bzed dag thogs la dge 'dun gyi nang du gshegs par mdzod 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]cig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de nas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gis phyi de nyin par gnas mal bsham pa byas te/_gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 
[\[165a.2\]]lhung bzed dag byin gyis brlabs pa phyung zhing thogs te dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o/_/de nas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa thogs te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su phyag 'tshal 
[\[165a.3\]]nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/_gnas brtan lhung bzed 'di ni shin tu gsal ba/_dbyibs legs pa/_longs spyad par bzod pa lags kyis gal te bzhed na snoms shig ces yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa'i bsngags pa brjod de dbul 
[\[165a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kyang gal te 'dod na blang bar bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis lhung bzed de blangs na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi lhung bzed gang yin pa de gnas brtan gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gnas brtan gnyis pa'i lhung bzed gang yin 
[\[165a.5\]]pa de gnas brtan gsum pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gnyis pa'i lhung bzed gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyi sar bu la dbul ba'i bar du bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis ma blangs na gnas brtan gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gal te gnas brtan gnyis 
[\[165a.6\]]pas ma blangs na gnas brtan gsum pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gal te gnas brtan gsum pas ma blangs na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan slong bar byed na brjod pa dang po la sbyin par mi bya zhing brjod pa gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/brjod pa gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas 
[\[165a.7\]]brtan gyi 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gsum pas ma blangs na gsar bu gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gal te gsar bu gnyis pas ma blangs na gsar bu la dbul bar bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi gsar bus 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]blangs pa na gsar bu gsum pa slong bar byed na brjod pa dang po la sbyin par mi bya zhing /_brjod pa gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/brjod pa gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gsum pas 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags pa'i bar du bya'o/_/dge slong 
[\[165b.2\]]gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/_gtang bar mi bya/_gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya'o/_/lhung bzed 'brel 
[\[165b.3\]]pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyad par bya ba'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/ngas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'chang ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyad par bya ba'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 
[\[165b.4\]]'chang ba'i dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi snod gnyis nye bar gzhag par bya zhing de la bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /_cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/des lhung bzed gnyi ga thogs te bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya zhing
