[\[165b.5\]]gal te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na lhung bzed 'brel pa med pas blang bar bya'o/_/gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pas blang bar bya'o/_/gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas dkyil 'khor byas te lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa mdun du bzhag nas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs 
[\[165b.6\]]par bza' bar bya'o/_/zos zin nas byi dor dang /_kha zas 'bags pa'i dril phyi bya ba yang dang por lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa la bya zhing /_de'i 'og tu lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa la bya'o/_/bkru ba dang /_bskam pa dang /_lci bas brud pa la yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/gal te lhung bzed 
[\[165b.7\]]kyi ngos khung gnyis yod na bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /_cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te ngos khung gcig yod la gal te shod bzang na shod du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing /_ngos khung du 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te ngos khung bzang na ngos khung du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /_shod du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o/_/lhung bzed kyi las byed pa na gal te rdza bo gnyis yod na rdza bo bzang 
[\[166a.2\]]po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bsreg par bya zhing /_cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bsreg par bya'o/_/gal te rdza bo gcig yod na gal te 'og ma legs par tshos par 'gyur na 'og tu lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing /_steng du lhung bzed byin 
[\[166a.3\]]gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o/_/gal te steng du bzhag pa legs par tshos par 'gyur na steng du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing /_'og tu lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o/_/lam du 'gro ba na lhung bzed kyi snod gnyis bskur bar bya ste/_de la bzang po gang 
[\[166a.4\]]yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /_cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te khur tsha ba 'ga' zhig yod na de la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bskur bar bya zhing /_bdag nyid kyis lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bskur bar bya'o/_/
[\[166a.5\]]gal te khur tsha ba 'ga' yang med na phrag pa g.yon pas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bskur bar bya zhing /_phrag pa g.yas pas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bskur bar bya'o/_/'di ni re zhig chad pa'i las yin te tshul khrims yang dag par rjes su srung bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spyad par bya'o/_/
[\[166a.6\]]lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni de la de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[166a.7\]]dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gcig gis glan par 'os shing ma glan la spyad bzod pa yin na/_de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bzed chag kyang lhan pa gnyis kyis glan par 'os shing ma glan la spyad bzod pa yin na/_de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang 
[\[166b.2\]]lhan pa gsum gyis glan par 'os shing ma glan la spyad bzod pa yin na/_de la lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa bzhis 
[\[166b.3\]]glan par 'os shing ma glan la spyad bzod pa yin na/_de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gcig gis glan 
[\[166b.4\]]par 'os shing glan la spyad bzod pa yin na/_de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gnyis kyis glan par 'os 
[\[166b.5\]]shing glan la spyad bzod pa yin na/_de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa gsum gyis glan par 'os shing glan la 
[\[166b.6\]]spyad bzod pa yin na/_de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung bzed chag kyang lhan pa bzhis glan par 'os shing glan la spyad bzod pa yin 
[\[166b.7\]]na/_de lhung bzed spyad bzod pa de yod bzhin du lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi lhung bzed chag cing lhan pa lngas glan par 'os pa yin na de des [{]glan ka[,]klan ka[}\u0fb1]nga rung /_ma [{]glan ka[,]klan ka[}\u0fb1]nga rung /_
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]spyad bzod kyang rung /_spyad mi bzod kyang rung /_lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol bar byed na de tshol ba la yang ltung ba med la/_thob na yang ltung ba med do/_/rin gyis len pa dang /_brje bas len pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 
[\[167a.2\]]'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/lhung bzed tshol ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[167a.3\]]nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_'di dag thams cad khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i gzhi dag gis bsdams pas phyin chad ras yug phran sbom po gcig gi rin yang gang las kyang bslang bar mi nus kyis/_song ste bltas la gal te la la las bslang bar nus kyang 
[\[167a.4\]]srid do snyam nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du shar sgo nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_skyed mos tshal zhig na yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa 'khal zhing 'khod pa de dag des mthong nas bsams pa/_'di dag ni 
[\[167a.5\]]las bdag gir bya ba dang ldan pa dag gcig ste/_nyin mtshan du thong gshol dkar po spyod kyang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la sgyur dpya 'jal bar mi byed pa dag yin no snyam nas des de dag la smras pa/_sring mo dag a rog gya/_a rog gya/_de dag cang mi smra bar 
[\[167a.6\]]'khod pa dang des de dag la smras pa/_sring mo dag skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa dang /_skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /_skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa dang /_skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad dang thun mong ba 'di lta ste/_'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ong bar 'gyur 
[\[167a.7\]]bas khyed cag de'i tshe tshig smrar ni dang po nyid nas mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/de na gzhon nu ma bsod nams 'dod pa cig 'dug pa des stan las langs te nye dga'i stan bting ba dang /_nye dga' de la 'dug nas des nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug go/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]dag la smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed cag la dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya ba cung zad yod dam/_'phags pa ci yang ma mchis so/_/sring mo dag ma legs so/_/bu mo 'dis ni re zhig dge ba'i chos gnyis byas shing bsags te/_'dis kho bo la sems 
[\[167b.2\]]mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa des ni 'dis phyug por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no/_/'dis kho bo la mngon du ldang ba byas shing stan bting ba dang /_phyag byas pa gang yin pa des ni 'dis rigs mthon por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no/_/
[\[167b.3\]]gal te cung zad sbyin par byed na de ni 'di'i longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no/_/sring mo dag khyed cag gi 'tsho tshis dag ga las 'byung /_'phags pa sgyur ba 'di nyid las so/_/gos dag ga las 'byung /_sgyur ba 'di nyid las so/_/khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol 
[\[167b.4\]]tu 'gro ba'i lam rgyags cung zad khyer ba yod dam/_'phags pa de ni thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis so sring mo dag ma legs so ma legs so/_/'phags pa su la thugs ngan mdzad/_khyed cag la ste/_khyed cag 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bcom zhing 'dir 'ongs 
[\[167b.5\]]la/_'di nas bcom bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bar byed do/_/'phags pa gang gis bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi ba'i shul rgyags cung zad bskur ba'i thabs ci mchis/_sring mo dag gal te khyed kyis dge sbyong shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung 
[\[167b.6\]]ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrogs pa/_rigs pa dang /_grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la ras yug chen bskon na des khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam rgyags mang po khyer bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa bdag cag gis dge slong 
[\[167b.7\]]de lta bu ga las rnyed/_sring mo dag khyed kyis kho bo shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrogs pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par mi shes sam/_'phags pa bdag cag la ras yug chen gyi 'byor pa ga las mchis/_sring 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]mo dag khyed kyis/_bsod nams chung yang brnyas mi bya/_/de ni bdag la mi 'ong min/_/chu yi thigs pa 'dzag pa yis/_/snod chen gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin/_/brtan pa rnams kyis bsod nams ni/_/cung zad cung zad bsags na rdzogs/_/zhes bya ba de mi shes sam/_khyed kyis 
[\[168a.2\]]re zhig dog pa srang gcig sbyin nus sam/_rngo thog go/_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_bdag gis kyang srang byed dbul lo/_/gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/_bdag gis kyang srang gi bzhi cha cig dbul lo/_/de bzhin du thams cad kyis kyang shas shas kyis dbul bar 
[\[168a.3\]]khas blangs so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_sring mo dag dog pa phra mo dag byin cig_/'phags pa bdag cag thams cad ni sbom po 'khal ba dag lags so/_/bdag cag gi nang na bde gnas ma zhig ni phra mor 'khal lo/_/sring mo dag de je bos shig_/de dag gis de 
[\[168a.4\]]bos pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de la smras pa/_bu mo je dog pa phrar khol cig_/des phrar bkal ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bu mo de bas kyang phrar khol cig_/des de bas kyang phrar bkal ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]yang dang yang du bu mo de bas kyang phrar khol cig ces smras 
[\[168a.5\]]pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa 'di las phra bar ni rngo mi thog go/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de dag la smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed cag thams cad kyis dog pa 'di 'dra ba sha stag byin cig_/'phags pa bdag cag gis dog pa 'di 'dra ba 'khal du rngo mi thog go/_/bu mo 
[\[168a.6\]]'dis kyang mi nus sam ci/_khyed cag gis 'di'i don du 'khol la 'di khyed cag gi don du 'khal du chug shig_/'phags pa gal te btub na'o/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de la smras pa/_bu mo gyis shig dang khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa dog pa 'di ni phra bdar che ba lags 
[\[168a.7\]]pas yun ring mos bkal 'tshal gyis ha cang ngos drag tu ma mdzad par dus 'di tsam na spyon cig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de la a rog gya zhes smras nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/bde gnas ma des dus de srid kyis dog pa bkal nas de gzhan dag gi gan du song ste thams cad 'dus nas dog pa 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]de nye dga' la phul lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de dag la a rog gya sbyin pa 'dis khyed sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog thob pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo /_/de nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]
[\[168b.2\]]dog pa de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas/_des dge slong rnams la dog pa de bstan te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i dog pa ci 'dra ltos/_gnas brtan dog pa bzang ngo /_/gnas brtan gyis gang ras yug chen 'thag par 'gyur ba'i tha ga pa 'ga' btsal ba mchis 
[\[168b.3\]]sam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed kyis nye dga' zil gyis gnon tam/_gal te nye dga' rab tu ma byung du zin na nye dga' rang nyid 'thag par 'gyur ro/_/gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan gal zil gyis gnon/_'di ltar ra ba ga ge mo'i drung na tha ga pa spyi cer khyo shug mchis te/_
[\[168b.4\]]gal te des dog pa 'di rnyed du lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bu dag a rog gya don gyis na khyed kyis kho bo'i ras yug chen 'thag tu bcug go zhes des dog pa de khyer te tha ga pa de'i khyim du song ba dang /_des tha ga pa de thag ring po kho na nas mthong 
[\[168b.5\]]nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_mkhas pa ring nas rab snang ba/_/gangs dang ldan pa'i ri bo bzhin/_/mi mkhas rab tu mi snang ba/_/mun pa'i nang du mda' 'phangs bzhin/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi grags pas mnyan yod thams cad gang bar gyur pa ni khyod kyis 
[\[168b.6\]]rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/_/dog pa 'di ci 'dra je ltos shig_/'phags pa dog pa bzang ngo /_/dog pa ni 'di lags la thag pa ni bdag lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen du 'gyur ro/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thogs shig_/'phags pa bdag la 
[\[168b.7\]]thags gla sus stsol bar 'gyur/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod rtag pa nyid du thags glas mi ngoms sam/_'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i lam rgyags kyang bskur bar gyis shig_/de la chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras 'dis thag ring po kho na nas bdag cag gnyis kyi bsngags pa 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]brjod kyis 'di'i ras yug chen thogs shig_/'phags pa dog pa 'di phra bdar che ba lags kyis yun 'di tsam na spyon cig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]a rog gya zhes smras te song ngo /_/tha ga pa des ras yug chen de dus de tsam gyis btags so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]
[\[169a.2\]]yang dus de tsam gyis der song ba dang tha ga pa des de la ras yug chen de phul lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas des dge slong rnams la ras yug chen de bstan te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i ras yug chen ci 'dra ltos/_gnas brtan 
[\[169a.3\]]ras yug chen bzang ngo /_/'di ltar gang la 'di lta bu gnyis pa yang mchis pa de ni sar pa las snam sbyar nyi rim du bgyis te dge ba'i phyogs la snying las chung ngus tron bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyod kyi snying lam na nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ras yug chen 'di 'dra ba 
[\[169a.4\]]gnyis sbyor du 'jud mi nus snyam mam/_ji ltar sbyor du 'jud pa ltos shig_/de nas nye dga' snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du nub sgo nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_skyed mos tshal zhig na yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa 
[\[169a.5\]]'khal zhing 'khod pa de dag des mthong nas bsams pa/_'di dag ni las bdag gir bya ba dang ldan pa dag cig ste/_nyin mtshan du thong gshol dkar po spyod kyang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la sgyur dpya 'jal bar mi byed pa dag yin no snyam nas des de dag 
[\[169a.6\]]la smras pa/_sring mo dag a rog gya a rog gya/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang des de dag la smras pa/_sring mo dag skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa dang skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /_skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa dang /_skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad 
[\[169a.7\]]dang thun mong pa 'di lta ste/_'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ong bar 'gyur bas khyed cag de'i tshe tshig smrar ni dang po nyid nas mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/de na gzhon nu ma bsod nams 'dod pa cig 'dug pa des stan las langs te nye dga'i stan bting ba dang nye dga' de la 'dug nas 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]des nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug go/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de dag la smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed cag la dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya ba cung zad yod dam/_'phags pa ci yang ma mchis so/_/sring mo dag ma legs so/_/bu mo 'dis ni re zhig 
[\[169b.2\]]dge ba'i chos gnyis byas shing bsags te/_'dis kho bo la sems mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa des ni 'dis phyug por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no/_/'dis kho bo la mngon du ldang ba byas shing stan bting ba dang phyag byas pa gang yin pa des ni 'dis 
[\[169b.3\]]rigs mthon por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin no/_/gal te cung zad sbyin par byed na de ni 'di'i longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no/_/sring mo dag khyed cag gi 'tsho tshis dag ga las 'byung 'phags pa sgyur ba 'di nyid las so/_/gos dag ga las 'byung /_sgyur 
[\[169b.4\]]ba 'di nyid las so/_/khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i lam rgyags cung zad khyer ba yod dam/_'phags pa de ni thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis so/_/sring mo dag ma legs so ma legs so/_/'phags pa su la thugs ngan mdzad/_khyed cag la ste/_
[\[169b.5\]]khyed cag 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bcom zhing 'dir 'ongs la/_'di nas kyang bcom bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro bar byed do/_/'phags pa gang gis bdag cag gis 'jig rten pha rol du mchi ba'i shul rgyags cung zad bskur ba'i thabs ci mchis/_sring mo dag 
[\[169b.6\]]gal te khyed kyis dge slong shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrogs pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la ras yug chen bskon na des khyed cag gis 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i lam rgyags mang po khyer bar 'gyur 
[\[169b.7\]]ro/_/'phags pa bdag cag gis dge slong de lta bu ga las rnyed/_sring mo dag khyed kyis kho bo shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrogs pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin par mi shes sam/_'phags pa bdag cag la 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]ras yug chen gyi 'byor pa ga las mchis/_sring mo dag khyed kyis/_bsod nams chung yang brnyas mi bya/_/de ni bdag la mi 'ong min/_/chu yi thigs pa 'dzag pa yis/_/snod chen gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin/_/brtan pa rnams kyis bsod 
[\[170a.2\]]nams ni/_/cung zad cung zad bsags na rdzogs/_/zhes bya ba de mi shes sam/_khyed kyis re zhig dog pa srang gcig sbyin nus sam/_rngordo thog go/_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_bdag gis kyang srang phyed dbul lo/_/gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/_bdag gis 
[\[170a.3\]]kyang srang gi bzhi cha cig dbul lo/_/de bzhin du thams cad kyis kyang shas shas kyis dbul bar khas blangs so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_sring mo dag dog pa phra mo dag byin cig_/'phags pa bdag cag thams cad ni sbom po 'khal bdag lags so/_/bdag cag 
[\[170a.4\]]gi nang na bde gnas ma zhig ni phra mor 'khal lo/_/sring mo dag de je bos shig_/de dag gis de bos pa dang nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de la smras pa/_bu mo je dog pa phrar 'khol cig_/des phrar bkal ba dang nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bu mo de bas kyang phrar 'khol cig_/des de bas kyang 
[\[170a.5\]]phrar bkal ba dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]yang dang yang du bu mo de bas kyang phrar 'khol cig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa 'di las phra bar ni rngo mi thog go/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de dag la smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed cag thams cad kyis dog pa 'di 'dra ba sha stag byin cig_/
[\[170a.6\]]'phags pa bdag cag gis dog pa 'di 'dra ba 'khal du rngo mi thog go/_/bu mo 'dis kyang mi nus sam ci khyed cag gis 'di'i don du 'khol la/_'di khyed cag gi don du 'khal du chug shig_/'phags pa gal te btub na'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de la smras pa/_bu mo gyis shig 
[\[170a.7\]]dang khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa dog pa 'di ni phra bdar che ba lags pas yun ring mos bkal 'tshal gyis ha cang ngos drag par ma mdzad par dus 'di tsam na spyon cig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de la a rog gya zhes smras nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/bde gnas 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]ma des dus de srid kyis dog pa bkal nas de gzhan dag gi gan du song ste thams cad 'dus nas dog pa de nye dga' la phul lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de dag la a rog gya/_sbyin pa 'dis khyed sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don 
[\[170b.2\]]gyi mchog thob pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi gos dag thob par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo /_/de nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]dog pa de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song nas des dge slong rnams la dog pa de bstan te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i dog pa 'di ci 'dra ltos/_
[\[170b.3\]]gnas brtan dog pa bzang ngo /_/gnas brtan gyis gang ras yug chen 'thag par 'gyur ba'i tha ga pa 'ga' btsal ba mchis sam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed kyis nye dga' zil gyis gnon tam/_gal te nye dga' rab tu ma byung du zin na nye dga' rang nyid 'thag par 'gyur 
[\[170b.4\]]ro/_/gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan gal zil gyis gnon/_'di ltar ra ba ga ge mo'i drung na tha ga pa spyi cer khyo shug mchis te/_gal te des dog pa 'di rnyed du lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bu dag a rog gya de don gyis na 
[\[170b.5\]]khyed kyis kho bo'i ras yug chen 'thag tu bcug go zhes des dog pa de khyer te tha ga pa de'i khyim du song ba dang /_des tha ga pa de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_mkhas pa ring nas rab snang ba/_/gangs dang ldan pa'i ri bo bzhin/_/mi mkhas 
[\[170b.6\]]rab tu mi snang ba/_/mun pa'i nang du mda' 'phangs bzhin/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi grags pas mnyan yod thams cad gang bar gyur pa ni khyed kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/_/dog pa 'di ci 'dra je ltos shig_/'phags pa dog pa bzang ngo /_/dog pa ni 'di 
[\[170b.7\]]lags la tha ga pa ni bdag lags na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen du 'gyur ro/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di yang thogs shig_/'phags pa bdag la thags gla sus stsal bar 'gyur/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod rtag pa nyid du thags glas mi ngoms sam/_'jig rten pha rol 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]du 'gro ba'i lam rgyags kyang bskur bar gyis shig_/'phags pa ras yug chen snga ma de 'thag pa na bdag gis bu lon gang dag blangs pa de dag kyang da dung ma 'khor ro/_/des chung ma'i gdong du blta bar brtsams pa dang /_chung mas smras pa/_
[\[171a.2\]]'phags pa gal te 'di 'tshal yang bdag ni mi 'tshal lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]spyos te smras pa/_kwa'i tha ga pa spyi cer nyon cig_/kho bos gal te khyod ras yug chen 'di 'thag tu ma bcug na spyi cer gyi mgo 'dis mna' 'dor ro/_/tha ga pa des kyang spyos te smras pa/_kwa'i dge sbyong 
[\[171a.3\]]mgo reg nyon cig_/kho bo gal te khyod kyi ras yug chen 'thag na mgo reg gi mgo 'dis mna' 'dor ro/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]spyos te song nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pho brang gi yid brten pa che ba zhes bya ba nye dga'i mdza' bo zhig yod de/_nye dga' de'i 
[\[171a.4\]]sdum par song ste/_g.yog 'khor dag la smras pa/_kye nang rje dag che ba gar song /_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa srang du mchis so/_/nye dga' de 'ong ba'i srang du song ba dang /_che ba chang 'tshong ba'i tshong rdal zhig tu zhugs so/_/nye dga' tshong rdal de'i sgor bsdad 
[\[171a.5\]]de che ba la nye dga' sgo na sdod kyis phyir byung shig ces phrin spring ba dang /_che ba phyir byung nas smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_che ba kho bos ko khyod rgyal po'i bya ba dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa dag la brtson par gyur 
[\[171a.6\]]snyam du bsams kyis/_kho bos khyod 'di ltar chang 'tshong ba'i khyim nas chang 'tshong ba'i khyim du 'phyan par ni ma bsams so/_/'phags pa bdag rgyal po'i dgos pas 'dir zhugs so/_/btsun pa nye dga' byon pa'i dgos pa ci mchis/_che ba dog pa cung zhig rnyed 
[\[171a.7\]]pa 'dis re zhig ras yug chen 'thag tu chug shig_/bdag gis btsun pa nye dga' la ras yug chen nyid dbul lo/_/de yang bskur na ci dad pas sbyin par bya ba 'di dor bar bya'am/_che bas mi zhig la bsgo ba/_kye nang rje tha ga pa'i sna bo'i gan du song la 'phags 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]pa nye dga'i ras yug chen 'di thogs la phul cig ces gyis shig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_'di tha ga pa'i sna bo 'thag tu ma gzhug par 'di ltar ra ba ga ge mo zhig gi drung na tha ga pa spyi cer khyo shug 'dug pa des 'di btag par bya'o/_/che bas mi de la smras pa/_kye nang 
[\[171b.2\]]rje tha ga pa spyi cer de'i gan du song la 'di skad ces che ba na re 'di thogs la byin cig ces zer ro zhes gyis shig_/mi des dog pa de khyer te tha ga pa spyi cer gyi gan du song ste smras pa/_kye spyi cer che ba'i zhal nas 'di thogs la byin cig ces gsung ngo /_/spyi cer gyis dog pa 
[\[171b.3\]]de ngo shes nas des smras pa/_bdag gis res 'khor ro/_/mi de song ste che ba la smras pa/_tha ga pa spyi cer gyi mchid nas bdag gi res 'khor ro zhes mchi'o/_/che bas smras pa/_kye nang rje spyi cer gyi gan du song la 'di skad ces res gzhan byed du mi gzhug go zhes 
[\[171b.4\]]gyis shig_/mi de song ste smras pa/_kye spyi cer che ba'i zhal nas res gzhan byed du mi gzhug go zhes gsung ngo /_/spyi cer gyis smras pa/_kye nang rje che ba mnyan yod du dbang byed na kho bo mnyan yod du mi gnas par zad mod/_kho bo skal ba ma yin pa'i las mi byed do/_/
[\[171b.5\]]mi de che ba'i gan du song ste smras pa/_spyi cer gyi mchid nas che ba mnyan yod du dbang byed na kho bo mnyan yod du mi gnas par zad mod/_kho bo skal ba ma yin pa'i las mi byed do zhes mchi'o/_/che bas smras pa/_kye nang rje tha ga pa'i sna bo'i gan du song la dog pa 'di 
[\[171b.6\]]las ras yug chen thogs shig ces bgyi shig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_'di tha ga pa'i sna bos btag par mi bya bar 'di ltar tha ga pa spyi cer gyis btag par bya'o/_/che bas mi de la smras pa/_kye nang rje tha ga pa spyi cer gyi gan du song la/_che ba na re skom zong sbyin gyis 
[\[171b.7\]]ras yug chen thogs shig ces zer ro zhes gyis shig_/de 'phags pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de la smras pa/_bkren pa khyod su zhig gis rgyal po'i mir bzhag_/khyod lcag rgod mang pos brdabs te sa dang shing dag skyed du gzhug par bya ba yin no/_/tha ga pa spyi cer gyi gan du 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]song ste 'di skad ces che ba'i zhal nas ras yug chen thogs shig ces byung ngo /_/zhes zer mi nus sam/_gal te mi 'thag go zhes zer na thor to dag nas bzung ste khug la khu tshur gyis gtogs shig gal te ngu na thags mi mthun par dril cig_/gal te 
[\[172a.2\]]de'i chung ma ngu na lan bu nas bzung ste drang bar bya zhing /_khyed gnyis kyis che ba'i mchid bcag pas khyed gnyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya gzhal dgos pa'i gyod la bsgrin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de lta na kho bo'i ras yug chen yang 'grub 
[\[172a.3\]]par 'gyur la khyod kyis kyang gsug mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de song ste smras pa/_che ba'i zhal nas skom zong sbyin gyis ras yug chen thogs shig ces byung ngo /_/spyi cer gyis smras pa/_kho bo skal ba ma yin pa 'thag mi nus so/_/des de'i thor to dag nas bzung 
[\[172a.4\]]ste bkug nas khu tshur gyis btags so/_/des ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_des de'i thags mi mthun par dril bar brtsams so/_/de'i chung mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_des de'i lan bu nas bzung ste drang bar brtsams shing khyed gnyis kyis che ba'i mchid bcag pas 
[\[172a.5\]]khyed gnyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya gzhal dgos pa'i gyod la bsgrin par byas tshur shog_/rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo zhes des de gnyis khrid de 'phags pa dang /_chung mas spyi cer la smras pa/_rje'i sras gal te bdag cag gnyis 
[\[172a.6\]]btson rar bcug par gyur na bdag cag gnyis la thar bar byed pa 'ga' yang med pas btson rar gnod pa dag gis 'chi bar bya dgos kyis ras yug chen 'di thogs shig_/spyi cer gyis smras pa/_kye nang po bdag cag rgyal po'i pho brang du ma bkri bar dog pa zhog la bzhud 
[\[172a.7\]]cig dang bdag gis ras yug chen yang btag cing khyod la yang gsug mang po dbul lo/_/des dog pa bzhag ste song ba dang spyi cer gyis chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo ras yug chen 'di gang gis dog par yang mi rung la ras yug chen du'ang mi rung bar 'gyur ba de ltar 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]btag par bya'o/_/chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras de dge sbyong hral po de lta bu yin pas bdag cag gis ras yug chen de lta bur byas na des btang re skan/_des ras yug chen de btags nas de ras yug chen de thags las 'grol zhing 'dug pa na nye dga' yang 'ongs 
[\[172b.2\]]nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ras yug chen de blangs pa dang /_spyi cer gyis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag la skom zong stsol cig_/bkren pa kho bo khyod kyi skom zong dbul ba yin nam/_dug ci'i phyir mi brgyud/_nur rtsi ci'i phyir mi brgyud/_de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong 
[\[172b.3\]]gi tshul ni tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_'di ltar kha'i chos cung zad kyis kyang 'thag tu bcug go/_/rgyal po'i pho brang gi mthu cung zad kyis kyang 'thag tu bcug go zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[172b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad 
[\[172b.5\]]pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun 
[\[172b.6\]]pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon 
[\[172b.7\]]bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang rang gis bslangs pa'i dog pas tha 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]ga pa nye du ma yin pa las gos 'thag tu 'jud na gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/rang gis bslangs pa'i dog pas zhes bya ba ni 'dun pas la la las srang 
[\[173a.2\]]gcig_/la la las srang phyed/_la la las zho gnyis/_la la las zho gcig bslangs pa'i dog pas so/_/tha ga pa zhes bya ba ni thags mkhan no/_/nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_mes po dang /_phrugs las brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/_de 
[\[173a.3\]]phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/_/gos 'thag tu 'jud na zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos la ba gang yang rung ba'o/_/gos grub na 
[\[173a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags pa bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te tha 
[\[173a.5\]]ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes 
[\[173a.6\]]byas su 'gyur la/_tha ga pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid kyis 'thag par byed na/_de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[173a.7\]]dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du dang nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_tha ga pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do/_/tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la 
[\[173b.2\]]spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nye du ma yin pa las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/tha ga pa nye du la 'thag tu 'jud 
[\[173b.3\]]pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/_tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te 
[\[173b.4\]]tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/_tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la yang ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid kyis 'thag par byed na de slong ba la ltung ba med la bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas 
[\[173b.5\]]nyid du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/_tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la yang ltung ba med do/_/tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung 
[\[173b.6\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/_bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jud pa la spang ba'i ltung 
[\[173b.7\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nye du las dog pa bslangs te bdag nyid dang tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud na de slong ba la ltung ba med la/_bdag nyid kyis 'thag pa la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/tha ga pa nye du la gos 'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do/_/gla rngan gyis 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]'thag tu 'jud pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/'thag tu 'jud pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas 
[\[174a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/
[\[174a.3\]]khyim bdag de dus gzhan zhig na gzhan gyi chung ma la chags par gyur nas de la chung mas rje'i sras de lta ma mdzad cig ces phyir zlog na/_ji tsam du de phyir bzlog kyang ma log pa de tsam du de'i chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'khrul pa rtsom par byed do/_/khyim 
[\[174a.4\]]bdag de yang bud med gzhan dag la sbyin par byed la/_chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pas de ltar khyim de gnyis ka rgud par gyur nas de gnyis la bu mo mngag gzhug ma zhig yod nas khyim bdag des bu mo de la 'dis khyim rgud par byas so zhes 
[\[174a.5\]]khu tshur dang /_thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed do/_/bu mo des smras pa/_bdag gis khyim rgud par gyur pa 'di ci las gyur pa 'tshal mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gis ji ltar rje dag la bsngags pa ma lags pa brjod par bgyir rung /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de tshor nas khyim 
[\[174a.6\]]bdag de dang khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i gan du song ste ci nas kyang de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod nas des 
[\[174a.7\]]de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par byas so/_/khyim bdag de gtum pa/_brtun ngas pa/_drag shul che ba yin pas yang bu mo de la brdeg par brtsams pa dang /_chung mas de la smras pa/_rje'i sras gang gi tshe 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]bdag cag las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi mkhyen pa de'i tshe go rdeg par mdzad mod/_da bdag cag dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa nye dga' la brten nas las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pas 'di ltar 'jig rten ni rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa lags 
[\[174b.2\]]pas su zhig su'i bran lags/_bu mo 'di la rdeg par ma mdzad cig_/bzang mo khyod zer ba mnyes so/_/bu mo tshur shog_/khrus gyis la shog shig_/bu mo de khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang /_des de la gos phrugs gcig bskon nas smras pa/_bu mo dga' zhing las 
[\[174b.3\]]byos shig_/bu mo des bsams pa/_khyim bdag khyo shug 'di sngon gtum pa/_brtun ngas pa/_drag shul che ba yin te/_yang dang yang du bdag la khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis rdeg par byed cing zas dang gos ngan pa dag sbyin par byed na/_da 'di bdag gi pha ma dang 
[\[174b.4\]]'dra bar gyur to snyam nas/_yang bsams pa/_gang tshun cad nas 'phags pa nye dga' khyim 'dir 'jug par brtsams pa de tshun chad nas khyim bdag 'di pha ma dang 'dra bar gyur pas bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la ci zhig gis dga' bar bya snyam nas des bsams pa/_gal 
[\[174b.5\]]te bdag gis 'di las chung zhig brkus te dbul du ni khyim bdag 'dis bdag brdeg btsog mang po byas te sngon gyi gnas su bzhag par 'gyur ro snyam nas de sdod cing 'dug go/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma des khyim bdag de la smras pa/_rje'i sras mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'phags pa 
[\[174b.6\]]nye dga' ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/_'phags pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bdag cag las dri ma can dang phral nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod de/_yang dang yang du bdag cag la chos kyis sdud par byed pas bdag cag gis kyang de 
[\[174b.7\]]la zang zing cung zad kyis bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/bzang mo de bzhin bya'o/_/rje'i sras bdag gis dog pa 'jam po bkal te/_dog pa de las tha ga pa che ge mo zhig la ras yug chen 'thag tu stsal cing slad kyis ras yug chen bskon par bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag des dog pa de tha ga 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]pa la byin nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis dog pa 'di las ras yug chen thogs shig dang 'phags pa nye dga' la dbul bar ba'o/_/de ltar bya'o/_/bu mo des de thos nas bsams pa/_bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dga' ba de sbran 
[\[175a.2\]]par bya'o snyam mo/_/nye dga' yang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs pa dang /_bu mo des khyim legs par byugs shing phyag dar bor nas/_
[\[175a.3\]]des nye dga' mthong ba dang rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_bdag gis 'phags pa nye dga' la dgyes pa sbran par bgyi'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis kho bo la dga' ba ci zhig sbran par bya/_khyim bdag 'di khyod la ras yug chen 'bul bar 'gyur ro/_/nye 
[\[175a.4\]{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_sa'i steng na 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag dang bdag mnyam par deng bu mo 'dis kyang 'phrigs so snyam du rig nas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo ci kho bo la tho 'tsham par byed dam/_bu mos smras pa/_bdag ci'i 
[\[175a.5\]]slad du 'phags pa la tho 'tsham par bgyid/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bu mo gal te bden par gyur na ni ngas khyod la gshe ba dag la chugs ma bya'o/_/ji ste [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par gyur na ni brdeg btsog mang po byed du bcug ste sngon gyi gnas ji lta bar gzhag par bya'o/_/'phags pa gal te 
[\[175a.6\]]bdag la thugs mi ches na phyogs ga ge mo zhig na tha ga pa mchis pa der bzhud cig dang khyod nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/de der song ste tha ga pa la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ras yug chen 'thag pa 'di su'i yin/_'phags pa btsun pa nye dga'i lags so/_/khyod 
[\[175a.7\]]kyis nye dga' shes sam/_ma 'tshal to/_/de ni kho bo yin no/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]srid du 'di tsam gyis srings shig_/'phags pa dog pa sus stsol bar 'gyur/_khyim bdag de nyid kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/kho bos kyang khyod la cung zhig nye bar bsgrub par 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]bya'o/_/nye dga' phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i khyim du zhugs nas/_des de'i stan bting ba dang /_de de la 'dug 
[\[175b.2\]]nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas nye dga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/des de la chos bstan nas des smras pa/_'phags pa ci lags/_deng spyan drangs sam/_bsod snyoms mdzad/_bsod snyoms bgyid do/_/des bsams 
[\[175b.3\]]pa su zhig bdag pas bsod snyoms ches bzang ba 'bul bar 'gyur snyam nas des de la hwags kyi la thu dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de dag blangs te tha ga pa de'i gan du song nas des de la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]je lag pa gnyis zed cig_/
[\[175b.4\]]des lag pa gnyis bzed pa dang /_des de la la thu gcig byin nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]je zo shig_/des de zos pa dang /_des de la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la thu'i ro ci 'dra/_'phags pa bda'o/_/khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' la thu 'di 'dra ba 
[\[175b.5\]]zos sam/_'phags pa lan 'ga' yang ma 'tshal to/_/thu ba zed cig_/des thu ba bzed pa dang /_des de'i thu bar la thu thams cad blugs te smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo'i ras yug chen 'di legs par thogs shig_/kho bos khyod la phyis kyang la thu [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]nye 
[\[175b.6\]]bar bsgrub par byas zheng du 'di tsam gyis skyed cig_/'phags pa dog pa bas par gyur na sus stsol bar 'gyur/_khyim bdag de nyid kyis sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/des ras yug chen de 'thag pa na dog pa zad nas de khyim bdag de'i gan du song ba dang /_ji tsam na khyim 
[\[175b.7\]]bdag gi chung ma ni med/_khyim bdag ni 'dug nas tha ga pa des khyim bdag de la smras pa/_khyim bdag ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis dog pa byin cig khyim bdag des byin te btang ngo /_/yang 'thag pa na dog pa zad pa nas de yang khyim bdag de'i 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]gan du song ba dang /_ji tsam na khyim bdag ni med khyim bdag gi chung ma ni 'dug nas tha ga pa des khyim bdag gi chung ma de la smras pa/_sru ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis dog pa byin cig_/des byin te btang ngo /_/yang 'thag pa na dog 
[\[176a.2\]]pa zad nas de khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang /_ci tsam na khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma gnyi ga 'dug nas tha ga pa des khyim bdag de la smras pa/_khyim bdag yang ras yug chen de btag pa'i dog pa zad kyis yang dog pa byin cig_/khyim bdag gi chung 
[\[176a.3\]]mas smras pa/_kye tha ga pa ci ras yug chen de bskyed dam/_khyim bdag gis chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo ci khyod kyis kyang 'di la dog pa byin nam/_stsal to/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_kye tha ga pa ci ras yug chen de bskyed dam/_tha ga pas smras pa/_khyim 
[\[176a.4\]]bdag ci deng bskyed par brtsams snyam mam/_nyi ma gang kho na la btsun pa nye dga' mchis nas 'di skad ces srid du 'di tsam gyis srings shig_/zheng du 'di tsam gyis skyed cig ces mchi ba'i nyi ma de kho na la bskyed par brtsams so/_/khyim bdag gi chung mas bsams 
[\[176a.5\]]pa/_ras yug chen de ci 'dra ji ltar 'gro 'o snyam nas de der song ba dang /_ji tsam na chen po la 'os pa'i ras yug chen mthong ngo /_/de mthong nas de'i mig khrag gis gang ste smras pa/_kho mos ras yug chen 'di 'phags pa nye dga' la mi byin no/_/kho mos de'i don du 
[\[176a.6\]]ras yug chen gzhan zhig 'thag tu gzhug go zhes zer te song ngo /_/nye dga' dus dang dus su der 'ongs nas smras pa/_kye tha ga pa rung ngam/_'phags pa bdag gi ni rung na khyod kyi ni mi rung ngo /_/kye tha ga pa ji ltar gyur/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag gi chung 
[\[176a.7\]]ma mchis par gyur te des ras yug chen mthong nas de'i mig khrag gis gang ste/_kho mos 'phags pa nye dga' la ras yug chen 'di mi sbyin no/_/kho mos de'i don du ras yug chen gzhan 'thag tu gzhug go zhes mchi ste mchis so/_/kye tha ga pa khyod la kho bos cung zhig 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]byas pa yod pa shes sam/_des smras pa ci'i slad du ma 'tshal/_bdag da dung yang khyod kyi la thu dag 'tshal zhing mchis so/_/kye tha ga pa gang gi tshe kho bo khyim der 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe na khyod kyis ras yug chen 'di khyer shog shig_/'phags pa je bzhud cig dang 
[\[176b.2\]]bdag gis kyang kha tshar bkal te mchi'o/_/nye dga' de'i khyim du song ste sgo'i thad kar 'dug pa dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te kha sgor lta zhing mdun du 'dug go/_/tha ga pa des kyang ras yug chen de'i kha tshar dril nas de khyer te der song ba 
[\[176b.3\]]dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma des de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des lag brdas ma 'ong shig ces byas pa dang /_tha ga pa des phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas ltos bzung bas mgo smad de nang du zhugs nas des ras yug chen de khyim bdag gi chung ma de'i 
[\[176b.4\]]pang du bzhag pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]tsham tshom med par blangs te smras pa/_a rog gya sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog 'thob pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi gos thob par gyur cig_/
[\[176b.5\]]khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/_'phags pa khyim bdag gis rang gi sug pa nas dbul gyis slar stsol cig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_kho bos 'di je rung bar byas/_de'i 'og tu khyim bdag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan skon du gzhug go/_/khyim bdag gi chung mas 
[\[176b.6\]]smras pa/_'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog dkar po bsngags so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_drang srong gi rgyal mtshan skon du chug shig ces smras nas langs te song ngo //_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa lnga pa/_tha ga 
[\[176b.7\]]pas smras pa/_khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag la gla byin cig_/des smras pa/_kho mo'i ras yug chen gcig kyang 'phrog tu bcug nas gla gzhan yang ded dam/_song la khyod kyis gang la ras yug chen byin pa de nyid la gla dos shig_/de nye dga'i gan du song ste 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]smras pa/_'phags pa bdag la gla stsol cig_/song la khyim bdag gi chung ma de nyid la dos shig_/'phags pa khyim bdag gi mchis brang de mchid 'bo zhing 'di skad ces khyod kyis gang la ras yug chen byin pa de nyid la gla dos shig ces mchi'o/_/
[\[177a.2\]]nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_song shig dang byin par 'gyur ro/_/tha ga pa de yang de'i gan du song ste smras pa/_khyim bdag gi btsun mo bdag la gla byin cig_/des smras pa/_kwa'i khyo ga khyod 'dug mi phod dam/_gal te 'dug na ni 'dug shig_/mi 'dug na kho mos 
[\[177a.3\]]khyod kyi mgrin par chol zangs btags te mnyan yod thams cad du bskor bar bya'o/_/tha ga pa de yang nye dga'i thad du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa khyim bdag gi mchis brang des bdag spyos te/_kwa'i khyo ga khyod 'dug mi phod dam/_gal te 'dug na ni 'dug shig_/
[\[177a.4\]]mi 'dug na kho mos khyod kyi mgrin par chol zangs btags te mnyan yod thams cad du bskor bar bya'o zhes mchi yis 'phags pas bdag la gla stsol cig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_kye nang rje gal te gang gis kho bo'i ras yug chen 'thag tu bcug pa de'i gla kho bo 
[\[177a.5\]]'jal bar gyur na kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang med par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang tshur shog rtsis byas khyod kyis kho bo las bag phye'i rin dang /_zhun mar dang /_hwags la sogs pa ji tsam khyer ba dag khod cig ces rtsis byas pa dang /_ji tsam na ches lhag 
[\[177a.6\]]par khyer bar gyur nas/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]tha ga pa de yud tsam zhig nyi tshan la btags te btang ngo /_/tha ga pa de shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_de ltar lhag pa kho na bya'o zhes zer la 'bri ba kho nar byed do zhes 
[\[177a.7\]]smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu 
[\[177b.2\]]de byas par gyur pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/
[\[177b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga 
[\[177b.4\]]ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu bcug pa las de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par 
[\[177b.5\]]rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung nas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par gyis shig_/gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa gos 'di zheng che ba dang /_khrun ring ba dang /_thar gyis zhag pa dang /_
[\[177b.6\]]thags ran bzang bar legs par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa 'di ltar kho bos gla rngan 'di lta ste/_bza' ba'am/_bca' ba tsam mam bza' rgyu cung zad sbyin no zhes smras nas/_de la gal te dge slong des gos bsgrub pa'i phyir gla rngan 'di lta ste/_bza' 
[\[177b.7\]]ba'am/_bca' ba tsam mam/_bza' rgyu cung zad cig sbyin zhing gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/khyim bdag ces bya ba ni skyes pa'o/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]zhes bya ba ni bud med do/_/nye du ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_mes po dang /_phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/_de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/_/tha ga pa zhes bya ba ni tha gas mkhan no/_/nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_
[\[178a.2\]]mes po dang /_phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la/_de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no/_/gos 'thag tu bcug pa las zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_ko tam 
[\[178a.3\]]pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o/_/de na gal te dge slong de la zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' la'o/_/sngar ma bstabs par zhes bya ba ni sngar mgron du ma bos par ro/_/rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung nas zhes bya ba ni bsnyen bkur 
[\[178a.4\]]byed pa 'ga' zhig byung nas so/_/tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste zhes bya ba ni drung du song ste'o/_/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par gyis shig_/gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid nye bar ston par byed pa'o/_/zheng che ba 
[\[178a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni rgyar che ba'o/_/khrun ring ba zhes bya ba ni chur ring ba'o/_/thar gyis zhag pa zhes bya ba ni 'jur mdud med pa'o/_/thags ran bzang bar zhes bya ba ni byer zug snyoms pa dang /_shas bzang ba dang /_sad sed med par ro/_/bza' ba'am zhes bya ba ni 
[\[178a.6\]]bza' ba lnga po dag go/_/bca' ba tsam mam zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dag go/_/bza' rgyu zhes bya ba ni bza' ba'i rgyu'o/_/de la gal te dge slong des zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]so/_/gos bsgrub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gos thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/gos grub 
[\[178a.7\]]na zhes bya ba ni gos thob na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam du go sa bsgrub pa'i phyir khri 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]las ldang bar byed/_gos dag dang /_sham thabs gon par byed/_lag pa dang /_lhung bzed 'khru bar byed/_bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed/_bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga dag slong bar byed/_tha ga pa la sbyin par byed cing ji srid du gos thob par mi byed kyi bar du 
[\[178b.2\]]nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gos thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu gos 'thag tu bcug gis de khyod kyis blta bar bya'o zhes sngar bstabs par gyur na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa 
[\[178b.3\]]dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/'thag pa skyed pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dga' bo la 
[\[178b.4\]]lhan cig gnas pa chos zhes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa bsdams pa/_bslab pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des ji srid du de gnas ngan len kun tu spyod par mi shes pa de srid du de dang lhan cig gnas so/_/gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun tu spyod par shes pa 
[\[178b.5\]]de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[178b.6\]]la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig 
[\[178b.7\]]ces bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig_/dga' bos thos te/_thos nas kyang nye dga' la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' shes par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams 
[\[179a.2\]]la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/_khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo na/_gal te 
[\[179a.3\]]bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni sgo 'phar brgya dag 'das te ci nas kyang lto dgang ba bsgrub par bya dgos so/_/ji ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod par gsungs pas srog chags brgya 
[\[179a.4\]]stong phrag du ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro bar 'gyur bas/_gal te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro na re zhig chu yang rnyog pa can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/_shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis bdag cag dge slong 
[\[179a.5\]]rab tu bshes pa 'ga' zhig khrid de/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing mdun du dong na de lta na bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_slob dpon re zhig gser 
[\[179a.6\]]gyi snod spangs te sa'i snod kyis bsod snyoms rgyu bar byed dam/_khyod kyi lhan cig gnas pa chos lta bu ngo tsha shes pa/_'gyod pa dang ldan pa/_bsdams pa/_bslab pa 'dod pa su la yod/_des kho bo mthong bar yang mi 'dod do/_/slob dpon bcom 
[\[179a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don mthun pa gang dag bka' stsal pa de dag las slob dpon gyis 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te 'jud par byas pa yod dam/_de ni thams cad kyi thams 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]cad du med do/_/de'i phyir khyod kyi gnas skabs de lta bu der gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa chos kyi snam sbyar rnyings nas des ras yug chen zhig rnyed nas bsams pa/_bdag song la mkhan po la zhus te snam sbyar btsem par bya'o snyam nas/_des de khyer te dga' 
[\[179b.2\]]bo'i gan du 'phags pa dang /_de 'gro ba na bsod snyoms pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa chos gar 'gro/_des smras pa/_kho bo'i snam sbyar rnyings te kho bo'i ras yug chen 'di rnyed pas bdag song ste mkhan po la zhus la snam sbyar btsem 
[\[179b.3\]]par bya'o/_/bsod snyoms pas smras pa/_gal te khyod snam sbyar sar pa gzhan 'tshem na snam sbyar rnying pa 'di kho bo la byin cig_/de bzhin bya'o/_/de dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa/_mkhan po bdag gi snam sbyar rnyings te bdag gis ras yug chen 
[\[179b.4\]]'di rnyed pas snam sbyar btsem par zhu'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa slob dpon 'di ni de'i dus lags so/_/dga' bos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa chos kho bo nyid la snam sbyar zhig yod pa de kho bos khyod la sbyin no/_/mkhan po mi 'tshal te bdag gis ras yug 
[\[179b.5\]]chen 'di las snam sbyar drubs te bcang bar bgyi'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa chos kho bos ko gzhan thos la gzhan mthong ste/_kho bos khyod ngo tsha shes pa/_'gyod pa dang ldan pa/_bsdams pa/_bslab pa 'dod pa yin par shes kyi/_kho bos 
[\[179b.6\]]khyod 'di ltar mkhan po'i chos dang ldan pa'i tshig gcog par mi shes so/_/ci khyod mkhan po dang mi mthun pa'i don yang dag par len par byed dam/_de dge slong dbang chen pos smad pas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_dga' bos kyang de la snam sbyar byin no/_/
[\[179b.7\]]des de blangs nas smras pa/_mkhan po khyod ras yug chen 'di bzhes shig_/tshe dang ldan pa chos ci kho bos khyod la brje ba'i phyir snam sbyar byin nas ras yug chen yang khyod nyid khyer cig_/des bsams pa/_bdag la yo byad don med pa 'dis ci bya/_bdag 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul bar bya zhing snam sbyar rnying pa 'di yang bsod snyoms pa de la sbyin pa mkhan po la zhu'o snyam nas smras pa/_mkhan po bdag gis ras yug chen 'di dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyi zhing snam sbyar rnying pa 'di 
[\[180a.2\]]yang bsod snyoms pa zhig gis bslangs pas de la stsal bar bgyi ba mkhan po la zhu'o/_/de bzhin gyis shig_/des ras yug chen de dge 'dun la phul zhing snam sbyar rnying pa de yang bsod snyoms pa de la byin no/_/phyi de nyin par de snam sbyar de gyon te mkhan po'i 
[\[180a.3\]]rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang /_dga' bos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa chos shes par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs 
[\[180a.4\]]kyis/_khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo na/_gal te bdag cag 'di nyid du 'dug na ni sgo 'phar brgya dag 'das te ci nas kyang lto gang ba bsgrub par bya 
[\[180a.5\]]dgos so/_/ji ste bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod par gsungs pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro bar 'gyur bas gal 
[\[180a.6\]]te bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro ba na re zhig chu yang rnyog pa can dag btung dgos par 'gyur la/_shing ljon pa'i drung du yang go thob par mi 'gyur gyis/_bdag cag sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing mdun du dong na de 
[\[180a.7\]]lta na bdag cag bde bar rgyu bar 'gyur zhing /_rnyed pa mang po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/mkhan po bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mchis par bka' stsal pa gang dag lags pa de dag mkhan po la nyes dmigs kho nar gyur te 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]bdag ni re zhig bcom ldan 'das nyid dang thabs cig mchi'o/_/dga' bos smras pa/_kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo /_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyid dang lhan cig mchi'o/_/dga' bos spyos te smras pa/_ngan pa ci kho bos khyod la chos la chos nyid 
[\[180b.2\]]bzang pos snam sbyar byin snyam mam/_khyod kho bo dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i phyir byin pa yin na gal te kho bo dang lhan cig mi 'gro na snam sbyar 'on cig khyod la mi sbyin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa chos kyis bsams pa/_bdag la chos gos phrogs pa ni bla'i bdag gnas ngan len 
[\[180b.3\]]kun tu spyod pa dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam nas des de la snam sbyar phyir byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/_grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor 
[\[180b.4\]]dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/_thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis 
[\[180b.5\]]yongs su bskor ba/_glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis 
[\[180b.6\]]yongs su bskor ba/_bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs 
[\[180b.7\]]su bskor ba/_ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]su bskor ba/_zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi 
[\[181a.2\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba/_thags zangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa 
[\[181a.3\]]gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/_spyod lam dang /_spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/_chu gter ltar ting nge ba/_sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/_glang po 
[\[181a.4\]]che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/_'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_rin 
[\[181a.5\]]po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pu pa/_nyag gcig dpa' ba/_
[\[181a.6\]]gnyis pa med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 
[\[181a.7\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_yan lag lnga spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_
[\[181b.2\]]stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa/_'khor nyan thos chen po tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_ga ya 'od srung dang /_chu klung 'od srung la sogs pa 
[\[181b.3\]]sngon gyi ral pa can stong dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos mdun du bdar te ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyur gshegs pa rnams ni chos 
[\[181b.4\]]nyid kyis na sku thams cad kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis la las legs par ma bgos pa dang /_legs par ma bcangs par ma gyur tam snyam du rnam par gzigs par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku thams cad kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po 
[\[181b.5\]]che'i lta stangs kyis rnam par gzigs pa na tshe dang ldan pa chos chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong dbyar gnas pa rnams kyi chos 
[\[181b.6\]]gos kyi rnyed pa ma grub bam/_bcom ldan 'das grub bo/_/'o na ci'i phyir dge slong chos chos gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro/_/des skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[181b.7\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong la gos byin nas 'phrog par byed dam/_btsun pa 'phrog par bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la rmas pa/_dga' bo khyod kyis dge 
[\[182a.2\]]slong la gos byin nas yang phyir phrogs pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam 
[\[182a.3\]]par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya 
[\[182a.4\]]ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas 'phrog gam 'phrog tu 'jud 
[\[182a.5\]]cing /_de la 'di skad ces dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na dge slong des lhag ma yod pa phyir sbyin par bya zhing btang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu dga' bo'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[182a.6\]]dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/_/byin nas 
[\[182a.7\]]zhes bya ba ni phyir sbyin mi dgos par ro de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o/_/khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khro ba ma sangs par ro/_/'phrog gam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/'phrog tu 'jud cing zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/_/lhag ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i lhag ma gang yod pa'o/_/phyir sbyin par bya zhing zhes bya ba ni gtang bar bya zhing ngo /_/btang na zhes bya ba ni lus dang bral bar byas na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni 
[\[182b.2\]]dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_lus g.yo bar byed pa dang /_tshig rjod par byed pa dang /_de gnyis ka dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan dag gis so/_/
[\[182b.3\]]de la ji ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas zhe na/_dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas lus kyis rtul bar byed cing 'dren par byed khrid par byed la/_tshig gis dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin 
[\[182b.4\]]cig ces ni mi zer na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_gos kyi grwa lus la bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/_de ltar lus g.yo bar byed pas so/_/ji ltar tshig rjod par byed pas zhe na/_dge slong gis dge 
[\[182b.5\]]slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces tshig rjod par byed la lus kyis rtul bar mi byed na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_gos kyi 
[\[182b.6\]]grwa lus las bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/_de ltar tshig rjod par byed pas so/_/ji ltar de gnyis ka dang ldan pas zhe na dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas lus kyis kyang rtul bar byed cing tshig gis 
[\[182b.7\]]kyang dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/_de ltar gnyis ka dang ldan pas so/_/ji ltar gzhan 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]dag gis zhe na dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/_gos kyi grwa lus las 
[\[183a.2\]]bral bar byed na gnyi ga la spang ba'i ltung byed re rer 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong ma 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 
[\[183a.3\]]'gyur la/_gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge slong ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/_dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slob ma 'phrog tu 'jud na ji 
[\[183a.4\]]srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge slob ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/_dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og 
[\[183a.5\]]tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge tshul 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 'gyur ro/_/gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na dge tshul la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/_dge slong la spang 
[\[183a.6\]]ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge tshul ma 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du gnyis ka la nyes byas re rer 'gyur la/_gos kyi grwa lus las 
[\[183a.7\]]bral bar byed na dge tshul ma la nyes byas nyid du 'gyur la/_dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas khyim pa 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]byed pa de srid du khyim pa la bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur zhing /_dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na khyim pa la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing /_dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[183b.2\]]gis dge slong la gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas khyim pa mo 'phrog tu 'jud na ji srid du gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar mi byed pa de srid du khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing /_dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur 
[\[183b.3\]]la/_gos kyi grwa lus las bral bar byed na khyim pa mo la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur zhing /_dge slong la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/_de ltar gzhan dag gis so/_/don gzhan dang 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis ni ltung ba med do/_/ji ltar don gzhan gyis 
[\[183b.4\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_slob dpon dang /_mkhan po'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su dus ma yin pa dang /_chu klung gi kha'am/_yur po che'i khar 'gro ba de dag la slob dpon dang /_mkhan pos chom rkun pa dang /_g.yon 
[\[183b.5\]]can dag gis gos dag phrogs par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu 'jud pa ste/_de ltar don gzhan gyis so/_/ji ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong rnams kyi lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_
[\[183b.6\]]sdig pa'i zla bo dang /_sdig pa'i sten grogs dag dang lhan cig sdig pa sten cing lam du 'gro bar gyur na de dag la mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyis 'di dag sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_sdig pa'i zla bo dang /_sdig pa'i sten grogs la sten par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pas 
[\[183b.7\]]gos dag 'phrog gam 'phrog tu 'jud pa ste/_de ltar 'dul ba'i yo byad kyis so/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/'phrog pa'i spang ba ste nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ri brag zhig na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig 'dug pa des dgon par dge 'dun gyi gtsug 
[\[184a.2\]]lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa mthongs khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_lan kan gyis brgyan pa/_snying dang mig 'phrog par byed pa/_mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa/_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_yo byad phun sum tshogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/_de na dge 
[\[184a.3\]]slong drug bcu gnas pa de dag la khyim bdag des chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms la sogs pa mkho ba stobs par byed do/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas khyim bdag de la bu zhig yod pa de'i gan du dge slong de dag dong ste smras pa/_
[\[184a.4\]]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi phas dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba bstabs pa byas par gyur na khyod kyis kyang kho bo cag dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba stobs par byed nus sam/_des smras pa/_
[\[184a.5\]]'phags pa dag la la ni brgya la bsnyen bkur byed/_la la ni stong la/_la la ni 'bum la bsnyen bkur byed pa yang yod/_la las ni bdag nyid kyang gso bar dka' bas bdag gis rngo mi thog go/_/de nas dge slong de dag gtsug lag khang de nas dong ngo /_/rgan zhugs ri 
[\[184a.6\]]brag de nyid nas rab tu byung ba gnyis zhig bsod snyoms brgyus nas gtsug lag khang de nyid na 'khod do/_/byang lam nas don mthun dag lhags nas de dag gis gtsug lag khang de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de dag der dong ste tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la 
[\[184a.7\]]phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na gtsug lag khang stong par 'dug nas de dag gis bsams pa/_dge slong dag nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs sam/_yang na nyin mo spyod du dong gor ma chag snyam nas de dag de na yongs su bskor ba na rgan zhugs 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]de gnyis mthong nas de dag gis de gnyis la smras pa/_'phags pa gnyis dge slong dag gar dong /_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'di na dge slong dag mi 'khod do ji'i slad du/_khyim bdag gang gis gtsug lag khang 'di byed du bcug pa des dge 
[\[184b.2\]]slong drug bcu la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba bstabs par byas par gyur te dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas dge slong rnams kyis de la bu zhig yod pa de'i gan du song ste bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi phas dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms 
[\[184b.3\]]la sogs pa mkho ba bstabs par byas par gyur na khyod kyis kyang kho bo cag dge slong drug bcu la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms la sogs pas mkho ba stobs par byed nus sam zhes smras na/_de na re 'phags pa dag la la ni brgya la bsnyen bkur byed/_la la ni stong la/_
[\[184b.4\]]la la ni 'bum la bsnyen bkur byed pa yang yod/_la las ni bdag nyid gso bar dka' bas bdag gis rngo mi thog go zhes zer nas dge slong de dag dong ngo /_/kho bo cag gnyis ni bsod snyoms brgyus nas gtsug lag khang 'di nyid na 'khod do/_/ded dpon gyis smras pa/_
[\[184b.5\]]shes ldan dag bdag cag yun ring po nas smon pa/_kye ma bdag cag gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byed du gzhug cing gtsug lag khang byed du bcug nas dge slong rnams la mkho ba bstabs par bya'o snyam na/_gtsug lag khang 'di ni byas zin pa yin pas gtsug lag 
[\[184b.6\]]khang 'di nyid du dge slong rnams la mkho ba bstabs par bya'o zhes des ras yug chen bting ste/_shes ldan dag khyed cag las gang gis ji yongs su btang ba de 'dir phul cig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis kyang ji 'byor pa der phul nas der rnyed pa mang po 'dus par 
[\[184b.7\]]gyur pa dang ded dpon gyis rgan zhugs de gnyis la smras pa/_'phags pa gnyis 'di ni dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms lags so/_/'di ni brgyad ston dang /_bcu bzhi ston dang /_nya ston gyi bsod snyoms lags so/_/'di ni na ba'i rkyen dang /_
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]sman gyi yo byad lags so/_/'di ni rnyed pa lags so/_/'di ni chos gos kyi zong lags kyis dge slong bzang po dag spyan drongs shig_/bdag cag dbyar 'das nas 'dir mchis te dge slong brgya la mkho ba bstabs par bgyi'o zhes smras te dong 
[\[185a.2\]]ngo /_/rgan zhugs gcig gis smras pa/_rgan zhugs dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa sus sba bar bya/_cig shos kyis smras pa/_gang gzhon pas so/_/de gnyis las gang gzhon pas rnyed pa de sbas nas des smras pa/_rgan zhugs mnyan yod nas dge slong dag 
[\[185a.3\]]bod na der gang 'gro bar bya/_rgan pas smras pa/_gang gzhon pa 'gro bar bya'o/_/gzhon pas smras pa/_kho bos rnyed pa sbas kyis khyod der song shig_/rgan pa shos mnyan yod du dge slong sbron du song ngo /_/drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram 
[\[185a.4\]]ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/_rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' 
[\[185a.5\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba smin ma 'phyang ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas des bsams pa/_dge slong gnas brtan zhig 'ong ba 'di gang yin bsu'o snyam nas des de la gnas brtan 
[\[185a.6\]]byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs so/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_de na re slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo zhes zer nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_kye ma 'di ni rgan zhugs zhig ste slob dpon yang mi shes/_mkhan po yang mi shes so snyam nas des de la smras 
[\[185a.7\]]pa/_rgan zhugs ga las 'ongs/_ri brag gi gtsug lag khang ga ge mo zhig nas mchis so/_/rgan zhugs ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/_'on te phongs pa yin gtsug lag khang ni ci 'dra/_phongs pa ni ci 'dra/_gang na yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa ni gtsug 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]lag khang yin la/_gang na yo byad thams cad dang bral ba ni phongs pa yin no/_/de sngon ni phongs par gyur la/_da ni gtsug lag khang du gyur to/_/ji ltar gyur byang lam nas don mthun dag lhags nas de dag gis der dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms 
[\[185b.2\]]dang /_brgyad ston dang /_bcu bzhi ston dang /_nya ston dang /_na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad dang /_rnyed pa dang /_chos gos kyi zong dag phul nas 'di skad ces 'phags pa dge slong bzang po dag bos shig_/bdag cag kyang dbyar 'das nas 'dir mchis te dge slong 
[\[185b.3\]]brgya la mkho ba bstabs par bgyi'o zhes mchi'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_'on tang khyod dge slong rkur 'ongs mod/_lags so/_/rgan zhugs ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /_rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /_khyim 
[\[185b.4\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /_bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /_rnying pa dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /_legs skyes dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can mang po gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong rnams la yo byad thams cad 
[\[185b.5\]]kyis bsnyen bkur byas shing /_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyi ma re re zhing yon bshad pa byed pa na yang gnas 'dir dge slong gang dag ma 'ongs pa de dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing 'ongs pa dag kyang mngon par dga' bar gyur cig ces zer la/_de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_
[\[185b.6\]]chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_na ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag gis brel ba med cing bcom ldan 'das kyang mngon sum du chos ston par mdzad pas 'di na chos kyi longs spyod dang /_zang zing gi longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa yin 
[\[185b.7\]]pas gal te dge slong rnams kyis khyod dge slong rkur 'dir 'ongs par shes par gyur na khyod gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyis/_dge slong gzhan la de skad ma zer cig_/'di ltar kho bo cag mi drug re re la 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]yang 'khor bcu bcu yod pas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'ong ngo /_/slob dpon bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mchis te slad kyis mchi'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig gis 'di mthong zhing 
[\[186a.2\]]de thos nas dang po kho nar 'gro bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod kyis lha ni yid kyis bskor ba yin gyi lus kyis bskor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ma thos sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_chos rnams yid kyis 'dren byed cing /_/yid gtso yid 
[\[186a.3\]]kyi 'gros can yin/_/zhes gsungs kyis/_'di nyid nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshol cig ces des de'i gnya' ba nas bzung ste rgan zhugs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gyis shig
