[\[186a.4\]]ces 'dud du bcug go/_/slob dpon skom gyis ji skom 'thung du mchi'o/_/'di nyid du sdod cig dang kho bos skom gyis phor bu bkang ste khyer te 'ong ngo zhes des skom gyis phor bu bkang ste blud nas smras pa/_rgan zhugs da song shig ces des de thag ring por bskyal nas da phyir 
[\[186a.5\]]ma ldog cig ces bsgo ste bdag nyid phyir log go/_/drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ci thos pa de phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe gcig tu 'dus nas phan tshun rjod par byed pa yin pas nye dga' gtsug lag khang du song ste drug sde rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[186a.6\]]dag bdag cag gis yun ji srid kyis brel ba spang bar bya/_khyod kyis thos pa chung zhig yod dam/_yod de/_ri brag gi gtsug lag khang ga ge mo zhig tu byang lam nas don mthun dag lhags nas de dag gis der dge slong drug bcu'i dbyar zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms 
[\[186a.7\]]dang /_brgyad ston dang /_bcu bzhi ston dang /_nya ston dang /_na ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag rnyed pa dang chos gos kyi zong dag phul gyis der dong ngo /_/ci de nyid du dbyar gnas par bya'am/_mi bya ste/_'di ltar dbyar gyi nang nyid du de dag zos te 'di nyid du 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]'ongs la dbyar phyi ma nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su gnas par khas blang bar bya'o/_/de dag der 'ong ba dang rgan zhugs gnyis kyis de dag thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so zhes de gnyis kyis de dag gi 
[\[186b.2\]]gnas khang dag bskos shing gnas mal dang /_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_chu ra dang /_phor bu dang /_chu tshags dang /_lde mig kyog po dag phog go/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag don gang gi phyir lhags pa de je brtag par bya'o snyam nas de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[186b.3\]]rgan zhugs gnyis 'dir rnyed pa ci grub pa dag ji bltas 'on cig_/rgan zhugs de gnyis drang po'i rang bzhin can yin pas de gnyis kyis 'di ni dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms so/_/'di ni brgyad ston no/_/'di ni bcu bzhi ston no/_/'di ni nya ston 
[\[186b.4\]]no/_/'di ni na ba'i rkyen to/_/'di ni sman gyi yo byad do/_/'di ni 'di'i rnyed pa'o/_/'di ni chos gos kyi zong ngo zhes rnyed pa de dag thams cad bstan no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag rgan zhugs ser sna can yin pas zas bsod pa sbyin par mi nus la 'di 
[\[186b.5\]]ltar rgan zhugs 'di gnyis kyis dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pas yongs su spang ba sbyin no zhes de dag gis de gnyis la yongs su spang ba sbyin nas de gnyis kyang bdag cag gnyis kyis yongs su spang ba thob bo zhes dga' bar gyur to/_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[186b.6\]]ldan pa dag dge slong lto mdun can 'ga' zhig la bcol na des dge 'dun la nyi ma re re zhing bca' ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang /_legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba yang 'brim par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis dge slong lto mdun can 
[\[186b.7\]]zhig la bcol ba dang /_des de dag la nyi ma re re zhing bca' ba rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang /_legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba yang 'brim par byed pas dus cung zad cig gis bsod snyoms thams cad spyad pa dang /_dge 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]bskos kyis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun gyi gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi bungs zhig mchis so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs pa de dag ni 
[\[187a.2\]]brgyad ston dang /_bcu bzhi ston dang /_nya ston byed la/_bdag cag bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa dag de mi byed kyis de yang bza'o zhes de dag gis de yang zos pa dang /_dge bskos kyis yang rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag da ni 
[\[187a.3\]]dge 'dun gyi na ba'i rkyen dang yo byad dag gcig mchis so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ji srid du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'tsho ba de srid du bdag cag rtag tu nad pa yin pas na ba'i sman de yang bza'o zhes de dag gis de yang zos nas de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[187a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa dag khur ya gcig na 'dug par dka' ba yin gyis gos kyi rnyed pa 'di yang bgos la/_khur do mnyam pas bde bar 'dong bar bya'o zhes de dag gis de yang bgos pa dang /_dge bskos kyis yang rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/_da ni dge 'dun 
[\[187a.5\]]gyi gdugs gcig kho na'i spyi bu ngas las ma mchis so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_rgan zhugs gnyis khyed gnyis na re dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms yod do zhes zer na dbyar gyi nang du zad par gyur to/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_ci de dag gis bca' ba 
[\[187a.6\]]rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_tshod ma snum bag can mang po sna tshogs dag dang /_legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sha stag rims shig ces smras sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_rgan zhugs gnyis gnya' ba smad de spyod spyod la da smod par byed kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di gnyis 
[\[187a.7\]]gnas nas dbyung ba'i las gyis shig_/kha cig gis smras pa/_rgan zhugs gnyis myur du bzod pa gsol cig_/phyis bzod pa gsol na ltag pa'i spu byi bar 'gyur ro/_/de gnyis kyis bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang /_kha cig gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]pa dag rgan zhugs 'di gnyis drang po'i rang bzhin can yin gyis 'di gnyis la bzod pa gyis shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_rgan zhugs gnyis bzod par bya'o/_/ri brag 'di ni ma dad pa mang bas 'dir bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed kyis gal te lhag rol cung zad 
[\[187b.2\]]yod na de yang byin cig_/'on te med na ni kho bo cag 'dong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ci yang med kyis deng shig_/de dag de nas dong ste mnyan yod du song nas de dag der phyin pa dang dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs so/_/dbyar 'das pa dang don mthun de dag yang 
[\[187b.3\]]lhags nas de dag gis de bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te/_gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na gtsug lag khang stong par mthong nas de dag gis bsams pa/_dge slong dag nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs sam/_
[\[187b.4\]]nyin mo spyod du dong gor ma chag snyam nas/_de dag de na yongs su bskor ba na rgan zhugs de gnyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa gnyis dge slong dag gar dong /_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'di na dge slong dag mi 'khod do/_/'phags pa gnyis bdag cag 
[\[187b.5\]]gis dge slong drug bcu'i zla ba gsum gyi bsod snyoms ma phul lam/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_dge slong dag lhags par gyur nas de dag gis dbyar gyi nang nyid du thams cad zos te dong ngo /_/khyed gnyis kyis dge slong gang dag khrid de 'ongs/_drug sde dag go/_/
[\[187b.6\]]'phags pa gnyis khyed gnyis rgya mtsho chen por dong nas nor bu mching bu dag khyer te 'ongs so/_/de na dge slong gzhan dag med dam ci na drug sde dag khrid de 'ongs/_de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_'di ltar 
[\[187b.7\]]bdag cag gi dad pa'i myu gu skyes ma thag tu bcom mo zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[188a.2\]]drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgos pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin 
[\[188a.3\]]pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams 
[\[188a.4\]]kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgo bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis dbyar 
[\[188a.5\]]gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgo bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[188a.6\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dang /_chos byin gnyis las skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ni spong ba ma 'khor yang spong ba ma dang ldan pa yin la/_chos byin ni mdo sde'i mtha' pa 'khor yang mdo sde'i mtha' pa dang 
[\[188a.7\]]ldan pa yin te/_de gnyis dbyar khang cig tu gnas par khas blangs nas gang gi tshe/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'khor rnam par langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na chos byin gyis rang gi 'khor la nu mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de thams cad skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI las brten pa yin la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhan gyi sems srung ba'i gang zag ni bsod nams mang du skyed par byed do/_/zhes gsungs kyis/_khyed cag 
[\[188b.2\]]kyang re zhig mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya ba sgoms shig ces 'doms par byed cing /_de dag kyang mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya ba sgom par rtsom mo/_/gang gi tshe chos byin gyi 'khor rnam par langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI yang rang gi 'khor la nu mo dag 
[\[188b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyod pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de thams cad sems can la phan pa'i rgyu yin la/_bcom ldan 
[\[188b.4\]]'das kyis kyang gzhan gyi sems srung ba'i gang zag ni bsod nams mang po skyed par byed do zhes gsungs kyis/_khyed cag kyang re zhig mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i mtha' dag kha ton gyis shig ces 'doms par byed cing /_de dag kyang mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[188b.5\]]mdo sde'i mtha' dag kha ton du byed par rtsom mo/_/dge slong ma dag de ltar phan tshun sems rjes su srung bas dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te/_chu med pa nas ut+pa la bzhin no/_/chos byin la dge bsnyen sa ga zhes bya ba mngon par dad pas des yo byad thams cad 
[\[188b.6\]]kyis de mgron du bos so/_/dus gzhan zhig na dge bsnyen sa ga chos byin gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang /_chos byin gyis de la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag dbyar khang gcig tu gnas par khas blangs pas de dag phan tshun 
[\[188b.7\]]sems rjes su srung bas dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phel te chu med pa nas ut+pa la bzhin du gyur na khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi phyir dbyar khang byed du 'jud nus sam/_des smras pa/_'phags ma bdag la kAr ShA pa Na dag ni mchis nas gzhi rgyal po dbang 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]bas sa gzhi'i slad du rgyal po la gsol ba mdzod cig dang der bdag gis dbyar khang bgyid du stsal to/_/dge slong ma chos byin btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i gan du song ba dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan mas smras pa/_'phags ma byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs 
[\[189a.2\]]so/_/'phags ma sku don ci zhig gi slad du byon/_bdag dge slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid du stsol bar 'tshal na/_sa gzhi rgyal po dbang bas sa gzhi'i slad du rgyal po la gsol ba bgyi bar 'tshal lo/_/'phags ma khyod bzhud cig dang /_bdag gis 'phags 
[\[189a.3\]]ma'i slad du lha la gsol bar bgyi'o/_/chos byin song ba dang btsun mo phreng ldan ma ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du song ste des smras pa/_lha khyod kyi pho brang du 'phags ma chos byin byon par gyur pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/de ci'i slad du byon/_de dge 
[\[189a.4\]]slong ma'i dbyar khang zhig bgyid du stsol bar bzhed nas/_dog sa rgyal po mnga' bas dog sa'i slad du rgyal po la gsol ba bgyid ces mchi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te 'phags ma chos byin re zhig gnas 'di nyid du bzhed na yang de 'di nyid du bzhugs la rag ste/_nga'i 
[\[189a.5\]]pho brang gzhan du byed du gzhug go/_/gal te mi bzhed na gang du dgyes pa de dbyar khang bgyid du stsol la rag go/_/btsun mo phreng ldan mas chos byin la lhas 'phags ma la dam pa gsol te/_gal te 'phags ma chos byin gnas 'di nyid du bzhed na yang de 'di nyid du bzhugs 
[\[189a.6\]]la rag ste nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed du gzhug go/_/gal te mi bzhed na gang du dgyes pa der dbyar khang bgyid du stsol la rag ces byung ngo zhes spring ngo /_/chos sbyin gyis dge bsnyen sa ga la ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag la dam pa byin te/_gal te 
[\[189a.7\]]'phags ma chos byin re zhig gnas 'di nyid du bzhugs la rag ste nga'i pho brang gzhan du byed du gzhug go/_/gal te mi bzhed na gang du dgyes pa der dbyar khang bgyid du stsol la rag ces byung ngo zhes spring ngo /_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ral gri'i mthu 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]can dang /_rgyal rigs bzang po pa zhes bya ba'i khrom gnyis yod pa las/_ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom dmag gi gnas su song ba dang /_de dag gi chung ma rnams skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed pas phyogs de go skabs dben par gyur nas 
[\[189b.2\]]chos byin gyis smras pa/_phyogs 'dir dbyar khang byed du chug shig_/dge bsnyen sa gas phyogs der dbyar khang byed du bcug nas dge slong ma rnams kyis der gnas par brtsams so/_/ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dmag gi gnas nas phyir 'ongs te/_de dag gis 
[\[189b.3\]]chung ma de dag bkug cing bkug cing brdeg par brtsams pa dang /_srang dag na de dag ngu ba'i sgra rta'i skad dang /_glang po che'i skad lta bu'i skad mthon po dang /_skad chen po dag byung ngo /_/dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags ma bdag cag dgung char gyis 'jigs 
[\[189b.4\]]pas dang la kha'i 'og tu zhugs so/_/chos byin gyis bsams pa/_'di dag las kha cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba yod dam snyam du bsams na/_yod par mthong ngo /_/su la rag lus snyam du bsams na bdag nyid la rag lus par mthong nas des smras pa/_nu mo dag gdul 
[\[189b.5\]]ba la ltos pas thams cad bzod par bya'o/_/chos byin gyis phyogs gcig tu gyo mo sar pa bzhag ste dge slong ma rnams la smras pa/_nu mo dag khyed cag gang la sder lhag yod pa de thams cad gyo mo 'dir chug shig_/de dag la sder lhag ci yod pa de thams cad 
[\[189b.6\]]gyo mo der 'jud par byed do/_/de na byis pa dag der 'ong bar gyur nas chos byin gyis de ni khye'u gang dag yin pa de dag la ni 'bru mar byin nas gcig gis gcig gi mgo skud du bcug ste rang gi lag gis bca' ba dag sbyin par byed do/_/bu mo gang dag yin pa de dag la ni 
[\[189b.7\]]bdag nyid kyis 'bru mar gyis mgo bskus nas rang gi lag gis bca' ba dag sbyin par byed do/_/byis pa de dag gis de dag khyer te rang rang gi khyim dag tu dong ba dang de dag gi ma dag gis dris pa/_khyed cag la 'di dag sus byin/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags ma 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]chos byin gyis so/_/chung ma de dag gis bsams pa/_don gyis na 'phags ma chos byin ni bdag cag la ma ma'i bya ba mdzad do snyam du rig nas de la mngon par dad par gyur te/_de dag gis bsams pa/_gang gi tshe bdag cag gi khyim thab dag dmag gi 
[\[190a.2\]]gnas su 'dong ba de'i tshe na bdag cag gis khyim thab dag bskyal nas 'phags ma chos byin la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo/_/dus gzhan zhig na de dag gi khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas su 'phags pa dang /_chos byin gyis de dag 'dul ba'i dus shes nas gtsug lag 
[\[190a.3\]]khang chag chag btab/_legs par byugs/_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bskus te 'dag rdzas dang /_chu dang /_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_pog por bzhag nas dge slong ma skad snyan pa dag bskos te bsdad pa dang /_chung ma de dag kyang khyim thab dag 
[\[190a.4\]]bskyal te chos byin gyi drung du lhags nas chos byin gyis de dag la 'dag rdzas dang /_lag pa bsnyal ba'i chu dang /_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_pog por dag byin nas tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gong 
[\[190a.5\]]du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de dag kyang de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/_/chos byin gyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas ji nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs 
[\[190a.6\]]la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa byas so/_/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_'phags ma bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma la brten nas 
[\[190a.7\]]'phags mas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang 
[\[190b.2\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_
[\[190b.3\]]'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_'phags ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/_bdag cag dge bsnyen mar 
[\[190b.4\]]gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas skyabs su mchi'o/_/de dag mngon par dad par gyur nas khyim khyim du dong ste khyim chag chag btab/_legs par byugs/_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bskus te spyod lam zhi bas 'khod do de dag gi 
[\[190b.5\]]khyim thab dag dmag gi gnas nas phyir 'ong ba na bsams pa/_bdag cag gi chung ma glang po che 'tsho ba'am/_ba lang rdzi'am/_su zhig dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed cing 'dug snyam mo/_/de dag gis bdag cag gi khyim thab dag 'ongs zhes thos so/_/
[\[190b.6\]]thos nas kyang bshes pa dang bcas pa'i tshig gis rje'i sras dag byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs so zhes bsu nas de dag rang rang gi khyim du dong ba dang /_de dag rang rang gi chung ma dag gis bsku mnye dang dril phyi byas te khrus byas nas legs par bskus te zas 
[\[190b.7\]]byin no/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_'di dag gi spyod lam 'di lta bu ni sngon ma byung ngo snyam nas de dag la dris pa/_bzang mo dag khyed kyi spyod lam 'di lta bu 'di sngon ma byung ba yin na ji las gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_rje'i sras dag 'phags ma chos byin 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]gyis bdag cag la ji nas kyang bdag cag 'khor ba na 'khor ba rnams la slan chad nyon mongs pa de lta bu kun tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_'phags ma chos byin ni ma dul ba 'dul bar mdzad pa 
[\[191a.2\]]yin te/_des 'di dag btul ba lta ste/_gang gi phyir bdag cag gis 'di dag bsad pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_spyo bas gdul bar ma nus pa dag 'phags ma chos byin gyis chos bstan pas btul bas 'phags ma chos byin gyis bdag 
[\[191a.3\]]cag la phan btags kyis/_bdag cag gis kyang rgyal po bltas te 'phags ma chos byin la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo/_/chos byin gyis kyang de dag gdul ba'i dus shes nas gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/_legs par byugs/_lci ba sar pa'i byug 
[\[191a.4\]]pas bskus te 'dag rdzas dang /_chu dang /_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_pog por bzhag nas dge slong ma skad snyan pa dag bskos te bsdad pa dang /_de dag kyang rgyal po bltas nas chos byin gyi drung du lhags pa dang /_chos byin gyis de dag la 'dag 
[\[191a.5\]]rdzas dang /_lag pa bsnyal ba'i chu dang /_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_pog por dag byin nas tshigs su bcad pa'i skad kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de dag kyang de'i rkang 
[\[191a.6\]]pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/_/chos byin gyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas ci nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun 
[\[191a.7\]]du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa byas so/_/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_'phags ma bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma la brten nas 'phags mas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs 
[\[191b.2\]]kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang /_mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha 
[\[191b.3\]]dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags 
[\[191b.4\]]so/_/'phags ma bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_'phags ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis/_bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas 
[\[191b.5\]]skyabs su mchi'o/_/de dag mngon par dad par gyur nas yang smras pa/_'phags ma bdag cag gis da ni srog chags grog sbur la yang bsams bzhin du srog 'gums pa'i rngo mi thog la/_bdag cag ni mtshon chas 'tsho ba lags na bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par 
[\[191b.6\]]bgyi/_chos byin gyis smras pa/_gzhu gzhu rgyud med pa dag dang /_mda' mde'u med pa dag dang /_shing gi ral gri dag thogs shig_/de dag gzhu gzhu rgyud med pa dag dang /_mda' mde'u med pa dag dang /_shing gi ral gri dag thogs so/_/gang gi tshe de dag gis 
[\[191b.7\]]bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe na phyin chad brgyan pos rtse bar mi byed/_chang 'thung bar mi byed/_bud med gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mi byed pas de dag longs spyod dag gis phyugs pa dang nye bar bsags par gyur to/_/de dag gi glang po che dag dang /_rta 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]dag kyang yongs su ma spyad pas tsho ba dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas par gyur to/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ri brags pa zhig log nas der dmag ru gcig btang na bcom pa dang /_rab tu bcom pa dang /_so sor bcom 
[\[192a.2\]]par gyur te phyir 'ongs so/_/de bzhin du ru gnyis pa btang na de yang bcom pa dang /_rab tu bcom pa dang /_so sor bcom par gyur te phyir 'ongs nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha ri brags pa'i dpung ni skyes shing lha'i dpung ni nyams te gal te lha nyid der ma 
[\[192a.3\]]gshegs na ri brags pa bsgrub dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos dril bsgrags pa byas te nga'i yul na mtshon chas 'tsho ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad der 'gro bar bya'o zhes bsgo nas/_rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te chas so/_/ko sa lar 
[\[192a.4\]]byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ral gri'i mthu can dang /_rgyal rigs bzang po pa bya ba'i khrom gnyis yod pa las ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom ni mdun du 'gro ba'i mi yin la/_rgyal rigs bzang po'i khrom ni phyi nas 'ong ba'i mi yin pas rgyal pos ral gri'i mthu can 
[\[192a.5\]]gyi khrom mdun du song ba'i mi dag tsho zhing pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas pa dang /_de dag gi glang po che dag dang /_rta dag kyang tsho zhing pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khrom 'di gang gi 
[\[192a.6\]]yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha'i khrom ral gri'i mthu can zhes bgyi ba mdun du mchi ba lags so/_/rgyal pos rgyab tu bltas pa dang ji tsam na rgyal rigs bzang po pa'i khrom gyi mi dag rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob pa dang /_de 
[\[192a.7\]]dag gi glang po che dag dang /_rta dag kyang rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di gang gi khrom yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha'i khrom rgyal rigs 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]bzang po pa zhes bgyi ba slad bzhin mchi ba lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci 'di dag dbang thang mnyam par mi sbyin nam/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha dbang thang mnyam par stsol to/_/de dag bos shig_/de dag bos pa dang rgyal pos de dag la smras pa/_
[\[192b.2\]]shes ldan dag khyed cag dbang thang mnyam par mi sbyin nam/_lha mnyam par stsol to/_/'o na ci'i phyir ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom 'di dag ni 'byor pa dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas par gyur la/_rgyal rigs bzang po'i khrom khyed ni rgud pa dang /_nyam chung ba 
[\[192b.3\]]dang /_rke ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob par gyur/_lha gal te bdag cag kyang gzhu gzhu rgyud ma mchis pa dang /_mda' mde'u ma mchis pa dang /_zhugs shing gi ral gri dag thogs shing mtshon cha dag btsongs shing btsongs shing 'tshal bar 'gyur na/_bdag 
[\[192b.4\]]cag kyang 'byor pa dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang 'di dag gi glang po che dag dang /_rta dag ni yongs su ma spyad la/_bdag cag gi rta dang /_glang po che dag ni yongs su spyad do/_/rgyal pos de dag la smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[192b.5\]]dag khyed de ltar gyur pa bden nam/_lha mad do/_/ci khyed cag da der khrid la ri brags su bsad par 'dod dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha ci lags mtshon chas g.yul sprod dam/_mis g.yul sprod/_rgyal pos spyos te smras pa/_/gal te mtshon chas g.yul mi sprod 
[\[192b.6\]]na khyed cag nyid deng la ri brags pa de phob shig ces smras te rgyal po de nyid nas phyir log go/_/ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dag chos byin gyi gan du song ste smras pa/_'phags ma bdag cag rgyal pos dmag gi gnas su bskos na bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_
[\[192b.7\]]chos byin gyis smras pa/_deng shig dang /_khyed cag der dong ba rnams la nyes dmigs 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar gang dang gang du 'brang 'debs pa de dang der rgyud chags gsum pa ltos shig_/nyi ma gang la ri brags skor bar byed pa'i nyi ma de 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]la mtshan thams cad du chos mnyan pa byin la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen 
[\[193a.2\]]dang /_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga'i ming gis yon bshad pa gyis shig_/de dag gis 'phags ma chos byin gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba byas te/_'phags nas de dag gang dang gang du 'brang 'debs pa de dang der rgyud chags 
[\[193a.3\]]gsum pa klog par byed cing /_gang gi nyin mo ri brags skor bar byed pa de'i nyin mo mtshan thams cad du chos mnyan pa byin nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad 
[\[193a.4\]]dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang /_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga'i ming gis yon bshad pa byas pa dang /_de'i tshe na rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin rnams gnod sbyin 'du bar 'phags pa dang /_des yon bshad pa byed pa de 
[\[193a.5\]]thos nas des bsams pa/_bdag gi ming gis yon bshad pa byed pa 'di su zhig snyam nas ji tsam na chos kyi spun dag gnas ma yin par bskos pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen la smras pa/_nga'i chos kyi spun 'di dag gnas 
[\[193a.6\]]ma yin par bskos kyis song la ri brags de phob ste 'di dag la byin la srog chags 'ga' la yang mi gnod par gyis shig_/gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas/_ri'i rtse mo lta bu'i glang po che dag dang /_rnga mo lta 
[\[193a.7\]]bu'i rta dag dang /_gzhal med khang lta bu'i shing rta dag dang /_gnod sbyin gdug pa lta bu'i mi dag mngon par sprul nas ri brag pa dag gis de dag thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/de dag gis de dag mthong nas skrag ste bsams pa/_/yul dang srog la gnod 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]gyur na/_/skyes bus kun tu srog bsrung bya/_/blo yis gnyis ka dpyad byas na/_/yul ni yang rnyed srog rnams min/_/snyam nas de dag gis ral gri mgul du btags te ri brag nas byung ba dang /_de dag gis de dag bzung nas sgyu dpya dang bcas te mnyan yod du 
[\[193b.2\]]bdas nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du dong ste smras pa/_lha ri brags pa ni 'di lags/_sgyu dpya ni 'di dag lags so/_/rgyal po dga' nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag sgyu dpya dag khyed cag nyid khyer cig_/de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag 
[\[193b.3\]]cag gson zhing lhags pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'phags ma chos byin gyi mthu yin pas bdag cag dong la sgyu dpya 'di dag 'phags ma chos byin la dbul lo snyam nas de dag gis de dag khyer te chos byin gyi gan du dong nas smras pa/_'phags ma bdag cag gson 
[\[193b.4\]]zhing lhags pa dang /_bdag cag gi dpal dang skal ba bzang po phun sum tshogs pa gang lags pa de thams cad 'phags ma kho na'i mthu lags kyis/_rgyal pos bdag cag la sgyu dpya stsal ba 'di dag 'phags mas thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol/_
[\[193b.5\]]des smras pa/_bu dag lha rnams kyi nang du yang lha dbul ba yod kyis sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa gyis shig dang /_des khyed cag gi yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi 
[\[193b.6\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs nas de dag snga dro ni sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa dag byed/_phyi dro ni chos nyan par byed do//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po sum 
[\[193b.7\]]bcu rtsa drug pa/_dus gzhan zhig na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ri brags pa gzhan zhig log nas rgyal pos rgyal rigs bzang po pa'i khrom la bsgo ba/_deng la ri brags pa de phob shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha bdag cag ni rgud pa lags la/_
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom ni 'byor pa lags na/_'di'i tshe de dag la bka' stsal cing bdag cag res gzhan la mchi bar ci gnang /_rgyal pos ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom la bsgo ba/_deng la ri brags pa che ge mo zhig phob shig_/de dag gis smras 
[\[194a.2\]]pa/_lha bdag cag gis res 'khor lags so/_/deng shig dang res gzhan la mi btang ngo /_/de dag gis bsams pa/_de'i tshe ni bdag cag gis gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyi mthus ri brags pa de phab kyi/_da ni bdag cag gis de nyid du 'chi 
[\[194a.3\]]bar bya dgos par 'gyur bas 'di ltar bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs pa de dag la chos gos dag phul te 'dong bar bya'o snyam nas/_de dag chos gos dag thogs te gtsug lag khang du dong nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_
[\[194a.4\]]'phags pa dag bdag cag rgyal pos dmag gi gnas su btang ste/_gal te na bdag cag de nyid du 'gum par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang mchi bar 'gyur bas chos gos 'di dag bzhes su gsol/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 
[\[194a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bgo bar mi bya'o zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas bdag cag mi len to/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag gis bzhes te zhog la dgag dbye bgyis nas bgo bar mdzod 
[\[194a.6\]]cig ces de dag gis de dag gi gnas khang du bcug ste dong ngo /_/de dag 'phags pa dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag gar 'dong /_khyim bdag dmag gi gnas gnas su mchi'o/_/khyed kyis res ma 'khor ram/_khyim 
[\[194a.7\]]bdag res 'khor ro/_/'o na ci'i phyir 'dong /_lha'i zhal nas deng shig dang res gzhan du mi btang ngo zhes byung ngo /_/kho bos lha la zhus de'i bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig_/de rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa/_lhas ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom gang du bka' stsal/_
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]khyim bdag ri brags pa che ge mo zhig log nas de 'bebs su'o/_/lha de dag gis res ma 'khor ram/_khyim bdag res 'khor ro/_/'o na ji'i slad du bka' stsal/_res gzhan du mi btang bar byas so/_/ci lhas gzhu gzhu rgyud ma mchis pa dang /_mda' mde'u ma 
[\[194b.2\]]mchis pa dang /_zhugs shing gi ral gri thogs pa de dag gis ri brags pa dag mi phebs par mi mkhyen tam/_gzhan yang de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi sras sha stag ste/_de dag gis srog chags grog sbur la yang bsams bzhin du srog 'gums pa'i rngo mi thog go/_/
[\[194b.3\]]'di ltar de'i tshe yang de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi dmag dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyi mthus ri brags pa de phab bo/_/'di ltar de dag der mchis su lags na nongs dmigs 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_des lha la yang ma legs par 'gyur gor ma bkum mo/_/
[\[194b.4\]]khyim bdag ji de dag sangs rgyas kyi sras sha stag yin nam/_lha de lags te de dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma chos byin la brten nas thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal 
[\[194b.5\]]rgyal gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng phyin chad khyed kyis dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo bar bya'i/_ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom la bsgo bar mi bya'o/_/de nas ral gri'i mthu can gyi khrom de dag phyir mkhos su phab nas dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye 
[\[194b.6\]]byas pa'i tshe dge slong de dag de dag gi gan du dong ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag kho bo cag dgag dbye byas kyis chos gos dag byin cig_/'phags pa dag bdag cag gis chos gos dag phul lags kyis de dag bzhes shig_/dge slong de dag dong ste gnas khang sgo phye ba dang /_
[\[194b.7\]]phyogs des snum zhing mngar bas chos gos de dag sril dag gis rmugs te rdul du brlags te 'dug par snang ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gos sbed pa'i dge slong bsko 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]bar bya ste/_gos sbed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 
[\[195a.2\]]'gro ba dang /_gos kyi rnyed pa sbas pa dang ma sbas pa mi shes pa'o/_/gos sbed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_
[\[195a.3\]]gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_gos sbas pa dang ma sbas pa shes pa'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/_je dang por spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa sbed par spro'am/_gal te spro na des spro'o zhes 
[\[195a.4\]]brjod par bya'o de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas te/_gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa 
[\[195a.5\]]rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar 
[\[195a.6\]]dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di 
[\[195a.7\]]dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko bar bzod pa 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de 
[\[195b.2\]]bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams dang /_bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams dang /_phri ba rnams dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang /_mdzes pa rnams dang /_drod rig pa 
[\[195b.3\]]rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]
[\[195b.4\]]nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du brtad pa las byung ba'i gos zhig rnyed la 'dod na dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o/_/blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o/_/de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis zhes bya 
[\[195b.5\]]ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du zhes bya ba ni zhag bcu na dgag dbye 'byung ba tshun chad du'o/_/brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig ces bya ba ni brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga po dag ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_nad pa la sbyin pa 
[\[195b.6\]]dang /_nad pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang /_'chi ba la sbyin pa dang /_shi ba'i phyir sbyin pa dang /_'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa'o/_/rnyed pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so/_/'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o/_/dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang 
[\[195b.7\]]yin pa des so/_/gos de zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos las gang yang rung ba'o/_/blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]bdag gir bya ba'o/_/blangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni sba bar bya'o/_/dge slong gi gos sbyin pa'i dus ni gang yin/_dus ma yin pa ni gang yin zhe na/_sra brkyang ma  bting ba'i gnas na ni ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]nya 
[\[196a.2\]]tshun chad ni gos sbyin pa'i dus ma yin la/_lhag ma ni dus yin no/_/sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas na ni ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]nya phan chad nas dpyid zla 'bring po nya tshun chad ni dus ma yin la/_lhag ma ni dus yin no/_/de las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las thal bar 'chang 
[\[196a.3\]]na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam du dbyar gyi rnyed pa dbyar gyi nang du bdag gir byed 
[\[196a.4\]]dam/_gos sbyin pa'i dus las 'das par 'chang na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/brtad pa las byung ba'i gos lnga po dag bdag gir byed pa dang /_sbyin bdag gis rang gi lag nas sbyin par byed na ltung ba med do/_/gos sbed pa'i dge slong 
[\[196a.5\]]bskos pa dang /_sbyin bdag 'ongs te 'phags pa dag bzhes shig dang /_gos 'di bdag mchis nas rang gi sug pa nyid nas dbul lo zhes zer ba la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyen pa 
[\[196a.6\]]la ltung ba med do/_/brtad pa las byung ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod nas ha cang mi ring ba na ri 
[\[196a.7\]]brags zhig yod pa de na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug ste de yang dad pa can bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas des dge 'dun la bsngos te gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang /_skar khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_lan 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]kan gyis brgyan pa/_snying dang mig 'phrog pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug go/_/gtsug lag khang der dge slong drug bcus dbyar dgag dbye dag byas te dong nas khyim bdag des der ma byin par len pa dag gis khri'am khri'u dag ma brkus par 
[\[196b.2\]]gyis shig ces srung ma'i mi bzhag go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gzhan drug bcu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brags der phyin nas/_bsti gnas rnyed par byed pa na mi zhig gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag ci'i slad du gtsug lag khang du mi 
[\[196b.3\]]gnas/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gtsug lag khang ga la yod/_'phags pa dag dgon pa 'di na'o/_/dge slong de dag der dong ba dang /_srung ma'i mis mthong nas/_des 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bsnyen bkur byas te gnas khang dag bskos nas khri dang 
[\[196b.4\]]khri'u dang stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba la sogs pa dag phul te/_spyangs tshags g.yar nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag re zhig chab btsag par mdzod cig dang de'i bar du bdag gis khyim bdag la brjod par bgyi'o zhes mi de khyim bdag gi drung du song ste smras 
[\[196b.5\]]pa/_khyim bdag dgyes pa skyed cig_/khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du dge slong blo bur du lhags pa drug bcu mchis so/_/khyim bdag gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas nang mi dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo'i gtsug lag khang du dge slong gi dge 'dun byon pa 
[\[196b.6\]]dag legs par sbyar ba'i btung bas tshim par byas/_bu ram dang /_hwags dang /_li kha ra dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_bal po se'u long shig ces khyim bdag des legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sbyar nas gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /_dge slong dag kyang 
[\[196b.7\]]chu btsags te rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod do/_/khyim bdag des dge slong de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/_des gtsug lag khang de mtsho pad mas gang ba bzhin du mthong nas/_rgya cher dad pa'i shugs kyis bsgyur ba'i rgyud kyis tshigs su bcad 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]pa smras pa/_grong ngam yang na dgon pa'ang rung /_/gshong ngam yang na thang yang rung /_/gang na 'os pa gnas pa yi/_/sa gzhi de na dga' byed yin/_/de nas legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sta gon byas te/_rang gi lag nas dge slong 
[\[197a.2\]]gi dge 'dun de dag tshim par byas nas rang nyid kyis pog por thogs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas/_gtsug lag khang du zhugs te rgan pa'i mtha'i logs su 'dug go dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad 
[\[197a.3\]]nas khyim bdag des rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_sang bdag gi sdum par 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes smras pa dge slong rnams kyis kyang dang du blangs nas/_khyim bdag de rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te song 
[\[197a.4\]]ngo /_/khyim bdag des phyi de nyin par zas bsod pas dge slong dag tshim par byas shing dus ma yin par yang btung ba blud nas dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos bstan to/_/phyis kyang de kho na bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad pa dang /_
[\[197a.5\]]khyim bdag de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag gis gtsug lag khang 'di bdag nyid kyi slad du yang bgyid du ma stsal/_nye du rnams kyi slad du yang bgyid du ma stsal gyi/_'di ltar 'phags pa rnams kyi slad du stsal pa lags 
[\[197a.6\]]kyis/_'di nyid du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes shig dang /_bdag gis 'phags pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag mnyan yod na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing /_
[\[197a.7\]]dus dang dus su dge slong che ge mo zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas/_che ge mo zhig gis ni mi sdug pa'i bar grub po zhes shes pa brda sprod pa dag kyang thos par 'gyur/_rgyal po yang bstan pa la shin tu dad/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /_rgyal 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /_bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /_rnying pa dang /_dge bsnyen ma sa ga dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma dang /_gzhan yang dad pa can mang du yod pas der zang zing gi longs spyod dang /_chos kyi longs spyod chen po yang 'grub pas bdag cag de nyid du 'dong 
[\[197b.2\]]ngo /_/'phags pa dag chos kyi longs spyod ni 'phags pa dag nyid la rag las pa lags kyi/_zang zing gi longs spyod ni bdag la rag las pa lags pas dgyes pa bskyed cig dang cung zad kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[197b.3\]]pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pa can gyi dad pa spel bar bya zhing sbyin bdag la rjes su snying brtse bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas/_'di nyid du 'khod par bya'o zhes de dag der 'khod nas/_blo brtan pas gtsug lag khang de'i phyi nang bcas par so sor brtag par brtsams 
[\[197b.4\]]pa dang /_gtsug lag khang de me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_shin tu dga' bar mthong nas/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu 
[\[197b.5\]]phun sum tshogs pa/_shin tu dga' ba yin pas gal te bdag cag gis 'dir dbyar snga mar gnas par khas blangs na me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad yongs su longs spyod par mi 'gyur gyis/_bdag cag gis nges par dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blang bar bya'o 
[\[197b.6\]]zhes de dag gis der dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs so/_/khyim bdag de la gtsug lag khang de gcig pu 'ba' zhig yod pas de sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/_/ri brags de na yang gtsug 
[\[197b.7\]]lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags pa de dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin par byed do/_/ri brags de'i nyen kor na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags kyi nyen kor pa de dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed pas der dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo /_/ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni dgag dbye byas ma thag tu 
[\[198a.2\]]'dus te bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na des brtsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do/_/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong 'di dag gzhom par bya'o snyam mo/_/gzhan dag gis 
[\[198a.3\]]smras pa/_de dag ni sgo 'phar brgya snyed bzla ba byas kyang lto khengs pa 'grub par dka' bas/_de dag la ci yang med na bdag cag ci'i phyir yun de srid du bsdad par bya/_de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa cig 'dug pas smras pa/_khyod ci shes de dag la mang du yod do/_/
[\[198a.4\]]ji ltar re zhig gtsug lag khang 'di gang gi yin pa'i khyim bdag de ni dad pa can bzang ba/_dge ba'i bsam pa can yin la/_khyim bdag de la yang gtsug lag khang de gcig pu 'ba' zhig yod pas de sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag 
[\[198a.5\]]khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/_/ri brags 'di na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags pa 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/_/ri brags 'di'i nye 'khor na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan 
[\[198a.6\]]med pas ri brags kyi nye 'khor ba 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed pas 'dir dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo /_/gal te yid mi ches na song la ltos 
[\[198a.7\]]shig dang rang nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/gal te de lta na khyod nyid je song la mngon sum du gyis shig dang kho bo cag phyis 'ong ngo /_/de smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig dang /_kho bo 'gro'o zhes de gos tshags bcos te 'phags shing /_de nas tshigs 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te gtsug lag khang der zhugs so/_/ji tsam na sgo khang na rgan zhugs shig 'dug nas g.yon can des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te dri bar brtsams pa/_'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog pa/_mtho 
[\[198b.2\]]ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi yin no/_/'phags pa ci 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/_'on te phongs pa lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu yin/_phongs pa ni ji lta bu yin/_'phags 
[\[198b.3\]]pa gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang lags so/_/gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'o na 'di ni gtsug lag khang yin gyi phongs pa ma yin te 'di na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yod kyi/_'di na yo byad med pa ma 
[\[198b.4\]]yin no/_/'phags pa zas za ba ni 'ga' yang sa rdul mi za la/_gos dag gyon pa ni 'ga' yang shing shun dag mi gyon pas khyed cag la gos cung zad ma mchis sam/_rgan zhugs de drang po'i rang bzhin can yin pas des g.yon can de'i lag nas bzung ste gnas 
[\[198b.5\]]khang du bcug nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gos kyi gdang gos dag gis phur shog cing 'dug pa la ltos/_'phags pa ci 'di khyod kyi lags sam/_'on te dge 'dun gyi lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di kho bo gang zag gi yin no/_/'phags pa 'o na khyod ni gor 
[\[198b.6\]]ma bkum par dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nam/_chos sgrog pa zhig lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan yang ma yin la/_chos sgrog pa yang ma yin te/_'di ltar kho bo ni dge 'dun gyi gsar bu dge tshul zhig yin no/_/'phags pa de ni 
[\[198b.7\]]mngal na 'di na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal cung zad ma mchis sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mang du yod de re zhig kho bo'i byug ris su yang dngos po bdun po dag 'thob bo/_/'phags pa de yang mjal gyis 'di zhu'o/_/gtsug lag khang 'di na gang la la 'tshal ma bgyid pa de 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]ji rdza mkhan gyi snod du 'tshed dam/_'on te zangs ma'i snod du 'tshed bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis gnas khang 'di dag mthong ngam/_'phags pa mthong ngo /_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gnas khang 'di dag zangs ma'i snod kyis gang zhing 'dug go/_/g.yon can 
[\[199a.2\]]des bsams pa/_legs par brid zin gyis da ni 'gro'o snyam nas g.yon can des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams pa ni bdag gi don yongs su nyams pa lags pas bdag slad kyis kyang mchi yis da ni mchi'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de 
[\[199a.3\]]bzhin gyis shig_/g.yon can des rgan zhugs de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas g.yon can de chom rkun pa de dag gi drung du song ste smras pa/_pad ma'i mig can dag rdzas thams cad kyis gang ba'i gru bo che skam sa na 'dug gis phrogs shig_/phrogs 
[\[199a.4\]]shig_/de na gcig gis smras pa/_de na 'khod pa'i rab tu byung ba drug bcu po dag ni 'phong gi slob dpon sha stag yin zhes grags pas de bzhin du gzhom par mi nus kyis/_gang gi tshe de dag mtshan mo chos nyan pa de'i tshe gzhom mo/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_
[\[199a.5\]]nyi ma gang la de dag gi chos nyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_des smras pa/_tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi la 'byung ste/_de la tshes brgyad ni thal zin pas tshes bcu bzhi la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag sor mo dag gis nyi ma bgrang zhing 'khod 'khod nas/_ji tsam na tshes bcu 
[\[199a.6\]]bzhi la bab ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so sor thar pa'i mdo bton te/_dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong byas nas chos sgrog pa seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs te 'di skad ces/_mi mchog gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur mdzad pa/_/kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod pa de bzhin gshegs/_/
[\[199a.7\]]dbang po zhi zhing nyer zhi zhi la mkhas/_/mnyan yod zhugs pas bka' bzhin byed la gsungs/_/zhes smra bar brtsams pa dang /_g.yon can de dag gis sgo brdungs so/_/dge slong dag gis tshor nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag su yin/_'phags pa dag 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go/_/dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/_ri brags nas skye bo'i tshogs dag chos nyan du lhags gor ma chag gis sgo dbye'o snyam nas/_de dag gis sgo phye ba dang de dag zhugs so/_/ji tsam na gzhom par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[199b.2\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag na re bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go zhes zer na/_da nged cag 'joms par byed dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag la ming gnyis mchis te/_slad rol du ni rigs kyi bu dag ces bgyi la/_
[\[199b.3\]]nang du ni chom rkun pa dag ces bgyi'o/_/khyed cag gi ming 'dogs par byed pa ni nyams so/_/g.yon can de dag gis dge slong de dag bcom ste dong nas dge slong bcom pa de dag gis gros byas pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag ma dang bcas 
[\[199b.4\]]par gzhom par bya'o zhes gsungs pas/_re zhig khyim bdag 'di phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya/_bdag cag la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya/_bdag cag mnyan yod nyid du dong na der bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 
[\[199b.5\]]pa dag gis chos gos dag gis mi phongs par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gros byas so/_/ji ltar 'dong bar bya/_mtshan mo 'gebs pas 'dong zhing nyin mo thibs por zhugs te 'gro bar bya'o zhes de dag gis khyim bdag la yang ma bltas par dong ngo /_/ji tsam 
[\[199b.6\]]na mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa de dag gis dge slong de dag sgren mor sgo'i gam yo na rgyu ba mthong nas smras pa/_gcer bu sgre byi dag khyed cag 'dir ci 'dod 'di khyed 
[\[199b.7\]]kyi gtsug lag khang yang ma yin la/_'dug gnas kyang ma yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gcer bu dag ma yin no/_/'o na khyed su yin/_dge slong dag go/_/'di lta bu dag dge slong yin nam/_gang dag chom rkun pa dag 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]gis bcom pa de dag ji lta bu yin/_khyed cag ming ci/_sangs rgyas 'tsho'o/_/chos 'tsho'o/_/dge 'dun 'tsho'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so zhes de dag gis sgo phye nas dge slong de dag 'jug tu bcug ste/_
[\[200a.2\]]de dag la la las ni chos gos byin/_la las ni sham thabs byin/_la las ni rngul zan byin/_la las ni lhung bzed byin/_la las ni chu tshags byin te/_bgo bsha' ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad du thams cad bgo bsha' byas pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom 
[\[200a.3\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag dgon pa pas chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum las chos gos 
[\[200a.4\]]gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag de nyid du dong ste nyal bar byed pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag ci'i slad du 'dir gzims par mdzad/_kho bo cag gis chos gos dag 
[\[200a.5\]]'dir gzhag go/_/'phags pa dag ci khyod kyi chos gos dag rku bar bgyid dam/_gal te thugs mi ches na snoms te bzhud cig ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der nyal 
[\[200a.6\]]bar mi bya'o/_/de dag phyir dong ste skya rengs 'char bar byed pa dang /_bud med kyi yul sgren mor nyal ba de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag ci'i slad du mtshan mo nyid la 'dir byon/_kho bo cag gis 'dir chos gos dag bzhag go/_/'phags pa 
[\[200a.7\]]dag ci khyed cag gi chos gos dag rku bar bgyid dam/_gal te thugs mi ches na snoms te bzhud cig ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der skya rengs 'char bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]de dag phyis der dong ste bang rim du skya rengs 'char bar byed pa dang /_de dag chom rkun pa dag dang /_g.yon can dag dang /_seng ge dag dang /_stag dang /_gung dag gi dbang du gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[200b.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtsug lag khang du skya rengs 'char bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams la dge 'dun gyi dang /_mchod rten gyi dang /_gang zag gi bya ba'i phyir mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos par gyur pa de dag bdag cag gis khyim gzhan du chos gos dag 
[\[200b.3\]]gzhag go zhes der mi 'gro ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dgon pa pas zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar bya'o/_/dge slong 
[\[200b.4\]]drug sde dag bsams bzhin du zhag bdun du 'bral bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya 
[\[200b.5\]]ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag ngas dge slong dgon 
[\[200b.6\]]pa pas zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/_khyed cag bsams bzhin du zhag bdun du mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 
[\[200b.7\]]sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/_dge slong rnams la 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di 
[\[201a.2\]]ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas mal dgon pa dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa/_'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu dbyar phyi mar gyur la/_dge slong dgon pa pas 'dod na chos 
[\[201a.3\]]gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dgon pa pa la mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na dge slong dgon pa pa des zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar 
[\[201a.4\]]bya'o/_/de las 'das par 'bral na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/rab tu mang po dag ces bya ba ni gnyis yan chad rab tu mang po dag yin no/_/gnas mal zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang ngo /_/dgon pa zhes bya ba ni rdul phra rab 
[\[201a.5\]]drug la rdul phra mo gcig go/_/rdul phra mo drug la chu rdul gcig go/_/chu rdul drug la lcags rdul gcig go/_/lcags rdul drug la ri bong rdul gcig go/_/ri bong rdul drug la lug rdul gcig go/_/lug rdul drug la glang rdul gcig go/_/glang rdul drug 
[\[201a.6\]]la nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go/_/nyi zer gyi rdul drug la sro ma gcig go/_/sro ma drug la shig gcig go/_/shig drug la nas gcig go/_/nas drug la sor gcig go/_/sor bzhi drug la khru gang ngo /_/khru phyed dang bzhi la mi'i srid do/_/khru bzhi la gzhu'o/_/
[\[201a.7\]]gzhu lnga brgya la rgyang grags te de phan cad dgon pa'o/_/dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pa dang /_g.yon can gyis 'jigs par grags pa'o/_/'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gung gis 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]'jigs par grags pa'o/_/'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu zhes bya ba ni sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag 
[\[201b.2\]]tu'o/_/dbyar phyi mar gyur la zhes bya ba ni dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs par gyur la'o/_/dge slong dgon pa pas zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/_/'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o/_/chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang 
[\[201b.3\]]rung ba zhes bya ba ni snam sbyar dang /_bla gos dang /_mthang gos las gang 'dod pa'o/_/khyim gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gang na lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag yod par ro/_/gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gtams par bya ba'o/_/
[\[201b.4\]]dge slong dgon pa pa la mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi'am/_mchod rten gyi'am/_gang zag gi bya ba'i phyir mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na'o/_/dge slong dgon pa pa des zhes 
[\[201b.5\]]bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/_/zhag drug gi mtha' tshun cad du zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan drug gi mtha' tshun cad du'o/_/chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos gos bzhag pa gang yin pa de dang ngo /_/de las 'das par 'bral na 
[\[201b.6\]]zhes bya ba ni de las lhag par skya rengs 'char bar byed na'o/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_'di ltar dge slong 
[\[201b.7\]]dgon pa pas chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du bral na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'di'am der bar chad brgyad po 'di lta ste/_rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /_chom rkun pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_me'i 'jigs 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]pa dang /_chu'i 'jigs pa dang /_seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang /_stag gi 'jigs pa dang /_mi'i 'jigs pa dang /_mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa las gang yang rung ba nye bar gnas pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_
[\[202a.2\]]sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/zhag bdun gyis 'bral ba'i spang ba ste nyi shu bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[202a.3\]]bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de na dge slong gang dag snga mas dbyar gnas pa khas len pa de dag ni rang gi dus yin no/_/zhes tshol bar byed cing bdag cag gis ci'i phyir mi bcang 
[\[202a.4\]]zhes 'chang bar byed do/_/phyi mas dbyar gnas par khas len pa de dag kyang rang gi dus yin no/_/zhes 'chang bar byed cing bdag cag gis ci'i phyir mi btsal zhes tshol bar byed de/_de dag ha cang myur bar tshol ba dang /_ha cang yun ring du 'chang bar byed pas bya ba mang ba dang /_
[\[202a.5\]]byed pa mang bar gyur te/_lung mnod pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed nas/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na 
[\[202a.6\]]ci'i phyir de dag ha cang myur du tshol bar byed cing ha cang yun ring du 'chang bar byed pas bya ba dang byed pa mang bar gyur te/_lung mnod pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar 
[\[202a.7\]]ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed ngas dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen bcang 
[\[202b.2\]]bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/_khyed cag ha cang myur du tshol ba dang /_ha cang yun ring du 'chang bar byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso dka' ba dang /_dgang dka' ba dang /_'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa rnam par 
[\[202b.3\]]smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_phri ba dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes pa dang /_drod rig pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[202b.4\]]dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis 
[\[202b.5\]]so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus na dbyar gyi gos ras chen btsal bar bya'o/_/dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa'i sngon rol du dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshol bar byed dam/_dbyar zad 
[\[202b.6\]]nas 'og tu zla ba phyed las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/so ka rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus na zhes bya ba ni zla ba gcig na dbyar nye bar sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba na'o/_/dbyar gyi gos ras chen zhes bya 
[\[202b.7\]]ba ni char pa bab pa'i gos so/_/btsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan las so/_/dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgag dbye byas nas zla ba phyed kyi bar du'o/_/gal te dge slong gis so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa'i sngon 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]rol du dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshol bar byed dam zhes bya ba ni de'i mdun rol du'o/_/dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par ro/_/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs nas ltung 
[\[203a.2\]]byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/_des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_snga ma dang /_phyi ma las te/_de la gang dag dbyar snga mar gnas par khas len pa de dag la ni ha cang yang yun ring du 'chang na spang ba'i ltung 
[\[203a.3\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/gang dag dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas len pa de dag la ha cang myur du tshol na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na dge slong gis ji tsam du ha cang myur du tshol bar byed pa dang /_ha cang yun ring du 'chang bar byed na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung 
[\[203a.4\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dbyar gyi ras chen gyi spang ba ste nyi shu brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang 
[\[203a.5\]]na shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal wa tshongs can zhes bya ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag cig gis rang gi dad pa dang /_rang gi gcugs pa dang /_rang gi dang bas gtsug lag khang byed du bcug nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la gang zag gir phul lo/_/
[\[203a.6\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gtsug lag khang der ji tsam pa de tsam 'dug nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ljongs rgyur song ngo /_/khyim bdag des 'phags pa sgra can zin gtsug lag khang der ji tsam pa de tsam 'dug nas lhung bzed dar chos gos thogs te 
[\[203a.7\]]ljongs rgyur song zhes thos so thos nas kyang khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin ci dgar ljongs su 'dug nas shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal wa tshongs can ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ba na mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i tshe 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]wa tshongs can du phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul lo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' 
[\[203b.2\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na khyim bdag cig gis rang gi dad pa dang rang gi gcugs pa dang /_rang gi dang bas gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal nas 
[\[203b.3\]]bdag la gang zag gir stsal te/_bdag gtsug lag khang der ci tsam pa de tsam mchis nas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos 'tshal te ljongs rgyur mchis pa dang khyim bdag des 'phags pa sgra can zin gtsug lag khang der ci tsam pa de tsam mchis nas lhung bzed dang /_
[\[203b.4\]]chos gos 'tshal te/_ljongs rgyur mchis zhes thos te thos nas kyang khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phul na/_btsun pa de la bdag gis da ji ltar bgyi/_sgra can zin tshur shog_/khyod khyim bdag de ga la ba der song la phyin nas khyim bdag de la 'di 
[\[203b.5\]]skad ces khyim bdag khyod kho bo'i lus sam/_ngag la cung zad smod par mi byed dam zhes smros shig_/tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas khyim bdag de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag de la 'di 
[\[203b.6\]]skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod kho bo'i lus sam/_ngag la cung zad smod par mi byed dam/_'phags pa sgra can zin bdag khyod kyi sku'am/_gsung la cung zad kyang smod par mi bgyid do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song 
[\[203b.7\]]ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag khyim bdag ga la ba der mchis 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]te phyin nas khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod kho bo'i lus sam/_ngag la cung zad smod par mi byed dam zhes bgyis na/_de 'di skad ces 'phags pa sgra can zin bdag khyod kyi sku'am/_gsung la smod pa cung zad kyang ma mchis so zhes 
[\[204a.2\]]mchi'o/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'dug par gyur cing bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 
[\[204a.3\]]song la dge slong ji snyed wa tshongs can nye bar rten cing 'khod pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal/_zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong ji snyed wa tshongs can nye bar rten cing 'khod 
[\[204a.4\]]pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di 
[\[204a.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa dge slong ji snyed wa tshongs can nye bar rten cing mchis pa de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par mchis shing mthun par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das dpong 
[\[204a.6\]]sa'i khang pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang gis gang zag gcig la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig 
[\[204a.7\]]la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba ma yin no/_/gzhan gnyis sam/_rab tu mang po'am/_dge 'dun la sbyin par byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]len pa ma yin la longs spyad du rung ba ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gang gis gnyis la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba ma yin no/_/gzhan gnyis sam 
[\[204b.2\]]rab tu mang po'am/_dge 'dun la sbyin par byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la longs spyad du rung ba ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gang gis rab tu mang po la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang 
[\[204b.3\]]ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la longs spyad du rung ba ma yin no/_/gzhan gnyis sam/_rab tu mang po'am/_dge 'dun la sbyin par byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/_longs spyad 
[\[204b.4\]]du rung ba ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba ma yin no/_/gzhan gnyis sam/_rab tu mang po'am/_
[\[204b.5\]]dge 'dun la sbyin par byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun bye zhing gnyis su gyur te phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa na phyogs gcig 
[\[204b.6\]]la sbyin pa byin nas/_phyogs gnyis pa la sbyin par byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa ma yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa ma yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gang gis gang zag gcig la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par mi byed pa 
[\[204b.7\]]ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba yin no/_/gzhan gnyis sam/_rab tu mang po'am/_dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/_
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]longs spyad du rung ba yin no/_/dge slong dag gang gis gnyis la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba yin no/_/gzhan gnyis sam/_
[\[205a.2\]]rab tu mang po'am/_dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba yin no/_/dge slong dag gang gis rab tu mang po la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos 
[\[205a.3\]]dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba yin no/_/gzhan gnyis sam/_rab tu mang po'am/_dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/_longs 
[\[205a.4\]]spyad du rung ba yin no/_/dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin nas gzhan gcig la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba yin no/_/gzhan gnyis sam/_rab tu mang po'am/_
[\[205a.5\]]dge 'dun la sbyin par mi byed pa yang chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba yin no/_/dge slong dag gang gis dge 'dun bye zhing gnyis su gyur la phyogs dag gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa na phyogs 
[\[205a.6\]]gcig la sbyin pa byin nas/_phyogs gnyis pa la sbyin par mi byed pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yin zhing chos dang ldan pa'i len pa yin la/_longs spyad du rung ba yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni sbyin pa yin la/_phyi ma ni ma yin no/_/rgyal po ni 
[\[205a.7\]]sa gzhi la dbang la/_bdag po ni gnas mal la dbang /_dge slong ni lhung bzed dang chos gos la dbang ngo /_/sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gis rang gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya bar ni rung gi rang gis gzhan la sbyin du ni mi rung ngo /_/dge slong dag dge slong sgra 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]can zin la gtsug lag khang de phyir byin cig_/dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la gtsug lag khang de phyir byin no/_/'di ni re zhig byung ba yin gyi bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/
[\[205b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bsod snyoms pa zhig gis khyim bdag cig skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag nas dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms pa des 
[\[205b.3\]]khyim bdag de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po dag gi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis kyang re zhig rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i gzhi cung zhig bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gyis shig_/ci zhig 
[\[205b.4\]]bgyi/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod ston gsol cig_/de bzhin bgyi'o/_/na bza' dbul ba yang cung zad yod dam/_'phags pa bdag ni longs spyod srab pa lags mod kyi ras zung gcig dbul lo/_/'phags pa khyod kyis sang bdag 
[\[205b.5\]]gi ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drang du gsol/_bsod snyoms pa des tshogs pa'i dus su khyim bdag de'i ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /_
[\[205b.6\]]dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa khyod khyim dad par byed par gyur to/_/bsod snyoms pa ci khyim bdag gis yon dang bcas pa'i mchod ston gsol lam/_'on te yon med pa'i mchod ston gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa dag yon dang bcas pa ste/_'on kyang 
[\[205b.7\]]khyim bdag de longs spyod srab pa lags pas 'di ltar ras zung gcig 'bul lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]thos nas des bsams pa/_gang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la ras zung gcig 'bul ba de ni chen po la 'os pa zhig 'byung gor ma chag gis 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]gal te bdag gis ras zung de ma phrogs na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo snyan nas nye dga' de'i phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang /_ji tsam na des khyim bdag de mchod 
[\[206a.2\]]ston sbyor ba mthong nas/_des khyim bdag de la dris pa/_khyim bdag ci byed/_'phags pa mchod ston sbyor ro/_/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gang dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe lus kyis legs par spyad cing spyod/_ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad cing 
[\[206a.3\]]spyod pa'i sems can de dag la dus de na snga dro bzang por nye bar gnas par 'gyur la/_sems can gang dag gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe dang /_phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe lus kyis legs par spyad cing spyod/_ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad cing spyod pa'i sems can de dag la 
[\[206a.4\]]dus de na gung tshigs bzang po dang phye ma red bzang por nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa de ni legs par gsungs pa yin no/_/khyim bdag gos sbyin pa yang cung zad yod dam/_'phags pa bdag ni longs spyod srab pa lags te 'on kyang ras zung gcig 'bul 
[\[206a.5\]]lo/_/khyim bdag ras zung de ci 'dra blta'o/_/des bstan pa dang ci tsam na bzang bar mthong nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams ni yod na yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ni lan 'ga' yang med 
[\[206a.6\]]do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu la ras zung stong nyis brgya lnga bcus 'grub pas 'dis ni re zhig chos gos kyi gdang kho na la yongs su zad par bya dgos par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zas kyi rnyed pa byung na ni pu la sa'i 'dab mas kyang 
[\[206a.7\]]bgo bar bya la/_gos kyi rnyed pa byung na ni mar me'i snying por rung bas kyang bgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/_gal te 'ged par mi byed na khyod kyi 'di yang longs spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gang gis bdag la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]nams kyang mchis la/_yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyang mchis par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci mchis/_khyim bdag gal te khyod kyis shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/_sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrog pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i 
[\[206b.2\]]spobs pa can gang yin pa de la ras zung 'di bskon na de lta na khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams dang /_yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams su yang 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/_sde snod 
[\[206b.3\]]gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrog pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can su mchis/_khyim bdag kho bo nyid shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/_sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrog pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can yin no/_/khyim bdag des nye 
[\[206b.4\]]dga' la 'phags pa khyod ras zung 'di bzhes shig ces sbyin par brtsams pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod sbyin pa sbyin yang mi shes sam/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod ston gsol ba de'i tshe na khyod kyis rgan pa'i mtha' 
[\[206b.5\]]logs su rjes su yi rang ba byed du chug la kho bo la byin cig_/'phags pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes khyim bdag des de las mnyan nas khyim bdag des de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod ston gsol nas ras zung de rgan pa'i mtha' logs 
[\[206b.6\]]su yi rang bar mdzod cig_/rjes su yi rang bar mdzod cig ces rjes su yi rang bar byed du bcug nas nye dga' la byin no/_/dge slong rnams kyis dge skos la smras pa/_nye dga' las ras zung de long shig_/dge skos kyis nye dga' la smras pa/_ras zung de 'on 
[\[206b.7\]]cig_/ci gtsug lag khang du khyer te sbyin nam/_dge skos kyis smras pa/_ma yin te/_'di ni dge 'dun la phul ba yin no/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_khyod ci'i phyir rang gi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dge 'dun la dbul bar mi byed/_'di ni kho bo la byin pa 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs pa dang bsod snyoms pa de skyengs nas de nyid du 'dug go/_/de nas bsod snyoms pa des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhud
