[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag gis mthong gi_/ma thos ma rig rnam par ma shes so zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/des ma thos la ma thos par 'du shes nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa 
[\[228a.2\]]dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag gis thos kyi/_ma mthong ma rig rnam par ma shes so zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/des ma rig la ma rig par 'du shes nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba 
[\[228a.3\]]bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag gis rig gi ma mthong ma thos rnam par ma shes so zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/des rnam par ma shes la rnam par ma shes par 'du shes nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur 
[\[228a.4\]]te 'di skad ces bdag gis rnam par shes kyi/_ma mthong ma thos ma rig go zhes zer na smras so cog ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ji tsam du 'du shes bsgyur te tshig smra bar byed na thams cad ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_
[\[228a.5\]]tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i ltung byed de dang po rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag dge 
[\[228a.6\]]slong rnams la 'di lta ste/_zhar ba dag_/theng po dag_/smad 'chal dag_/lag sor rdum po dag_/sgur po dag_/mi'u thung dag_/lba ba can dag_/lkugs pa dag_/'on pa dag_/rten 'phye dag_/rkang 'bam dag_/gyol po dag_/mchu 'phyangs dag_/mgo bo che dag ces 
[\[228a.7\]]mi'i skyon nas smra bas kun du spyod par byed do/_/mi'i skyon nas smra bas kun du spyod pa na dge slong dag spa gong ba dang /_gzengs dmas pa dang /_zhum par gyur nas lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong zhing 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba mang bar gnas so/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams la 'di lta ste/_zhar ba dag_/theng po dag_/smad 'chal dag_/lag sor rdum po dag_/sgur po dag_/mi'u thung dag_/lba ba can dag_/lkugs pa dag_/'on pa dag_/
[\[228b.2\]]rten 'phye dag_/rkang 'bam dag_/gyol po dag_/mchu 'phyangs dag_/mgo bo che dag ces mi'i skyon nas smra bas kun tu spyod par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[228b.3\]]'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[228b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed dge slong rnams la 'di lta ste/_zhar ba dag_/theng po dag_/smad 'chal dag_/lag sor rdum po dag_/sgur po dag_/mi'u thung dag_/lba ba can dag_/lkugs pa dag_/'on pa dag_/
[\[228b.5\]]rten 'phye dag_/rkang 'bam dag_/gyol po dag_/mchu 'phyangs dag_/mgo bo che dag ces mi'i skyon nas smra bas kun tu spyod par byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung 
[\[228b.6\]]ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brags shig na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_
[\[228b.7\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de la bu mo zhig byung nas de bsrings bskyed nas chen mor gyur to/_/khyim bdag de zhing pa yin pas rang nyid zhing rmed par byed do/_/khyim bdag cig gi bu pha ma dang bral nas dgon pa nas shing khur thogs te de'i zhing dang nye bar shing ljon pa'i drung du khur 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]bzhag ste ngal bso nas des smras pa/_zhang po ci'i phyir khyod rang nyid zhing rmo bar byed/_khyod kyis grong du grong gi bya ba bya ba'i rigs na khyod dgon par dgon pa'i bya ba byed dam/_tsha bo kho bo la bu yang med/_phu nu yang med do/_/zhang po gshol 'on cig dang kho bos rmos 
[\[229a.2\]]khyod re zhig ngal so shig ces des zhing rmo bar brtsams pa dang /_khyim bdag des de'i zan khyer te 'ongs nas smras pa tsha bo tshur shog zan za'o/_/de gnyis kyis zan zos nas khyim bdag gi bu des smras pa/_zhang po kho bos khyod kyi khyim mi shes kyis khyod song shig dang /_kho bos zhing 
[\[229a.3\]]rmos dgongs kar su shig_/khyim bdag de song ba dang /_khyim bdag gi bu des kyang yud tsam zhig zhing rmos nas zhing tshigs kyi phyogs su glang gnyis zar bcug ste/_dgongs kar rtswa khur gcig thogs nas ri brags der 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_khyim bdag des kyang de bsu nas 
[\[229a.4\]]khyim bdag des de khyim du khrid do/_/khyim bdag gi bu des glang brags su stsal te gcal bkram nas du ba btul te glang gnyis kyi mdun du rtswa bkram pa dang /_khyim bdag des bsams pa/_bdag khyim bdag gi bu 'dis bde bar byas kyis bdag gis bu mo 'di 'di la chung mar sbyin no 
[\[229a.5\]]snyam nas des de la smras pa/_tsha bo mngon par dga' bzhin du las gyis shig dang bu mo 'di khyod la chung mar sbyin no/_/des der khyim brtsig par brtsams pa dang /_de'i glang zhing zan cig zhing la bros nas des de bzlog kyang ma bzlogs nas des de la spyos te shing tshal zhig 'phangs 
[\[229a.6\]]pa dang /_des de'i rwa chag nas de'i ming rwa chag ces bya bar btags so/_/dus gzhan zhig na de yang zhing la bros nas des de bzlog kyang ma bzlogs nas des de la spyos te zor ba 'phangs pa dang des de'i mjug ma chad nas de'i ming mjug rdum zhes bya bar btags so/_/de ltar de'i 
[\[229a.7\]]ming rwa chag dang mjug rdum zhes btags nas/_de phyin chad glang de'i ming chag rdum zhes bya bar btags so/_/dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag gi bu des khyim bdag de la smras pa/_zhang po ji ltar khas blangs pa bzhin gyis shig_/khyim bdag des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]bag rdzangs sta gon gyis shig_/bu mo bag mar gtang bar bya'o/_/chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras bu mo 'di su la yang ma stsal na ji ltar bag mar gtang bar bgyi des smras pa/_kho bos 'di gzhan la sbyin no/_/su la stsal/_khyim bdag gi bu 'di la'o/_/chung mas smras pa/_kho mos 
[\[229b.2\]]na le zham dkar po bzhin du ji ltar byung gtol med pa gang yin pa 'di la bu mo sbyin re skan/_'di ltar gang du kho mo bgo bar bya ba dang /_bza' bar bya ba yod pa der kho mos bu mo sbyin par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo khyim bdag gi bu 'dis kho bo bde bar gyur te/_gal te 'di 'gro 
[\[229b.3\]]bar gyur na yang kho bos zhing rmo dgos par 'gyur ro/_/chung mas smras pa/_kho mos lto gol ba 'di la bu mo sbyin par mi nus so/_/khyim bdag gis bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis khye'u 'di la kho bos khyod la bu mo mi sbyin no zhes smras na deng nyid du 'di 'gro bar 'gyur zhing bdag 
[\[229b.4\]]sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de la sgyong ba byas so/_/khyim bdag gi bu des khyim bdag de la yang smras pa/_zhang po ji ltar khas blangs pa bzhin gyis shig_/des smras pa/_tsha bo kho bo nye du'i 'khor rgya chen po dag la zan sbyar dgos kyis re zhig sA lu dag sgrubs shig_/des sA lu 
[\[229b.5\]]dag bsgrubs nas smras pa/_zhang po bag ma rdzongs shig_/des smras pa/_tsha bo de la bu ram dag kyang dgos kyis re zhig bu ram shing dag sgrubs shig_/des bu ram shing dag bsgrubs nas smras pa/_zhang po da bag ma rdzongs shig_/des smras pa/_tsha bo de la khur 
[\[229b.6\]]ba dag kyang dgos kyis re zhig gro dag sgrubs shig_/des gro dag kyang bsgrubs nas smras pa/_zhang po da bag ma rdzongs shig_/khyim bdag des smras pa/_tsha bo sA lu snga ma dag zad kyis de yang re zhig sA lu sgrubs shig_/khyim bdag gi bu des bsams pa/_de gsum ni rang 
[\[229b.7\]]bzhin gyis dus gcig tu bsgrub par mi nus pas 'di sgyong bar byed kyis skye bo phal po che'i nang du song ste khas lan du bcug la gal te mi ster na rgyal po'i pho brang nas bde bar sbyin du gzhug go snyam nas des skye bo phal po che'i nang du de la smras pa/_zhang po bag ma rdzongs shig_/khyim bdag des spyos te 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag mi 'di kho bo'i lto gol ba lto glas las byed pa yin na kho bos 'di la bu mo sbyin re skan/_khyim bdag gi bu des bsams pa/_bdag gis kAr ShA pa Na dag kyang ma thob la bu mo yang ma thob pas 'di la gnod pa cung zhig byas te 'gro'o snyam nas des 
[\[230a.2\]]glang de dag nyin par zhing rmos nas lcag mang pos gzhus te nyi ma la shing skam la btags te song ngo /_/chos nyid kyis na 'jig rten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe na dud 'gro dag kyang smra shes pa yin pas glang de dag gis de la smras pa/_kye mi khyod kho bo cag gi pha ma 'dra 
[\[230a.3\]]bar 'dug 'dug ste/_rtag tu kho bo cag legs par bde bas yongs su skyong bar byed na da ci'i phyir nyin par zhing rmos nas lcag mang pos gzhus te nyi ma la shing skam la btags te 'gro/_/ci kho bo cag gis khyod la nyes pa zhig byas sam/_khyed cag gis kho bo la nyes pa cung 
[\[230a.4\]]zad kyang ma byas te/_'di ltar khyed cag gi bdag pos kho bo la nyes pa byas so/_/des ci byas/_kho bo la bu mo sbyin par khas blangs nas ma ster ro/_/'o na rgyal po'i pho brang du ci'i phyir mi 'gro/_che gzhi dag med do/_/song shig dang kho bo cag gis che gzhi dbye'o/_/ci mi'i skad du smra bar 
[\[230a.5\]]'gyur ram/_ma yin te/_'di ltar khyod kyis bden pas gsol bar bya ste/_kho bo cag zhag bdun gyi bar du brags su btags ste/_rtswa yang sbyin par mi bya/_chu yang blud par mi bya bar gzhag par bya zhing nyi ma bdun pa la rtswa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa'i phyogs su gtang bar bya 
[\[230a.6\]]ste/_de'i tshe khyod kyis rgyal po'i mdun du gal te bdag bden na glang 'di dag rtswa yang mi za chu yang mi 'thung bar gyur cig ces bden pa'i tshig gis gsol cig dang /_kho bo cag ji srid du rgyal po yid ches par ma gyur gyi bar du rtswa yang mi za chu yang mi 'thung ngo /_/khyim bdag gi bu des rgyal po'i pho brang du song 
[\[230a.7\]]ste rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis bdag la bu mo stsal bar mchid kyis 'tshal nas mi ster ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod la che gzhi 'ga' yod dam/_lha mchis so/_/ci mi dag gam/_mi ma yin pa dag_/mi ma lags pa glang dag go/_/ci mi'i skad du 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]smra bar 'gyur ram/_ma lags te 'di ltar bdag gis bden pas gsol bar bgyi ste/_bdag gis dgung bdun gyi bar du glang de dag brags su btags te ran yang stsal bar mi bgyi/_chab kyang stsal bar mi bgyi bar gzhag par bgyi zhing /_gdugs bdun pa la 
[\[230b.2\]]ran phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chab phun sum tshogs pa'i phyogs su gtang bar bgyi ste/_de'i tshe bdag gis lha'i spyan sngar gal te bdag mad na glang 'di dag ran yang mi 'tshal chab kyang mi 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bden pa'i tshig gis gsol na ji srid du lha thugs ches 
[\[230b.3\]]par ma gyur gyi bar du de dag ran yang mi 'tshal/_chab kyang mi 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag de ltar gyis shig_/de dag gis glang de dag brags su btags te bzhag pa dang /_chag rdum gyis smras pa/_nub phyogs nas nyi ma shar ram/_
[\[230b.4\]]ci na gang gis bdag cag gtong bar mi byed/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_ma yin te/_bdag cag gis khyim bdag gi bu de la 'di ltar khyod kyis bden pas gsol bar bya ste/_kho bo cag zhag bdun gyi bar du brags su btags te rtswa yang sbyin par mi bya/_chu yang blud par mi bya bar 
[\[230b.5\]]gzhag par bya zhing /_nyi ma bdun pa la rtswa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa'i phyogs su gtang bar bya ste/_de'i tshe khyod kyis rgyal po'i mdun du/_gal te bdag bden na glang 'di dag rtswa yang mi za/_chu yang mi 'thung bar gyur cig ces bden pa'i tshig gis gsol cig 
[\[230b.6\]]dang /_kho bo cag ji srid du rgyal po yid ches par ma gyur gyi bar du rtswa yang mi za chu yang mi 'thung ngo zhes khas blangs so/_/chag rdum gyis smras pa/_kho bo ni gal te btang bar gyur na rdo ba yang zan rtswa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag gi bu de bdag cag 
[\[230b.7\]]gi pha ma dang 'dra bar 'dug 'dug gis/_de ltar ma byed cig_/chag rdum gyis smras pa/_de bdag cag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar 'dug 'dug pa yang bden mod kyi 'on kyang de kho bo la chag rdum zhes 'bod pas kho bo ni de ltar mi 'dod de/_'di ltar kho bo ni de'i lto 'dral bar yang 'dod do/_/
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]khyim bdag gi bu de dus dang dus su glang de dag gi gan du song ste dris pa/_kwa'i glang dag ji ltar khyod cag rung ngam/_de dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag ni rung na/_khyod kyi mi rung ngo /_/ci nyes chag rdum 'di na re kho bo ni gal te btang bar gyur na rdo ba yang za 
[\[231a.2\]]na rtswa lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes zer ro/_/'o na ci kho bo 'bros par bya'am/_ma 'bros par 'di ltar chag rdum 'di'i sna phug shig dang /_gal te 'di rtswa za bar 'gyur ram/_chu 'thung bar 'gyur ba na kho bo cag gis rwa dag gis 'di'i sna blangs te kha gyen du gzung bar byas/_khyod 
[\[231a.3\]]kyis kyang de'i tshe 'di dag 'jig rten skyong ba lnga pa nyi ma yang che bzhir yod ces nyi ma ston par byed do zhes smra bar bya'o/_/des de'i sna dbug par brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ltar kho bo la mtho 'tsham par byed pa la ltos shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_'di khyod la 
[\[231a.4\]]rgyan 'dogs par byed kyis kha rog shig_/de nas nyi ma bdun pa la rgyal po blon po rnams dang thabs cig tshogs pas glang de dag rtswa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa'i phyogs su btang ba na chag rdum des rtswa'i kham blang bar brtsams pa dang /_glang de dag gis rwa dag gis 
[\[231a.5\]]de'i sna blangs te nyi ma la lta zhing 'dzin to/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir glang 'di dag nyi ma la lta zhing 'khod/_de na blon po gcig gis smras pa/_lha 'di dag don gyis na lha la gsol bar bgyid de bdag cag 'ba' zhig che bzhi lags 
[\[231a.6\]]par ma bas kyi 'jig rten skyong ba lnga pa gdugs 'di yang che bzhi gzhan lags so zhes mchi'o/_/rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag mi ma yin pa dag gis che bzhi phyes khyim bdag gi bu 'di la de'i bu mo sbyin du chug shig_/khyim bdag gi bu 
[\[231a.7\]]des khyim bdag de pham par byas nas de la bu mo byin no/_/dge slong dag re zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang mis skyon nas smra bas kun du spyod pa na gsod par sems na mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de lta bas na dge slong gis dge slong la mi'i 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]skyon nas smra bas kun tu spyod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brags shig na khyim bdag shing rta spyod pa zhig 'dug pa de la ba dga' byed dang sa ri zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod pa de gnyis las dpyid kyi zla ba la be'u khra bo dang /_nye bkra gnyis shig 'brangs 
[\[231b.2\]]so/_/de nas dga' byed kyi be'u ni ru 'del zhig yin la/_sa ri'i be'u ni khu yu zhig yin nas des gcig gi ming ni dga' byed ru 'del zhes bya bar btags/_gcig gi ming ni sa ri khu yu zhes bya bar btags te/_de gnyis dus gzhan na glang chen po gnyis su gyur to/_/
[\[231b.3\]]dus gzhan zhig na shing rta spyod pa dag chang gral 'tshogs te gtam zer ba na shes ldan dag bdag cag las su'i glang dag bzang zhes smras pa dang /_de na gcig na re kho bo'i bzang ngo zhes zer ro/_/yang gzhan zhig na re kho bo'i bzang ngo zhes zer ro/_/shing rta spyod pa de na re kho bo'i 
[\[231b.4\]]bzang ngo zhes zer ro/_/de dag gis smras pa/_ji ltar shes/_des smras pa/_lam dma' ba nas shing rtar khal 'di tsam bzhag ste kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya skugs su btsugs la glang gnyis bda' bar bya'o/_/de dag gis lam dma' ba nas shing rtar khal de tsam bzhag ste kAr ShA 
[\[231b.5\]]pa Na lnga brgya skugs su btsugs nas glang de gnyis deng du bcug go/_/shing rta spyod pa des dga' byed ru 'del song shig_/sa ri khu yu song shig ces bda' bar brtsams pa dang /_glang de gnyis mi 'gul bar 'khod nas des glang de gnyis la lag pas btsag par brtsams pa dang /_
[\[231b.6\]]shing rta spyod pa gzhan dag gis smras pa/_khyod pham gyis ba lang ma gsod par glang 'di gnyis thong la skugs 'jol cig ces de dag gis de kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya 'jal du bcug go/_/shing rta spyod pa des glang de gnyis la spyos te lcag mang pos gzhus nas nyi ma la shing skam la btags 
[\[231b.7\]]te gzhag go/_/chos nyid kyis na 'jig rten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe na dud 'gro dag kyang mi'i skad smra shes pas de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyod bdag cag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar 'dug 'dug na bdag cag gis khyod la nyes pa byas sam/_ci na khyod kyis da bdag 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]cag lcag mang pos gzhus te nyi ma la shing skam la btags te 'jog par byed des smas pa/_khyod gnyis kyis nus bzhin du sgyu byas te kho bo kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya'i skugs 'jal du bcug go/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyod rang gi lces skugs 'jal du bcug go/_/
[\[232a.2\]]ji ltar gyur/_bdag cag gnyis kyi gcig gi ming ni dga' byed ces bya/_gcig gi ming ni sa ri zhes bya na/_khyod ci'i phyir kho bo cag gnyis la ru 'del dang /_khu yu zhes ming mi snyan par rjod par byed/_de lta mod kyi da lam ches dma' ba nas shing rtar khal de'i nyis gyur 
[\[232a.3\]]zhog ste kAr ShA pa Na de'i nyis gyur skugs su tshugs la kho bo cag gnyis dos shig_/ci khyed gnyis yang kho bo skugs 'jal du gzhug par 'dod dam/_bdag cag gnyis la ming mi snyan par ma brjod cig dang khyod skugs nod du gzhug go/_/dus gzhan zhig na shing rta spyod pa de 
[\[232a.4\]]dag yang chang gral du tshogs te gtam zer ba na shes ldan dag bdag cag las su'i glang dag bzang zhes smras pa dang /_de na gcig na re kho bo'i bzang ngo zhes zer ro/_/yang gzhan zhig na re kho bo'i bzang ngo zhes zer ro/_/shing rta spyod pa de na re yang kho bo'i bzang ngo zhes zer ro/_/de 
[\[232a.5\]]dag gis smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod yang bdag nyid skugs 'jal du gzhug par 'dod dam/_des smras pa/_khyed cag la ci gnod da lam ches dma' ba nas shing rtar khal de'i nyis gyur bzhag ste/_kAr ShA pa Na stong skugs su btsugs la glang dag bda' bar bya'o/_/de dag gis lam 
[\[232a.6\]]ches dma' ba nas shing rtar khal de'i nyis gyur bzhag ste/_kAr ShA pa Na stong skugs su btsugs nas glang de gnyis ded du bcug go/_/shing rta spyod pa des dga' byed song shig_/sa ri song shig ces bda' bar brtsams pa dang /_de gnyis kyis khal de myur ba myur ba kho nar thang la bskyal te 
[\[232a.7\]]shing rta spyod pa des skugs kAr shA pa Na stong thob pa dang /_lhas tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_gang tshe khal ni ches lci zhing /_/gang tshe lam yang ches dma' ba/_/de tshe de gnyis khal khyer zhing /_/de tshe shing rta 'dren par byed/_/yid du 'ong ba brjod byas na/_
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]shin tu lci ba'i khal khyer zhing /_/de yang rnyed dang ldan gyur la/_/de gnyis kyang ni yid dgar gyur/_/de bas yid 'ong brjod bya zhing /_/yid du mi 'ong nam yang min/_/yid du 'ong brjod byed na/_/dge bar 'gyur zhing sdig med yin/_/dge slong dag re zhig dud 'gro'i 
[\[232b.2\]]skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang mis skyon nas smra bas kun du spyad pa na byams pa'i rgyun gcod par byed na mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de lta bas na dge slong gis dge slong la mi'i skyon nas smra bas kun du spyod par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs 
[\[232b.3\]]du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na/_phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la 
[\[232b.4\]]bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi'i skyon nas smra na ltung byed do/_/mi'i skyon nas smra na zhes bya ba ni mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas ngag dang tshig dang /_tha snyad dang skad dang brjod pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang tshig gi lam dang /_tshig gi sgra dang /_ngag gi las 
[\[232b.5\]]dang /_ngag gi rnam par rig byed smra na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshed par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma 
[\[232b.6\]]bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//bar sdom la/_rigs dang bzo dang las dang ni/_/rtags nang ltung ba sde lnga dang /_/nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams dang ni/_/spyo bar byed pa tha ma yin/_/dge 
[\[232b.7\]]slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas bram ze las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rgyal rig las rab tu byung ba yin no 
[\[233a.2\]]zhes smra na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang 
[\[233a.3\]]ldan pa ni rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_
[\[233a.4\]]bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/_thag pa las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 
[\[233a.5\]]'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam 
[\[233a.6\]]pas khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 
[\[233a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas lcags mgar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni lcags mgar las 
[\[233b.2\]]rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_
[\[233b.3\]]bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na/_dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung 
[\[233b.4\]]ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i 
[\[233b.5\]]skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang 
[\[233b.6\]]rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas 'dreg mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni 'dreg mkhan las rab tu byung 
[\[233b.7\]]ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smra na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du 
[\[234a.2\]]song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[234a.3\]]gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas bran las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bran las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur 
[\[234a.4\]]kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas bram ze las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin gyis tshe dang 
[\[234a.5\]]ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_bram ze'i spyod tshul dang /_spyod pa dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_kun tu spyod pa dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_bya ma bum blang ba dang /_sa blang ba dang lag stangs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_rab bsngags bya ba dang /_kye zhes bya ba dang /_nges brjod 
[\[234a.6\]]kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin byed pa dang /_mchod sbyin byed du 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_klog tu 'jug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_lan pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa 
[\[234a.7\]]gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i gnyar bzhon pa dang /_rta la bzhon pa dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_'phong dang phyir bsnur ba dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang /_
[\[234b.2\]]zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phen thabs dang /_'dzin stangs dang gom stangs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_gcad pa dang dral ba dang dbug pa dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs 
[\[234b.3\]]che ba dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas/_rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la 
[\[234b.4\]]yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_zhing rmo ba dang ba lang bsrung ba dang /_tshong bya ba bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung 
[\[234b.5\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang 
[\[234b.6\]]ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste zor ba dang /_phrag gdang bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di 
[\[234b.7\]]skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni thag pa las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_dar dag dang /_ras yug chen dag dang /_be'u ras dag dang /_dar la dag dang /_du gu la dag dang /_ko tam 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul 
[\[235a.2\]]ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_be'u ras dang ras yug chen dang /_par thang dang /_khab ris dang /_khre'u tshe dang gor bu bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba 
[\[235a.3\]]nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bzang mkhan las 
[\[235a.4\]]rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_zhwa dang zhwa sgre bo dang /_byis pa'i gos dag dang /_shi nga dpung bcad dag dang /_dor mang dag dang /_dor thung dag dang /_bzang mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur

[\[235a.6\]]byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste lhung bzed dang lhung bzed chung ngu dang /_khab dang /_gri dag dang /_sen gri dag dang /_lcags mgar gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa de dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la 
[\[235a.7\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_khar gzhong dag dang /_gzhong bu dag dang /_cha lang dag dang /_skom phor dag dang /_ril ba dag dang /_rdungs mgar gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong

[\[235b.3\]]gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_lham sgrog gu can dag dang /_lham yu chad dag dang /_mchil lham dag dang /_sga dag dang /_dong pa dag dang /_ko lpags mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma 
[\[235b.4\]]gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba 
[\[235b.5\]]yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_rdza ma dag dang /_bum pa dag dang /_ril ba dag dang /_rdze'u dag dang /_kham phor dag dang /_rdza mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge

[\[235b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_skra 'breg pa dang /_sen mo 'breg pa dang /_kha spu 'breg pa dang /_byin pa bcos pa dang /_'breg mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan

[\[236a.6\]]khrus dang /_pho nyar 'gro ba dang /_mngag pa dang /_bran gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po sum bcu rtsa dgu pa/_dge slong 
[\[236a.7\]]gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas bram ze las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi las 'di lta ste/_bram ze'i spyod 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]tshul dang /_spyod pa dang gtsang sbra dang /_kun tu spyod pa dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_byam bum blang ba dang /_sa blang pa dang /_lag stangs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_rab bsngags bya ba dang /_kye zhes bya ba dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan

[\[236b.3\]]gyur kyang rung dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rgyal rigs las rab tu byung 
[\[236b.4\]]ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi las 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i gnyar bzhon pa dang /_rta la bzhon pa dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_'phong dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phen 
[\[236b.5\]]thabs dang /_'dzin stangs dang /_gom stangs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs che ba dang /_rgyal rigs kyi las gzhan gang yin 
[\[236b.6\]]pa dag kyang bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul 
[\[236b.7\]]ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi las 'di lta ste/_zhing rmo ba dang /_ba lang bsrung ba dang /_tshong bya ba dang /_rje'u rigs kyi las gzhan gang yin pa dag kyang bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur

[\[237a.1\]]kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni dmangs rigs las

[\[237a.3\]]nas smra ba'i bsam pas tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_son pa dang /_dru bu 
[\[237a.4\]]dang /_snas la sogs pas rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan 
[\[237a.5\]]pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste rgyang shing dang /_skud pa dang /_tshon dang /_phur pa dang /_so [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba

[\[237a.7\]]ni bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_khab dang /_skud pa dang /_gri dang chan pa dang /_lcug mos rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]nas smra ba'i bsam pas lcags mgar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni lcags mgar las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste sbud pa dang /_sbud ru dang /_
[\[237b.2\]]ti tsa dang skam pa dang /_tho bas rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong 
[\[237b.3\]]gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas ni 'di lta ste/_sbud pa dang /_sbud ru dang /_ti tsa dang /_skam pa dang /_tho bas rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung 
[\[237b.4\]]dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe 
[\[237b.5\]]dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_rgyus pa dang /_rgyi'u dang /_'breng bu dang /_dra gri dang /_smyung dang smyung bus rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas rdza mkhan las rab tu 
[\[237b.6\]]byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste 'khor lo dang /_dbyig gu dang /_tha gu dang /_'khor lo'i rten ma dang /_gsal gyis rang gi 
[\[237b.7\]]las bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa ni 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_spu gri dang /_chan pa dang /_bdar dang /_smang tser dang /_sen gris rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[238a.2\]]dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste ste'u dang /_
[\[238a.3\]]sta re dang gzong dang /_sog le dang /_tho bas rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad 
[\[238a.4\]]ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_smyig ma dang /_gri dang /_tshon dang /_smyug tho dang /_lhang tsher gyis rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na 
[\[238a.5\]]dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas bran las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[238a.6\]]pa ni bran las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_bsku mnye dang dril phyi dang /_khrus dang /_pho nyar 'gro ba dang /_mngag pas rang gi las bya'o zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[238a.7\]]gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni theng po dang /_smad 'chal dang /_zhar ba dang /_lag sor rdum po dang /_sgur po dang /_mi'u thung 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]dang /_lba ba can dang /_glen pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_grum po dang /_'on pa dang /_rten 'phye dang /_rkang 'bam las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam 
[\[238b.2\]]pas dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni mdze can dang /_'brum bu phra mo can dang /_ngal skyen pa dang /_shu ba can dang /_g.yan pa can dang /_khyi rngo can dang /_glog pa can dang /_rkang shu 
[\[238b.3\]]can dang /_skyigs bu can dang /_skyug bro ba dang /_khong skem can dang /_rims can dang /_rims drag po can dang /_lud pa can dang /_dbugs mi bde ba can dang /_skem nad can dang /_brjed byed can dang /_bkres ngab can dang /_skya rbab can dang /_tshil po che dang /_skran can dang /_
[\[238b.4\]]khrag nad can dang /_mkhris nad can dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang 
[\[238b.5\]]ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni pham par 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba dang /_nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang 
[\[238b.6\]]rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_dngan 
[\[238b.7\]]dus can dang /_phrag dog can dang /_ser sna can dang /_g.yon can dang /_sgyu can dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khrel med pa dang /_sdig pa 'dod pa dang /_log par lta ba yin no zhes smras na dge slong spa gong ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]dge slong gis mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i bsam pas dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni ro lta bu yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyo ba dag gis spyo bar byed na dge slong spa gong 
[\[239a.2\]]ba nyid du gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung dge slong la ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te ming de lta bu mang po dag yod par gyur na de la lan gdab par smra ba sangs rgyas skyong gang yin zhes zer ba la bram ze las rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma lta bu dag brjod pa la 
[\[239a.3\]]ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/mi'i skyon nas smra ba'i ltung byed de gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas 
[\[239a.4\]]sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag dge slong rnams la phra mas kun du spyod par byed de/_phra mas kun tu spyod pa na dge slong dag spa gong ba dang /_gzengs dmas pa dang /_zhum par gyur nas lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 
[\[239a.5\]]'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas kyang gtong bar byed/_'di ltar dus yun ring po nas nye bar bsags pa chos dang ldan pa'i gcugs pa'i rgyun yang gcod par byed nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams la phra mas kun du spyod par 
[\[239a.6\]]byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la 
[\[239a.7\]]sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed dge slong rnams la phra mas 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]kun du spyod pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/dge slong dag sngon 
[\[239b.2\]]byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nags tshal zhig na seng ge mo sbrum ma zhig 'dug ste/_de la seng ge mo rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni gang gi tshe 'brang ba'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe na sha'i tshogs byas te 'brang bar byed pas seng ge mo de ba lang gi tshogs chen po zhig gi phyi bzhin du rjes su song ba dang /_
[\[239b.3\]]ba 'brangs nas ring po ma lon pa be'u rjes su skyong bar byed pa zhig khyu'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro ba de seng ge mo des bsad nas sha khyer te/_rang gi tshang du song ngo /_/be'u de yang ma'i nu ma 'thung 'dod pas de'i phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du song ba dang seng ge mos bsam pa/_be'u 'di yang 
[\[239b.4\]]gsad par bya'o snyam nas yang bsam pa/_gal te bdag gi bu 'brangs par gyur na 'di de'i chung po grogs su 'gyur gyis mi gsad do snyam mo/_/seng ge mo de 'brangs nas de las phrug gu pho zhig byung ba dang /_seng ge mo des rang gi phrug gu dang /_be'u de gnyis ka nu ma bsnun par 
[\[239b.5\]]brtsams nas ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis ka chen por gyur te/_dus gzhan zhig na seng ge mo de na bar gyur nas de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smras pa/_bu gnyis khyed gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin la/_phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyis/_
[\[239b.6\]]kho mo 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o zhes smras nas/_bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes bya ba yin pas 
[\[239b.7\]]dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/seng ge de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dam pa dag za zhing khrag mang po dag 'thung bas chen por gyur to/_/khyu mchog de yang seng ges bsrung ba'i rtswa bzang po dag za zhing chu gtsang ma dag 'thung bas chen por gyur to/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]kyi rgyal po seng ge de la wa rgan po rab tu brkam pa lhag ma za ba zhig 'khor zhing phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang nas seng ge des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag dam pa dag 'thungs bag tsha ba med par de na 'dug pas phyogs der 
[\[240a.2\]]gcan gzan phra mo gzhan dag gis nye mi phod pas wa rgan po de seng ge des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag dam pa 'thungs pa'i sha'i lhag ma dang khrag gi lhag ma dag za zhing 'thung bas pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas par gyur to/_/
[\[240a.3\]]ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na seng ge de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag dam pa dag 'thungs nas myur ba myur ba kho nar tshang du song ste khyu mchog de dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'dug par byed nas sha'i lhag ma de dag kyang gcan gzan phra mo gzhan dag gis zos 
[\[240a.4\]]nas wa rgan po des bsams pa/_seng ge 'di gang du 'gro ba je blta bar bya'o snyam nas/_de de'i phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du song ba dang /_ji tsam na khyu mchog dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'dug pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_khyu mchog 'di bdag gi lto'i dgrar gyur pa yin gyis/_
[\[240a.5\]]bdag gis 'di gnyis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas wa rgan po de khyu mchog de'i mdun du rna ba phab ste 'dug pa dang /_khyu mchog gis smras pa/_zhang po rlung tsha ba dag mi ldang ngam/_was smras pa/_tsha bo rlung rab tu 'bar ba dag ldang ngo /_/ci nyes/_seng ge 'di na re kho bo'i 
[\[240a.6\]]sha tshogs rgyu khyu mchog de gar song /_gang gi tshe kho bos sha gzhan ma rnyed pa de'i tshe na kho bos khyu mchog 'di bza' bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/khyu mchog gis smras pa/_zhang po kho bo cag gnyis la mas 'chi kar bu gnyis khyed gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin 
[\[240a.7\]]la phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyi kho mo 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o zhes kha chems bzhag gis khyod de skad ma zer cig_/was smras pa/_tsha bo khyod da kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig mi nyan na chud zos par 'ong 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]ngo /_/khyu mchog gis smras pa/_zhang po [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/_was smras pa/_tsha bo seng ge 'di tshang nas byung nas bya smyang byed par 'gyur la/_bya smyang byas nas glal bar 'gyur zhing glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar 'gyur/_phyogs bzhir rnam par 
[\[240b.2\]]bltas nas seng ge'i skad thang gsum phyung ste/_khyod kyi mdun du 'ong bar 'gyur ba na khyod kyis bdag 'dis bsad do snyam du shes par gyis shig_/wa de de'i 'og tu seng ge'i mdun du rna ba phab ste 'dug pa dang /_seng ges smras pa/_zhang po rlung tsha ba dag mi ldang ngam/_was 
[\[240b.3\]]smras pa/_tsha bo rlung rab tu 'bar ba dag ldang ngo /_/ci nyes/_khyu mchog 'di na re kho bo'i rtsa'i seng ge de gar song /_'di'i mas kho bo'i ma bsad kyis 'di'i lto nges par dral bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/seng ges smras pa/_zhang po kho bo cag gnyis la mas 'chi kar bu 
[\[240b.4\]]gnyis khyed gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin la/_phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyis/_kho mo 'das pa'i 'og tu khyod gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o zhes kha chems bzhag gis khyod de skad ma zer cig_/was smras pa/_
[\[240b.5\]]tsha bo khyod da kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig mi nyan na chud zos par 'ong ngo /_/seng ges smras pa/_zhang po [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/_was smras pa/_tsha bo khyu mchog 'di lhas nas byung nas bya smyang byed par 'gyur la/_bya smyang byas nas 'bu sgra 'byin par 'gyur zhing 
[\[240b.6\]]'bu sgra phyung nas phug thrig byed par 'gyur/_phug thrig byas nas rngam pa byas te khyod kyi mdun du 'ong bar 'gyur na/_khyod kyis bdag 'dis bsad do snyam du shes par gyis shig_/de gnyis rang bzhin gyis rtag tu de lta byed mod kyi lan 'ga' yang phan tshun mtshan mar ma 
[\[240b.7\]]bzung ngo /_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge de tshang nas byung nas bya smyang byas te glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te seng ge'i skad thang gsum phyung nas khyu mchog gi mdun du song ngo /_/khyu mchog de yang lhas nas byung nas bya smyang byas te 'bu sgra 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]phyung nas phug thrig byas te rngam pa byas nas seng ge'i mdun du song ngo /_/de gnyis rang bzhin gyis rtag tu de lta byed mod kyi lan 'ga' yang mtshan mar ma bzung ste gang gi tshe rgyud la dbyen gyi sa bon btab pa de'i tshe na mtshan mar bzung bas/_khyu mchog gis 
[\[241a.2\]]kyang bdag 'dis bsad do snyam du bsams la/_seng ges kyang bdag 'dis bsad do snyam du bsams nas/_seng ges khyu mchog gi brang la sder mos btab pa dang /_khyu mchog gis kyang rwas seng ge'i lto dral nas de gnyis ka dus la bab pa dang /_lhas tshigs su 
[\[241a.3\]]bcad pa smras pa/_bzang po dag la lta ba'i mis/_/skye bo ngan pa bsten mi bya/_/seng ge khyu mchog mdza' ba la/_/wa yis tha dad phye la ltos/_/dge slong dag re zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang phra mas kun tu spyod pa na gsod par sems na 
[\[241a.4\]]mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis dge slong la phra mas kun du spyod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong la phra mas kun du spyod par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nags tshal 
[\[241a.5\]]zhig na seng ge mo phrug gu dang bcas pa zhig dang /_stag mo phrug gu dang bcas pa zhig 'dug ste/_seng ge mo spyod yul du song ba dang /_de'i phrug gu de 'khyam pa na stag mo'i gan du song nas stag mos de mthong nas bsams pa 'di gsad par bya'o snyam nas/_yang bsams 
[\[241a.6\]]pa/_'di bdag gi bu'i chung po grogs su 'gyur gyis mi bsad do snyam nas des de nu ma snun par brtsams so/_/seng ge mo des kyang spyod yul brgyus te phyir 'ongs pa dang /_ji tsam na phrug gu mi snang nas des de btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_des phrug gu stag mos 
[\[241a.7\]]bsnun par mthong ngo /_/stag mo des kyang seng ge mo de mthong nas skrag ste 'bros par brtsams pa dang /_seng ge mo des stag mo la smras pa/_nu mo ma 'bros shig dang /_lhan cig 'khod par bya ste/_'di ltar kho mo spyod yul du song ba na khyod kyis kho mo'i phrug gu la 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]mkho ba bstabs pas gal te khyod spyod yul du 'gro bar gyur na/_kho mos kyang khyod kyi phrug gu la mkho ba bstabs par bya'o/_/de gnyis lhan cig 'khod par brtsams nas de gnyis kyis seng ge'i phrug gu'i ming ni mche bzang zhes bya bar btags/_stag phrug gi ming ni 
[\[241b.2\]]dpung bzang zhes bya bar btags nas de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na chen por gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na seng ge mo dang /_stag mo gnyis na bar gyur nas de gnyis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bu gnyis la smras pa/_bu gnyis khyed gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin la phra ma 
[\[241b.3\]]can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyis/_kho mo cag gnyis 'das pa'i 'og tu khyod gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o zhes smras nas/_bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 
[\[241b.4\]]'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/seng ges ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag za bar byed/_khrag dam pa dag 'thung bar byed cing /_de sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag 
[\[241b.5\]]dam pa dag 'thungs nas myur ba myur ba kho nar tshang du 'gro bar byed do/_/stag gis spyod yul du song nas tshegs chen pos [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag bsad de sha dang khrag zos shing 'thungs nas yun ring pos phyir 'ong ngo /_/dus gzhan zhig na stag gis lhag rol dag sbas nas des de zos 
[\[241b.6\]]te myur du phyir 'ongs pa dang /_seng ges stag la smras pa/_khyod sngon chad ni yun ring zhig gis phyir 'ongs na deng myur du phyir 'ongs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/_stag gis smras pa/_kho bos lhag rol sbas par gyur pa de zos te phyir 'ongs so/_/seng ges smras pa/_khyod lhag 
[\[241b.7\]]rol sbed dam/_stag gis smras pa sbed do/_/seng ges smras pa/_kho bo ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dam pa dam pa dag bsad nas sha dam pa dag zos shing khrag dam pa dag 'thungs nas ltos pa med par 'gro'o/_/stag gis smras pa/_khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa yin gyis/_kho bos ni 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]de ltar byed mi nus so/_/seng ges smras pa/_bdag cag lhan cig dong ngo /_/de gnyis lhan cig 'dong bar brtsams so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge de la wa rgan po rab tu gdu ba lhag ma za ba zhig 'khor zhing phyi bzhin du 'brang ba des bsams pa/_stag 
[\[242a.2\]]'di bdag gi lto'i dgrar gyur pa yin gyis 'di gnyis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nas wa rgan po de seng ge'i mdun du rna ba phab ste 'dug pa dang /_seng ges smras pa/_zhang po rlung tsha ba dag mi ldang ngam/_was smras pa/_tsha bo rlung rab tu 'bar ba dag ldang ngo /_/ci nyes/_
[\[242a.3\]]stag 'di na re kho bo'i rtsa'i seng ge de gar song /_des kho bo lhag ma zar bcug gis kho bos de nges par gsad par bya'o zhes zer ro/_/seng ges smras pa/_zhang po kho bo cag gnyis la ma gnyis kyis 'chi kar bu gnyis khyed gnyis nu ma gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin la/_phra 
[\[242a.4\]]ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyis/_kho mo cag gnyis 'das pa'i 'og tu khyed gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o zhes kha chems bzhag gis khyod de skad ma zer cig_/was smras pa/_tsha bo khyod da kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig mi nyan na 
[\[242a.5\]]chud zos par 'ong ngo /_/seng ges smras pa/_zhang po [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/_was smras pa/_tsha bo stag 'di tshang nas byung nas bya smyang byed par 'gyur la/_bya smyang byas nas glal bar 'gyur zhing /_glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar 'gyur/_phyogs 
[\[242a.6\]]bzhir rnam par bltas nas stag gi skad thang gsum phyung ste khyod kyi mdun du 'ong bar 'gyur ba na khyod kyis bdag 'dis bsad do snyam du shes par gyis shig_/de'i 'og tu stag gi mdun du rna ba phab ste 'dug pa dang /_stag gis smras pa/_zhang po rlung tsha bdag mi ldang ngam/_
[\[242a.7\]]was smras pa/_tsha bo rlung rab tu 'bar ba dag ldang ngo /_/ci nyes/_seng ge 'di na re kho bo'i rtsa'i stag de gar song /_de nges par gsad par bya'o zhes zer ro/_/stag gis smras pa/_zhang po kho bo cag gnyis la ma gnyis kyis 'chi kar bu gnyis khyed gnyis nu ma 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]gcig la nu nu ba'i spun yin la/_phra ma can snod 'byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gang bar 'khod kyis/_khyed gnyis kyis 'ga' yang mnyan par mi bya'o zhes kha chems bzhag gis khyod de skad ma zer cig_/was smras pa/_tsha bo khyod da kho bo phan par 'dod pa'i tshig mi 
[\[242b.2\]]nyan na chud zos par 'ong ngo /_/zhang po [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/_was smras pa/_tsha bo seng ge 'di tshang nas byung nas bya smyang byed par 'gyur la/_bya smyang byas nas glal bar 'gyur zhing /_glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar 'gyur/_phyogs bzhir rnam 
[\[242b.3\]]par bltas nas seng ge'i skad thang gsum phyung ste khyod kyi mdun du 'ong bar 'gyur ba na khyod kyis bdag 'dis bsad par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par bya'o/_/de gnyis rang bzhin gyis rtag tu de ltar byed mod kyi/_lan 'ga' yang mtshan mar ma bzung ngo /_/dus gzhan zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[242b.4\]]kyi rgyal po seng ge de tshang nas byung nas bya smyang byas te glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te seng ge'i skad thang gsum phyung nas stag gi mdun du song ngo /_/stag gis kyang tshang nas byung nas bya smyang byas te glal nas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te stag skad thang gsum phyung 
[\[242b.5\]]nas seng ge'i mdun du song ngo /_/de gnyis rtag tu de lta byed mod kyi/_lan 'ga' yang mtshan mar ma bzung ste/_gang gi tshe rgyud la dbyen gyi sa bon btab pa de'i tshe mtshan mar bzung bas seng ges kyang bdag 'dis bsad do snyam du bsams la/_stag gis kyang bdag 'dis bsad do 
[\[242b.6\]]snyam du bsams so/_/yang seng ges bsams pa/_bdag ni stobs dang ldan pa yin la stag ni de lta ma yin pas 'dis bdag la rgol mi nus kyis je brtag par bya'o snyam nas des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_chu zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/rtsal dang shugs dang ldan 
[\[242b.7\]]pa yi/_/mche ba bzang la rgol byed pa/_/dpung bzang de ni rigs pa min/_/stag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_chu zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/rtsal dang shugs dang ldan pa yi/_/dpung bzang la ni rgol byed pa/_/mche bzang de ni rigs pa min/_/seng ges smras pa/_khyod la 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]sus smras/_stag gis smras pa/_wa 'dis so/_/stag gis smras pa/_khyos la sus smras/_seng ges smras pa/_wa 'dis so/_/seng ges bsams pa/_'dis bdag cag gnyis 'byed par byed do snyam nas des wa de thal lcag gis bsnun te bsad pa 
[\[243a.2\]]dang /_lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_gzhan gyi tshig gis mdza' bshes mi spang zhing /_/gzhan gyis smras pa dag la brtag par bya/_/'byed par 'dod pa skabs tshol byed pas na/_/skye bo phra ma can la yid ma rton/_/wa skyes grong pa [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra byed pa/_/mdza' 
[\[243a.3\]]bshes 'byed par byed pas skyes to re/_/phra ma smra ba de ni bsad gyur nas/_/bde bas mdza' bshes dga' bar byed la ltos/_dge slong dag re zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang phra mas kun du spyod pa na gsod par sems na mi rnams la 
[\[243a.4\]]smos kyang ci dgos/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis dge slong la phra mas kun du spyad par mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong la phra mas spyod par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong 
[\[243a.5\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon 
[\[243a.6\]]par bya ste/_dge slong la phra ma byed na ltung byed do/_/dge slong la phra ma byed na zhes bya ba ni dge slong la phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas ngag dang /_tshig dang tha snyad dang /_skad dang /_brjod pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_tshig gi lam dang /_tshig gi sgra dang /_ngag gi las dang /_
[\[243a.7\]]ngag gi rnam par rig byed smras pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ltung ba de ma 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//bar sdom la/_rigs dang bzo dang las dang ni/_/rtags nad ltung ba sde lnga dang /_/nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams 
[\[243b.2\]]dang ni/_/spyo bar byed pa tha ma yin/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bram ze las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bram ze las rab tu byung 
[\[243b.3\]]ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas phra mor 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba'i 
[\[243b.4\]]gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes 
[\[243b.5\]]bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas phra mor 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge 
[\[243b.6\]]sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/_ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs 
[\[243b.7\]]dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 
[\[244a.2\]]phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni thag pa las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang 
[\[244a.3\]]zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na/_ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 
[\[244a.4\]]'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di 
[\[244a.5\]]zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi 
[\[244a.6\]]tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes 
[\[244a.7\]]byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas lcags mgar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni lcags mgar las rab tu 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rdungs mgar las 
[\[244b.2\]]rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 
[\[244b.3\]]'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge 
[\[244b.4\]]slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa 
[\[244b.5\]]la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_
[\[244b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa ni rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam 
[\[244b.7\]]pas 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 
[\[245a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na 
[\[245a.3\]]ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_
[\[245a.4\]]bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[245a.5\]]gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bran las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bran las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_
[\[245a.6\]]ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bram ze las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan 
[\[245a.7\]]pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_bram ze'i spyod tshul dang /_spyod pa dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_kun du spyod pa dang /_thal 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]ba blang ba dang /_bya ma bum pa blang ba dang /_sa blang ba dang /_lag stangs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_rab bsngags bya ba dang /_kye zhes bya ba dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod 
[\[245b.2\]]sbyin byed pa dang /_mchod sbyin byed du 'jud pa dang /_klog pa dang /_klog tu 'jud pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_len pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la nyes byas 
[\[245b.3\]]su 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas phra mor 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i 
[\[245b.4\]]tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste glang po che'i gnyar bzhon pa dang /_rta bzhon pa dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_'phong dang phyir bsnur ba dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_
[\[245b.5\]]lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phen thabs dang /_'dzin stangs dang /_gom stabs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_bcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_
[\[245b.6\]]mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs che ba dag bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas phra mor 'gyur ro/_/
[\[245b.7\]]dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_zhing rmo ba dang /_ba lang bsrung ba dang /_tshong bya ba bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs 
[\[246a.2\]]dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_
[\[246a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa ni dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_zor ba dang /_phrag gdang bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod 
[\[246a.4\]]pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas thag pa las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul 
[\[246a.5\]]ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_dar dag dang /_ras yug chen dag dang /_be'u ras dag dang /_dar la dag dang /_du gu la dag dang /_ko tam pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge 
[\[246a.6\]]slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i 
[\[246a.7\]]gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_be'u ras yug 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]chen dang /_bar thang dang /_khab ris dang /_khre'u tshe dang /_gong bu bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la 
[\[246b.2\]]nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bzang mkhan 
[\[246b.3\]]las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_zhwa dang zhwa sgre bo dang /_byis pa'i gos dag dang /_shi nga dpung bcad dag dang /_dor mang dag dang /_dor thung dag dang /_bzang mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes 
[\[246b.4\]]zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas lcags mgar las 
[\[246b.5\]]rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni lcags mgar las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_lhung 
[\[246b.6\]]bzed dang /_lhung bzed chung ngu dang /_khab dang /_gri dag dang /_sen gri dag dang /_lcags mgar gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes 
[\[246b.7\]]smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_khar gzhong dag dang /_gzhong bu dag dang /_cha lang dag dang /_skom phor dag dang /_ril 
[\[247a.2\]]ba dag dang /_rdungs mgar gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes 
[\[247a.3\]]byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni ko lpags 
[\[247a.4\]]mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_lham sgrog gu can dag dang /_lham yu chad dag dang /_mchil lham dag dang /_sga dag dang /_dong pa dag dang /_ko lpags mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o 
[\[247a.5\]]zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rdza mkhan 
[\[247a.6\]]las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_rdza ma 
[\[247a.7\]]dag dang /_bum pa dag dang /_ril ba dag dang /_rdze'u dag dang /_kham phor dag dang /_rdza mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge 
[\[247b.2\]]sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_skra breg pa dang /_sen mo breg pa dang /_kha spu breg pa dang /_byin pa bcos pa dang /_'breg mkhan 
[\[247b.3\]]gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[247b.4\]]gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang 
[\[247b.5\]]ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_khri dag dang /_khri'u dag dang /_an dag dang /_an khri'u dag dang /_sgo glegs dag dang /_shing mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 
[\[247b.6\]]'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod
