[\[247b.7\]]la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_skon bu dag dang /_sprog ma dag dang /_gdugs dag dang /_
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]bsil yab dag dang /_dung gzeb dag dang /_smyig ma mkhan gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa 
[\[248a.2\]]la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bran las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga 
[\[248a.3\]]la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bran las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi bzo 'di lta ste/_bsku mnye dang /_dril phyi dang /_khrus dang /_pho nyar 'gro ba dang /_mngag pa dang /_bran gyi bzo gzhan gang yin pa dag bslab par bya'o zhes zer te/_
[\[248a.4\]]dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bzhi bcu pa/_dge 
[\[248a.5\]]slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bram ze las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bram ze las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang 
[\[248a.6\]]gi las 'di lta ste/_bram ze'i spyod tshul dang /_spyod pa dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_kun du spyod pa dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_bya ma bum blang ba dang /_lag stangs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_rab bsngags bya ba dang /_kye zhes bya dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_
[\[248a.7\]]mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin byed pa dang /_mchod sbyin byed du 'jud pa dang /_klog pa dang /_klog tu 'jug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_len pa dang /_bram ze'i las gzhan gang yin pa 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]dag kyang bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas phra mor 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam 
[\[248b.2\]]pas rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rgyal rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi las 
[\[248b.3\]]'di lta ste/_glang po che'i gnyar bzhon pa dang /_rta la bzhon pa dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_'phong dang /_phyir bsnur ba dag dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 
[\[248b.4\]]'phen thabs dang /_'dzin stangs dang /_gom stangs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs che bar phog pa dang /_
[\[248b.5\]]rgyal rigs kyi las gzhan gang yin pa dag kyang bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas phra mor 'gyur 
[\[248b.6\]]ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rje'u rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rje'u rigs las 
[\[248b.7\]]rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi las 'di lta ste/_zhing rmo ba dang /_ba lang bsrung ba dang /_tshong bya ba dang /_rje'u rigs kyi las gzhan gang yin pa dag kyang bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan 
[\[249a.2\]]pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas rang gi las 'di lta ste/_zor ba dang /_phrag gdang dang /_dmangs rigs kyi las 
[\[249a.3\]]gzhan gang yin pa de dag kyang bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 
[\[249a.4\]]phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas thag pa las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni tha ga pa las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 
[\[249a.5\]]'di lta ste/_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_son pa dang /_dru bu dang /_snas ma la sogs pas rang gi las bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs 
[\[249a.6\]]dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_
[\[249a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa ni khab ris mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_rgyang shing dang /_skud pa dang /_tshon dang /_phur pa dang /_so [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]rang gi las bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re 
[\[249b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bzang mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_khab dang /_skud pa dang /_gri dang /_chan pa dang /_lcub mos rang gi las bya'o zhes zer te/_
[\[249b.3\]]dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas lcags mgar las rab tu byung ba'i 
[\[249b.4\]]gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni lcags mgar las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_sbud pa dang /_sbud ru dang /_ti tsa 
[\[249b.5\]]dang /_skam pa dang /_tho bas rang gi las bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[249b.6\]]slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdungs mgar las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe 
[\[249b.7\]]dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_sbud pa dang /_sbud ru dang /_ti tsa dang /_skam pa dang /_tho bas rang gi las bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram 
[\[250a.2\]]ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni ko lpags mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_rgyus pa dang /_rgyi'u dang /_'breng bu dang /_dra gri dang /_smyung dang /_smyung bus rang gi las bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes 
[\[250a.3\]]bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang 
[\[250a.4\]]ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni rdza mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_'khor lo dang /_dbyig gu dang /_tha gu dang /_'khor lo'i rten ma dang /_
[\[250a.5\]]gsal gyis rang gi las bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya 
[\[250a.6\]]ba'i bsam pas 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 
[\[250a.7\]]'di lta ste/_spu gri dang /_chan pa dang /_bdar dang /_smang tser dang /_sen gris rang gi las bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_
[\[250b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa ni shing mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_ste'u dang /_sta re dang /_gzong dang /_sog le dang /_tho bas rang gi las bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 
[\[250b.3\]]'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba'i gan du stong ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong 
[\[250b.4\]]na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni smyig ma mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/_smyig ma dang /_gri dang /_tshon dang /_smyug tho dang /_lhang tsher gyis rang gi las 
[\[250b.5\]]bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas bran 
[\[250b.6\]]las rab tu byung ba'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni bran las rab tu byung ba yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pas 'di lta ste bsku mnye dang /_dril phyi dang /_khrus dang /_pho nyar 'gro 
[\[250b.7\]]ba dang /_mngag pas rang gi las bya'o zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas dge 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni theng po dang /_smad 'chal dang /_zhar ba dang /_lag sor rdum po dang /_sgur po dang /_mi'u 
[\[251a.2\]]thung dang /_lba ba can dang /_glen pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_grum po dang /_'on pa dang /_rten 'phye dang /_rkang 'bam las rab tu byung ba yin gyis zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming 
[\[251a.3\]]brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga 
[\[251a.4\]]la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni mdze can dang /_'brum bu phra mo can dang /_ngal skyen pa dang /_shu ba can dang /_g.yan pa can dang /_khyi rngo can dang /_glog pa can dang /_rkang shu can dang /_skyigs bu can dang /_skyug bro ba dang /_khong skam can dang /_rims 
[\[251a.5\]]can dang /_rims drag po can dang /_lud pa can dang /_dbugs mi bde ba can dang /_skem nad can dang /_brjed byed can dang /_bkres ngab can dang /_skya rbab can dang /_tshil po che dang /_skran can dang /_khrag nad can dang /_mkhris nad dang /_mtshan bar 
[\[251a.6\]]rdol ba las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma 
[\[251a.7\]]bya ba'i bsam pas dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni pham par 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]par bya ba dang /_nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[251b.2\]]gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_dngan dus can 
[\[251b.3\]]dang /_phrag dog can dang /_ser sna can dang /_g.yon can dang /_sgyu can dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khrel med pa dang /_sdig pa 'dod pa dang /_log par lta ba yin no zhes zer te/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 
[\[251b.4\]]'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas dge slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod la dge slong na re tshe dang ldan pa la dge sbyong gi tshul 
[\[251b.5\]]ga la yod/_bram ze'i tshul ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa ni ro lta bu yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyo ba dag gis spyo bar byed de/_dge slong gang zhe na/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya zhes smras na ming brjod pa la ltung byed du 'gyur la/_
[\[251b.6\]]rigs dang rus brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dge slong gis ji tsam du phra ma bya ba'i bsam pas dge slong dag dbye ba'i tshig smra na bden yang rung /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]yang rung thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_
[\[251b.7\]]sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong la phra ma byed pa'i ltung byed de gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag dge 'dun mthun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par shes bzhin du rtsod pa 'di ni shad kyis ma byang ba dang /_legs par shad kyis ma byang ba yin gyis yang shad kyis byang bar bya'o/_/rtsod 
[\[252a.2\]]pa 'di ni nges par ma brtags pa dang /_legs par nges par ma brtags pa yin gyis yang nges par brtag par bya'o/_/rtsod pa 'di ni nye bar ma zhi ba dang /_legs par nye bar ma zhi ba yin gyis yang nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed de/_dge 
[\[252a.3\]]slong dag yang dang yang du rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa na bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur nas lung mnod pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas gtong bar byed do/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag 
[\[252a.4\]]ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun mthun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par shes bzhin du rtsod pa 'di ni shad kyis ma byang ba dang /_legs par shad kyis ma byang ba yin gyis yang shad kyis sbyang bar bya'o/_/rtsod pa 'di ni nges par ma brtags pa dang /_legs par nges par 
[\[252a.5\]]ma brtags pa yin gyis yang nges par brtag par bya'o/_/rtsod pa 'di ni nye bar ma zhi ba dang /_legs par nye bar ma zhi ba yin gyis yang nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed 
[\[252a.6\]]pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[252a.7\]]'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed dge 'dun mthun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par shes bzhin du yang las 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]kyis skyo sngogs byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa 
[\[252b.2\]]mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs 
[\[252b.3\]]pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par shes bzhin du yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes 
[\[252b.4\]]bya ba ni drug sde 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun no/_/mthun pas zhes bya ba ni blo mthun pas so/_/chos bzhin du zhes bya ba ni chos ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba dang /_ston 
[\[252b.5\]]pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o/_/rtsod pa zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa bzhi po 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /_mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /_ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa dang /_bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa'o/_/sbyangs pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar zhi bar byas pa'o/_/shes bzhin du 
[\[252b.6\]]zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyis de yongs su rig pa'am/_gzhan dag gis brjod pas so/_/yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na zhes bya ba ni yang byed na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_
[\[252b.7\]]log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]dge slong gis 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod pa la 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung 
[\[253a.2\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'thab pa'i phyir 
[\[253a.3\]]rtsod pa la mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma 
[\[253a.4\]]byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod pa la ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par 
[\[253a.5\]]'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang 
[\[253a.6\]]bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod pa la bya ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad 
[\[253a.7\]]kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa la mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du 
[\[253b.2\]]shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes 
[\[253b.3\]]byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa la 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing 
[\[253b.4\]]yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[253b.5\]]shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa la ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na 
[\[253b.6\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid 
[\[253b.7\]]gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa la bya ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid 
[\[254a.2\]]gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa la ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[254a.3\]]shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las 
[\[254a.4\]]kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa la 'thab pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid 
[\[254a.5\]]gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na 
[\[254a.6\]]nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa la mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs 
[\[254a.7\]]byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]gis ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa la bya ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 
[\[254b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bya ba'i 
[\[254b.3\]]phyir rtsod pa la bya ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad 
[\[254b.4\]]kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la 'thab 
[\[254b.5\]]pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad 
[\[254b.6\]]kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad 
[\[254b.7\]]kyis byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa la ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par 'du shes nas shad kyis byang ba 
[\[255a.2\]]la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la shad kyis byang bar 'du shes shing yang las kyis skyo 
[\[255a.3\]]sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shad kyis ma byang ba la yid gnyis za zhing yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni gang zag lnga ste/_gnyug mar gnas pa dang /_las byed pa dang /_'dun pa 'bul ba dang /_lta ba smra 
[\[255a.4\]]ba dang /_blo bur du 'ongs pa dag go/_/de la gang zag gnyug mar gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang gis rtsod pa de'i thog ma dang /_dbus dang /_tha ma dag shes pa'o/_/gang zag las byed pa gang zhe na/_gang gis rtsod pa de nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir las 
[\[255a.5\]]byas pa'o/_/gang zag 'dun pa 'bul ba gang zhe na/_gang gis las de bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa phul bar gyur pa'o/_/gang zag lta ba smra ba gang zhe na/_gang gis rtsod pa de la rang gi lta ba smras par gyur pa'o/_/gang zag blo bur du 'ongs pa gang zhe na/_gang 
[\[255a.6\]]gis rtsod pa de'i thog ma dang /_dbus dang /_tha ma dag mi shes pa'o/_/de la gang zag dang po gsum po gnyug mar gnas pa dang /_las byed pa dang /_'dun pa 'bul ba'i gang zag de gsum gyis dge 'dun mthun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par 
[\[255a.7\]]shes bzhin du yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gang zag tha ma gnyis po lta ba smra ba dang /_blo bur du 'ongs pa'i gang zag de gnyis dge 'dun mthun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par shes bzhin du yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na nyes byas 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/skyo sngogs byed pa'i ltung byed de bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal 
[\[255b.2\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sha mtshan gyi rig pa shes te/_de snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la 'jug go/_/de bram ze dang /_
[\[255b.3\]]khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu song ste chos ston par byed cing chos bstan nas mna' ma la dris pa/_sru mo khyod kyi sgyug mo ci 'dra/_des smras pa/_'phags pa ri bong ma mdas phog pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra'o/_/'char kas smras pa/_sru mo ci de de'i nyes pa yin snyam mam/_
[\[255b.4\]]'di ltar de la gtum pa'i mtshan nu ma'i bar dang /_mdoms kyi bar dang /_rked pa'i bar dag na sha rman dang /_mdzer bu dang /_sme ba dang /_sme ba dmar po dang /_spu 'khyil ba dag yod pas de ni de'i nyes pa yin no/_/de'i 'og tu sgyug mo'i gan du song ste 
[\[255b.5\]]dris pa/_sru mo khyod kyi mna' ma ci 'dra/_'phags pa de'i skyon ni seg dar gyis bdar 'tshal te/_le lo can sgrub mi phod pa/_gtum pa/_gshe ba/_spyo bar bgyid pa lags so/_/sru mo ci de de'i nyes pa yin snyam mam/_'di ltar de la gtum pa'i 
[\[255b.6\]]mtshan nu ma'i bar dang /_mdoms kyi bar dang /_rked pa'i bar dag na sha rman dang /_mdzer bu dang /_sme ba dang /_sme ba dmar po dang /_spu 'khyil ba dag yod pas de ni de'i nyes pa yin no/_/de dus gzhan zhig na yang sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang /_
[\[255b.7\]]chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la 'jug go/_/de bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu song ste chos ston par byed cing /_chos ston pa na sgyug mo la dris pa/_sru mo khyod kyi mna' ma ci 'dra/_'phags pa bu mo'am/_nu mo ci 'dra ba de 'dra'o/_/sru mo 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]de ni 'di'i yon tan ma yin te/_'di ltar de la nges pa'i mtshan nu ma'i bar dang /_mdoms kyi bar dang /_rked pa'i bar dag na 'di lta ste/_dpal be'u dang /_bum pa gang ba dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung dag yod pas de ni de'i yon tan yin 
[\[256a.2\]]no/_/de'i 'og tu de'i mna' ma'i gan du song ste dris pa/_sru mo khyod kyi sgyug mo ci 'dra/_'phags pa ma'am/_bu mo ci 'dra ba de 'dra'o/_/sru mo de ni de'i yon tan ma yin te/_'di ltar de la nges pa'i mtshan nu ma'i bar dang /_mdoms kyi bar dang /_rked pa'i 
[\[256a.3\]]bar dag na 'di lta ste/_dpal be'u dang /_bum pa gang ba dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung dag yod pas de ni de'i yon tan yin no/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na bud med de dag bsku mnye dang /_dril phyi dang /_khrus bdag gir byed pa'i tshe gcig 
[\[256a.4\]]la gcig gsang ba'i gnas kyi mtshan ma rtog par byed pa na/_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ji skad bstan pa de kho na lta bu'i mtshan bzang po dang /_mtshan ngan pa dag mthong ngo /_/de dag gang gi tshe thab mo byung ba de'i tshe na gcig la gcig gleng bar byed de/_
[\[256a.5\]]khyod kyang kho mo dang lhan cig smra bar byed dam/_khyod skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'di dang 'di ltar byed do/_/sdig pa zhi'o/_/'o na khyod kyi mdoms kyi bar dag na mtshan dang /_mtshan ngan pa dag yod pa skyes pa gzhan gyis ji ltar shes/_gal te de lta na kho 
[\[256a.6\]]mo yang ci'i phyir mi smra/_khyod kyang kho mo dang lhan cig smra bar byed dam/_khyod skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'di dang 'di ltar byed do/_/sdig pa zhi'o/_/'o na khyod kyi mdoms kyi bar dag na mtshan dang /_mtshan ngan pa dag yod pa skyes pa gzhan gyis ji ltar 
[\[256a.7\]]shes/_gang gi tshe de dag gcig la gcig bzod pa gsol ba de'i tshe na gcig gis gcig la dris pa/_khyod la sus smras/_'phags pa 'char kas so/_/khyod la yang sus smras/_'phags pa 'char kas so/_/de dag 'phags pa 'char kas 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]bsams bzhin du bdag cag 'thab tu bcug go zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/de dag the tshom skyes nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na de dag gis de dag la dris pa/_'phags 
[\[256b.2\]]pa dag 'phags pa 'char ka dge slong ji lta bu lags/_sring mo dag de ni mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no/_/'phags pa dag gal te dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa lags na des ji ltar bud med kyi yul gyi 
[\[256b.3\]]gsang ba'i phyogs dag na sha rman mchis pa dag 'tshal/_de dag gis smras pa/_sring mo dag des sha mtshan brtags pa'i rig pa shes pas de'i mthus shes so/_/'phags pa dag ci ji tsam 'tshal ba de dag thams cad bstan par bgyi'am zhes smod 
[\[256b.4\]]par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gang gi phyir nyes dmigs cung zad ci byung ba de dag thams cad dge slong dag 
[\[256b.5\]]bud med kyi yul la chos ston pa las gyur pa yin gyis/_de'i phyir dge slong gis bud med kyi yul la chos bstan par mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas de lta bas na dge slong gis bud med kyi yul la chos bstan par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[256b.6\]]kyis dge slong gis bud med kyi yul la chos bstan par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na bud med kyi yul dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag chos bstan du gsol/_sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang 
[\[256b.7\]]ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_gal te khyod chos mi ston na bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms mi 'bul lo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshig lngas chos bstan par bya ste/_
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]sring mo dag 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa'o zhes bya bas so/_/dge slong dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na bud med kyi yul dag gis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[257a.2\]]pa dag chos bstan du gsol/_dge slong rnams kyis sring mo dag 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa'o zhes tshig lngas chos bstan pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[257a.3\]]'phags pa dag yang chos bstan du gsol/_sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis re zhig de tsam zhig rjes su gnang ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag legs kyis bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms cung zhig 'bul lo zhes zer ba'i skabs 
[\[257a.4\]]de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshig drug gis chos bstan par bya ste/_sring mo dag 'di ltar mig ni mi rtag pa'o/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni mi rtag 
[\[257a.5\]]pa'o zhes bya bas so/_/dge slong dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na bud med kyi yul dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag chos bstan du gsol/_dge slong rnams kyis sring mo dag 'di ltar mig ni mi rtag pa'o/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus 
[\[257a.6\]]dang /_yid ni mi rtag pa'o zhes tshig drug gis chos bstan pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag yang chos bstan du gsol/_sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis re zhig de tsam zhig rjes su gnang ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[257a.7\]]dag legs kyis bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms chung zhig 'bul lo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes pa bzhag ste ji tsam 'dod par chos bstan par bya'o/_/dge 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]slong dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dag na bud med kyi yul dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa chos bstan du gsol/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_sring mo dag skyes pa 'ga' zhig khrid de shog_/'phags pa dag skyes pas ci bgyi/_sring mo dag bcom ldan 
[\[257b.2\]]'das kyis skyes pa bzhag ste/_ci tsam 'dod par chos bstan par bya'o zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do/_/'phags pa dag legs te bdag cag kyang shin tu sbas pa dang /_shin tu bsrungs par 'gyur la/_'phags pa dag kyang mi bsnyengs par chos 
[\[257b.3\]]ston par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis skyes pa khrid de 'ongs nas dge slong dag gis kyang ci 'dod pas chos bstan te dong ngo /_/drug sde dag bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de dag gis bud med kyi yul dag la smras pa/_sring mo dag 'khod cig dang chos bstan 
[\[257b.4\]]par bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag skyes pa 'ga' zhig khrid de mchi'i bar du re zhig yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol drug sde dag gis smras pa/_khyi dang /_spre'u dang /_be'u dang /_phyi rgan du nyal ba dang /_gog pa dang /_khye'u 'dug pa 'di 
[\[257b.5\]]las gzhan pa'i skyes pa ci dgos zhes de dag la chos bstan nas dong ngo /_/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na bud med kyi yul dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag chos bstan du gsol/_sring mo dag skyes pa 'ga' zhig khrid 
[\[257b.6\]]de shog_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci lags khyi dang /_spre'u dang /_be'u dang /_phyi rgan du nyal ba dang /_gog pa dang /_khye'u 'di dag ma mchis sam/_sring mo dag kho bo cag skyes pa 'di lta bu dang chos mi ston te/_khyed cag la skyes pa 'di lta bu 
[\[257b.7\]]dang chos ston par byed pa de su yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa drug sde dag go/_/de kho na'i phyir de dag gi gnas skabs de 'dra'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]rig pa'i skyes pa bzhag ste ci 'dod par chos bstan par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kyi yul la tshig lnga'am drug gis chos bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_drug sde dag tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du 
[\[258a.2\]]tshig drug pa la 'jug par byed cing /_tshig drug gis chos ston pa na yang bsams bzhin du tshig bdun pa la 'jug par byed nas dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig lnga'am drug gis chos bstan par bya'o zhes 
[\[258a.3\]]bka' stsal na/_khyed cag tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la 'jug par byed cing /_tshig drug gis chos ston pa na yang bsams bzhin du tshig bdun pa la 'jug par byed dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gang la tshig lnga 
[\[258a.4\]]pa rung ba de la tshig drug pa yang rung la/_gang la tshig drug pa rung ba de la tshig bdun pa yang rung ste/_tshig drug pa dang /_bdun pas kun dong zos sam/_chang 'thungs sam/_ji na dmigs kyis dgag par bya/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[258a.5\]]kyis bud med kyi yul la tshig lnga'am/_drug gis chos bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_ci'i phyir dge slong dag tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la 'jug par byed cing /_tshig drug gis chos ston pa na yang bsams bzhin du tshig 
[\[258a.6\]]bdun pa la 'jug par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[258a.7\]]bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag ngas 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]bud med kyi yul la tshig lnga'am/_drug gis chos bstan par bya'o zhes bstan na/_khyed tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la 'jug par byed cing /_tshig drug gis chos ston pa na yang bsams bzhin du tshig bdun pa la 'jug pa bden 
[\[258b.2\]]nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas 
[\[258b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs 
[\[258b.4\]]pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul la tshig lnga'am drug las lhag pa'i chos ston na/_rig pa'i skyes pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang 
[\[258b.5\]]zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/bud med kyi yul la zhes bya ba ni bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun du shes par nus pa la'o/_/tshig lnga'am drug las lhag par 
[\[258b.6\]]zhes bya ba ni tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la thal bar byed pa dang /_tshig drug gis chos ston pa na yang bsams bzhin du tshig bdun pa la thal bar byed pa'o/_/chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am/_sangs rgyas 
[\[258b.7\]]kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o/_/ston na zhes bya ba ni 'chad na'o/_/rig pa'i skyes pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i skyes pa bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 
[\[259a.2\]]'gyur zhe na/_dge slong steng gi khang thog tu bud med kyi yul la chos ston par byed na/_des tshig lnga'am/_drug gis chos bstan par bya ste/_dge slong gis tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la thal bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshig drug 
[\[259a.3\]]gis chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig bdun pa la thal bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/chos bstan nas khang thog bar mar zhugs pa na de'i phyi bzhin 'ong zhing 'phags pa chos bstan du gsol zhes zer na de la sring mo khyod la chos bstan zin to zhes byas 
[\[259a.4\]]nas/_'phags pa 'dir yang chos bstan du gsol zhes zer na der yang tshig lnga'am drug gis chos bstan par bya ste/_dge slong gis tshig lngas chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig drug pa la thal bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tshig drug gis 
[\[259a.5\]]chos ston pa na bsams bzhin du tshig bdun pa la thal bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'og gzhi'i sa dang /_sgo khang dang /_bang rim gyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis gong nas gong du dris pa 
[\[259a.6\]]gtan la dbab pa byas pa dang /_slob gnyer gsod pa dang /_kha ton zhu ba dang /_dmigs kyis 'dri ba dang /_dus khrims dpog pa dang /_yon bshad pa byed pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis ji tsam 'dod pa bkag pa dang /_ldab ldib can dang /_smra ba 
[\[259a.7\]]myur ba la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/ston pa'i ltung byed de lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dag dang tshig gis chos 'don par byed de/_des kun dga'i ra ba'i mthar sgra mthon po dang /_sgra chen po skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi sgra lta bu 
[\[259b.2\]]'di lta ste/_dper na bram ze rnams bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don pa lta bu dang /_rtsis mkhan rnams rtsis kyi gnas na smra ba lta bu grags par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga'i ra ba na mthar de dag gi sgra mthon po dang /_sgra chen po skye bo phal po che'i 
[\[259b.3\]]tshogs kyi sgra lta bu de gsan to/_/gsan nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo kun dga'i ra ba'i mtha' na sgra mthon po dang /_sgra chen po skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi sgra lta bu 'di lta ste/_dper na bram ze rnams bram ze'i gsang 
[\[259b.4\]]tshig 'don pa lta bu dang /_rtsis mkhan rnams rtsis kyi gnas na smra ba lta bu 'di ci yin/_btsun pa dge slong drug sde dag gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dag dang tshig gis chos 'don par bgyid de/_des kun dga'i ra ba'i mtha' sgra mthon po dang /_sgra 
[\[259b.5\]]chen po skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi sgra lta bu 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na bram ze rnams bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don pa lta bu dang /_rtsis mkhan rnams rtsis kyi gnas na smra ba lta bu 'di grag par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo dge slong dag gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan 
[\[259b.6\]]cig tshig gis chos 'don par byed dam/_btsun pa bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[259b.7\]]rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang lhan cig tshig gis chos 'don par 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad 
[\[260a.2\]]do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la 
[\[260a.3\]]sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang tshig gis chos 'don na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan 
[\[260a.4\]]yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa dang zhes bya ba la rdzogs par bsnyen pa ni gnyis te/_dge slong dang dge slong ma'o/_/de las gzhan pa ni rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa'o/_/tshig gis zhes bya ba ni tshig mnyam pa dang /_tshig snga ba 
[\[260a.5\]]dang /_yi ge mnyam pa dang /_yi ge snga bas so/_/ji ltar tshig mnyam pas zhe na/_slob dpon 'di skad ces sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes 'don pa na nye gnas kyang dus gcig tu sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes 'don pa ste/_'di ltar tshig mnyam pas 
[\[260a.6\]]so/_/ji ltar tshig snga bas zhe na/_slob dpon gyis re zhig sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes ma bton par nye gnas dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya zhes 'don pa ste/_de ltar tshig snga bas so/_/ji ltar yi ge mnyam pas zhe na/_slob dpon a zhes 'don 
[\[260a.7\]]pa na nye gnas kyang dus gcig tu a zhes 'don pa ste/_de ltar yi ge mnyam pas so/_/ji ltar yi ge snga bas zhe na/_slob dpon gyis re zhig a zhes ma bton par nye gnas a zhes 'don pa ste/_de ltar yi ge snga bas so/_/chos zhes bya ba ni 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o/_/'don pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin du 'jud na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par 
[\[260b.2\]]ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[260b.3\]]dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par 'du shes pas tshig mnyam pas chos 'don na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par 'du shes pas tshig snga bas chos 
[\[260b.4\]]'don na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par yid gnyis za bas tshig mnyam pas chos 'don na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la rdzogs par 
[\[260b.5\]]ma bsnyen par yid gnyis za bas tshig snga bas chos 'don na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par 'du shes pas yi ge mnyam pas chos 'don na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag 
[\[260b.6\]]rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par 'du shes pas yi ge snga bas chos 'don na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par yid gnyis za bas yi ge mnyam pas chos 'don na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[260b.7\]]dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par yid gnyis za bas yi ge snga bas chos 'don na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par 'du shes pas tshig mnyam pas chos 'don 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par 'du shes pas tshig snga bas chos 'don na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen 
[\[261a.2\]]par yid gnyis za bas tshig mnyam pas chos 'don na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par yid gnyis za bas tshig snga bas chos 'don na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs 
[\[261a.3\]]par bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par 'du shes pas yi ge mnyam pas chos 'don na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par 'du shes pas yi ge snga bas chos 'don na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[261a.4\]]dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par yid gnyis za bas yi ge mnyam pas chos 'don na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gang zag rdzogs par bsnyen pa la rdzogs par ma bsnyen par yid gnyis za bas yi ge snga 
[\[261a.5\]]bas chos 'don na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ldab ldib can dang /_smra ba myur ba la ltung ba med do/_/kha ton zhur gzhug pa dang /_yongs su 'drir 'jug pa la ltung ba med do/_/rjes su bsgrags te lung dbog pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos 
[\[261a.6\]]pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/'don pa'i ltung byed de drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal 
[\[261a.7\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba med pa nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'byin par byed pa dang /_kha cig ni lam gol bar rgas pas de dag gang 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]gi tshe dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la thos pa de'i tshe na de dag ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byed cing de dag yongs su gnas pa dang /_mgu bar bya ba spyod pa na dge 'dun la chu 'brim pa'i tshe bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[261b.2\]]dad pa can dag gis smras pa/_gang dag rin po che rtogs pa dag kyang de las nye bar brtags shing rin po che de dag sdud par byed do/_/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan bsod snyoms pa 'di dag kyang dge 'dun la chu 'brim pa'i bsod snyoms sogs par byed do/_/
[\[261b.3\]]drug sde lto mdun can 'di dag ni za zhing 'khod par byed do/_/de dag smod par byed pa na drug sde dag gis thos nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci 'di dag chos bzang po'i chos kyis dge 'dun la chu 'brim par byed snyam mam/_'di ltar 'di dag ni chad pa'i las 
[\[261b.4\]]byed pa yin no/_/de dag gis dris pa/_'di dag gis ci byas/_drug sde dag gis lag pas bya ba ma yin pa byas te 'di lta 'di ltar byas so zhes smras pa dang /_de dag dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag yin pa de dag gi gnas skabs 
[\[261b.5\]]kyang re zhig 'di 'dra na dge slong bar ma dang /_gsar bu gang dag yin pa de dag gi gnas skabs ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/dge slong yongs su gnas pa byed pa de dag phyi dro dbu skra dang sen 
[\[261b.6\]]mo'i mchod rten dag la lci ba 'jam po'i byug pas nyug par byed pa na drug sde dag gis de dag gi lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag la dris pa/_dge tshul dag khyed kyi mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dag gar dong /_de dag gis smras pa/_bsod nams dag 
[\[261b.7\]]byed de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la lci ba 'jam po'i byug pas nyug par byed do/_/khyed cag kyang de lta bu'i bsod nams dag gyis shig_/ci de dag chos bzang po'i chos kyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la lci ba 'jam 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]po'i byug pas nyug par byed snyam mam/_'di ltar de dag ni chad pa'i las byed pa yin no/_/de dag gis de dag la dris pa/_de dag gis ci byas/_drug sde dag gis lag pas bya ba ma yin pa byas te 'di lta 'di ltar byas so zhes smras so/_/
[\[262a.2\]]gang gi tshe dge slong yongs su gnas pa byed pa de dag ltung ba de las langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na dge tshul dag la dge tshul dag 'di dang 'di gyis shig ces bsgo ba dang /_dge tshul de dag gis smras pa/_khyed rang ci'i phyir mi byed/_kho bo cag gis byar mi rung 
[\[262a.3\]]ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyed kyis 'di lta 'di ltar byar rung na 'di ci'i phyir byar mi rung /_de dag gis smras pa/_de lta bu yang yod mod kyi 'on kyang kho bo cag gis ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas zin to/_/khyed la sus smras/_drug sde dag gis 
[\[262a.4\]]so/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba rjod par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[262a.5\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag la 'di skad ces lan gdab par bya ste/_gang la nyes pa med pa yin/_/skyon mi byed pa'i mi gang yin/_/su zhig kun du rmongs mi 'gyur/_/su zhig rtag tu brtan par gsungs/_/yang dag mkhyen 
[\[262a.6\]]pas rnam grol ba/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab mkhyen pa/_/de la nyes pa med pa yin/_/skyon mi byed pa'i mi de yin/_/de ni kun du rmongs mi 'gyur/_/de ni rtag tu brtan par gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di 
[\[262a.7\]]dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba brjod pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin 
[\[262b.2\]]pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag 
[\[262b.3\]]par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la 
[\[262b.4\]]gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba brjod na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/mnyan yod na dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma zhes bya ba ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad 
[\[262b.5\]]par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyed kyis dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed 
[\[262b.6\]]pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/_khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang mi ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 
[\[262b.7\]]'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_go bar byas pa dang ma byas pa'i khyim mi shes pa'o/_/khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_go bar bya ba dang /_go bar ma byas pa'i khyim shes pa'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI 
[\[263a.2\]]brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na je dang por spro bar bya ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor 
[\[263a.3\]]go bar byed par spro'am/_gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 
[\[263a.4\]]ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid de/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun 
[\[263a.5\]]gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid do/_/'di 
[\[263a.6\]]ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid nas dge slong 
[\[263a.7\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung 
[\[263b.2\]]shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bskos lags te 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong dag ngas dge slong khyim rnams su so sor 
[\[263b.3\]]go bar byed pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed nyon cig_/khyim rnams su khyim sun par byed pa dang /_gnas rnams su gnas sun par 
[\[263b.4\]]byed pa 'di lta ste/_dper na 'bras sA lu'i zhing phun sum tshogs pa la ser ba 'khor lo mi bzad pa bab na 'di ltar 'bras sA lu de nyid shin te ma dang /_chud za ba dang /_tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bu ram shing gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa la nad kyi rigs dmar po 
[\[263b.5\]]zhes bya ba byung na 'di ltar bu ram shing de nyid shin te ma dang /_chud za ba dang /_tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba lta bu dag yod kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'dis bstan pa'i tshod ma 'dzin cig_/'di ltar dge slong 
[\[263b.6\]]'di dang /_dge slong ma 'di ni yos tshig pa bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la skyer mi rung ba'i chos can yin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_gnas brtan kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rlangs pa dang /_rta thul dang /_bzang ldan dang /_gnas brtan grags pa dang /_
[\[263b.7\]]gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_gsus po che chen po dang /_skul byed chen po dang /_ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]'od srung dang /_'gab ma 'od srung dang /_'od srung chen po dang /_dga' byed dang /_kim pi la dang /_legs skyes dang /_nam gru dang /_sa ri dang /_nye sde dang /_som nyi nam gru dang /_lam brtan dang /_lam phran brtan dang /_brtag 
[\[264a.2\]]pa'i shing rta dang /_chen po pa dang /_grags sbyin dang /_de dag la sogs pa dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la ltos shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa de khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed du song ba dang /_dge slong 
[\[264a.3\]]'phral bas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba de khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed par bskos so zhes thos nas de de'i gan du song ste smras pa/_khyod khyim rnams su kho bo sun 'byin du 'gro'am/_dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i bka' bsgrub par bya'o/_/kho 
[\[264a.4\]]bos de dang de byar rung na khyod kyi lto dral te rgyu ma dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal dkri bar bya ba dang /_mgo yang 'bru mar gyi snod bzhin du rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor dpyang la gdags par mi rung ba ci yod/_dge slong des dge slong rnams la 'phral bas bdag spyos te/_de na re kho bos 
[\[264a.5\]]de dang de byar rung na khyod kyi lto dral te rgyu ma dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal dkri bar bya ba dang /_mgo yang 'bru mar gyi snod bzhin du rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor dpyang la gdags par mi rung ba ci yod ces zer gyis/_bdag de khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed par mi spro zhes zer 
[\[264a.6\]]ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi gti mug can des gang zag ni gsod par nus kyi/_dge 'dun ni mi nus pas de'i phyir dge 'dun gyis khyim rnams su so 
[\[264a.7\]]sor go bar bya'o/_/'di ltar so sor go bar bya ste/_gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya'o/_/de yang 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'phral ba 'di dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma 'di ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par 
[\[264b.2\]]bgyid/_dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid kyang /_dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par spro ba su yang 
[\[264b.3\]]ma mchis na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams 
[\[264b.4\]]su spyod par bgyid par gang gis mthong zhing gang du mthong ba des khyim der khyed dge slong 'di dang /_dge slong ma 'dis bstan pa'i tshod ma 'dzin cig_/dge slong 'di dang /_dge slong ma 'di ni yos tshig pa bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la skyer mi rung ba'i chos can yin 
[\[264b.5\]]gyis/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la ltos shig ces so sor go bar bgyid du stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor rig par khyim dag tu so sor go bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_de dag so 
[\[264b.6\]]sor rig pa dang /_so sor ma rig pa'i khyim dag tu so sor go bar byed pa na/_de dag bsod snyoms kyis phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so sor rig pa'i khyim 
[\[264b.7\]]dag tu so sor go bar bya'i/_so sor ma rig pa'i khyim dag tu so sor go bar mi bya ste/_de lta bas na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni 
[\[265a.2\]]gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba brjod na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong 
[\[265a.3\]]gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la zhes bya ba la rdzogs par bsnyen pa ni gnyis te/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma'o/_/de las gzhan pa ni rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa'o/_/gnas ngan len 
[\[265a.4\]]ces bya ba la gnas ngan len ni gnyis te/_pham par 'gyur ba kun nas slong ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma kun nas slong ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir de dag gnas ngan len ces bya zhe na/_ngo bo nyid las dang /_kun nas slong ba las so/_/ltung ba brjod na zhes bya ba ni smra na'o/_/dge 'dun 
[\[265a.5\]]gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis gnang ba bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/
[\[265a.6\]]gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis so sor ma rig pa'i khyim dag tu so sor ma rig par 'du shes pas dge 
[\[265a.7\]]slong so sor go bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis so sor ma rig pa'i khyim dag tu so sor ma rig par yid gnyis za bas dge slong so sor go bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis so sor rig pa'i khyim dag tu so sor ma rig par 'du shes 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]pas dge slong so sor go bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis so sor rig pa'i khyim dag tu so sor ma rig par yid gnyis za bas dge slong so sor go bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dril bsgrags pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/ngos la ri mor bris 
[\[265b.2\]]pa phan chad la yang ltung ba med do/_/ji ltar bdag gis shes pa de bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang shes so snyam na'o/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/gnas ngan len brjod 
[\[265b.3\]]pa'i ltung byed de bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na nya pa lnga brgya chu klung yid 'ong ldan la rten cing 'khod do/_/de dag la rgya mo spyod pa dang /_
[\[265b.4\]]spyod pa chen mo zhes bya ba gnyis zhig yod do/_/de dag lan 'ga' ni rgya mo spyod pa 'jug par byed la/_lan 'ga' ni spyod pa chen mo 'jud par byed de/_gang gi tshe nya dag nyo ba med pa de'i tshe ni rgya mo spyod pa 'jud par byed la/_gang gi tshe nya dag nyo ba yod pa de'i tshe ni 
[\[265b.5\]]spyod pa chen mo 'jud par byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yangs pa can du dus ston byung nas de dag gis rgya mo gnyis ka bcug ste/_nyis brgya lnga bcus ni rgya mo spyod pa bcug ste/_nyis brgya lnga bcus ni spyod pa chen mo bcug go/_/gang dag gis rgya mo 
[\[265b.6\]]spyod pa bcug pa de dag gis ni nya dang /_rus sbal dang /_sbal pa dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang /_nya khyi ba la sogs pa mang po dag 'di lta ste/_dper na til dang /_'bras thug po che dang /_rgya shug dang /_rgya sran la sogs pa bzhin du phung po chen po rnam par 
[\[265b.7\]]bzhag go/_/gang dag gis rgya mo spyod pa chen mo bcug pa de dag gis ni rgya mtsho chen po nas chu klung yid 'ong ldan du zhugs pa chu srin nya'i rigs bong tshod chen po nyal ba zin nas de dag gis de drang bar brtsams so/_/de dag gis drangs pa na de sad nas nya pa nyis 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]brgya lnga bcu po de dag dang /_rgya mo spyod pa chen mo khyer te rgyun phyogs su zhugs so/_/nya pa de dag gis nya pa nyis brgya lnga bcu po gzhan dag la shes ldan dag rgya mo spyod pa chen mo dang /_bdag cag khyer gyis ram mda' log shig ces byas so/_/
[\[266a.2\]]de dag gis thos nas nya pa nyis brgya lnga bcu po dag kyang lhags te de nyid la rub pa dang /_des nya pa lnga brgya dang rgya mo spyod pa chen mo khyer te rgyun phyogs su zhugs nas gzung bar ma nus so/_/skyabs med pa de dag gis kun du shes ldan dag rgya mo spyod pa chen mo dang /_bdag 
[\[266a.3\]]cag khyer gyis grogs gyis shig ces ram mda' ba bzlog pa dang /_las ma mthong ba'i mi ba lang rdzi dag dang /_phyugs rdzi dag dang /_shing thun dag dang /_rtswa thun dag dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba dag dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi dag dang /_gzhan yang 
[\[266a.4\]]srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag log nas de dag gis lus smas pa dang /_rnam par smas pa dag gis rgya mo ral ba dang /_rab tu ral bas chu srin de chu nas skam la phyung ngo /_/de la mgo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_mig sum bcu rtsa drug yod de/_de'i mgo la 
[\[266a.5\]]la ni glang po che'i mgo 'dra/_la la ni rta'i mgo 'dra/_la la rnga mo'i mgo dang /_bong bu'i mgo dang /_ba lang gi mgo dang /_spre'u'i mgo dang /_seng ge'i mgo dang /_stag gi mgo dang /_dom gyi mgo dang /_dred mo'i mgo dang /_gung gi mgo dang /_byi la'i 
[\[266a.6\]]mgo dang /_ra'i mgo dang /_lug gi mgo dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi mgo dang /_ma he'i mgo dang /_phag gi mgo dang /_khyi'i mgo 'dra'o/_/kun du chu klung yid 'ong ldan pa'i nya pa lnga brgyas rgya mtsho chen po nas chu klung yid 'ong ldan du zhugs pa'i chu srin nya'i 
[\[266a.7\]]rigs bong tshod chen po zhig rgya mo spyod pa chen mos zin te chu nas skam la phyung zhing de la mgo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_mig sum bcu so drug yod do zhes sgras khyab par gyur to/_/de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram du lhags te/_
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]kha cig ni ltad mo skyes par gyur/_kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul bar gyur to/_/rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po yangs pa can na rten cing gnas pa de dag kyang ltad mo skyes te der lhags so/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang ya 
[\[266b.2\]]mtshan skyes te mig tshugs su rtog cing shes ldan dag 'di'i mgo la la ni glang po che'i mgo 'dral de nas rtog par byed/_'di'i mgo la la ni khyi'i bar gyi mgo 'dra la de nas rtog par byed do zhes kyang zer ro/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 
[\[266b.3\]]ni mi mkhyen pa dang /_ma gzigs pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nya pa lnga brgya po de dag rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad pa'i bar du sngar pham par 'gyur ba 
[\[266b.4\]]bzhi pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis gdos bu dang /_pho long gi sbyor bas spro bar byed/_'bad par byed/_rtsol bar byed pa dag gis gcig 
[\[266b.5\]]pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/_tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' 
[\[266b.6\]]bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /_dgra bcom pa khams 
[\[266b.7\]]gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na mu 
[\[267a.2\]]ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la zas sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo pa dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[267a.3\]]dag da ltar mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la zas sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo pa dag lta la smos kyang ci dgos pa byung gis dge slong dag khyed cag tshur sheg la smos 'drin ji lta ba dang /_
[\[267a.4\]]phebs par smra ba ji lta ba dang /_'grogs bshes ji lta bas yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par khas long shig_/nga yang 'od ma can gyi grong 'di nyid du bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang dbyar gnas par khas len gyis/_
[\[267a.5\]]thams cad ni bsod snyoms kyis nyon mongs par gyur na mi rung ngo /_/dge slong dag gis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas smos 'drin ji lta ba dang /_phebs par smra ba ji lta ba dang /_'grogs bshes ji lta bas yangs pa 
[\[267a.6\]]can gyi nyen kor spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang 'od ma can gyi grong de nyid du bsnyen bkur ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 
[\[267a.7\]]'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal na/_'di na bdag cag la nye du 'ga' yang med de nya pa'i grong na bdag cag gi nye du dag 'khod kyis bdag cag nya pa'i grong du dong ste nye du rnams bltas nas nya pa'i grong gi nyen kor du lo ma dang /_'dab ma'i spyil bu dag byas te dbyar gnas 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]par khas blang bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong lnga brgya po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis sngon ni nya pa'i grong du dong ste nye du rnams la gcig gis gcig gi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yon tan 
[\[267b.2\]]bsgrag pa byas pas da ni gcig gis gcig gi yang dag pa'i yon tan bsgrag par bya'o snyam nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag nya pa'i grong du dong ste nye du dag bltas nas nya pa'i grong gi nyen kor du lo ma dang /_'dab ma'i spyil bu dag byas te dbyar gnas par 
[\[267b.3\]]khas blangs so/_/de dag gi nye du dag nye bar 'ongs par gyur nas de dag gis nye du nye bar 'ongs pa de dag la smras pa/_nye du dag khyed cag gang dag gi grong tshigs na dge slong gi dge 'dun yon gyi gnas 'di lta bu 'di ltar dbyar gnas par khas blangs par 
[\[267b.4\]]gyur pa'i nye du de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin te/_dge slong 'di ni mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang /_'jig 
[\[267b.5\]]rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /_nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang /_spong ba'i 'du shes dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /_'gog pa'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 
[\[267b.6\]]sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes 
[\[267b.7\]]dang /_rus gong gi 'du shes dang /_stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes thob pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni bsam gtan dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[268a.2\]]bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_sems yongs su shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang /_zag pa zad pa thob pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la 
[\[268a.3\]]bsam gtan pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed kyis yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu dag thob bam/_thob bo/_/'jig rten ni yon tan la dga' ba yin pas re zhig rang gi bu dag 
[\[268a.4\]]las kyang phrogs te de dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gson zhing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams la chos nyid kyis nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po gnyis yod de/_gcig ni dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya 
[\[268a.5\]]la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe'o/_/gnyis pa ni ston zla 'bring po'i nya la'o/_/de la gang dag dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe gdams ngag mnos te/_grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu 
[\[268a.6\]]dbyar gnas par khas len pa de dag ni ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba nya la lhags nas ji ltar thob pa ni rjod par byed/_ma thob pa ni thob par bya ba'i phyir 'og tu 'dre bar byed do/_/de nas dge slong gang dag yangs pa can gyi nyen kor spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par 
[\[268a.7\]]khas blangs pa de dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing /_rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob pas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te 'od ma 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]can gyi grong ga la ba der rgyu zhing 'dong ba na/_mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'dong ba'i tshe 'od ma can gyi grong du phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rab tu mang po de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la 
[\[268b.2\]]mnyes gshin pas bshes pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham yu chad dang /_mchil lham len par byed cing 'di skad ces
