[\[268b.5\]]bo bdag cag spong byed kyi grong du te por bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par khas blangs mod kyi/_bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis ngal bar gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de kho na ltar snang ste/_'di ltar bsod snyoms kyis brel bas rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke 
[\[268b.6\]]ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob pa dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag bri bar gyur to/_/dge slong gang dag nya pa'i grong gi nyen kor du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa de dag kyang dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_
[\[268b.7\]]chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing /_tsho ba dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas pas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te 'od ma can gyi grong ga la ba der rgyu zhing 'dong ba na mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'dong ba'i tshe 'od ma can gyi grong du phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]kun dga' bos dge slong rab tu mang po de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mnyes gshin pas bshes pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_
[\[269a.2\]]gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham yu chad dang /_mchil lham len par byed cing 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg 'ongs pa legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag gang nas da ltar 'dir 
[\[269a.3\]]'ongs/_khyed cag gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag nya pa'i grong nas 'dir 'ongs so/_/bdag cag nya pa'i grong du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar nya pa'i grong du bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas 
[\[269a.4\]]par khas blangs sam/_khyed cag bsod snyoms kyis ngal bar ma gyur tam/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag nya pa'i grong du te por bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par khas blangs te bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang ngal bar ma gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de kho 
[\[269a.5\]]na ltar snang ste/_'di ltar bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med pas tsho ba dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la zas sbyin 
[\[269a.6\]]pa dang bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo ba lta smos kyang ci dgos pa byung na/_'dir tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang yin/_rkyen ni gang yin/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag gis nye du rnams kyi mdun du gcig 
[\[269a.7\]]gis gcig gi yang dag pa'i yon tan bsgrag pa byas te/_dge slong 'di ni mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten thams cad 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /_nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang /_spong ba'i 'du shes dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /_'gog pa'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 
[\[269b.2\]]'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong

[\[269b.4\]]mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[269b.5\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_sems yongs su shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang /_zag pa zad pa thob pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa yin no/_/dge 
[\[269b.6\]]slong 'di ni gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba yin no zhes gcig gis gcig gi yang dag pa'i yon tan bsgrag par byas so/_/ci yang dag pas sam/_yang dag pa ma yin pas/_yang dag pas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag gang zag rdzogs 
[\[269b.7\]]par ma bsnyen pa la mi'i chos bla ma bden pa brjod du rung ngam/_rung yang srid/_mi rung yang srid de/_'di ltar bdag cag gis ni smras so/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la mi'i chos bla ma bden pa brjod ces 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba 
[\[270a.2\]]mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram na gnas pa'i 
[\[270a.3\]]dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la mi'i chos bla ma bden pa smras pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi brtson pa dang /_mi sbyor ba dang /_ma brtags par spyod pa rnam 
[\[270a.4\]]par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos 
[\[270a.5\]]rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la mi'i chos bla ma bden pa brjod na ltung byed 
[\[270a.6\]]do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/gang zag rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa la zhes bya ba la rdzogs par bsnyen pa ni gnyis te/_dge slong dang dge slong ma'o/_/de las gzhan pa ni rdzogs par ma bsnyen pa'o/_/mi'i chos zhes bya ba ni mi 
[\[270a.7\]]rnams kyi chos mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_de mi rnams kyis 'thob kyi za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_mtshan gnyis pa dag gis kyang mi 'thob na/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]bla ma zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams pas gzugs kyi khams bla ma yin la/_gzugs kyi khams pas gzugs med pa'i khams bla ma yin pa'o/_/yang na mi'i chos zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa lnga po dag go/_/bla ma zhes bya ba ni de dag spangs pa gang yin pa'o/_/bden 
[\[270b.2\]]pa zhes bya ba ni de'i dngos po bden pa kho na yin pa'o/_/smra na zhes bya ba ni brjod na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par 
[\[270b.3\]]byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//bar sdom la/_'du shes ma 
[\[270b.4\]]bsgyur dgon pa dang /_/khyim rnams su ni stan bkra dang /_/rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa dang /_/bdag nyid nye bar ston pa'o/_/dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di 
[\[270b.5\]]skad ces lha rnams mthong ngo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar du mthong ngo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams mthong ngo zhes zer na 
[\[270b.6\]]nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces lha rnams kyi sgra thos so zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams 
[\[270b.7\]]nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar gyi sgra thos so zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams kyi sgra thos so zhes zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar du blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o zhes zer na 
[\[271a.2\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o zhes zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di 
[\[271a.3\]]skad ces lha rnams bdag blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin lus srul po rnams kyi bar dag bdag blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul 
[\[271a.4\]]khrod kyi sha za rnams kyang bdag blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo zhes zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces lha rnams dang lhan cig gtam 'dre 
[\[271a.5\]]bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar 
[\[271a.6\]]byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor 
[\[271a.7\]]kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces lha rnams bdag 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar yang 
[\[271b.2\]]bdag dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams kyang bdag dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_
[\[271b.3\]]phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur 
[\[271b.4\]]bar 'di skad ces thob bzhin du bdag gis mi rtag pa'i 'du shes thob bo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes nas snga ma bzhin du stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes kyi bar du thob bo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[271b.5\]]slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces thob bzhin du bdag gis bsam gtan dang po thob bo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi 
[\[271b.6\]]pa nas snga ma bzhin du bdag dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang /_gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dge slong rab tu mang po dag grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas shig na gnas shing de na de 
[\[271b.7\]]dag la mi ma yin pa dag gis 'tshe ba dang /_de na dge slong gang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba/_dgra bcom pa yin pa de la de na mi ma yin pa dag gis 'tshe bar mi byed nas dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces bdag kyang grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas te/_de na bdag la mi ma yin pa rnams 'tshe bar mi byed do zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dge slong rab tu mang po 
[\[272a.2\]]dag khyim rnams su mgron du bos te za bar byed cing de na de dag la stan khra bo bkra ba dag bshams shing de na dge slong gang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa yin pa de la de na stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag shom par 
[\[272a.3\]]byed nas dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces bdag kyang khyim der mgron du bos shing zos te/_de na bdag la yang stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag shom par byed do zhes zer na/_
[\[272a.4\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dge slong rab tu mang po dgon pa na gnas pa dag gis zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten nas/_'jig rten pa'i lam gyis/_nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags 
[\[272a.5\]]dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du mi 'byung nas dge slong gis 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces bdag kyang grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas shing /_bdag gis 
[\[272a.6\]]kyang de na gnas pa na zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag bdag gi rgyud la yang kun du mi 'byung ngo zhes zer 
[\[272a.7\]]na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis lha rnams mthong ba de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar du mthong ba de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis rdul khrod kyi sha za 
[\[272b.2\]]rnams mthong ba de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces 
[\[272b.3\]]dge slong gang gis lha rnams kyi sgra thos pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar gyi sgra thos pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 
[\[272b.4\]]'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams kyi sgra thos pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag 
[\[272b.5\]]nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces dge slong gang lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na 
[\[272b.6\]]nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar du blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong rdul khrod 
[\[272b.7\]]kyi sha za rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces dge slong gang la lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams 
[\[273a.2\]]kyi bar du blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong gang la rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[273a.3\]]dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces dge slong gang lha rnams dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so 
[\[273a.4\]]sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces/_kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar 
[\[273a.5\]]dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong gang rdul khrod kyi 
[\[273a.6\]]sha za rnams dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye 
[\[273a.7\]]bar ston pas 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces dge slong gang dang lhan cig lha rnams gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar yang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar 
[\[273b.2\]]byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong gang dang lhan cig rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams gtam 'dre bar 
[\[273b.3\]]byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gang gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes ma 
[\[273b.4\]]bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis mi rtag pa'i 'du shes thob pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mi rtag pa'i 'du 
[\[273b.5\]]shes ji lta ba de bzhin du gang gis snga ma bzhin du stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes kyi bar du thob pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod 
[\[273b.6\]]pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis bsam gtan dang po thob pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan dang po ji lta ba 
[\[273b.7\]]de bzhin du gang gis snga ma bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa nas dge slong gang dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang /_gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba'i bar de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dge slong rab tu mang po dag grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas zhig na gnas shing de na de dag la mi ma yin pa dag gis 'tshe ba na de dge slong gang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir 
[\[274a.2\]]mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa yin pa de la de na mi ma yin pa dag gis 'tshe bar mi byed nas/_dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad 
[\[274a.3\]]ces dge slong gang grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa de la de na mi ma yin pa rnams 'tshe bar mi byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dge slong rab tu mang po dag khyim rnams su mgron 
[\[274a.4\]]du bos te za bar byed cing de na de dag la stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag bshams shing /_de na dge slong gang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa yin pa de la de na stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag shom par byed nas/_
[\[274a.5\]]dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad ces dge slong gang khyim der mgron du bos shing zos te de na de la yang stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag shom 
[\[274a.6\]]par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dge slong rab tu mang po dag dgon pa na gnas pa dag gis zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 
[\[274a.7\]]nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du mi 'byung nas dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes ma bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba ma bsgyur bar 'di skad 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]ces dge slong gis grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas shing zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag 
[\[274b.2\]]rgyud la kun du mi 'byung ba de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/mi'i chos bla ma brjod pa'i ltung byed de brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_sangs 
[\[274b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gnas mal 'bog pa dang /_zas la sko bar bskos pa de'i tshe na de dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas 
[\[274b.4\]]dge 'dun la chos dang ldan pas zhal ta byed pa'i las la brtson pa yin la/_des sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am/_yongs su ma btang ba ci yang med de/_des de ltar phul zhing yongs 
[\[274b.5\]]su btang bas chos gos gsum ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor 'di dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas dge 'dun la chos dang ldan pas zhal ta byed pa'i las 
[\[274b.6\]]la brtson pa yin la/_des sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am/_yongs su ma btang ba ci yang med de/_des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas chos gos gsum ngan cing snam sbyar yang 
[\[274b.7\]]yongs su rnyings kyis/_gal te dge 'dun gyis ras yug chen 'ga' zhig rnyed na de tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la sbyin par bya'o zhes smras nas/_dge 'dun gyis kyang ras yug chen rnyed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsol ba byas te byin na mi g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI de brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 
[\[275a.2\]]'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong cig gis gsol ba bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor 'di ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can de dge 'dun la yang chos kyis zhal ta bgyid pa'i las 
[\[275a.3\]]la brtson pa lags la/_des sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am/_yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te/_des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas chos gos gsum 
[\[275a.4\]]ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings la dge 'dun la ni ras yug chen 'byor par mnga' na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la ras yug chen stsol to/_/
[\[275a.5\]]'di ni gsol ba'o/_/phyis dge 'dun gyis de la ras yug chen byin pa dang /_dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang tshe rabs tshe rabs nas rjes su 'brel pa'i khon yod pas de gnyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun na tshe dang ldan 
[\[275a.6\]]pa dag 'di ltar dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa rnyed do cog gcig gis gang zag la yongs su sngo bar byed na/_dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa 'grub par ga la 'gyur zhes smod par byed nas dge slong rnams kyis de gnyis la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gnyis khyed gnyis der 
[\[275a.7\]]ma 'dus sam/_'dus so/_/'o na ci'i phyir smod par byed/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_ci kho bo cag gnyis 'dur yang mi gnang ngam/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag sngar legs par rung bar byas nas/_de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos pa bdag gi gang zag la bsngos zhes zer zhing smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[275b.2\]]gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par 
[\[275b.3\]]mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis la rmas pa/_dge slong gnyis khyed gnyis kyis sngar legs par rung bar byas nas de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan 
[\[275b.4\]]pa dag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos pa bdag gi gang zag la bsngos so zhes smras pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_
[\[275b.5\]]rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa/_de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[275b.6\]]de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i bzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge 
[\[275b.7\]]slong gang sngar legs par rung bar byas nas/_de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos pa bdag gi gang zag la bsngos so zhes zer na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]ba ni mdza' bo dang sa las skyes sam/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/sngar legs par rung bar byas nas zhes bya ba ni sngar dad pa phul nas so/_/de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di 
[\[276a.2\]]skad ces zer na'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te zhes bya ba la/_dge slong gi bshes pa gang zhe na/_mkhan po'i ni lhan cig gnas pa'o/_/lhan cig gnas pa'i ni mkhan po'o/_/slob dpon gyi ni nye gnas so/_/
[\[276a.3\]]nye gnas kyi ni slob dpon no/_/mkhan po gcig pa'i ni mkhan po gcig pa'o/_/slob dpon gcig pa'i ni slob dpon gcig pa'o/_/mdza' bo'i ni mdza' bo'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/
[\[276a.4\]]rnyed pa zhes bya ba la rnyed pa ni gnyis te/_gos kyi rnyed pa dang /_zas kyi rnyed pa ste/_don 'dir ni gos kyi rnyed pa yin par dgongs so/_/bsngos pa zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi nang du grub pa'o/_/bdag gi gang zag la bsngos so zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don 
[\[276a.5\]]du'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags 
[\[276a.6\]]shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam du cung zad sngar mthun zhing rung bar byas nas de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[276a.7\]]dag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos pa bdag gi gang zag la bsngos so zhes zer na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bshes ngor byas te dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos pa bdag gi gang zag la bsngos pa bden na ltung ba med 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/skur ba 'debs pa'i ltung byed de dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi 
[\[276b.2\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rnams zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon 
[\[276b.3\]]pa 'don par byed pa na/_drug sde dag pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa'i tshe ni cang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/dge 'dun lhag ma bcu gsum 'don pa'i tshe na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang la gzhi nges pa dang /_gang zag nges 
[\[276b.4\]]par rab tu shes pa yod bzhin du/_bdag cag gis rma sos pa sos pa dag ci'i phyir 'dral bar byed/_gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 
[\[276b.5\]]'di dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton pa dag gis ci bya zhes zer ro/_/de bzhin du ma nges pa gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba'i 
[\[276b.6\]]chos bzhi dang /_bslab pa'i chos mang po dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag 'don pa'i tshe na yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang la gzhi nges pa dang /_gang zag nges pa rab tu shes pa yod bzhin du bdag cag gi rma sos pa sos pa 
[\[276b.7\]]dag ci'i phyir 'dral bar byed/_gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton pa dag gis ci bya 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]zhes zer nas/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gi phyir kho bo cag zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa ma yin gyi/_'di ltar kho bo cag ni ston pa'i bka' lung gis 'don to/_/gal te khyed cag 
[\[277a.2\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba skye na ci'i phyir lhag par spyod par byed/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir/_dge slong dag pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa'i tshe ni cang mi smra bar 'khod la/_dge 'dun lhag ma bcu gsum 'don pa'i tshe ni 'di skad 
[\[277a.3\]]ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang la gzhi nges pa dang /_gang zag nges pa rab tu shes pa yod bzhin du bdag cag gi rma sos pa sos pa dag ci'i phyir 'dral bar byed/_gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod par 'gyur ba bslab 
[\[277a.4\]]pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton pa dag gis ci bya zhes zer/_de bzhin du ma nges pa gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /_so sor 
[\[277a.5\]]bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /_bslab pa'i chos mang po dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag 'don pa'i tshe na yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang la gzhi nges pa dang /_gang zag nges pa rab tu shes pa yod bzhin du bdag cag gi 
[\[277a.6\]]rma sos pa sos pa dag ci'i phyir 'dral bar byed/_gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 
[\[277a.7\]]bton pa dag gis ci bya zhes zer zhing smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag 
[\[277b.2\]]la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed cag pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa'i tshe ni cang mi smra bar 'khod la/_dge 'dun lhag ma bcu gsum 'don pa'i tshe ni 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang la gzhi nges pa dang /_gang zag nges pa rab tu shes 
[\[277b.3\]]pa yod bzhin du/_bdag cag gi rma sos pa sos pa dag ci'i phyir 'dral bar byed/_gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag 
[\[277b.4\]]gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton pa dag gis ci bya/_de bzhin du ma nges pa gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /_so sor bshags par bya'i chos bzhi dang /_bslab pa'i 
[\[277b.5\]]chos mang po dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag 'don pa'i tshe yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang la gzhi nges pa dang /_gang zag nges pa rab tu shes pa yod bzhin du bdag cag gi rma sos pa sos pa dag ci'i phyir 'dral bar byed/_gang dag 
[\[277b.6\]]gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton pa dag gis ci bya zhes smras pa bden nam/_btsun 
[\[277b.7\]]pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/_/zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/_zhes bya ba la sogs 
[\[278a.2\]]pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /_
[\[278a.3\]]yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton pa dag gis ci bya zhes zer zhing bslab pa khyad du gsod na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang 
[\[278a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/zla ba phyed phyed cing zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed phyed cing ngo /_/so sor thar pa zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /_ma nges pa'i tshes gnyis 
[\[278a.5\]]dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /_bslab pa'i chos mang po dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag go/_/mdo zhes bya ba ni des nye bar sbyar ba'i 
[\[278a.6\]]mdo'am/_yang na mdo yang dag par sbyar ba'o/_/gdon pa 'don pa na zhes bya ba ni rab tu ston pa na'o/_/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab 
[\[278a.7\]]tu phra ba 'di dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton pa dag gis ci bya zhes zer zhing bslab pa khyad du gsod na zhes bya ba ni bslab pa khyad du gsod pa'i bsam pas ngag dang /_tshig dang /_tha snyad dang /_skad dang /_brjod pa dang /_nges 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]pa'i tshig dang /_tshig gi lam dang /_tshig gi sgra dang /_ngag gi las dang /_ngag gi rnam par rig byed brjod pa'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu 
[\[278b.2\]]sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur 
[\[278b.3\]]zhe na/_dge slong pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod par 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa na 
[\[278b.4\]]'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis ni dge slong rnams yid la gcags par 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis 
[\[278b.5\]]dge slong rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams gdung bar 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya 
[\[278b.6\]]zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams kun du gdung bar 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong pham par 
[\[278b.7\]]'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod par 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams mngon par mi 
[\[279a.2\]]dga' bar 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams rnam par 'khyam par 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na 
[\[279a.3\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dge slong /_dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /_ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /_bslab pa'i chos 
[\[279a.4\]]mang po dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_gdung ba dang /_kun du gdung ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba dang /_'dod pa 
[\[279a.5\]]dang /_mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_rnam par 'khyam par 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dge slong gzhi dag dang /_phran tshegs dag dang /_gleng gzhi dag dang /_sil bu dag dang /_'dul ba lnga pa dag dang /_'dul 
[\[279a.6\]]ba drug pa dang /_'dul ba'i ma mo dag dang /_de las gzhan pa 'dul ba dang ldan pa'i mdo dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_gdung ba dang /_kun tu gdung ba dang /_
[\[279a.7\]]yongs su gdung ba dang /_'dod pa dang /_mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_rnam par 'khyam par 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong de las gzhan pa'i mdo sde dag 'don pa na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_gdung ba dang /_kun du gdung ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba dang /_'dod pa dang /_mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_rnam par 'khyam par 'gyur ba 'di dag bton pas ci bya zhes zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las 
[\[279b.2\]]dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bslab pa khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed de bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom la/_sa bon 'phya ba bsgo ba dang /_/khri dang gding dang skrod pa dang /_/phyis gnod 
[\[279b.3\]]'byung ba 'debs pa dang /_/rim pa gnyis su rtsig pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na sngon shing mkhan rgan zhugs byis pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba mi 
[\[279b.4\]]mkhas pa zhig gis shing ljon pa bcad nas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byed du bcug go/_/de nas shing ljon pa de la gnas pa'i lha kha dog shin tu 'das pa gang yin pa de mtshan mo nam sros pa dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[279b.5\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar lha de'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la lha des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 
[\[279b.6\]]sngon shing mkhan rgan zhugs byis pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa zhig gis bdag gi gnas pa dang /_gling dang /_skyob pa dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_gnas mal dang /_gzhi dang /_rten gyi zhugs shing ljon pa gang lags pa de bkum nas dge 'dun gyi 
[\[279b.7\]]gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal te/_btsun pa dgun gyi dgung ni ring /_dgun smad kyi dus kyi tshe ni tshes brgyad kyi bar la 'od ma 'gas pa'i bser ma dag ldang zhing btsun pa bdag gi bu dang phrug gu dag ni chung na bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha zhig 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]la bka' stsal pa/_lha khyod kyi gnas su lha 'di'i gnas byin cig_/lha des 'di lta ste/_ston pa'i bka' lung gis rang gi gnas su lha de'i gnas byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan 
[\[280a.2\]]bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mdang lha kha dog shin tu 'das pa zhig mtshan mo nam sros pa dang nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/_nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 
[\[280a.3\]]mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar lha de'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas nga la lha de 'di skad ces btsun pa sngon shing mkhan rgan zhugs byis pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi 
[\[280a.4\]]mkhas pa zhig gis bdag gi gnas dang /_gling dang /_skyob pa dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_gnas mal dang /_gzhi dang /_rten gyi zhugs shing ljon pa gang lags pa de bkum nas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal te/_btsun pa dgun gyi dgung 
[\[280a.5\]]ni ring /_dgun smad kyi dus kyi tshe ni tshes brgyad kyi bar la 'od ma 'gas pa'i bser ma dag ldang zhing /_btsun pa bdag gi bu dang phrug gu dag ni chung na bdag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes zer bas dge slong dag 'di ltar lha dag de skad ces/_kye ma shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams 
[\[280a.6\]]ni 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos rnams kyis yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa de ni mi mdzes shing tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba de ni 
[\[280a.7\]]dge slong dag shing ljon pa gcod par byed pa las gyur pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis shing ljon pa gcad par mi bya'o/_/gcod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas na 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]'brog gi nags mchog na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis shing ljon pa gcad par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong lag gi bla dag gis shing med pas mkhar lan dag btang bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du 
[\[280b.2\]]rmed par mdzad pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong lag gi bla dag gis mkhar lan dag btang bar gyur/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis shing ljon pa gcad par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal 
[\[280b.3\]]nas/_dge slong lag gi bla dag gis zhugs shing ma mchis pas mkhar lan btang bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo ngas dge slong lag gi bla'i kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong lag gi blas zhag bdun nam brgyad kyis shing ljon pa gcod par 'gyur ba na 
[\[280b.4\]]shing ljon pa de'i drung du dkyil 'khor bya zhing /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_gtor ma yang sbyin par bya/_rgyud chags gsum pa yang bklag par bya/_yon bshad pa yang bya zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag nye bar gzhag par yang bya/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag gi bsngags pa 
[\[280b.5\]]ma yin pa dag kyang brjod par bya/_'di skad ces shing ljon pa 'di la lha gang gnas pa de gnas gzhan tshol cig_/shing ljon pa 'dis mchod rten gyi'am/_chos kyi'am/_dge 'dun gyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes kyang brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu nyi ma bdun nam brgyad 
[\[280b.6\]]kyis shing ljon pa de gcad par bya'o/_/gal te 'gyur ba ston na gcad par mi bya'o/_/'on te mi ston na gcad par bya'o/_/dge slong lag gi blas kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can 
[\[280b.7\]]du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni re zhig byung ba yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar ni mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag rang gi lag gis shing ljon pa gcod cing gcod du 'jud par yang byed/_rtswa sngon po rnga zhing rngar 'jud par yang byed/_me tog dag 'thog cing 'thog tu 'jud par yang

[\[281b.1\]]yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka'

[\[285b.4\]]par nyams par gyur na dge slong la ltung byed lngar 'gyur ro/_/sa bon nyams par ma gyur cing /_sa bon rnam par nyams par ma gyur na nyes byas lngar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sa bon nyams par gyur cig_/sa bon rnam par nyams par gyur cig snyam pas sa 
[\[285b.5\]]bon gyi rigs lnga po dag la khu tshan nam/_'bras khu'am/_sran tshod ldugs par byed cing /_sa bon nyams pa dang /_sa bon rnam par nyams par gyur na/_dge slong la ltung byed lngar 'gyur ro/_/sa bon nyams par ma gyur cing /_sa bon rnam par nyams par ma 
[\[285b.6\]]gyur na nyes byas lngar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gcig gis shing ljon pa gcig gcod na nyes byas gcig dang /_ltung byed gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gcig gis shing ljon pa gnyis gcod na nyes byas gcig dang ltung byed gnyis su 
[\[285b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gcig gis shing ljon pa rab tu mang po gcod na nyes byas gcig dang /_ltung byed rab tu mang por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gnyis kyis shing ljon pa gcig gcod na nyes byas gnyis dang /_ltung byed gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]dge slong gis sbyor ba gnyis kyis shing ljon pa gnyis gcod na nyes byas gnyis dang /_ltung byed gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gnyis kyis shing ljon pa rab tu mang po gcod na nyes byas gnyis dang /_ltung byed rab tu mang por 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[286a.2\]]slong gis sbyor ba rab tu mang pos shing ljon pa gcig gcod na nyes byas rab tu mang po dang /_ltung byed gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba rab tu mang pos shing ljon pa gnyis gcod na nyes byas rab tu mang po dang /_ltung byed gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 
[\[286a.3\]]sbyor ba rab tu mang pos shing ljon pa rab tu mang po gcod na nyes byas rab tu mang po dang /_ltung byed rab tu mang por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gcig gis rtswa gcig rnga na nyes byas gcig dang /_ltung byed gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gcig gis rtswa 
[\[286a.4\]]gnyis rnga na nyes byas gcig dang /_ltung byed gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gcig gis rtswa rab tu mang po rnga na nyes byas gcig dang /_ltung byed rab tu mang por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gnyis kyis rtswa gcig rnga na nyes byas gnyis dang /_
[\[286a.5\]]ltung byed gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gnyis kyis rtswa gnyis rnga na nyes byas gnyis dang /_ltung byed gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba gnyis kyis rtswa rab tu mang po rnga na nyes byas gnyis dang /_ltung byed rab tu mang por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor 
[\[286a.6\]]ba rab tu mang pos rtswa gcig rnga na nyes byas rab tu mang po dang /_ltung byed gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba rab tu mang pos rtswa gnyis rnga na nyes byas rab tu mang po dang /_ltung byed gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sbyor ba rab tu mang pos rtswa rab tu mang po rnga na 
[\[286a.7\]]nyes byas rab tu mang po dang /_ltung byed rab tu mang por 'gyur ro/_/ut+pa la dang /_pad ma la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/dge slong gis sngo nyams par gyur cig_/sngo rnam par nyams par gyur cig snyam pas sngo'i phyogs su tshwa rgo'am/_'gyur byed dam/_
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]lci ba'am/_sas nyug par byed cing /_sngo nyams pa dang /_rnam par nyams par gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sngo nyams par ma gyur cing rnam par nyams par ma gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/nyug pa'i bsam pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis sngo nyams par gyur cig_/sngo rnam par nyams par 
[\[286b.2\]]gyur cig snyam pas sngo'i phyogs su khu tshan nam/_'bras khu'am/_sran tshod 'thor bar byed cing /_sngo nyams pa dang /_rnam par nyams par gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sngo nyams par ma gyur cing rnam par nyams par ma gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'dor ba'i bsam pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/
[\[286b.3\]]dge slong gis sngo nyams par gyur cig_/sngo rnam par nyams par gyur cig snyam pas sngo'i phyogs su 'chag par byed cing sngo nyams pa dang /_rnam par nyams par gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sngo nyams par ma gyur cing sngo rnam par nyams par ma gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'chag pa'i bsam pa la ni 
[\[286b.4\]]ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis sngo nyams par gyur cig_/sngo rnam par nyams par gyur cig snyam pas sngo'i phyogs su yal ga'am/_seg gam/_re lde 'drin par byed cing /_sngo nyams pa dang /_sngo rnam par nyams par gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/sngo nyams par ma gyur cing sngo rnam par nyams par ma gyur 
[\[286b.5\]]na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'drud pa'i bsam pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis sha bal nyams par gyur cig_/sha bal rnam par nyams par gyur cig snyam pas sha bal chags pa'i phyogs su 'chag par byed cing /_sha bal nyams pa dang /_rnam par nyams par gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[286b.6\]]sha bal nyams par ma gyur cing rnam par nyams par ma gyur na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'chag pa'i bsam pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis sha bal nyams par gyur cig_/sha bal rnam par nyams par gyur cig snyam pas sha bal chags pa'i phyogs su khu tshan nam/_'bras 
[\[286b.7\]]khu'am/_sran tshod 'dor bar byed cing sha bal nyams pa dang /_sha bal rnam par nyams par gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/sha bal nyams par ma gyur cing rnam par nyams par ma gyur na nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'dor ba'i bsam pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis sha bal nyams par gyur cig
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]sha bal rnam par nyams par gyur cig snyam pas sha bal chags pa'i phyogs su tshwa rgo'am/_'gyur byed dam/_lci ba'am/_sas nyug par byed cing sha bal nyams pa dang /_sha bal rnam par nyams par gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/sha bal nyams par ma gyur cing rnam par nyams par ma gyur na yang nyes 
[\[287a.2\]]byas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/nyug pa'i bsam pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong gis shing ljon pa'i rtsa rgyun 'byin par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis shing ljon pa'i rtsa ba 'byin par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis shing ljon pa'i shun pa 'chu bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 
[\[287a.3\]]shing ljon pa'i bri 'chu bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis shing ljon pa'i snying po 'chu bar byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis shing ljon pa'i lo ma rlon pa rlog par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis shing ljon pa'i lo ma ser po rlog par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[287a.4\]]gis shing ljon pa'i me tog kha ma bye ba rlog par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis shing ljon pa'i me tog kha bye ba rlog par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis shing ljon pa'i 'bras bu ma smin pa rlog par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis shing ljon pa'i 'bras bu smin pa rlog par 
[\[287a.5\]]byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nya lcibs 'byin par byed na ji srid du chu nas skam la 'don par mi byed kyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/chu nas skam la 'don par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nya tshang 'don par byed na ji srid du chu nas skam la 'don par mi byed kyi bar du nyes byas su 
[\[287a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/chu nas skam la 'don par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis sha mo 'thog par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis pha ba gol gol 'thog par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis rdza ma'am/_phru ba'am/_ril ba'am/_gos sam/_gos kyi gdang la rlam 
[\[287a.7\]]chags pa bskyod par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/rung bar byas te spyod pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/sa bon dang skye ba 'jig pa'i ltung byed de bcu gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
